63 float baseMoveSpeed[MAX_MOVE_TYPE] =
64 {
65  2.5f, // MOVE_WALK
66  7.0f, // MOVE_RUN
67  4.5f, // MOVE_RUN_BACK
68  4.722222f, // MOVE_SWIM
69  2.5f, // MOVE_SWIM_BACK
70  3.141594f, // MOVE_TURN_RATE
71  7.0f, // MOVE_FLIGHT
72  4.5f, // MOVE_FLIGHT_BACK
73  3.14f // MOVE_PITCH_RATE
74 };
75 
76 typedef std::array<uint32, NUM_SPELL_PARTIAL_RESISTS> SpellPartialResistChanceEntry;
77 typedef std::vector<SpellPartialResistChanceEntry> SpellPartialResistDistribution;
78 static inline SpellPartialResistDistribution InitSpellPartialResistDistribution()
79 {
80  // Precalculated chances for 0-100% mitigation
81  // We use integer random instead of floats, so each chance is premultiplied by 100 (100.00 becomes 10000)
82  SpellPartialResistDistribution precalculated;
83  for (uint8 percentage = 0; percentage <= 100; ++percentage)
84  {
85  SpellPartialResistChanceEntry values;
86  for (uint8 column = SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_NONE; column < NUM_SPELL_PARTIAL_RESISTS; ++column)
87  {
88  // We have an exception for first 10% of first two columns and last 10% of last two columns
89  // The rest is generated by the regular formula
90  if ((percentage < 10 && column < SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_PCT_20) || (percentage > 90 && column > SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_PCT_80))
91  {
92  const uint8 arg = (column > SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_PCT_80) ? (100 - percentage) : percentage;
93  if (!(column % SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_PCT_100))
94  values[column] = uint16(::round((100.0f - (arg * 7.5f)) * 100));
95  else
96  values[column] = uint16(arg * 5 * 100);
97  }
98  else
99  values[column] = uint16(::round(std::max(0.5f - (2.5f * std::abs((float(column) * 10 / 100) - (float(percentage) / 100))), 0.0f) * 10000));
100  }
101  precalculated.push_back(values);
102  }
103  // Inflate up to two decimal places of chance %: add all intermediate values and 100% value (100*100 + 1)
104  SpellPartialResistDistribution inflated(10001, {{}});
105  for (size_t row = 0; row < precalculated.size(); ++row)
106  {
107  const size_t next = (row + 1);
108  const size_t shift = (row * 100);
109  const auto& source = precalculated.at(row);
110  // Check if this is the last one first
111  if (next == precalculated.size())
112  {
113  for (uint8 column = SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_NONE; column < NUM_SPELL_PARTIAL_RESISTS; ++column)
114  inflated[shift][column] = source.at(column);
115  break;
116  }
117  const auto& ahead = precalculated.at(next);
118  for (size_t intermediate = 0; intermediate < 100; ++intermediate)
119  {
120  const size_t index = (shift + intermediate);
121  auto& values = inflated[index];
122  for (uint8 column = SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_NONE; column < NUM_SPELL_PARTIAL_RESISTS; ++column)
123  {
124  const uint32 base = source.at(column);
125  const uint32 upcoming = ahead.at(column);
126  const int64 diff = (int64(upcoming) - base);
127  // Use bigger types signed math to avoid potential erratic behavior on some compilers...
128  values[column] = uint32(std::max(0.0, (base + ::round(diff * (intermediate / double(100.0))))));
129  }
130  }
131  }
132  return inflated;
133 }
134 
135 static const SpellPartialResistDistribution SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_DISTRIBUTION = InitSpellPartialResistDistribution();
136 
138 // Methods of class MovementInfo
139 
140 void MovementInfo::Read(ByteBuffer& data)
141 {
142  stime = sWorld.GetCurrentMSTime();
143  data >> moveFlags;
144  data >> moveFlags2;
145  data >> ctime;
146  data >> pos.x;
147  data >> pos.y;
148  data >> pos.z;
149  data >> pos.o;
150 
151  if (HasMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_ONTRANSPORT))
152  {
153  data >> t_guid.ReadAsPacked();
154  data >> t_pos.x;
155  data >> t_pos.y;
156  data >> t_pos.z;
157  data >> t_pos.o;
158  data >> t_time;
159  data >> t_seat;
160 
161  if (moveFlags2 & MOVEFLAG2_INTERP_MOVEMENT)
162  data >> t_time2;
163  }
164 
165  if ((HasMovementFlag(MovementFlags(MOVEFLAG_SWIMMING | MOVEFLAG_FLYING))) || (moveFlags2 & MOVEFLAG2_ALLOW_PITCHING))
166  {
167  data >> s_pitch;
168  }
169 
170  data >> fallTime;
171 
172  if (HasMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_FALLING))
173  {
174  data >> jump.zspeed;
175  data >> jump.cosAngle;
176  data >> jump.sinAngle;
177  data >> jump.xyspeed;
178  if (!jump.startClientTime)
179  {
180  jump.startClientTime = ctime;
181  jump.start = pos;
182  }
183  }
184  else
185  jump.startClientTime = 0;
186 
187  if (HasMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_SPLINE_ELEVATION))
188  {
189  data >> u_unk1;
190  }
191 }
192 
193 void MovementInfo::Write(ByteBuffer& data) const
194 {
195  data << moveFlags;
196  data << moveFlags2;
197  data << stime;
198  data << pos.x;
199  data << pos.y;
200  data << pos.z;
201  data << pos.o;
202 
203  if (HasMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_ONTRANSPORT))
204  {
205  data << t_guid.WriteAsPacked();
206  data << t_pos.x;
207  data << t_pos.y;
208  data << t_pos.z;
209  data << float(t_guid.IsVehicle() ? 0 : t_pos.o); // its probably not right but its not worst that what we had
210  data << t_time;
211  data << t_seat;
212 
213  if (moveFlags2 & MOVEFLAG2_INTERP_MOVEMENT)
214  data << t_time2;
215  }
216 
217  if ((HasMovementFlag(MovementFlags(MOVEFLAG_SWIMMING | MOVEFLAG_FLYING))) || (moveFlags2 & MOVEFLAG2_ALLOW_PITCHING))
218  {
219  data << s_pitch;
220  }
221 
222  data << fallTime;
223 
224  if (HasMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_FALLING))
225  {
226  data << jump.zspeed;
227  data << jump.cosAngle;
228  data << jump.sinAngle;
229  data << jump.xyspeed;
230  }
231 
232  if (HasMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_SPLINE_ELEVATION))
233  {
234  data << u_unk1;
235  }
236 }
237 
238 float MovementInfo::GetOrientationInMotion(MovementFlags flags, float orientation)
239 {
240  float mod = ((flags & MOVEFLAG_BACKWARD) ? M_PI_F : 0);
241 
242  if (flags & (MOVEFLAG_STRAFE_LEFT | MOVEFLAG_STRAFE_RIGHT))
243  {
244  float flip = (M_PI_F * ((flags & MOVEFLAG_STRAFE_LEFT) ? 0.5f : -0.5f));
245  flip = ((flags & MOVEFLAG_BACKWARD) ? -flip : flip);
246  mod += (flip * ((flags & (MOVEFLAG_FORWARD | MOVEFLAG_BACKWARD)) ? 0.5f : 1));
247  }
248  return MapManager::NormalizeOrientation(orientation + mod);
249 }
250 
252 // Methods of class Unit
253 
254 Unit::Unit() :
255  movespline(new Movement::MoveSpline()),
256  m_charmInfo(nullptr),
257  i_motionMaster(this),
258  m_regenTimer(0),
259  m_vehicleInfo(nullptr),
260  m_combatData(new CombatData(this)),
261  m_guardianPetsIterator(m_guardianPets.end()),
262  m_spellUpdateHappening(false),
263  m_spellProcsHappening(false),
264  m_hasHeartbeatProcCounter(0),
265  m_ignoreRangedTargets(false),
266  m_auraUpdateMask(0),
267  m_combatManager(this),
268  m_isMountOverriden(false), m_overridenMountId(0)
269 {
270  m_objectType |= TYPEMASK_UNIT;
271  m_objectTypeId = TYPEID_UNIT;
272 
273  m_updateFlag = (UPDATEFLAG_HIGHGUID | UPDATEFLAG_LIVING | UPDATEFLAG_HAS_POSITION);
274 
275  m_attackTimer[BASE_ATTACK] = 0;
276  m_attackTimer[OFF_ATTACK] = 0;
277  m_attackTimer[RANGED_ATTACK] = 0;
278  m_modAttackSpeedPct[BASE_ATTACK] = 1.0f;
279  m_modAttackSpeedPct[OFF_ATTACK] = 1.0f;
280  m_modAttackSpeedPct[RANGED_ATTACK] = 1.0f;
281 
282  m_extraAttacks = 0;
283 
284  m_state = 0;
285  m_deathState = ALIVE;
286 
287  for (auto& m_currentSpell : m_currentSpells)
288  m_currentSpell = nullptr;
289 
290  // m_Aura = nullptr;
291  // m_AurasCheck = 2000;
292  // m_removeAuraTimer = 4;
293  m_spellAuraHoldersUpdateIterator = m_spellAuraHolders.end();
294  m_AuraFlags = 0;
295 
296  m_Visibility = VISIBILITY_ON;
297  m_AINotifyEvent = nullptr;
298 
299  m_transform = 0;
300  m_canModifyStats = false;
301 
302  for (auto& i : m_spellImmune)
303  i.clear();
304  for (auto& i : m_auraModifiersGroup)
305  {
306  i[BASE_VALUE] = 0.0f;
307  i[BASE_PCT] = 1.0f;
308  i[TOTAL_VALUE] = 0.0f;
309  i[TOTAL_PCT] = 1.0f;
310  }
311 
312  // implement 50% base damage from offhand
313  m_auraModifiersGroup[UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_OFFHAND][TOTAL_PCT] = 0.5f;
314 
315  for (float& m_createStat : m_createStats)
316  m_createStat = 0.0f;
317 
318  for (auto& m_createResistance : m_createResistances)
319  m_createResistance = 0;
320 
321  m_attacking = nullptr;
322  m_modMeleeHitChance = 0.0f;
323  m_modRangedHitChance = 0.0f;
324  m_modSpellHitChance = 0.0f;
325  for (float& i : m_modSpellCritChance)
326  i = 0.0f;
327 
328  for (float& i : m_modCritChance)
329  i = 0.0f;
330  m_modDodgeChance = 0.0f;
331  m_modDodgeChanceDiminishing = 0.0f;
332  m_modParryChance = 0.0f;
333  m_modParryChanceDiminishing = 0.0f;
334  m_modBlockChance = 0.0f;
335 
336  m_canDodge = true;
337  m_canParry = true;
338  m_canBlock = true;
339 
340  m_lastManaUseTimer = 0;
341 
342  // m_victimThreat = 0.0f;
343  for (float& i : m_threatModifier)
344  i = 1.0f;
345  m_isSorted = true;
346  for (float& i : m_speed_rate)
347  i = 1.0f;
348 
349  // remove aurastates allowing special moves
350  for (unsigned int& i : m_reactiveTimer)
351  i = 0;
352 
353  m_isCreatureLinkingTrigger = false;
354  m_isSpawningLinked = false;
355 
356  m_canEnterCombat = true;
357 
358  m_alwaysHit = false;
359  m_noThreat = false;
360  m_supportThreatOnly = false;
361  m_ownerThreatPropagation = true;
362  m_extraAttacksExecuting = false;
363  m_debuggingMovement = false;
364 
365  m_baseSpeedWalk = 1.f;
366  m_baseSpeedRun = 1.f;
367 
368  m_comboPoints = 0;
369 
370  m_aoeImmune = false;
371  m_chainImmune = false;
372 }
373 
374 Unit::~Unit()
375 {
376  // set current spells as deletable
377  for (auto& m_currentSpell : m_currentSpells)
378  {
379  if (m_currentSpell)
380  {
381  m_currentSpell->SetReferencedFromCurrent(false);
382  m_currentSpell = nullptr;
383  }
384  }
385  CleanupDeletedAuras();
386 
387  delete m_combatData;
388  delete m_charmInfo;
389  delete m_vehicleInfo;
390  delete movespline;
391 
392  // those should be already removed at "RemoveFromWorld()" call
393  MANGOS_ASSERT(m_gameObj.empty());
394  MANGOS_ASSERT(m_dynObjGUIDs.empty());
395  MANGOS_ASSERT(m_deletedAuras.empty());
396  MANGOS_ASSERT(m_deletedHolders.empty());
397 }
398 
399 void Unit::Update(const uint32 diff)
400 {
401  if (!IsInWorld())
402  return;
403 #ifdef BUILD_METRICS
404  metric::duration<std::chrono::microseconds> meas("unit.update", {
405  { "entry", std::to_string(GetEntry()) },
406  { "guid", std::to_string(GetGUIDLow()) },
407  { "unit_type", std::to_string(GetGUIDHigh()) },
408  { "map_id", std::to_string(GetMapId()) },
409  { "instance_id", std::to_string(GetInstanceId()) }
410  }, 1000);
411 #endif
412 
413  /*if(p_time > m_AurasCheck)
414  {
415  m_AurasCheck = 2000;
416  _UpdateAura();
417  }else
418  m_AurasCheck -= p_time;*/
419 
420  // WARNING! Order of execution here is important, do not change.
421  // Spells must be processed with event system BEFORE they go to _UpdateSpells.
422  // Or else we may have some SPELL_STATE_FINISHED spells stalled in pointers, that is bad.
423  m_spellUpdateHappening = true;
424 
425  UpdateCooldowns(GetMap()->GetCurrentClockTime());
426  m_events.Update(diff);
427  _UpdateSpells(diff);
428  m_spellUpdateHappening = false;
429 
430  CleanupDeletedAuras();
431 
432  if (m_lastManaUseTimer)
433  {
434  if (diff >= m_lastManaUseTimer)
435  m_lastManaUseTimer = 0;
436  else
437  m_lastManaUseTimer -= diff;
438  }
439 
440  if (CanHaveThreatList())
441  getThreatManager().UpdateForClient(diff);
442 
443  if (!IsDelayCombatTimerSpellCasted())
444  {
445  if (uint32 base_att = getAttackTimer(BASE_ATTACK))
446  setAttackTimer(BASE_ATTACK, (diff >= base_att ? 0 : base_att - diff));
447 
448  if (uint32 base_att = getAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK))
449  setAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK, (diff >= base_att ? 0 : base_att - diff));
450  }
451 
452  if (IsVehicle())
453  {
454  // Initialize vehicle if not done
455  if (IsAlive() && !m_vehicleInfo->IsInitialized())
456  m_vehicleInfo->Initialize();
457 
458  // Update passenger positions if we are the first vehicle
459  if (!IsBoarded())
460  m_vehicleInfo->Update(diff);
461  }
462 
463  // update abilities available only for fraction of time
464  UpdateReactives(diff);
465 
466  UpdateSplineMovement(diff);
467  i_motionMaster.UpdateMotion(diff);
468 
469  if (AI() && IsAlive())
470  {
471 #ifdef BUILD_METRICS
472  metric::duration<std::chrono::microseconds> meas_ai("unit.update.ai", {
473  { "entry", std::to_string(GetEntry()) },
474  { "guid", std::to_string(GetGUIDLow()) },
475  { "unit_type", std::to_string(GetGUIDHigh()) },
476  { "map_id", std::to_string(GetMapId()) },
477  { "instance_id", std::to_string(GetInstanceId()) }
478  }, 1000);
479 #endif
480 
481  AI()->UpdateAI(diff); // AI not react good at real update delays (while freeze in non-active part of map)
482  }
483 
484  GetCombatManager().Update(diff);
485 
486  if (IsAlive())
487  {
488  ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_HEALTHLESS_20_PERCENT, GetHealth() < GetMaxHealth() * 0.20f);
489  ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_HEALTHLESS_35_PERCENT, GetHealth() < GetMaxHealth() * 0.35f);
490  ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_HEALTH_ABOVE_75_PERCENT, GetHealth() > GetMaxHealth() * 0.75f);
491  }
492 
493  WorldObject::Update(diff);
494 }
495 
496 void Unit::Heartbeat()
497 {
498  WorldObject::Heartbeat();
499  SendFlightSplineSyncIfNeeded();
500 
501  for (auto data : m_spellAuraHolders)
502  {
503  SpellAuraHolder* holder = data.second;
504  for (Aura* aura : holder->m_auras)
505  if (aura)
506  aura->OnHeartbeat();
507  }
508 
509  if (m_hasHeartbeatProcCounter)
510  ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(this, nullptr, PROC_FLAG_HEARTBEAT, PROC_FLAG_NONE, PROC_EX_NONE, 0));
511 
512  if (AI())
513  AI()->OnHeartbeat();
514 }
515 
516 void Unit::TriggerAggroLinkingEvent(Unit* enemy)
517 {
518  if (IsLinkingEventTrigger())
519  GetMap()->GetCreatureLinkingHolder()->DoCreatureLinkingEvent(LINKING_EVENT_AGGRO, static_cast<Creature*>(this), enemy);
520 
521  if (IsCreature() && static_cast<Creature*>(this)->GetCreatureGroup())
522  static_cast<Creature*>(this)->GetCreatureGroup()->TriggerLinkingEvent(CREATURE_GROUP_EVENT_AGGRO, enemy);
523 }
524 
525 void Unit::TriggerEvadeEvents()
526 {
527  static_cast<Creature*>(this)->SetLootRecipient(nullptr);
528 
529  if (InstanceData* mapInstance = GetInstanceData())
530  mapInstance->OnCreatureEvade((Creature*)this);
531 
532  if (m_isCreatureLinkingTrigger)
533  GetMap()->GetCreatureLinkingHolder()->DoCreatureLinkingEvent(LINKING_EVENT_EVADE, static_cast<Creature*>(this));
534 
535  if (IsCreature() && static_cast<Creature*>(this)->GetCreatureGroup())
536  static_cast<Creature*>(this)->GetCreatureGroup()->TriggerLinkingEvent(CREATURE_GROUP_EVENT_EVADE, this);
537 
538  CallForAllControlledUnits([](Unit* unit) { unit->HandleExitCombat(false); }, CONTROLLED_PET | CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS | CONTROLLED_CHARM | CONTROLLED_TOTEMS);
539 }
540 
541 void Unit::TriggerHomeEvents()
542 {
543  AI()->JustReachedHome();
544 
545  if (!hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_NO_FOLLOW_MOVEMENT))
546  {
547  Unit* target = GetMaster();
548  if (target && (!target->GetTransportInfo() || target->GetTransportInfo()->GetTransport() != this))
549  GetMotionMaster()->MoveFollow(target, PET_FOLLOW_DIST, PET_FOLLOW_ANGLE, false, IsPlayer() && !HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED));
550  else if (IsLinkingEventTrigger())
551  GetMap()->GetCreatureLinkingHolder()->TryFollowMaster((Creature*)this);
552  }
553 
554  if (IsCreature() && static_cast<Creature*>(this)->GetCreatureGroup())
555  static_cast<Creature*>(this)->GetCreatureGroup()->TriggerLinkingEvent(CREATURE_GROUP_EVENT_HOME, this);
556 }
557 
558 void Unit::EvadeTimerExpired()
559 {
560  // Can happen for any unit with an AI
561  if (!AI())
562  return;
563 
564  // When there is no target to switch to, leave combat
565  if (getThreatManager().getThreatList().size() == 1)
566  {
567  AI()->EnterEvadeMode();
568  return;
569  }
570 
571  getThreatManager().SetTargetSuppressed(GetVictim());
572 }
573 
574 enum SwingErrors
575 {
576  SWING_ERROR_NOT_IN_RANGE,
577  SWING_ERROR_TARGET_NOT_ALIVE,
578  SWING_ERROR_BAD_FACING,
579  SWING_ERROR_CANT_ATTACK_TARGET,
580 };
581 
582 bool Unit::UpdateMeleeAttackingState()
583 {
584  Unit* victim = GetVictim();
585  if (!victim || IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false))
586  return false;
587 
588  if (GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER && (!static_cast<Creature*>(this)->CanInitiateAttack()))
589  return false;
590 
591  if (!isAttackReady(BASE_ATTACK) && !(isAttackReady(OFF_ATTACK) && hasOffhandWeaponForAttack()))
592  return false;
593 
594  uint8 swingError = 0;
595  if (!CanReachWithMeleeAttack(victim))
596  swingError = SWING_ERROR_NOT_IN_RANGE;
597  else if (!HasInArc(victim, 2 * M_PI_F / 3))
598  swingError = SWING_ERROR_BAD_FACING;
599  else if (!victim->IsAlive())
600  swingError = SWING_ERROR_TARGET_NOT_ALIVE;
601  else if (!CanAttackInCombat(victim))
602  swingError = SWING_ERROR_CANT_ATTACK_TARGET;
603  else
604  {
605  if (isAttackReady(BASE_ATTACK))
606  {
607  // prevent base and off attack in same time, delay attack at 0.2 sec
608  if (hasOffhandWeaponForAttack())
609  {
610  if (getAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK) < ATTACK_DISPLAY_DELAY)
611  setAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK, ATTACK_DISPLAY_DELAY);
612  }
613  AttackerStateUpdate(victim, BASE_ATTACK);
614  resetAttackTimer(BASE_ATTACK);
615  }
616  if (hasOffhandWeaponForAttack() && isAttackReady(OFF_ATTACK))
617  {
618  // prevent base and off attack in same time, delay attack at 0.2 sec
619  uint32 base_att = getAttackTimer(BASE_ATTACK);
620  if (base_att < ATTACK_DISPLAY_DELAY)
621  setAttackTimer(BASE_ATTACK, ATTACK_DISPLAY_DELAY);
622  // do attack
623  AttackerStateUpdate(victim, OFF_ATTACK);
624  resetAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK);
625  }
626  }
627 
628  if (swingError)
629  {
630  setAttackTimer(BASE_ATTACK, 100);
631  setAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK, 100);
632  }
633 
634  Player* player = IsClientControlled() ? const_cast<Player*>(GetClientControlling()) : nullptr;
635  if (player && swingError != player->LastSwingErrorMsg())
636  {
637  switch (swingError)
638  {
639  case SWING_ERROR_NOT_IN_RANGE:
640  player->SendAttackSwingNotInRange();
641  break;
642  case SWING_ERROR_TARGET_NOT_ALIVE:
643  player->SendAttackSwingDeadTarget();
644  break;
645  case SWING_ERROR_BAD_FACING:
646  player->SendAttackSwingBadFacingAttack();
647  break;
648  case SWING_ERROR_CANT_ATTACK_TARGET:
649  player->SendAttackSwingCantAttack();
650  break;
651  }
652  player->SwingErrorMsg(swingError);
653  }
654 
655  return swingError != 0;
656 }
657 
658 void Unit::SendHeartBeat()
659 {
660  WorldPacket data(MSG_MOVE_HEARTBEAT, 64);
661  data << GetPackGUID();
662  data << m_movementInfo;
663  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
664 }
665 
666 void Unit::SendMoveRoot(bool state, bool/* broadcastOnly*/)
667 {
668  const Player* client = GetClientControlling();
669 
670  // Apply flags in-place when unit currently is not controlled by a player
671  if (!client)
672  {
673  if (state)
674  {
675  m_movementInfo.RemoveMovementFlag(movementFlagsMask);
676  m_movementInfo.AddMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_ROOT);
677  if (!client)
678  StopMoving(true);
679  }
680  else
681  m_movementInfo.RemoveMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_ROOT);
682 
683  m_movementInfo.stime = World::GetCurrentMSTime(); // mark latest root change
684  }
685 
686  if (!IsInWorld())
687  return;
688 
689  const PackedGuid &guid = GetPackGUID();
690  // Wrath+ spline root: when unit is currently not controlled by a player
691  if (!client)
692  {
693  WorldPacket data(state ? SMSG_SPLINE_MOVE_ROOT : SMSG_SPLINE_MOVE_UNROOT, guid.size());
694  data << guid;
695  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
696  }
697  // Wrath+ force root: when unit is controlled by a player
698  else
699  {
700  auto const counter = client->GetSession()->GetOrderCounter();
701 
702  WorldPacket data(state ? SMSG_FORCE_MOVE_ROOT : SMSG_FORCE_MOVE_UNROOT, guid.size() + 4);
703  data << guid;
704  data << counter;
705  client->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
706  client->GetSession()->GetAnticheat()->OrderSent(data.GetOpcode(), counter);
707  client->GetSession()->IncrementOrderCounter();
708  }
709 }
710 
711 void Unit::resetAttackTimer(WeaponAttackType type)
712 {
713  m_attackTimer[type] = uint32(GetAttackTime(type) * m_modAttackSpeedPct[type]);
714 }
715 
716 bool Unit::CanReachWithMeleeAttack(Unit const* pVictim, float flat_mod /*= 0.0f*/) const
717 {
718  MANGOS_ASSERT(pVictim);
719 
720  float reach = GetCombinedCombatReach(pVictim, true, flat_mod);
721 
722  if (IsMoving() && !IsWalking() && pVictim->IsMoving() && !pVictim->IsWalking())
723  reach += MELEE_LEEWAY;
724 
725  // This check is not related to bounding radius
726  float dx = GetPositionX() - pVictim->GetPositionX();
727  float dy = GetPositionY() - pVictim->GetPositionY();
728 
729  if (IsPlayerControlled())
730  {
731  float dz = GetPositionZ() - pVictim->GetPositionZ();
732  return dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz < reach* reach;
733  }
734 
735  return dx * dx + dy * dy < reach* reach;
736 }
737 
738 void Unit::RemoveSpellsCausingAura(AuraType auraType)
739 {
740  for (AuraList::const_iterator iter = m_modAuras[auraType].begin(); iter != m_modAuras[auraType].end();)
741  {
742  Aura* aura = (*iter);
743  SpellAuraHolder* holder = aura->GetHolder();
744  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(holder);
745  iter = m_modAuras[auraType].begin();
746  }
747 }
748 
749 void Unit::RemoveSpellsCausingAura(AuraType auraType, SpellAuraHolder* except)
750 {
751  for (AuraList::const_iterator iter = m_modAuras[auraType].begin(); iter != m_modAuras[auraType].end();)
752  {
753  // skip `except` aura
754  if ((*iter)->GetHolder() == except)
755  {
756  ++iter;
757  continue;
758  }
759 
760  RemoveAurasDueToSpell((*iter)->GetId(), except);
761  iter = m_modAuras[auraType].begin();
762  }
763 }
764 
765 void Unit::RemoveSpellsCausingAura(AuraType auraType, SpellAuraHolder* except, bool onlyMechanic)
766 {
767  for (AuraList::const_iterator iter = m_modAuras[auraType].begin(); iter != m_modAuras[auraType].end();)
768  {
769  if ((*iter)->GetHolder() == except || (onlyMechanic && GetAllSpellMechanicMask((*iter)->GetSpellProto()) == 0))
770  {
771  ++iter;
772  continue;
773  }
774 
775  RemoveAurasDueToSpell((*iter)->GetId(), except);
776  iter = m_modAuras[auraType].begin();
777  }
778 }
779 
780 void Unit::RemoveSpellsCausingAura(AuraType auraType, ObjectGuid casterGuid)
781 {
782  for (AuraList::const_iterator iter = m_modAuras[auraType].begin(); iter != m_modAuras[auraType].end();)
783  {
784  if ((*iter)->GetCasterGuid() == casterGuid)
785  {
786  RemoveSpellAuraHolder((*iter)->GetHolder());
787  iter = m_modAuras[auraType].begin();
788  }
789  else
790  ++iter;
791  }
792 }
793 
794 void Unit::DealDamageMods(Unit* dealer, Unit* victim, uint32& damage, uint32* absorb, DamageEffectType damagetype, SpellEntry const* spellProto)
795 {
796  if (!victim->IsAlive() || victim->IsTaxiFlying() || victim->GetCombatManager().IsInEvadeMode())
797  {
798  if (absorb)
799  *absorb += damage;
800 
801  damage = 0;
802  return;
803  }
804 
805  uint32 originalDamage = damage;
806 
807  if (dealer) // dealer is optional
808  {
809  // You don't lose health from damage taken from another player while in a sanctuary
810  // You still see it in the combat log though
811  if (!IsAllowedDamageInArea(dealer, victim))
812  {
813  if (absorb)
814  *absorb += damage;
815  damage = 0;
816  }
817  if (UnitAI* ai = dealer->AI()) // Script Event damage Deal
818  ai->DamageDeal(victim, damage, damagetype, spellProto);
819  }
820  // Script Event damage taken
821  if (victim->AI())
822  victim->AI()->DamageTaken(dealer, damage, damagetype, spellProto);
823 
824  if (absorb && originalDamage > damage)
825  *absorb += (originalDamage - damage);
826 }
827 
828 void Unit::Suicide()
829 {
830  DealDamage(this, this, this->GetHealth(), nullptr, INSTAKILL, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, nullptr, false);
831 }
832 
833 void Unit::FallSuicide()
834 {
835  SendEnvironmentalDamageLog(DAMAGE_FALL, this->GetHealth(), 0, 0);
836  DealDamage(this, this, this->GetHealth(), nullptr, SELF_DAMAGE, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, nullptr, false);
837 }
838 
839 uint32 Unit::DealDamage(Unit* dealer, Unit* victim, uint32 damage, CleanDamage const* cleanDamage, DamageEffectType damagetype, SpellSchoolMask damageSchoolMask, SpellEntry const* spellProto, bool durabilityLoss, Spell* spell)
840 {
841  // remove affects from attacker at any non-DoT damage (including 0 damage)
842  if (damagetype != DOT && damagetype != INSTAKILL)
843  {
844  // Since patch 1.5.0 sitting characters always stand up on attack (even if stunned)
845  if (!victim->IsStandState() && (victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || !victim->IsStunned()))
846  victim->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
847  }
848 
849  if (dealer)
850  {
851  // Rage from Damage made (only from direct weapon damage)
852  if (cleanDamage && damagetype == DIRECT_DAMAGE && dealer != victim && dealer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (dealer->GetPowerType() == POWER_RAGE))
853  {
854  uint32 weaponSpeedHitFactor;
855 
856  switch (cleanDamage->attackType)
857  {
858  case BASE_ATTACK:
859  {
860  if (cleanDamage->hitOutCome == MELEE_HIT_CRIT)
861  weaponSpeedHitFactor = uint32(dealer->GetAttackTime(cleanDamage->attackType) / 1000.0f * 7);
862  else
863  weaponSpeedHitFactor = uint32(dealer->GetAttackTime(cleanDamage->attackType) / 1000.0f * 3.5f);
864 
865  static_cast<Player*>(dealer)->RewardRage(cleanDamage->damage, weaponSpeedHitFactor, true);
866 
867  break;
868  }
869  case OFF_ATTACK:
870  {
871  if (cleanDamage->hitOutCome == MELEE_HIT_CRIT)
872  weaponSpeedHitFactor = uint32(dealer->GetAttackTime(cleanDamage->attackType) / 1000.0f * 3.5f);
873  else
874  weaponSpeedHitFactor = uint32(dealer->GetAttackTime(cleanDamage->attackType) / 1000.0f * 1.75f);
875 
876  static_cast<Player*>(dealer)->RewardRage(cleanDamage->damage, weaponSpeedHitFactor, true);
877 
878  break;
879  }
880  case RANGED_ATTACK:
881  break;
882  }
883  }
884  }
885 
886  if ((cleanDamage && cleanDamage->takenOrAbsorbedDamage) &&
887  (damagetype == DIRECT_DAMAGE || damagetype == SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE || damagetype == DOT || damagetype == SELF_DAMAGE || damagetype == SPELL_DAMAGE_SHIELD
888  || damagetype == SPLIT_DAMAGE)
889  && !(spellProto && spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_REACTIVE_DAMAGE_PROC)))
890  {
891  int32 actionInterruptFlags = AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_DAMAGE;
892  if (damagetype != DOT)
893  actionInterruptFlags = (actionInterruptFlags | AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_NON_PERIODIC_DAMAGE);
894 
895  SpellAuraHolderMap& vInterrupts = victim->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
896  std::vector<uint32> cleanupHolder;
897 
898  for (auto& aura : vInterrupts)
899  {
900  if (spellProto && spellProto->Id == aura.second->GetId()) // Not drop auras added by self
901  continue;
902 
903  const SpellEntry* se = aura.second->GetSpellProto();
904 
905  if (!se)
906  continue;
907 
908  // for creatures, spells which started travelling sooner than aura application should not be broken - we assume same for players
909  if (spell)
910  if (spell->GetSpellStartTravelling() <= aura.second->GetAuraApplyMSTime())
911  continue;
912 
913  if (se->AuraInterruptFlags & actionInterruptFlags)
914  cleanupHolder.push_back(aura.second->GetId());
915  }
916 
917  for (auto aura : cleanupHolder)
918  victim->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(aura);
919 
920  if (Spell* spell = victim->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL))
921  if (spell->m_spellInfo->ChannelInterruptFlags & actionInterruptFlags)
922  victim->InterruptSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL);
923  }
924 
925  if (!damage)
926  {
927  // Rage from physical damage received - extend to all units
928  if (cleanDamage && cleanDamage->damage && (damageSchoolMask & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL) && victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (victim->GetPowerType() == POWER_RAGE))
929  if (cleanDamage->hitOutCome != MELEE_HIT_DODGE && cleanDamage->hitOutCome != MELEE_HIT_PARRY)
930  static_cast<Player*>(victim)->RewardRage(cleanDamage->damage, 0, false);
931 
932  return 0;
933  }
934 
935  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_DAMAGE, "DealDamageStart");
936 
937  uint32 health = victim->GetHealth();
938  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_DAMAGE, "deal dmg:%d to health:%d ", damage, health);
939 
940  // duel ends when player has 1 or less hp
941  bool duel_hasEnded = false;
942  if (dealer)
943  {
944  // share damage by auras
945  AuraList const& vShareDamageAuras = victim->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_SHARE_DAMAGE_PCT);
946  for (auto vShareDamageAura : vShareDamageAuras)
947  {
948  // if damage is done by another shared aura, then skip to avoid circular reference (aura 300 is only applied on effect_idx_0
949  if (spellProto && spellProto->Effect[EFFECT_INDEX_0] == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA &&
950  spellProto->EffectApplyAuraName[EFFECT_INDEX_0] == SPELL_AURA_SHARE_DAMAGE_PCT)
951  break;
952 
953  if (Unit* shareTarget = vShareDamageAura->GetCaster())
954  {
955  if (shareTarget != victim && (vShareDamageAura->GetMiscValue() & damageSchoolMask))
956  {
957  SpellEntry const* shareSpell = vShareDamageAura->GetSpellProto();
958  uint32 shareDamage = uint32(damage * vShareDamageAura->GetModifier()->m_amount / 100.0f);
959  Unit::DealDamageMods(dealer, shareTarget, shareDamage, nullptr, damagetype);
960  Unit::DealDamage(dealer, shareTarget, shareDamage, nullptr, damagetype, GetSpellSchoolMask(shareSpell), shareSpell, false);
961  }
962  }
963  }
964 
965  if (dealer->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED) && victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && static_cast<Player*>(victim)->duel && damage >= (health - 1))
966  {
967  // prevent kill only if killed in duel and killed by opponent or opponent controlled creature
968  Player* playerVictim = static_cast<Player*>(victim);
969  if (playerVictim->duel->opponent == dealer || playerVictim->duel->opponent->GetObjectGuid() == dealer->GetControllingPlayer()->GetObjectGuid())
970  damage = health - 1;
971 
972  duel_hasEnded = true;
973  }
974 
975  if (dealer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && dealer != victim)
976  {
977  Player* killer = static_cast<Player*>(dealer);
978 
979  // in bg, count dmg if victim is also a player
980  if (victim->IsPlayer() && (!spellProto || !spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_DO_NOT_COUNT_FOR_PVP_SCOREBOARD)))
981  {
982  if (BattleGround* bg = killer->GetBattleGround())
983  {
984  // FIXME: kept by compatibility. don't know in BG if the restriction apply.
985  bg->UpdatePlayerScore(killer, SCORE_DAMAGE_DONE, damage);
986  }
987  }
988 
989  killer->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_DAMAGE_DONE, damage, 0, victim);
990  killer->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_HIT_DEALT, damage);
991  }
992 
993  if (victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
994  static_cast<Player*>(victim)->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_HIT_RECEIVED, damage);
995 
996  if (victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
997  static_cast<Player*>(victim)->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_TOTAL_DAMAGE_RECEIVED, damage);
998 
999  if (victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
1000  {
1001  if (Creature* creatureVictim = static_cast<Creature*>(victim))
1002  {
1003  if (!creatureVictim->IsPet() && !creatureVictim->HasLootRecipient())
1004  creatureVictim->SetLootRecipient(dealer);
1005 
1006  if (creatureVictim->HasLootRecipient())
1007  {
1008  if (Player* player = creatureVictim->GetLootRecipient())
1009  {
1010  // Note: there is evidence that pre-mop this was split between player/nonplayer instead of group/nongroup
1011  if (!dealer->IsInGroup(player))
1012  victim->m_damageByOthers += damage;
1013  }
1014  }
1015  }
1016  }
1017  }
1018 
1019  if (victim->IsPreventingDeath() && damagetype != INSTAKILL && health <= damage)
1020  damage = health - 1;
1021 
1022  if (health <= damage)
1023  Kill(dealer, victim, damagetype, spellProto, durabilityLoss, duel_hasEnded);
1024  else // if (health <= damage)
1025  HandleDamageDealt(dealer, victim, damage, cleanDamage, damagetype, damageSchoolMask, spellProto, duel_hasEnded);
1026 
1027  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_DAMAGE, "DealDamageEnd returned %d damage", damage);
1028 
1029  return damage;
1030 }
1031 
1032 void Unit::Kill(Unit* killer, Unit* victim, DamageEffectType damagetype, SpellEntry const* spellProto, bool durabilityLoss, bool duel_hasEnded)
1033 {
1034  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_DAMAGE, "DealDamage %s Killed %s", killer ? killer->GetGuidStr().c_str() : "", victim->GetGuidStr().c_str());
1035 
1036  /*
1037  * Preparation: Who gets credit for killing whom, invoke SpiritOfRedemtion?
1038  */
1039  // for loot will be used only if group_tap == nullptr
1040  Player* responsiblePlayer = killer ? killer->GetBeneficiaryPlayer() : nullptr;
1041  Player* tapper = responsiblePlayer;
1042  Group* tapperGroup = nullptr;
1043 
1044  // in creature kill case group/player tap stored for creature
1045  if (victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
1046  {
1047  if (Player* recipient = ((Creature*)victim)->GetOriginalLootRecipient())
1048  tapper = recipient;
1049 
1050  tapperGroup = ((Creature*)victim)->GetGroupLootRecipient();
1051  }
1052  else
1053  {
1054  if (tapper)
1055  tapperGroup = tapper->GetGroup();
1056  }
1057 
1058  // On death scripts
1059  // Spirit of Redemtion Talent
1060  // if talent known but not triggered (check priest class for speedup check)
1061  Aura* spiritOfRedemtionTalentReady = nullptr;
1062  if (damagetype != INSTAKILL && // not called from SPELL_AURA_SPIRIT_OF_REDEMPTION
1063  victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && victim->getClass() == CLASS_PRIEST)
1064  {
1065  AuraList const& vDummyAuras = victim->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
1066  for (AuraList::const_iterator itr = vDummyAuras.begin(); itr != vDummyAuras.end(); ++itr)
1067  {
1068  if ((*itr)->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 1654)
1069  {
1070  spiritOfRedemtionTalentReady = *itr;
1071  break;
1072  }
1073  }
1074  }
1075 
1076  /*
1077  * Generic Actions (ProcEvents, Combat-Log, Kill Rewards, Stop Combat)
1078  */
1079  // call kill spell proc event (before real die and combat stop to triggering auras removed at death/combat stop)
1080  if (damagetype != INSTAKILL)
1081  {
1082  if (responsiblePlayer && responsiblePlayer != victim && (responsiblePlayer == tapper || (responsiblePlayer->GetGroup() == tapperGroup && tapperGroup)))
1083  {
1084  WorldPacket data(SMSG_PARTYKILLLOG, (8 + 8)); // send event PARTY_KILL
1085  data << responsiblePlayer->GetObjectGuid(); // player with killing blow
1086  data << victim->GetObjectGuid(); // victim
1087 
1088  if (tapperGroup)
1089  tapperGroup->BroadcastPacketInRange(victim, data, false, tapperGroup->GetMemberGroup(responsiblePlayer->GetObjectGuid()));
1090 
1091  responsiblePlayer->SendDirectMessage(data);
1092  }
1093  }
1094 
1095  // proc only once for victim
1096  if (killer)
1097  if (Unit* owner = killer->GetOwner())
1098  ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(owner, victim, PROC_FLAG_KILL, PROC_FLAG_NONE, PROC_EX_NONE, 0));
1099 
1100  ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(killer, victim, PROC_FLAG_KILL, PROC_FLAG_NONE, PROC_EX_NONE, 0));
1101 
1102  ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(victim, victim, PROC_FLAG_NONE, PROC_FLAG_DEATH, PROC_EX_NONE, 0));
1103 
1104  // Reward player, his pets, and group/raid members
1105  if (tapper != victim)
1106  {
1107  if (tapperGroup)
1108  tapperGroup->RewardGroupAtKill(victim, tapper);
1109  else if (tapper)
1110  tapper->RewardSinglePlayerAtKill(victim);
1111  }
1112 
1113  /*
1114  * Actions for the killer
1115  */
1116  if (spiritOfRedemtionTalentReady)
1117  {
1118  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_DAMAGE, "DealDamage: Spirit of Redemtion ready");
1119 
1120  // save value before aura remove
1121  uint32 ressSpellId = victim->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_SELF_RES_SPELL);
1122  if (!ressSpellId)
1123  ressSpellId = ((Player*)victim)->GetResurrectionSpellId();
1124 
1125  // Remove all expected to remove at death auras (most important negative case like DoT or periodic triggers)
1126  victim->RemoveAllAurasOnDeath();
1127 
1128  // restore for use at real death
1129  victim->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_SELF_RES_SPELL, ressSpellId);
1130 
1131  // FORM_SPIRITOFREDEMPTION and related auras
1132  victim->CastSpell(nullptr, 27827, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, spiritOfRedemtionTalentReady);
1133  }
1134  else
1135  victim->SetHealth(0);
1136 
1137  if (killer)
1138  {
1139  // Call KilledUnit for creatures
1140  if (UnitAI* ai = killer->AI())
1141  ai->KilledUnit(victim);
1142 
1143  // Call AI OwnerKilledUnit (for any current summoned minipet/guardian/protector)
1144  killer->PetOwnerKilledUnit(victim);
1145  }
1146 
1147  /*
1148  * Actions for the victim
1149  */
1150  if (victim->IsPlayer()) // Killed player
1151  {
1152  Player* playerVictim = static_cast<Player*>(victim);
1153 
1154  if (victim->GetFormationSlot())
1155  {
1156  // simply remove player from the formation on death event
1157  victim->GetFormationSlot()->GetFormationData()->Remove(playerVictim);
1158  }
1159 
1160  // remember victim PvP death for corpse type and corpse reclaim delay
1161  // at original death (not at SpiritOfRedemtionTalent timeout)
1162  if (damagetype != INSTAKILL)
1163  playerVictim->SetPvPDeath(responsiblePlayer != nullptr);
1164 
1165  // achievement stuff
1166  if (responsiblePlayer)
1167  responsiblePlayer->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_SPECIAL_PVP_KILL, 1, 0, victim);
1168  if (killer)
1169  {
1170  if (killer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
1171  playerVictim->GetAchievementMgr().UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILLED_BY_CREATURE, killer->GetEntry());
1172  else if (killer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && victim != killer)
1173  playerVictim->GetAchievementMgr().UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_KILLED_BY_PLAYER, 1, playerVictim->GetTeam());
1174  }
1175 
1176  // 10% durability loss on death
1177  // only if not player and not controlled by player pet. And not at BG
1178  if (durabilityLoss && !responsiblePlayer && !playerVictim->InBattleGround())
1179  {
1180  if (!spellProto || !spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_NO_DURABILITY_LOSS))
1181  {
1182  DEBUG_LOG("DealDamage: Killed %s, looing 10 percents durability", victim->GetGuidStr().c_str());
1183  playerVictim->DurabilityLossAll(0.10f, false);
1184 
1185 
1186  // durability lost message
1187  WorldPacket data(SMSG_DURABILITY_DAMAGE_DEATH, 0);
1188  playerVictim->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
1189  }
1190  }
1191 
1192  if (!spiritOfRedemtionTalentReady) // Before informing Battleground
1193  {
1194  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_DAMAGE, "SET JUST_DIED");
1195  victim->SetDeathState(JUST_DIED);
1196  }
1197 
1198  // playerVictim was in duel, duel must be interrupted
1199  // last damage from non duel opponent or non opponent controlled creature
1200  if (duel_hasEnded)
1201  {
1202  playerVictim->duel->opponent->CombatStopWithPets(true);
1203  playerVictim->CombatStopWithPets(true);
1204 
1205  playerVictim->DuelComplete(DUEL_INTERRUPTED);
1206  }
1207 
1208  if (responsiblePlayer && (!spellProto || !spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_DO_NOT_LOG_PVP_KILL))) // PvP kill
1209  {
1210  if (BattleGround* bg = playerVictim->GetBattleGround())
1211  {
1212  bg->HandleKillPlayer(playerVictim, responsiblePlayer);
1213  }
1214  else if (victim != killer)
1215  {
1216  // selfkills are not handled in outdoor pvp scripts
1217  if (OutdoorPvP* outdoorPvP = sOutdoorPvPMgr.GetScript(playerVictim->GetCachedZoneId()))
1218  outdoorPvP->HandlePlayerKill(responsiblePlayer, playerVictim);
1219  }
1220  }
1221  }
1222  else // Killed creature
1223  JustKilledCreature(killer, static_cast<Creature*>(victim), responsiblePlayer);
1224 
1225  // killing blow achievement
1226  if (responsiblePlayer)
1227  responsiblePlayer->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_GET_KILLING_BLOWS, 1, 0, victim);
1228 
1229  // stop combat
1230  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_DAMAGE, "DealDamageAttackStop");
1231  victim->CombatStop();
1232 }
1233 
1234 void Unit::HandleDamageDealt(Unit* dealer, Unit* victim, uint32& damage, CleanDamage const* cleanDamage, DamageEffectType damagetype, SpellSchoolMask damageSchoolMask, SpellEntry const* spellProto, bool duel_hasEnded)
1235 {
1236  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_DAMAGE, "DealDamageAlive");
1237 
1238  victim->ModifyHealth(-(int32)damage);
1239 
1240  if (dealer)
1241  {
1242  if (victim->CanAttack(dealer) && (!spellProto || !spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_NO_THREAT)) && dealer->CanEnterCombat() && victim->CanEnterCombat())
1243  {
1244  float threat = damage * sSpellMgr.GetSpellThreatMultiplier(spellProto);
1245  victim->AddThreat(dealer, threat, (cleanDamage && cleanDamage->hitOutCome == MELEE_HIT_CRIT), damageSchoolMask, spellProto);
1246  if (damagetype != DOT && damagetype != SPELL_DAMAGE_SHIELD) // DOTs dont put in combat but still cause threat
1247  {
1248  dealer->SetInCombatWith(victim);
1249  victim->SetInCombatWith(dealer);
1250  dealer->GetCombatManager().TriggerCombatTimer(victim);
1251  }
1252  }
1253 
1254  if (dealer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1255  {
1256  // random durability for items (HIT DONE)
1257  if (roll_chance_f(sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_FLOAT_RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_DAMAGE)))
1258  {
1259  EquipmentSlots slot = EquipmentSlots(urand(0, EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END - 1));
1260  static_cast<Player*>(dealer)->DurabilityPointLossForEquipSlot(slot);
1261  }
1262  }
1263  }
1264 
1265  if (victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) // victim is a player
1266  {
1267  // Rage from damage received
1268  if (dealer != victim && victim->GetPowerType() == POWER_RAGE) // player doesnt get rage when he parries
1269  if (cleanDamage && cleanDamage->damage && cleanDamage->hitOutCome != MELEE_HIT_DODGE && cleanDamage->hitOutCome != MELEE_HIT_PARRY)
1270  static_cast<Player*>(victim)->RewardRage(cleanDamage->damage, 0, false);
1271 
1272  // random durability for items (HIT TAKEN)
1273  if (roll_chance_f(sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_FLOAT_RATE_DURABILITY_LOSS_DAMAGE)))
1274  {
1275  EquipmentSlots slot = EquipmentSlots(urand(0, EQUIPMENT_SLOT_END - 1));
1276  static_cast<Player*>(victim)->DurabilityPointLossForEquipSlot(slot);
1277  }
1278  }
1279 
1280  if (dealer)
1281  dealer->InterruptOrDelaySpell(victim, damagetype, spellProto);
1282 
1283  // last damage from duel opponent
1284  if (duel_hasEnded)
1285  {
1286  MANGOS_ASSERT(victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER);
1287  Player* he = static_cast<Player*>(victim);
1288 
1289  MANGOS_ASSERT(he->duel);
1290 
1291  he->SetHealth(1);
1292 
1293  he->duel->opponent->CombatStopWithPets(true);
1294  he->CombatStopWithPets(true);
1295 
1296  he->CastSpell(he, 7267, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // beg
1297  he->DuelComplete(DUEL_WON);
1298  }
1299 }
1300 
1301 void Unit::InterruptOrDelaySpell(Unit* pVictim, DamageEffectType damagetype, SpellEntry const* spellProto)
1302 {
1303  bool dotDamage = (damagetype == DOT || spellProto && spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_TREAT_AS_PERIODIC));
1304  if (damagetype == NODAMAGE || damagetype == SPELL_DAMAGE_SHIELD || damagetype == SPLIT_DAMAGE || (spellProto && spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_DONT_CAUSE_SPELL_PUSHBACK)))
1305  return;
1306 
1307  for (uint32 i = CURRENT_FIRST_NON_MELEE_SPELL; i < CURRENT_MAX_SPELL; ++i)
1308  {
1309  if (Spell* spell = pVictim->GetCurrentSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i)))
1310  {
1311  if (!dotDamage && spell->getState() == SPELL_STATE_CASTING)
1312  {
1313  if (pVictim->IsPlayer())
1314  {
1315  if (spell->m_spellInfo->InterruptFlags & SPELL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_DAMAGE_CANCELS)
1316  pVictim->InterruptSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i));
1317  else
1318  spell->Delayed();
1319  }
1320  }
1321 
1322  if (CurrentSpellTypes(i) == CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL)
1323  {
1324  spell = pVictim->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL); // fetch again because spell couldve been interrupted before
1325  if (spell)
1326  {
1327  if (spell->CanBeInterrupted())
1328  {
1329  uint32 channelInterruptFlags = spell->m_spellInfo->ChannelInterruptFlags;
1330  if (!dotDamage && (channelInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_DAMAGE_CHANNEL_DURATION) != 0) // DOTs do not delay channels
1331  {
1332  if (pVictim != this) // don't shorten the duration of channeling if you damage yourself
1333  spell->DelayedChannel();
1334  }
1335  else if ((channelInterruptFlags & (AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_DAMAGE)))
1336  {
1337  DETAIL_LOG("Spell %u canceled at damage!", spell->m_spellInfo->Id);
1338  pVictim->InterruptSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL);
1339  }
1340 
1341  break;
1342  }
1343  }
1344  }
1345  }
1346  }
1347 }
1348 
1349 struct PetOwnerKilledUnitHelper
1350 {
1351  explicit PetOwnerKilledUnitHelper(Unit* pVictim) : m_victim(pVictim) {}
1352  void operator()(Unit* pTarget) const
1353  {
1354  if (pTarget->AI())
1355  pTarget->AI()->OwnerKilledUnit(m_victim);
1356  }
1357 
1358  Unit* m_victim;
1359 };
1360 
1361 void Unit::JustKilledCreature(Unit* killer, Creature* victim, Player* responsiblePlayer)
1362 {
1363  victim->m_deathState = DEAD; // so that IsAlive, IsDead return expected results in the called hooks of JustKilledCreature
1364  // must be used only shortly before SetDeathState(JUST_DIED) and only for Creatures or Pets
1365 
1366  // some critters required for quests (need normal entry instead possible heroic in any cases)
1367  if (killer && victim->GetCreatureType() == CREATURE_TYPE_CRITTER && killer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1368  {
1369  if (CreatureInfo const* normalInfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(victim->GetEntry()))
1370  static_cast<Player*>(killer)->KilledMonster(normalInfo, victim);
1371  }
1372 
1373  // Interrupt channeling spell when a Possessed Summoned is killed
1374  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(victim->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_CREATED_BY_SPELL));
1375  if (spellInfo && spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_TOGGLE_FARSIGHT) && spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_IS_CHANNELED))
1376  {
1377  Unit* creator = victim->GetMap()->GetUnit(victim->GetCreatorGuid());
1378  if (creator && creator->GetCharmGuid() == victim->GetObjectGuid())
1379  {
1380  Spell* channeledSpell = creator->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL);
1381  if (channeledSpell && channeledSpell->m_spellInfo->Id == spellInfo->Id)
1382  creator->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
1383  }
1384  }
1385 
1386  /* ******************************* Inform various hooks ************************************ */
1387  // Inform victim's AI
1388  if (victim->AI())
1389  victim->AI()->JustDied(killer);
1390 
1391  // Inform Owner
1392  Unit* pOwner = victim->GetMaster();
1393  if (victim->IsTemporarySummon())
1394  {
1395  if (victim->GetSpawnerGuid().IsCreatureOrVehicle())
1396  if (Creature* pSummoner = victim->GetMap()->GetCreature(victim->GetSpawnerGuid()))
1397  if (pSummoner->AI())
1398  pSummoner->AI()->SummonedCreatureJustDied(victim);
1399  }
1400  else if (pOwner && pOwner->AI())
1401  pOwner->AI()->SummonedCreatureJustDied(victim);
1402 
1403  // Inform Instance Data and Linking
1404  if (InstanceData* mapInstance = victim->GetInstanceData())
1405  mapInstance->OnCreatureDeath(victim);
1406 
1407  if (responsiblePlayer) // killedby Player, inform BG
1408  if (BattleGround* bg = responsiblePlayer->GetBattleGround())
1409  bg->HandleKillUnit(victim, responsiblePlayer);
1410 
1411  // Notify the outdoor pvp script
1412  if (OutdoorPvP* outdoorPvP = sOutdoorPvPMgr.GetScript(responsiblePlayer ? responsiblePlayer->GetCachedZoneId() : victim->GetZoneId()))
1413  {
1414  outdoorPvP->HandleCreatureDeath(victim);
1415 
1416  if (responsiblePlayer) // killed by Player; inform outdoorPvP
1417  outdoorPvP->HandlePlayerKill(responsiblePlayer, victim);
1418  }
1419 
1420  // Start creature death script
1421  victim->GetMap()->ScriptsStart(SCRIPT_TYPE_CREATURE_DEATH, victim->GetEntry(), victim, responsiblePlayer ? responsiblePlayer : killer);
1422 
1423  if (victim->IsLinkingEventTrigger())
1424  victim->GetMap()->GetCreatureLinkingHolder()->DoCreatureLinkingEvent(LINKING_EVENT_DIE, victim);
1425 
1426  if (CreatureGroup* cGroup = victim->GetCreatureGroup())
1427  {
1428  if (FormationData* fData = cGroup->GetFormationData())
1429  fData->OnDeath(victim);
1430  cGroup->TriggerLinkingEvent(CREATURE_GROUP_EVENT_MEMBER_DIED, victim);
1431  }
1432 
1433  // Dungeon specific stuff
1434  if (victim->GetInstanceId())
1435  {
1436  Map* map = victim->GetMap();
1437  if (map->IsDungeon())
1438  {
1439  Player* creditedPlayer = killer ? killer->GetBeneficiaryPlayer() : nullptr; // TODO: do instance binding anyway if the charmer/owner is offline
1440  if (map->IsRaidOrHeroicDungeon() && victim->GetCreatureInfo()->ExtraFlags & CREATURE_EXTRA_FLAG_INSTANCE_BIND)
1441  {
1442  static_cast<DungeonMap*>(map)->PermBindAllPlayers(creditedPlayer);
1443  }
1444  static_cast<DungeonMap*>(map)->GetPersistanceState()->UpdateEncounterState(ENCOUNTER_CREDIT_KILL_CREATURE, victim->GetEntry());
1445  }
1446  }
1447 
1448  bool isPet = victim->IsPet();
1449 
1450  /* ********************************* Set Death finally ************************************* */
1451  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_DAMAGE, "SET JUST_DIED");
1452  victim->SetDeathState(JUST_DIED); // if !spiritOfRedemtionTalentReady always true for unit
1453 
1454  victim->SetKillerGuid(killer ? killer->GetObjectGuid() : ObjectGuid());
1455 
1456  if (isPet)
1457  return; // Pets might have been unsummoned at this place, do not handle them further!
1458 
1459  /* ******************************** Prepare loot if can ************************************ */
1460  victim->DeleteThreatList();
1461 
1462  // only lootable if it has loot or can drop gold
1463  victim->PrepareBodyLootState();
1464 }
1465 
1466 void Unit::PetOwnerKilledUnit(Unit* pVictim)
1467 {
1468  // for minipet and guardians (including protector)
1469  CallForAllControlledUnits(PetOwnerKilledUnitHelper(pVictim), CONTROLLED_MINIPET | CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS | CONTROLLED_CHARM);
1470 }
1471 
1472 void Unit::CastStop(uint32 except_spellid)
1473 {
1474  for (uint32 i = CURRENT_FIRST_NON_MELEE_SPELL; i < CURRENT_MAX_SPELL; ++i)
1475  if (m_currentSpells[i] && m_currentSpells[i]->m_spellInfo->Id != except_spellid)
1476  InterruptSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i), false);
1477 }
1478 
1479 SpellCastResult Unit::CastSpell(Unit* Victim, uint32 spellId, uint32 triggeredFlags, Item* castItem, Aura* triggeredByAura, ObjectGuid originalCaster, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy)
1480 {
1481  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
1482 
1483  if (!spellInfo)
1484  {
1485  if (triggeredByAura)
1486  sLog.outError("CastSpell: unknown spell id %i by caster: %s triggered by aura %u (eff %u)", spellId, GetGuidStr().c_str(), triggeredByAura->GetId(), triggeredByAura->GetEffIndex());
1487  else
1488  sLog.outError("CastSpell: unknown spell id %i by caster: %s", spellId, GetGuidStr().c_str());
1489  return SPELL_NOT_FOUND;
1490  }
1491 
1492  return CastSpell(Victim, spellInfo, triggeredFlags, castItem, triggeredByAura, originalCaster, triggeredBy);
1493 }
1494 
1495 SpellCastResult Unit::CastSpell(Unit* Victim, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, uint32 triggeredFlags, Item* castItem, Aura* triggeredByAura, ObjectGuid originalCaster, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy)
1496 {
1497  if (!spellInfo)
1498  {
1499  if (triggeredByAura)
1500  sLog.outError("CastSpell: unknown spell by caster: %s triggered by aura %u (eff %u)", GetGuidStr().c_str(), triggeredByAura->GetId(), triggeredByAura->GetEffIndex());
1501  else
1502  sLog.outError("CastSpell: unknown spell by caster: %s", GetGuidStr().c_str());
1503 
1504  return SPELL_NOT_FOUND;
1505  }
1506 
1507  if (castItem)
1508  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "WORLD: cast Item spellId - %i", spellInfo->Id);
1509 
1510  if (triggeredByAura)
1511  {
1512  if (!originalCaster)
1513  originalCaster = triggeredByAura->GetCasterGuid();
1514 
1515  triggeredBy = triggeredByAura->GetSpellProto();
1516  }
1517  else
1518  {
1519  triggeredByAura = GetTriggeredByClientAura(spellInfo->Id);
1520  if (triggeredByAura)
1521  {
1522  triggeredFlags &= TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED;
1523  triggeredBy = triggeredByAura->GetSpellProto();
1524  }
1525  }
1526 
1527  Spell* spell = new Spell(this, spellInfo, triggeredFlags, originalCaster, triggeredBy);
1528 
1529  SpellCastTargets targets;
1530  targets.setUnitTarget(Victim);
1531 
1532  if (spellInfo->Targets & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
1533  targets.setDestination(Victim->GetPositionX(), Victim->GetPositionY(), Victim->GetPositionZ());
1534  if (spellInfo->Targets & TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION)
1535  if (WorldObject* caster = spell->GetCastingObject())
1536  targets.setSource(caster->GetPositionX(), caster->GetPositionY(), caster->GetPositionZ());
1537 
1538  spell->SetCastItem(castItem);
1539  return spell->SpellStart(&targets, triggeredByAura);
1540 }
1541 
1542 SpellCastResult Unit::CastCustomSpell(Unit* Victim, uint32 spellId, int32 const* bp0, int32 const* bp1, int32 const* bp2, uint32 triggeredFlags, Item* castItem, Aura* triggeredByAura, ObjectGuid originalCaster, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy)
1543 {
1544  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
1545 
1546  if (!spellInfo)
1547  {
1548  if (triggeredByAura)
1549  sLog.outError("CastCustomSpell: unknown spell id %i by caster: %s triggered by aura %u (eff %u)", spellId, GetGuidStr().c_str(), triggeredByAura->GetId(), triggeredByAura->GetEffIndex());
1550  else
1551  sLog.outError("CastCustomSpell: unknown spell id %i by caster: %s", spellId, GetGuidStr().c_str());
1552  return SPELL_NOT_FOUND;
1553  }
1554 
1555  return CastCustomSpell(Victim, spellInfo, bp0, bp1, bp2, triggeredFlags, castItem, triggeredByAura, originalCaster, triggeredBy);
1556 }
1557 
1558 SpellCastResult Unit::CastCustomSpell(Unit* Victim, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, int32 const* bp0, int32 const* bp1, int32 const* bp2, uint32 triggeredFlags, Item* castItem, Aura* triggeredByAura, ObjectGuid originalCaster, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy)
1559 {
1560  if (!spellInfo)
1561  {
1562  if (triggeredByAura)
1563  sLog.outError("CastCustomSpell: unknown spell by caster: %s triggered by aura %u (eff %u)", GetGuidStr().c_str(), triggeredByAura->GetId(), triggeredByAura->GetEffIndex());
1564  else
1565  sLog.outError("CastCustomSpell: unknown spell by caster: %s", GetGuidStr().c_str());
1566  return SPELL_NOT_FOUND;
1567  }
1568 
1569  if (castItem)
1570  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "WORLD: cast Item spellId - %i", spellInfo->Id);
1571 
1572  if (triggeredByAura)
1573  {
1574  if (!originalCaster)
1575  originalCaster = triggeredByAura->GetCasterGuid();
1576 
1577  triggeredBy = triggeredByAura->GetSpellProto();
1578  }
1579 
1580  Spell* spell = new Spell(this, spellInfo, triggeredFlags, originalCaster, triggeredBy);
1581 
1582  if (bp0)
1583  spell->m_currentBasePoints[EFFECT_INDEX_0] = *bp0;
1584 
1585  if (bp1)
1586  spell->m_currentBasePoints[EFFECT_INDEX_1] = *bp1;
1587 
1588  if (bp2)
1589  spell->m_currentBasePoints[EFFECT_INDEX_2] = *bp2;
1590 
1591  SpellCastTargets targets;
1592  targets.setUnitTarget(Victim);
1593  spell->SetCastItem(castItem);
1594 
1595  if (spellInfo->Targets & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
1596  targets.setDestination(Victim->GetPositionX(), Victim->GetPositionY(), Victim->GetPositionZ());
1597  if (spellInfo->Targets & TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION)
1598  if (WorldObject* caster = spell->GetCastingObject())
1599  targets.setSource(caster->GetPositionX(), caster->GetPositionY(), caster->GetPositionZ());
1600 
1601  return spell->SpellStart(&targets, triggeredByAura);
1602 }
1603 
1604 // used for scripting
1605 SpellCastResult Unit::CastSpell(float x, float y, float z, uint32 spellId, uint32 triggeredFlags, Item* castItem, Aura* triggeredByAura, ObjectGuid originalCaster, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy)
1606 {
1607  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
1608 
1609  if (!spellInfo)
1610  {
1611  if (triggeredByAura)
1612  sLog.outError("CastSpell(x,y,z): unknown spell id %i by caster: %s triggered by aura %u (eff %u)", spellId, GetGuidStr().c_str(), triggeredByAura->GetId(), triggeredByAura->GetEffIndex());
1613  else
1614  sLog.outError("CastSpell(x,y,z): unknown spell id %i by caster: %s", spellId, GetGuidStr().c_str());
1615  return SPELL_NOT_FOUND;
1616  }
1617 
1618  return CastSpell(x, y, z, spellInfo, triggeredFlags, castItem, triggeredByAura, originalCaster, triggeredBy);
1619 }
1620 
1621 // used for scripting
1622 SpellCastResult Unit::CastSpell(float x, float y, float z, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, uint32 triggeredFlags, Item* castItem, Aura* triggeredByAura, ObjectGuid originalCaster, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy)
1623 {
1624  if (!spellInfo)
1625  {
1626  if (triggeredByAura)
1627  sLog.outError("CastSpell(x,y,z): unknown spell by caster: %s triggered by aura %u (eff %u)", GetGuidStr().c_str(), triggeredByAura->GetId(), triggeredByAura->GetEffIndex());
1628  else
1629  sLog.outError("CastSpell(x,y,z): unknown spell by caster: %s", GetGuidStr().c_str());
1630  return SPELL_NOT_FOUND;
1631  }
1632 
1633  if (castItem)
1634  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "WORLD: cast Item spellId - %i", spellInfo->Id);
1635 
1636  if (triggeredByAura)
1637  {
1638  if (!originalCaster)
1639  originalCaster = triggeredByAura->GetCasterGuid();
1640 
1641  triggeredBy = triggeredByAura->GetSpellProto();
1642  }
1643 
1644  Spell* spell = new Spell(this, spellInfo, triggeredFlags, originalCaster, triggeredBy);
1645 
1646  SpellCastTargets targets;
1647 
1648  if (spellInfo->Targets & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
1649  targets.setDestination(x, y, z);
1650  if (spellInfo->Targets & TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION)
1651  targets.setSource(x, y, z);
1652 
1653  // Spell cast with x,y,z but without dbc target-mask, set destination
1654  if (!(targets.m_targetMask & (TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION | TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION)))
1655  targets.setDestination(x, y, z);
1656 
1657  spell->SetCastItem(castItem);
1658  return spell->SpellStart(&targets, triggeredByAura);
1659 }
1660 
1661 SpellCastResult Unit::CastSpell(SpellCastTargets& targets, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, uint32 triggeredFlags, Item* castItem, Aura* triggeredByAura, ObjectGuid originalCaster, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy)
1662 {
1663  if (!spellInfo)
1664  {
1665  if (triggeredByAura)
1666  sLog.outError("CastSpell: unknown spell by caster: %s triggered by aura %u (eff %u)", GetGuidStr().c_str(), triggeredByAura->GetId(), triggeredByAura->GetEffIndex());
1667  else
1668  sLog.outError("CastSpell: unknown spell by caster: %s", GetGuidStr().c_str());
1669  return SPELL_NOT_FOUND;
1670  }
1671 
1672  if (castItem)
1673  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "WORLD: cast Item spellId - %i", spellInfo->Id);
1674 
1675  if (triggeredByAura)
1676  {
1677  if (!originalCaster)
1678  originalCaster = triggeredByAura->GetCasterGuid();
1679 
1680  triggeredBy = triggeredByAura->GetSpellProto();
1681  }
1682 
1683  Spell* spell = new Spell(this, spellInfo, triggeredFlags, originalCaster, triggeredBy);
1684 
1685  spell->SetCastItem(castItem);
1686  return spell->SpellStart(&targets, triggeredByAura);
1687 }
1688 
1689 SpellCastResult Unit::CastCustomSpell(SpellCastTargets& targets, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, int32 const* bp0, int32 const* bp1, int32 const* bp2, uint32 triggeredFlags, Item* castItem, Aura* triggeredByAura, ObjectGuid originalCaster, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy)
1690 {
1691  if (!spellInfo)
1692  {
1693  if (triggeredByAura)
1694  sLog.outError("CastSpell: unknown spell by caster: %s triggered by aura %u (eff %u)", GetGuidStr().c_str(), triggeredByAura->GetId(), triggeredByAura->GetEffIndex());
1695  else
1696  sLog.outError("CastSpell: unknown spell by caster: %s", GetGuidStr().c_str());
1697  return SPELL_NOT_FOUND;
1698  }
1699 
1700  if (castItem)
1701  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "WORLD: cast Item spellId - %i", spellInfo->Id);
1702 
1703  if (triggeredByAura)
1704  {
1705  if (!originalCaster)
1706  originalCaster = triggeredByAura->GetCasterGuid();
1707 
1708  triggeredBy = triggeredByAura->GetSpellProto();
1709  }
1710 
1711  Spell* spell = new Spell(this, spellInfo, triggeredFlags, originalCaster, triggeredBy);
1712 
1713  if (bp0)
1714  spell->m_currentBasePoints[EFFECT_INDEX_0] = *bp0;
1715 
1716  if (bp1)
1717  spell->m_currentBasePoints[EFFECT_INDEX_1] = *bp1;
1718 
1719  if (bp2)
1720  spell->m_currentBasePoints[EFFECT_INDEX_2] = *bp2;
1721 
1722  spell->SetCastItem(castItem);
1723  return spell->SpellStart(&targets, triggeredByAura);
1724 }
1725 
1726 SpellCastResult Unit::CastSpell(SpellCastArgs& args, uint32 spellId, uint32 triggeredFlags, Item* castItem, Aura* triggeredByAura, ObjectGuid originalCaster, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy)
1727 {
1728  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
1729 
1730  if (!spellInfo)
1731  {
1732  if (triggeredByAura)
1733  sLog.outError("CastSpell: unknown spell id %i by caster: %s triggered by aura %u (eff %u)", spellId, GetGuidStr().c_str(), triggeredByAura->GetId(), triggeredByAura->GetEffIndex());
1734  else
1735  sLog.outError("CastSpell: unknown spell id %i by caster: %s", spellId, GetGuidStr().c_str());
1736  return SPELL_NOT_FOUND;
1737  }
1738 
1739  return CastSpell(args, spellInfo, triggeredFlags, castItem, triggeredByAura, originalCaster, triggeredBy);
1740 }
1741 
1742 SpellCastResult Unit::CastSpell(SpellCastArgs& args, uint32 spellId, TriggerCastFlags triggeredFlags, Item* castItem, Aura* triggeredByAura, ObjectGuid originalCaster, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy)
1743 {
1744  return CastSpell(args, spellId, uint32(triggeredFlags), castItem, triggeredByAura, originalCaster, triggeredBy);
1745 }
1746 
1747 SpellCastResult Unit::CastSpell(SpellCastArgs& args, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, TriggerCastFlags triggeredFlags, Item* castItem, Aura* triggeredByAura, ObjectGuid originalCaster, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy)
1748 {
1749  return CastSpell(args, spellInfo, uint32(triggeredFlags), castItem, triggeredByAura, originalCaster, triggeredBy);
1750 }
1751 
1752 SpellCastResult Unit::CastSpell(SpellCastArgs& args, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, uint32 triggeredFlags, Item* castItem, Aura* triggeredByAura, ObjectGuid originalCaster, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy)
1753 {
1754  if (!spellInfo)
1755  {
1756  if (triggeredByAura)
1757  sLog.outError("CastSpell: unknown spell by caster: %s triggered by aura %u (eff %u)", GetGuidStr().c_str(), triggeredByAura->GetId(), triggeredByAura->GetEffIndex());
1758  else
1759  sLog.outError("CastSpell: unknown spell by caster: %s", GetGuidStr().c_str());
1760  return SPELL_NOT_FOUND;
1761  }
1762 
1763  if (castItem)
1764  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "WORLD: cast Item spellId - %i", spellInfo->Id);
1765 
1766  if (triggeredByAura)
1767  {
1768  if (!originalCaster)
1769  originalCaster = triggeredByAura->GetCasterGuid();
1770 
1771  triggeredBy = triggeredByAura->GetSpellProto();
1772  }
1773 
1774  Spell* spell = new Spell(this, spellInfo, triggeredFlags, originalCaster, triggeredBy);
1775 
1776  SpellCastTargets targets;
1777 
1778  if (Unit* target = args.GetTarget())
1779  targets.setUnitTarget(target);
1780 
1781  if (args.IsScriptValueSet())
1782  spell->SetScriptValue(args.GetScriptValue());
1783 
1784  if (int32* bp = args.GetBasePoints(EFFECT_INDEX_0))
1785  spell->m_currentBasePoints[EFFECT_INDEX_0] = *bp;
1786 
1787  if (int32* bp = args.GetBasePoints(EFFECT_INDEX_1))
1788  spell->m_currentBasePoints[EFFECT_INDEX_1] = *bp;
1789 
1790  if (int32* bp = args.GetBasePoints(EFFECT_INDEX_2))
1791  spell->m_currentBasePoints[EFFECT_INDEX_2] = *bp;
1792 
1793  if (args.IsDestinationSet())
1794  targets.setDestination(args.GetDestination());
1795 
1796  spell->SetCastItem(castItem);
1797  return spell->SpellStart(&targets, triggeredByAura);
1798 }
1799 
1800 // Obsolete func need remove, here only for comotability vs another patches
1801 uint32 Unit::SpellNonMeleeDamageLog(Unit* pVictim, uint32 spellID, uint32 damage)
1802 {
1803  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellID);
1804  SpellNonMeleeDamage spellDamageInfo(this, pVictim, spellInfo->Id, SpellSchoolMask(spellInfo->SchoolMask));
1805  CalculateSpellDamage(&spellDamageInfo, damage, spellInfo);
1806  spellDamageInfo.target->CalculateAbsorbResistBlock(this, &spellDamageInfo, spellInfo);
1807  Unit::DealDamageMods(this, spellDamageInfo.target, spellDamageInfo.damage, &spellDamageInfo.absorb, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
1808  SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(&spellDamageInfo);
1809  DealSpellDamage(this, &spellDamageInfo, true, true);
1810  return spellDamageInfo.damage;
1811 }
1812 
1813 void Unit::CalculateSpellDamage(SpellNonMeleeDamage* spellDamageInfo, int32 damage, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, WeaponAttackType attackType)
1814 {
1815  SpellSchoolMask damageSchoolMask = spellDamageInfo->schoolMask;
1816  Unit* pVictim = spellDamageInfo->target;
1817 
1818  if (damage < 0)
1819  return;
1820 
1821  if (!pVictim)
1822  return;
1823 
1824  // Check spell crit chance
1825  bool crit = RollSpellCritOutcome(this, pVictim, damageSchoolMask, spellInfo);
1826 
1827  // damage bonus (per damage class)
1828  switch (spellInfo->DmgClass)
1829  {
1830  // Melee and Ranged Spells
1831  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
1832  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
1833  {
1834  // Calculate damage bonus
1835  damage = MeleeDamageBonusDone(pVictim, damage, attackType, damageSchoolMask, spellInfo, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
1836  damage = pVictim->MeleeDamageBonusTaken(this, damage, attackType, damageSchoolMask, spellInfo, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
1837  }
1838  break;
1839  // Magical Attacks
1840  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE:
1841  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC:
1842  {
1843  // Calculate damage bonus
1844  damage = SpellDamageBonusDone(pVictim, damageSchoolMask, spellInfo, damage, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
1845  damage = pVictim->SpellDamageBonusTaken(this, damageSchoolMask, spellInfo, damage, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
1846  }
1847  break;
1848  }
1849 
1850  // if crit add critical bonus
1851  if (crit && !spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_IGNORE_CASTER_MODIFIERS))
1852  {
1853  spellDamageInfo->HitInfo |= SPELL_HIT_TYPE_CRIT;
1854  damage = CalculateCritAmount(pVictim, damage, spellInfo);
1855  }
1856 
1857  // only from players
1858  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1859  {
1860  uint32 reduction_affected_damage = CalcNotIgnoreDamageReduction(damage, damageSchoolMask);
1861  damage -= pVictim->GetResilienceRatingDamageReduction(reduction_affected_damage, SpellDmgClass(spellInfo->DmgClass));
1862  }
1863 
1864  // damage mitigation
1865  if (damage > 0)
1866  {
1867  // physical damage => armor
1868  if (damageSchoolMask & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL)
1869  {
1870  uint32 armor_affected_damage = CalcNotIgnoreDamageReduction(damage, damageSchoolMask);
1871  damage = damage - armor_affected_damage + CalcArmorReducedDamage(this, pVictim, armor_affected_damage);
1872  }
1873  }
1874  else
1875  damage = 0;
1876  spellDamageInfo->damage = damage;
1877 }
1878 
1879 void Unit::DealSpellDamage(Unit* affectiveCaster, SpellNonMeleeDamage* spellDamageInfo, bool durabilityLoss, bool resetLeash)
1880 {
1881  if (!spellDamageInfo)
1882  return;
1883 
1884  Unit* victim = spellDamageInfo->target;
1885  if (!victim)
1886  return;
1887 
1888  if (!victim->IsAlive() || victim->IsTaxiFlying() || victim->GetCombatManager().IsInEvadeMode())
1889  return;
1890 
1891  SpellEntry const* spellProto = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellDamageInfo->SpellID);
1892  if (spellProto == nullptr)
1893  {
1894  sLog.outError("Unit::DealSpellDamage have wrong damageInfo->SpellID: %u", spellDamageInfo->SpellID);
1895  return;
1896  }
1897 
1898  // You don't lose health from damage taken from another player while in a sanctuary
1899  // You still see it in the combat log though
1900  if (!IsAllowedDamageInArea(affectiveCaster, victim))
1901  return;
1902 
1903  // Call default DealDamage (send critical in hit info for threat calculation)
1904  CleanDamage cleanDamage(spellDamageInfo->damage, BASE_ATTACK, spellDamageInfo->HitInfo & SPELL_HIT_TYPE_CRIT ? MELEE_HIT_CRIT : MELEE_HIT_NORMAL, (spellDamageInfo->damage > 0 || spellDamageInfo->absorb > 0));
1905  DealDamage(affectiveCaster, victim, spellDamageInfo->damage, &cleanDamage, resetLeash ? SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE : SPELL_DAMAGE_SHIELD, spellDamageInfo->schoolMask, spellProto, durabilityLoss, spellDamageInfo->spell);
1906 }
1907 
1908 uint32 Unit::GetResilienceRatingDamageReduction(uint32 damage, SpellDmgClass dmgClass, bool /*periodic = false*/, Powers pwrType/* = POWER_HEALtH*/) const
1909 {
1910  // NOTE: Resilince increases all 3 ratings at once, verify if specialized cases actually exist
1911  CombatRating rating;
1912  switch (dmgClass)
1913  {
1914  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE: rating = CR_CRIT_TAKEN_MELEE; break;
1915  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED: rating = CR_CRIT_TAKEN_RANGED; break;
1916  default: rating = CR_CRIT_TAKEN_SPELL; break;
1917  }
1918 
1919  switch (uint32(pwrType))
1920  {
1921  case POWER_MANA: return GetCombatRatingDamageReduction(rating, 2.2f, 100.0f, damage); // Mana drains: 2.4.0+
1922  }
1923  return GetCombatRatingDamageReduction(rating, 2.0f, 100.0f, damage);
1924 }
1925 
1926 // TODO for melee need create structure as in
1927 void Unit::CalculateMeleeDamage(Unit* pVictim, CalcDamageInfo* calcDamageInfo, WeaponAttackType attackType /*= BASE_ATTACK*/)
1928 {
1929  calcDamageInfo->attacker = this;
1930  calcDamageInfo->target = pVictim;
1931  calcDamageInfo->attackType = attackType;
1932  calcDamageInfo->totalDamage = 0;
1933  calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage = 0;
1934  calcDamageInfo->absorb = 0;
1935  calcDamageInfo->blocked_amount = 0;
1936 
1937  calcDamageInfo->TargetState = VICTIMSTATE_UNAFFECTED;
1938  calcDamageInfo->HitInfo = HITINFO_NORMALSWING;
1939  calcDamageInfo->procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_NONE;
1940  calcDamageInfo->procVictim = PROC_FLAG_NONE;
1941  calcDamageInfo->procEx = PROC_EX_NONE;
1942  calcDamageInfo->hitOutCome = MELEE_HIT_EVADE;
1943 
1944  if (!pVictim)
1945  return;
1946 
1947  if (!this->IsAlive() || !pVictim->IsAlive())
1948  return;
1949 
1950  // Select HitInfo/procAttacker/procVictim flag based on attack type
1951  switch (attackType)
1952  {
1953  case BASE_ATTACK:
1954  calcDamageInfo->procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_MELEE_SWING | PROC_FLAG_MAIN_HAND_WEAPON_SWING;
1955  calcDamageInfo->procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_MELEE_SWING;
1956  calcDamageInfo->HitInfo = HITINFO_NORMALSWING2;
1957  break;
1958  case OFF_ATTACK:
1959  calcDamageInfo->procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_MELEE_SWING | PROC_FLAG_OFF_HAND_WEAPON_SWING;
1960  calcDamageInfo->procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_MELEE_SWING;
1961  calcDamageInfo->HitInfo = HITINFO_LEFTSWING;
1962  break;
1963  case RANGED_ATTACK:
1964  calcDamageInfo->procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_RANGED_ATTACK;
1965  calcDamageInfo->procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_RANGED_ATTACK;
1966  calcDamageInfo->HitInfo = HITINFO_UNK3; // test (dev note: test what? HitInfo flag possibly not confirmed.)
1967  break;
1968  default:
1969  break;
1970  }
1971 
1972  bool immune = true;
1973 
1974  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[calcDamageInfo->attackType].lines; i++)
1975  {
1976  SubDamageInfo *subDamage = &calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i];
1977 
1978  subDamage->damageSchoolMask = SpellSchoolMask(1 << GetWeaponDamageSchool(calcDamageInfo->attackType, i));
1979 
1980  if (calcDamageInfo->target->IsImmuneToDamage(subDamage->damageSchoolMask))
1981  {
1982  subDamage->damage = 0;
1983  continue;
1984  }
1985  else
1986  immune = false;
1987 
1988  subDamage->damage = CalculateDamage(calcDamageInfo->attackType, false, i);
1989  // Add melee damage bonus
1990  subDamage->damage = MeleeDamageBonusDone(calcDamageInfo->target, subDamage->damage, calcDamageInfo->attackType, subDamage->damageSchoolMask, nullptr, DIRECT_DAMAGE, 1, i == 0);
1991  subDamage->damage = calcDamageInfo->target->MeleeDamageBonusTaken(this, subDamage->damage, calcDamageInfo->attackType, subDamage->damageSchoolMask, nullptr, DIRECT_DAMAGE, 1, i == 0);
1992 
1993  // Calculate armor reduction
1994  if (subDamage->damageSchoolMask == SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL)
1995  subDamage->damage = CalcArmorReducedDamage(this, calcDamageInfo->target, subDamage->damage);
1996 
1997  calcDamageInfo->totalDamage += subDamage->damage;
1998  }
1999 
2000  // Physical Immune check
2001  if (immune)
2002  {
2003  calcDamageInfo->HitInfo |= HITINFO_NORMALSWING;
2004  calcDamageInfo->TargetState = VICTIMSTATE_IS_IMMUNE;
2005 
2006  calcDamageInfo->procEx |= PROC_EX_IMMUNE;
2007  calcDamageInfo->totalDamage = 0;
2008  calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage = 0;
2009  return;
2010  }
2011 
2012  calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage = calcDamageInfo->totalDamage;
2013 
2014  // FIXME: Fix individual school results later when appropriate API is ready
2015  uint32 mask = SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL;
2016  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[calcDamageInfo->attackType].lines; ++i)
2017  {
2018  SubDamageInfo& subDamage = calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i];
2019  mask |= subDamage.damageSchoolMask;
2020  }
2021  calcDamageInfo->hitOutCome = RollMeleeOutcomeAgainst(calcDamageInfo->target, calcDamageInfo->attackType, SpellSchoolMask(mask));
2022 
2023  // Disable parry or dodge for ranged attack
2024  if (calcDamageInfo->attackType == RANGED_ATTACK)
2025  {
2026  if (calcDamageInfo->hitOutCome == MELEE_HIT_PARRY) calcDamageInfo->hitOutCome = MELEE_HIT_NORMAL;
2027  if (calcDamageInfo->hitOutCome == MELEE_HIT_DODGE) calcDamageInfo->hitOutCome = MELEE_HIT_MISS;
2028  }
2029 
2030  switch (calcDamageInfo->hitOutCome)
2031  {
2032  case MELEE_HIT_EVADE:
2033  {
2034  calcDamageInfo->HitInfo |= HITINFO_MISS | HITINFO_SWINGNOHITSOUND;
2035  calcDamageInfo->TargetState = VICTIMSTATE_EVADES;
2036 
2037  calcDamageInfo->procEx |= PROC_EX_EVADE;
2038  calcDamageInfo->totalDamage = 0;
2039  calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage = 0;
2040 
2041  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[calcDamageInfo->attackType].lines; i++)
2042  calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i].damage = 0;
2043 
2044  return;
2045  }
2046  case MELEE_HIT_MISS:
2047  {
2048  calcDamageInfo->HitInfo |= HITINFO_MISS;
2049  calcDamageInfo->TargetState = VICTIMSTATE_UNAFFECTED;
2050 
2051  calcDamageInfo->procEx |= PROC_EX_MISS;
2052  calcDamageInfo->totalDamage = 0;
2053  calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage = 0;
2054 
2055  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[calcDamageInfo->attackType].lines; i++)
2056  calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i].damage = 0;
2057 
2058  break;
2059  }
2060  case MELEE_HIT_NORMAL:
2061  {
2062  calcDamageInfo->procEx |= PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT;
2063  calcDamageInfo->TargetState = VICTIMSTATE_NORMAL;
2064  break;
2065  }
2066  case MELEE_HIT_CRIT:
2067  {
2068  calcDamageInfo->HitInfo |= HITINFO_CRITICALHIT;
2069  calcDamageInfo->TargetState = VICTIMSTATE_NORMAL;
2070  calcDamageInfo->procEx |= PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT;
2071  calcDamageInfo->totalDamage = CalculateCritAmount(calcDamageInfo);
2072  break;
2073  }
2074  case MELEE_HIT_PARRY:
2075  {
2076  calcDamageInfo->TargetState = VICTIMSTATE_PARRY;
2077  calcDamageInfo->procEx |= PROC_EX_PARRY;
2078  calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage += calcDamageInfo->totalDamage;
2079  calcDamageInfo->totalDamage = 0;
2080 
2081  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[calcDamageInfo->attackType].lines; i++)
2082  calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i].damage = 0;
2083 
2084  break;
2085  }
2086  case MELEE_HIT_DODGE:
2087  {
2088  calcDamageInfo->TargetState = VICTIMSTATE_DODGE;
2089  calcDamageInfo->procEx |= PROC_EX_DODGE;
2090  calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage += calcDamageInfo->totalDamage;
2091  calcDamageInfo->totalDamage = 0;
2092 
2093  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[calcDamageInfo->attackType].lines; i++)
2094  calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i].damage = 0;
2095 
2096  break;
2097  }
2098  case MELEE_HIT_BLOCK:
2099  {
2100  calcDamageInfo->HitInfo |= HITINFO_BLOCK;
2101  calcDamageInfo->TargetState = VICTIMSTATE_NORMAL;
2102  calcDamageInfo->procEx |= PROC_EX_BLOCK;
2103  calcDamageInfo->blocked_amount = calcDamageInfo->target->GetShieldBlockValue();
2104 
2105  // Target has a chance to double the blocked amount if it has SPELL_AURA_MOD_BLOCK_CRIT_CHANCE
2106  if (calcDamageInfo->target->IsBlockCritical())
2107  calcDamageInfo->blocked_amount *= 2;
2108 
2109  if (calcDamageInfo->blocked_amount >= calcDamageInfo->totalDamage)
2110  {
2111  // Full block
2112  calcDamageInfo->TargetState = VICTIMSTATE_BLOCKS;
2113  calcDamageInfo->blocked_amount = calcDamageInfo->totalDamage;
2114 
2115  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[calcDamageInfo->attackType].lines; i++)
2116  calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i].damage = 0;
2117  }
2118  else if (calcDamageInfo->blocked_amount)
2119  {
2120  // Partial block
2121  calcDamageInfo->procEx |= PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT;
2122 
2123  auto amount = calcDamageInfo->blocked_amount;
2124 
2125  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[calcDamageInfo->attackType].lines; i++)
2126  {
2127  if (calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i].damage >= amount)
2128  {
2129  calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i].damage -= amount;
2130  break;
2131  }
2132  else
2133  {
2134  amount -= calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i].damage;
2135  calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i].damage = 0;
2136  }
2137  }
2138  }
2139 
2140  calcDamageInfo->totalDamage -= calcDamageInfo->blocked_amount;
2141  calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage += calcDamageInfo->blocked_amount;
2142 
2143  break;
2144  }
2145  case MELEE_HIT_GLANCING:
2146  {
2147  calcDamageInfo->HitInfo |= HITINFO_GLANCING;
2148  calcDamageInfo->TargetState = VICTIMSTATE_NORMAL;
2149  calcDamageInfo->procEx |= PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT;
2150  CalculateGlanceAmount(calcDamageInfo);
2151 
2152  break;
2153  }
2154  case MELEE_HIT_CRUSHING:
2155  {
2156  calcDamageInfo->HitInfo |= HITINFO_CRUSHING;
2157  calcDamageInfo->TargetState = VICTIMSTATE_NORMAL;
2158  calcDamageInfo->procEx |= PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT;
2159 
2160  // 150% of normal damage
2161  calcDamageInfo->totalDamage += calcDamageInfo->totalDamage / 2;
2162 
2163  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[calcDamageInfo->attackType].lines; i++)
2164  calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i].damage += calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i].damage / 2;
2165 
2166  break;
2167  }
2168  default:
2169  break;
2170  }
2171 
2172  // only from players
2173  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2174  {
2175  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[calcDamageInfo->attackType].lines; i++)
2176  {
2177  SubDamageInfo* subDamage = &calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i];
2178 
2179  uint32 reduction_affected_damage = CalcNotIgnoreDamageReduction(subDamage->damage, subDamage->damageSchoolMask);
2180  uint32 resilienceReduction;
2181  resilienceReduction = pVictim->GetResilienceRatingDamageReduction(reduction_affected_damage, (attackType == RANGED_ATTACK ? SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED : SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE));
2182  subDamage->damage -= resilienceReduction;
2183  calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage += resilienceReduction;
2184  }
2185  }
2186 
2187  // Calculate absorb resist
2188  if (int32(calcDamageInfo->totalDamage) > 0)
2189  {
2190  calcDamageInfo->procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKE_ANY_DAMAGE;
2191 
2192  // Calculate absorb & resists
2193  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[calcDamageInfo->attackType].lines; i++)
2194  {
2195  SubDamageInfo* subDamage = &calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i];
2196 
2197  uint32 absorb_affected_damage = CalcNotIgnoreAbsorbDamage(subDamage->damage, subDamage->damageSchoolMask);
2198  calcDamageInfo->target->CalculateDamageAbsorbAndResist(this, subDamage->damageSchoolMask, DIRECT_DAMAGE, absorb_affected_damage, &subDamage->absorb, &subDamage->resist, true);
2199 
2200  const uint32 bonus = (subDamage->resist < 0 ? uint32(std::abs(subDamage->resist)) : 0);
2201  subDamage->damage += bonus;
2202  calcDamageInfo->totalDamage += bonus;
2203 
2204  const uint32 malus = (subDamage->resist > 0 ? (subDamage->absorb + uint32(subDamage->resist)) : subDamage->absorb);
2205 
2206  if (subDamage->damage <= malus)
2207  {
2208  calcDamageInfo->totalDamage -= subDamage->damage;
2209  subDamage->damage = 0;
2210  }
