2211  else
2212  {
2213  calcDamageInfo->totalDamage -= malus;
2214  subDamage->damage -= malus;
2215  }
2216 
2217  if (subDamage->absorb)
2218  {
2219  calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage = calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage <= subDamage->absorb ? 0 : calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage - subDamage->absorb;
2220  calcDamageInfo->HitInfo |= HITINFO_ABSORB;
2221  calcDamageInfo->procEx |= PROC_EX_ABSORB;
2222  }
2223 
2224  if (subDamage->resist)
2225  {
2226  calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage = int32(calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage) <= subDamage->resist ? 0 : calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage - subDamage->resist;
2227  calcDamageInfo->HitInfo |= HITINFO_RESIST;
2228  }
2229  }
2230  }
2231  else
2232  calcDamageInfo->totalDamage = 0;
2233 }
2234 
2235 void Unit::DealMeleeDamage(CalcDamageInfo* calcDamageInfo, bool durabilityLoss)
2236 {
2237  if (!calcDamageInfo) return;
2238  Unit* victim = calcDamageInfo->target;
2239  if (!victim)
2240  return;
2241 
2242  if (!victim->IsAlive() || victim->IsTaxiFlying() || victim->GetCombatManager().IsInEvadeMode())
2243  return;
2244 
2245  // You don't lose health from damage taken from another player while in a sanctuary
2246  // You still see it in the combat log though
2247  if (!IsAllowedDamageInArea(this, victim))
2248  return;
2249 
2250  // Hmmmm dont like this emotes client must by self do all animations
2251  if (calcDamageInfo->HitInfo & HITINFO_CRITICALHIT)
2252  victim->HandleEmoteCommand(EMOTE_ONESHOT_WOUNDCRITICAL);
2253 
2254  if (calcDamageInfo->TargetState == VICTIMSTATE_PARRY)
2255  {
2256  if (victim->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT ||
2257  (static_cast<Creature*>(victim)->GetCreatureInfo()->ExtraFlags & CREATURE_EXTRA_FLAG_NO_PARRY_HASTEN) == 0)
2258  {
2259  // Get attack timers
2260  float offtime = float(victim->getAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK));
2261  float basetime = float(victim->getAttackTimer(BASE_ATTACK));
2262  // Reduce attack time
2263  if (victim->hasOffhandWeaponForAttack() && offtime < basetime)
2264  {
2265  float percent20 = victim->GetAttackTime(OFF_ATTACK) * 0.20f;
2266  float percent60 = 3.0f * percent20;
2267  if (offtime > percent20 && offtime <= percent60)
2268  {
2269  victim->setAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK, uint32(percent20));
2270  }
2271  else if (offtime > percent60)
2272  {
2273  offtime -= 2.0f * percent20;
2274  victim->setAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK, uint32(offtime));
2275  }
2276  }
2277  else
2278  {
2279  float percent20 = victim->GetAttackTime(BASE_ATTACK) * 0.20f;
2280  float percent60 = 3.0f * percent20;
2281  if (basetime > percent20 && basetime <= percent60)
2282  {
2283  victim->setAttackTimer(BASE_ATTACK, uint32(percent20));
2284  }
2285  else if (basetime > percent60)
2286  {
2287  basetime -= 2.0f * percent20;
2288  victim->setAttackTimer(BASE_ATTACK, uint32(basetime));
2289  }
2290  }
2291  }
2292  }
2293 
2294  // Call default DealDamage
2295  CleanDamage cleanDamage(calcDamageInfo->cleanDamage, calcDamageInfo->attackType, calcDamageInfo->hitOutCome, calcDamageInfo->totalDamage || calcDamageInfo->absorb);
2296  DealDamage(this, victim, calcDamageInfo->totalDamage, &cleanDamage, DIRECT_DAMAGE, SpellSchoolMask(calcDamageInfo->subDamage[0].damageSchoolMask), nullptr, durabilityLoss);
2297 
2298  // If not immune
2299  if (calcDamageInfo->TargetState != VICTIMSTATE_IS_IMMUNE && calcDamageInfo->TargetState != VICTIMSTATE_EVADES)
2300  {
2301  if (CanEnterCombat() && victim->CanEnterCombat())
2302  {
2303  // if damage victim call AI reaction
2304  victim->AttackedBy(this);
2305 
2306  EngageInCombatWithAggressor(victim);
2307 
2308  if (IsPropagatingThreatToOwner())
2309  if (Unit* owner = GetOwner())
2310  if (owner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
2311  if (owner->CanJoinInAttacking(victim))
2312  owner->EngageInCombatWithAggressor(victim);
2313 
2314  for (m_guardianPetsIterator = m_guardianPets.begin(); m_guardianPetsIterator != m_guardianPets.end();)
2315  if (Pet* guardian = GetMap()->GetPet(*(m_guardianPetsIterator++)))
2316  if (guardian->CanJoinInAttacking(victim))
2317  guardian->EngageInCombatWithAggressor(victim);
2318  }
2319  }
2320 
2321  if (calcDamageInfo->totalDamage)
2322  {
2323  // If this attack by an NPC dealt some damage from behind to a player, it has a chance to daze victim
2324  if (CanDazeInCombat(victim) && roll_chance_f(CalculateEffectiveDazeChance(victim, calcDamageInfo->attackType)))
2325  CastSpell(victim, 1604, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2326 
2327  // update at damage Judgement aura duration that applied by attacker at victim
2328  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2329  {
2330  SpellAuraHolderMap const& vAuras = victim->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
2331  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator itr = vAuras.begin(); itr != vAuras.end(); ++itr)
2332  {
2333  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = (*itr).second->GetSpellProto();
2334  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_ALWAYS_HIT) && spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN && ((*itr).second->GetCasterGuid() == GetObjectGuid()))
2335  (*itr).second->RefreshHolder(); // TODO: Judgement - make this into a cast which should consume grounding totem
2336  }
2337  }
2338 
2339  // victim's damage shield
2340  std::set<Aura*> alreadyDone;
2341  AuraList const& vDamageShields = victim->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DAMAGE_SHIELD);
2342  for (AuraList::const_iterator i = vDamageShields.begin(); i != vDamageShields.end();)
2343  {
2344  if (alreadyDone.find(*i) == alreadyDone.end())
2345  {
2346  alreadyDone.insert(*i);
2347 
2348  SpellEntry const* spellProto = (*i)->GetSpellProto();
2349 
2350  // Damage shield can be resisted...
2351  if (SpellMissInfo missInfo = SpellHitResult(victim, this, spellProto, uint8(1 << (*i)->GetEffIndex()), false))
2352  {
2353  Unit::SendSpellMiss(victim, this, spellProto->Id, missInfo);
2354  continue;
2355  }
2356 
2357  // ...or immuned
2358  if (IsImmuneToDamage(GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto)))
2359  {
2360  Unit::SendSpellOrDamageImmune(victim->GetObjectGuid(), this, spellProto->Id);
2361  continue;
2362  }
2363 
2364  uint32 damage = (*i)->GetModifier()->m_amount;
2365 
2366  if (victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2367  ((Player*)victim)->ApplySpellMod(spellProto->Id, SPELLMOD_DAMAGE, damage);
2368 
2369  // Calculate absorb resist ??? no data in opcode for this possibly unable to absorb or resist?
2370  // uint32 absorb;
2371  // uint32 resist;
2372  // CalcAbsorbResist(victim, SpellSchools(spellProto->School), SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE, damage, &absorb, &resist);
2373  // damage-=absorb + resist;
2374 
2375  Unit::DealDamageMods(victim, this, damage, nullptr, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE, spellProto);
2376 
2377  uint32 targetHealth = GetHealth();
2378  uint32 overkill = damage > targetHealth ? damage - targetHealth : 0;
2379 
2380  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELLDAMAGESHIELD, (8 + 8 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 4));
2381  data << victim->GetObjectGuid();
2382  data << GetObjectGuid();
2383  data << uint32(spellProto->Id);
2384  data << uint32(damage); // Damage
2385  data << uint32(overkill); // Overkill
2386  data << uint32(spellProto->SchoolMask);
2387  victim->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
2388 
2389  DealDamage(victim, this, damage, nullptr, SPELL_DAMAGE_SHIELD, GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto), spellProto, true);
2390 
2391  i = vDamageShields.begin();
2392  }
2393  else
2394  ++i;
2395  }
2396  }
2397 }
2398 
2399 void Unit::HandleEmoteCommand(uint32 emote_id)
2400 {
2401  WorldPacket data(SMSG_EMOTE, 4 + 8);
2402  data << uint32(emote_id);
2403  data << GetObjectGuid();
2404  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
2405 }
2406 
2407 void Unit::HandleEmoteState(uint32 emote_id)
2408 {
2409  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_EMOTESTATE, emote_id);
2410 }
2411 
2412 void Unit::HandleEmote(uint32 emote_id)
2413 {
2414  if (!emote_id)
2415  HandleEmoteState(0);
2416  else if (EmotesEntry const* emoteEntry = sEmotesStore.LookupEntry(emote_id))
2417  {
2418  if (emoteEntry->EmoteType) // 1,2 states, 0 command
2419  HandleEmoteState(emote_id);
2420  else
2421  HandleEmoteCommand(emote_id);
2422  }
2423 }
2424 
2425 uint32 Unit::CalcNotIgnoreAbsorbDamage(uint32 damage, SpellSchoolMask damageSchoolMask, SpellEntry const* spellInfo /*= nullptr*/) const
2426 {
2427  if (spellInfo && spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_ABSORB_CANNOT_BE_IGNORE))
2428  return damage;
2429 
2430  float absorb_affected_rate = 1.0f;
2431  Unit::AuraList const& ignoreAbsorbSchool = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_IGNORE_ABSORB_SCHOOL);
2432  for (auto i : ignoreAbsorbSchool)
2433  if (i->GetMiscValue() & damageSchoolMask)
2434  absorb_affected_rate *= (100.0f - i->GetModifier()->m_amount) / 100.0f;
2435 
2436  if (spellInfo)
2437  {
2438  Unit::AuraList const& ignoreAbsorbForSpell = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_IGNORE_ABSORB_FOR_SPELL);
2439  for (auto citr : ignoreAbsorbForSpell)
2440  if (citr->isAffectedOnSpell(spellInfo))
2441  absorb_affected_rate *= (100.0f - citr->GetModifier()->m_amount) / 100.0f;
2442  }
2443 
2444  return absorb_affected_rate <= 0.0f ? 0 : (absorb_affected_rate < 1.0f ? uint32(damage * absorb_affected_rate) : damage);
2445 }
2446 
2447 uint32 Unit::CalcNotIgnoreDamageReduction(uint32 damage, SpellSchoolMask damageSchoolMask) const
2448 {
2449  float absorb_affected_rate = 1.0f;
2450  Unit::AuraList const& ignoreAbsorb = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_IGNORE_DAMAGE_REDUCTION_SCHOOL);
2451  for (auto i : ignoreAbsorb)
2452  if (i->GetMiscValue() & damageSchoolMask)
2453  absorb_affected_rate *= (100.0f - i->GetModifier()->m_amount) / 100.0f;
2454 
2455  return absorb_affected_rate <= 0.0f ? 0 : (absorb_affected_rate < 1.0f ? uint32(damage * absorb_affected_rate) : damage);
2456 }
2457 
2458 float Unit::CalcArmorReducedDamage(WorldObject* attacker, Unit* victim, const float damage)
2459 {
2460  float armor = (float)victim->GetArmor();
2461 
2462  // Ignore enemy armor by armor penetration
2463  if (attacker->IsUnit())
2464  armor -= static_cast<Unit*>(attacker)->GetResistancePenetration(SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL);
2465 
2466  // Apply Player CR_ARMOR_PENETRATION rating and percent talents
2467  if (attacker->IsPlayer())
2468  {
2469  float maxArmorPen = 400 + 85 * victim->GetLevel();
2470  if (attacker->GetLevel() > 59)
2471  maxArmorPen += 4.5f * 85 * (victim->GetLevel() - 59);
2472  // Cap ignored armor to this value
2473  maxArmorPen = std::min(((armor + maxArmorPen) / 3), armor);
2474  // Also, armor penetration is limited to 100% since 3.1.2, before greater values did
2475  // continue to give benefit for targets with more armor than the above cap
2476  float armorPenPct = std::min(100.f, static_cast<Player*>(attacker)->GetArmorPenetrationPct());
2477  armor -= maxArmorPen * armorPenPct / 100.0f;
2478  }
2479 
2480  if (armor < 0.0f)
2481  armor = 0.0f;
2482 
2483  float levelModifier = (float)attacker->GetLevel();
2484  if (levelModifier > 59)
2485  levelModifier = levelModifier + (4.5f * (levelModifier - 59));
2486 
2487  float tmpvalue = 0.1f * armor / (8.5f * levelModifier + 40);
2488  tmpvalue = tmpvalue / (1.0f + tmpvalue);
2489 
2490  if (tmpvalue < 0.0f)
2491  tmpvalue = 0.0f;
2492  if (tmpvalue > 0.75f)
2493  tmpvalue = 0.75f;
2494 
2495  float newdamage = damage - (damage * tmpvalue);
2496 
2497  return (newdamage > 1) ? newdamage : 1.0f;
2498 }
2499 
2500 void Unit::CalculateDamageAbsorbAndResist(Unit* caster, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask, DamageEffectType damagetype, const uint32 damage, uint32* absorb, int32* resist, bool canReflect, bool canResist, bool binary)
2501 {
2502  if (!IsAlive() || !damage)
2503  return;
2504 
2505  int32 RemainingDamage = int32(damage);
2506 
2507  // Magic damage, check for resists
2508  if (canResist && (schoolMask & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_MAGIC) && (!binary || damagetype == DOT))
2509  {
2510  const float multiplier = Unit::RollMagicResistanceMultiplierOutcomeAgainst(caster, this, schoolMask, damagetype, binary);
2511  *resist = int32(int64(damage) * multiplier);
2512  RemainingDamage -= *resist;
2513  }
2514  else
2515  *resist = 0;
2516 
2517  // Get unit state (need for some absorb check)
2518  uint32 unitflag = GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS);
2519  // Reflect damage spells (not cast any damage spell in aura lookup)
2520  uint32 reflectSpell = 0;
2521  int32 reflectDamage = 0;
2522  Aura* reflectTriggeredBy = nullptr; // expected as not expired at reflect as in current cases
2523  // Death Prevention Aura
2524  Aura* preventDeathAura = nullptr;
2525 
2526  // full absorb cases (by chance)
2527  AuraList const& vAbsorb = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_SCHOOL_ABSORB);
2528  for (AuraList::const_iterator i = vAbsorb.begin(); i != vAbsorb.end() && RemainingDamage > 0; ++i)
2529  {
2530  // only work with proper school mask damage
2531  Modifier* i_mod = (*i)->GetModifier();
2532  if (!(i_mod->m_miscvalue & schoolMask))
2533  continue;
2534 
2535  SpellEntry const* i_spellProto = (*i)->GetSpellProto();
2536  // Fire Ward or Frost Ward
2537  if (i_spellProto->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_MAGE && i_spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000108))
2538  {
2539  int chance = 0;
2540  Unit::AuraList const& auras = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_ADD_PCT_MODIFIER);
2541  for (auto aura : auras)
2542  {
2543  SpellEntry const* itr_spellProto = aura->GetSpellProto();
2544  // Frost Warding (chance full absorb)
2545  if (itr_spellProto->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_MAGE && itr_spellProto->SpellIconID == 501)
2546  {
2547  // chance stored in next dummy effect
2548  chance = itr_spellProto->CalculateSimpleValue(EFFECT_INDEX_1);
2549  break;
2550  }
2551  }
2552  if (roll_chance_i(chance))
2553  {
2554  int32 amount = RemainingDamage;
2555  RemainingDamage = 0;
2556 
2557  // Frost Warding (mana regen)
2558  CastCustomSpell(this, 57776, &amount, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, *i);
2559  break;
2560  }
2561  }
2562  }
2563 
2564  // Need remove expired auras after
2565  bool existExpired = false;
2566 
2567  // Incanter's Absorption, for converting to spell power
2568  int32 incanterAbsorption = 0;
2569 
2570  // absorb without mana cost
2571  AuraList const& vSchoolAbsorb = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_SCHOOL_ABSORB);
2572  for (AuraList::const_iterator i = vSchoolAbsorb.begin(); i != vSchoolAbsorb.end() && RemainingDamage > 0; ++i)
2573  {
2574  Modifier* mod = (*i)->GetModifier();
2575  if (!(mod->m_miscvalue & schoolMask))
2576  continue;
2577 
2578  SpellEntry const* spellProto = (*i)->GetSpellProto();
2579 
2580  // Max Amount can be absorbed by this aura
2581  int32 currentAbsorb = mod->m_amount;
2582 
2583  // Found empty aura (impossible but..)
2584  if (currentAbsorb <= 0)
2585  {
2586  existExpired = true;
2587  continue;
2588  }
2589 
2590  // Handle custom absorb auras
2591  // TODO: try find better way
2592 
2593  switch (spellProto->SpellFamilyName)
2594  {
2595  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
2596  {
2597  switch (spellProto->Id)
2598  {
2599  case 31130: // Nerves of Steel
2600  case 31131:
2601  {
2602  // while affected by Stun and Fear
2603  if (unitflag & (UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED | UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING))
2604  RemainingDamage -= RemainingDamage * currentAbsorb / 100;
2605  continue;
2606  }
2607  case 36815: // Shock Barrier - Kael'Thas
2608  {
2609  reflectSpell = 36822;
2610  if (RemainingDamage < currentAbsorb)
2611  reflectDamage = RemainingDamage / 100;
2612  else
2613  reflectDamage = currentAbsorb / 100;
2614  break;
2615  }
2616  case 39228: // Argussian Compass
2617  case 60218: // Essence of Gossamer
2618  {
2619  // Max absorb stored in 1 dummy effect
2620  int32 max_absorb = spellProto->CalculateSimpleValue(EFFECT_INDEX_1);
2621  if (max_absorb < currentAbsorb)
2622  currentAbsorb = max_absorb;
2623  break;
2624  }
2625  case 41341: // Balance of Power
2626  {
2627  continue; // unused atm
2628  }
2629  case 41475: // Reflective Shield (Lady Malande boss)
2630  {
2631  if (RemainingDamage < currentAbsorb)
2632  reflectDamage = RemainingDamage / 2;
2633  else
2634  reflectDamage = currentAbsorb / 2;
2635  reflectSpell = 33619;
2636  reflectTriggeredBy = *i;
2637  break;
2638  }
2639  case 49145: // Spell Deflection
2640  case 49495:
2641  case 49497:
2642  {
2643  // You have a chance equal to your Parry chance
2644  if (damagetype == SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE && roll_chance_f(GetParryChance()))
2645  RemainingDamage -= RemainingDamage * currentAbsorb / 100;
2646  continue;
2647  }
2648  case 51474: // Astral Shift
2649  case 51478:
2650  case 51479:
2651  {
2652  // reduces all damage taken while stun, fear or silence
2653  if (unitflag & (UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED | UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING | UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED))
2654  RemainingDamage -= RemainingDamage * currentAbsorb / 100;
2655  continue;
2656  }
2657  default:
2658  break;
2659  }
2660  break;
2661  }
2662  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
2663  {
2664  // Primal Tenacity
2665  if (spellProto->SpellIconID == 2253)
2666  {
2667  // reduces all damage taken while Stunned and in Cat Form
2668  if (GetShapeshiftForm() == FORM_CAT && (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED))
2669  RemainingDamage -= RemainingDamage * currentAbsorb / 100;
2670  continue;
2671  }
2672  // Moonkin Form passive
2673  if (spellProto->Id == 69366)
2674  {
2675  // reduces all damage taken while Stunned
2676  if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED)
2677  RemainingDamage -= RemainingDamage * currentAbsorb / 100;
2678  continue;
2679  }
2680  break;
2681  }
2682  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
2683  {
2684  switch (spellProto->Id)
2685  {
2686  case 31228: // Cheat Death
2687  case 31229:
2688  case 31230:
2689  {
2690  if (!preventDeathAura &&
2691  GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && // Only players
2692  IsSpellReady(31231) &&
2693  // Only if no cooldown
2694  roll_chance_i((*i)->GetModifier()->m_amount))
2695  // Only if roll
2696  {
2697  preventDeathAura = (*i);
2698  }
2699  // always skip this spell in charge dropping, absorb amount calculation since it has chance as m_amount and doesn't need to absorb any damage
2700  continue;
2701  }
2702  }
2703  break;
2704  }
2705  case SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST:
2706  {
2707  // Guardian Spirit
2708  if (spellProto->SpellIconID == 2873)
2709  {
2710  preventDeathAura = (*i);
2711  continue;
2712  }
2713  // Reflective Shield
2714  if (spellProto->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x0000000000000001)) && canReflect && caster)
2715  {
2716  if (caster == this)
2717  break;
2718  Unit* caster = (*i)->GetCaster();
2719  if (!caster)
2720  break;
2721  AuraList const& vOverRideCS = caster->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
2722  for (auto k : vOverRideCS)
2723  {
2724  switch (k->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue)
2725  {
2726  case 5065: // Rank 1
2727  case 5064: // Rank 2
2728  {
2729  if (RemainingDamage >= currentAbsorb)
2730  reflectDamage = k->GetModifier()->m_amount * currentAbsorb / 100;
2731  else
2732  reflectDamage = k->GetModifier()->m_amount * RemainingDamage / 100;
2733  reflectSpell = 33619;
2734  reflectTriggeredBy = *i;
2735  } break;
2736  default: break;
2737  }
2738  }
2739  break;
2740  }
2741  break;
2742  }
2743  case SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN:
2744  {
2745  // Astral Shift
2746  if (spellProto->SpellIconID == 3066)
2747  {
2748  // reduces all damage taken while stun, fear or silence
2749  if (unitflag & (UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED | UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING | UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED))
2750  RemainingDamage -= RemainingDamage * currentAbsorb / 100;
2751  continue;
2752  }
2753  break;
2754  }
2755  case SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT:
2756  {
2757  // Shadow of Death
2758  if (spellProto->SpellIconID == 1958)
2759  {
2760  // TODO: absorb only while transform
2761  continue;
2762  }
2763  // Anti-Magic Shell (on self)
2764  if (spellProto->Id == 48707)
2765  {
2766  // damage absorbed by Anti-Magic Shell energizes the DK with additional runic power.
2767  // This, if I'm not mistaken, shows that we get back ~2% of the absorbed damage as runic power.
2768  int32 absorbed = RemainingDamage * currentAbsorb / 100;
2769  int32 regen = absorbed * 2 / 10;
2770  CastCustomSpell(this, 49088, &regen, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, *i);
2771  RemainingDamage -= absorbed;
2772  continue;
2773  }
2774  // Anti-Magic Shell (on single party/raid member)
2775  if (spellProto->Id == 50462)
2776  {
2777  RemainingDamage -= RemainingDamage * currentAbsorb / 100;
2778  continue;
2779  }
2780  // Anti-Magic Zone
2781  if (spellProto->Id == 50461)
2782  {
2783  Unit* auraCaster = (*i)->GetCaster();
2784  if (!caster)
2785  continue;
2786  int32 absorbed = RemainingDamage * currentAbsorb / 100;
2787  int32 canabsorb = caster->GetHealth();
2788  if (canabsorb < absorbed)
2789  absorbed = canabsorb;
2790 
2791  RemainingDamage -= absorbed;
2792 
2793  uint32 ab_damage = absorbed;
2794  Unit::DealDamageMods(caster, auraCaster, ab_damage, nullptr, damagetype);
2795  Unit::DealDamage(caster, auraCaster, ab_damage, nullptr, damagetype, schoolMask, nullptr, false);
2796  continue;
2797  }
2798  break;
2799  }
2800  default:
2801  break;
2802  }
2803 
2804  // currentAbsorb - damage can be absorbed by shield
2805  // If need absorb less damage
2806  if (RemainingDamage < currentAbsorb)
2807  currentAbsorb = RemainingDamage;
2808 
2809  bool preventedDeath = false;
2810  bool dropCharge = true;
2811  (*i)->OnAbsorb(currentAbsorb, RemainingDamage, reflectSpell, reflectDamage, preventedDeath, dropCharge);
2812  if (preventedDeath)
2813  preventDeathAura = (*i);
2814 
2815  RemainingDamage -= currentAbsorb;
2816 
2817  // Fire Ward or Frost Ward or Ice Barrier (or Mana Shield)
2818  // for Incanter's Absorption converting to spell power
2819  if (spellProto->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_MAGE, uint64(0x0000000000000000), 0x00000008))
2820  incanterAbsorption += currentAbsorb;
2821 
2822  if (!IsPassiveSpell(spellProto))
2823  {
2824  // Reduce shield amount
2825  mod->m_amount -= currentAbsorb;
2826  if (dropCharge)
2827  if ((*i)->GetHolder()->DropAuraCharge())
2828  mod->m_amount = 0;
2829  // Need remove it later
2830  if (mod->m_amount <= 0)
2831  existExpired = true;
2832  }
2833  }
2834 
2835  // Remove all expired absorb auras
2836  if (existExpired)
2837  {
2838  for (AuraList::const_iterator i = vSchoolAbsorb.begin(); i != vSchoolAbsorb.end();)
2839  {
2840  if ((*i)->GetModifier()->m_amount <= 0)
2841  {
2842  RemoveAurasDueToSpell((*i)->GetId(), nullptr, AURA_REMOVE_BY_SHIELD_BREAK);
2843  i = vSchoolAbsorb.begin();
2844  }
2845  else
2846  ++i;
2847  }
2848  }
2849 
2850  // Cast back reflect damage spell if caster exists
2851  if (canReflect && reflectSpell && caster)
2852  {
2853  CastCustomSpell(caster, reflectSpell, &reflectDamage, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, reflectTriggeredBy);
2854  }
2855 
2856  // absorb by mana cost
2857  AuraList const& vManaShield = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MANA_SHIELD);
2858  for (AuraList::const_iterator i = vManaShield.begin(), next; i != vManaShield.end() && RemainingDamage > 0; i = next)
2859  {
2860  next = i; ++next;
2861 
2862  // check damage school mask
2863  if (((*i)->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & schoolMask) == 0)
2864  continue;
2865 
2866  int32 currentAbsorb;
2867  if (RemainingDamage >= (*i)->GetModifier()->m_amount)
2868  currentAbsorb = (*i)->GetModifier()->m_amount;
2869  else
2870  currentAbsorb = RemainingDamage;
2871 
2872  if (float manaMultiplier = (*i)->GetSpellProto()->EffectMultipleValue[(*i)->GetEffIndex()])
2873  {
2874  if (Player* modOwner = GetSpellModOwner())
2875  modOwner->ApplySpellMod((*i)->GetId(), SPELLMOD_MULTIPLE_VALUE, manaMultiplier);
2876 
2877  int32 maxAbsorb = int32(GetPower(POWER_MANA) / manaMultiplier);
2878  if (currentAbsorb > maxAbsorb)
2879  currentAbsorb = maxAbsorb;
2880 
2881  int32 manaReduction = int32(currentAbsorb * manaMultiplier);
2882  ApplyPowerMod(POWER_MANA, manaReduction, false);
2883  }
2884 
2885  // Mana Shield (or Fire Ward or Frost Ward or Ice Barrier)
2886  // for Incanter's Absorption converting to spell power
2887  if ((*i)->GetSpellProto()->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_MAGE, uint64(0x0000000000000000), 0x000008))
2888  incanterAbsorption += currentAbsorb;
2889 
2890  (*i)->OnManaAbsorb(currentAbsorb);
2891 
2892  (*i)->GetModifier()->m_amount -= currentAbsorb;
2893  if ((*i)->GetModifier()->m_amount <= 0)
2894  {
2895  RemoveAurasDueToSpell((*i)->GetId());
2896  next = vManaShield.begin();
2897  }
2898 
2899  RemainingDamage -= currentAbsorb;
2900  }
2901 
2902  // effects dependent from full absorb amount
2903  // Incanter's Absorption, if have affective absorbing
2904  if (incanterAbsorption)
2905  {
2906  Unit::AuraList const& auras = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
2907  for (auto aura : auras)
2908  {
2909  SpellEntry const* itr_spellProto = aura->GetSpellProto();
2910 
2911  // Incanter's Absorption
2912  if (itr_spellProto->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC &&
2913  itr_spellProto->SpellIconID == 2941)
2914  {
2915  int32 amount = int32(incanterAbsorption * aura->GetModifier()->m_amount / 100);
2916 
2917  // apply normalized part of already accumulated amount in aura
2918  if (Aura* spdAura = GetAura(44413, EFFECT_INDEX_0))
2919  amount += spdAura->GetModifier()->m_amount * spdAura->GetAuraDuration() / spdAura->GetAuraMaxDuration();
2920 
2921  // Incanter's Absorption (triggered absorb based spell power, will replace existing if any)
2922  CastCustomSpell(this, 44413, &amount, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2923  break;
2924  }
2925  }
2926  }
2927 
2928  // only split damage if not damaging yourself
2929  if (caster && caster != this)
2930  {
2931  AuraList const& vSplitDamageFlat = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_SPLIT_DAMAGE_FLAT);
2932  for (AuraList::const_iterator i = vSplitDamageFlat.begin(), next; i != vSplitDamageFlat.end() && RemainingDamage >= 0; i = next)
2933  {
2934  next = i; ++next;
2935 
2936  // check damage school mask
2937  if (((*i)->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & schoolMask) == 0)
2938  continue;
2939 
2940  // Damage can be splitted only if aura has an alive caster
2941  Unit* caster = (*i)->GetCaster();
2942  if (!caster || caster == this || !caster->IsInWorld() || !caster->IsAlive())
2943  continue;
2944 
2945  int32 currentAbsorb;
2946  if (RemainingDamage >= (*i)->GetModifier()->m_amount)
2947  currentAbsorb = (*i)->GetModifier()->m_amount;
2948  else
2949  currentAbsorb = RemainingDamage;
2950 
2951  RemainingDamage -= currentAbsorb;
2952 
2953  if (caster->IsImmuneToDamage(schoolMask))
2954  {
2955  Unit::SendSpellMiss(this, caster, (*i)->GetSpellProto()->Id, SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE);
2956  return;
2957  }
2958 
2959  uint32 splitted = currentAbsorb;
2960  uint32 splitted_absorb = 0;
2961  Unit::DealDamageMods(this, caster, splitted, &splitted_absorb, SPLIT_DAMAGE, (*i)->GetSpellProto());
2962 
2963  Unit::SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(this, caster, (*i)->GetSpellProto()->Id, splitted, schoolMask, splitted_absorb, 0, (damagetype == DOT), 0, false, true);
2964 
2965  CleanDamage cleanDamage(splitted, BASE_ATTACK, MELEE_HIT_NORMAL, splitted > 0);
2966  Unit::DealDamage(this, caster, splitted, &cleanDamage, SPLIT_DAMAGE, schoolMask, (*i)->GetSpellProto(), false);
2967  }
2968 
2969  AuraList const& vSplitDamagePct = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_SPLIT_DAMAGE_PCT);
2970  for (AuraList::const_iterator i = vSplitDamagePct.begin(), next; i != vSplitDamagePct.end() && RemainingDamage >= 0; i = next)
2971  {
2972  next = i; ++next;
2973 
2974  // check damage school mask
2975  if (((*i)->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & schoolMask) == 0)
2976  continue;
2977 
2978  // Damage can be splitted only if aura has an alive caster
2979  Unit* caster = (*i)->GetCaster();
2980  if (!caster || caster == this || !caster->IsInWorld() || !caster->IsAlive())
2981  continue;
2982 
2983  uint32 splitted = uint32(RemainingDamage * (*i)->GetModifier()->m_amount / 100.0f);
2984 
2985  RemainingDamage -= int32(splitted);
2986 
2987  if (caster->IsImmuneToDamage(schoolMask))
2988  {
2989  Unit::SendSpellMiss(this, caster, (*i)->GetSpellProto()->Id, SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE);
2990  return;
2991  }
2992 
2993  uint32 split_absorb = 0;
2994  Unit::DealDamageMods(this, caster, splitted, &split_absorb, SPLIT_DAMAGE, (*i)->GetSpellProto());
2995 
2996  Unit::SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(this, caster, (*i)->GetSpellProto()->Id, splitted, schoolMask, split_absorb, 0, (damagetype == DOT), 0, false, true);
2997 
2998  CleanDamage cleanDamage(splitted, BASE_ATTACK, MELEE_HIT_NORMAL, splitted > 0);
2999  Unit::DealDamage(this, caster, splitted, &cleanDamage, SPLIT_DAMAGE, schoolMask, (*i)->GetSpellProto(), false);
3000  }
3001  }
3002 
3003  // Apply death prevention spells effects
3004  if (preventDeathAura && RemainingDamage >= (int32)GetHealth())
3005  {
3006  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = preventDeathAura->GetSpellProto();
3007  switch (spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
3008  {
3009  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
3010  {
3011  switch (spellInfo->Id)
3012  {
3013  case 31228: // Cheat Death
3014  case 31229:
3015  case 31230:
3016  {
3017  SpellEntry const* cheatDeath = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(31231);
3018  CastSpell(this, cheatDeath, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3019  AddCooldown(*cheatDeath, nullptr, false, 60 * IN_MILLISECONDS); // TODO this may be removed by fixing cooldown value in spell template
3020  // with health > 10% lost health until health==10%, in other case no losses
3021  uint32 health10 = GetMaxHealth() / 10;
3022  RemainingDamage = GetHealth() > health10 ? GetHealth() - health10 : 0;
3023  break;
3024  }
3025  default: break;
3026  }
3027  }
3028  // Guardian Spirit
3029  case SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST:
3030  {
3031  // Guardian Spirit
3032  if (preventDeathAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2873)
3033  {
3034  int32 healAmount = GetMaxHealth() * preventDeathAura->GetModifier()->m_amount / 100;
3035  CastCustomSpell(this, 48153, &healAmount, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3036  RemoveAurasDueToSpell(preventDeathAura->GetSpellProto()->Id);
3037  RemainingDamage = 0;
3038  }
3039  break;
3040  }
3041  }
3042  preventDeathAura->OnAuraDeathPrevention(RemainingDamage);
3043  }
3044 
3045  *absorb = damage - RemainingDamage - *resist;
3046 }
3047 
3048 void Unit::CalculateAbsorbResistBlock(Unit* caster, SpellNonMeleeDamage* spellDamageInfo, SpellEntry const* spellProto, WeaponAttackType attType)
3049 {
3050  if (RollAbilityPartialBlockOutcome(caster, attType, spellProto))
3051  {
3052  uint32 blockValue = GetShieldBlockValue();
3053  if (IsBlockCritical())
3054  blockValue *= 2;
3055  spellDamageInfo->blocked = std::min(blockValue, spellDamageInfo->damage);
3056  spellDamageInfo->damage -= spellDamageInfo->blocked;
3057  }
3058 
3059  uint32 absorb_affected_damage = caster ? caster->CalcNotIgnoreAbsorbDamage(spellDamageInfo->damage, GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto), spellProto) : spellDamageInfo->damage;
3060  CalculateDamageAbsorbAndResist(caster, spellDamageInfo->schoolMask, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE, absorb_affected_damage, &spellDamageInfo->absorb, &spellDamageInfo->resist, IsReflectableSpell(spellProto), IsResistableSpell(spellProto) && !spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NO_PARTIAL_RESISTS), IsBinarySpell(*spellProto));
3061 
3062  const uint32 bonus = (spellDamageInfo->resist < 0 ? uint32(std::abs(spellDamageInfo->resist)) : 0);
3063  spellDamageInfo->damage += bonus;
3064  const uint32 malus = (spellDamageInfo->resist > 0 ? (spellDamageInfo->absorb + uint32(spellDamageInfo->resist)) : spellDamageInfo->absorb);
3065  spellDamageInfo->damage = (spellDamageInfo->damage <= malus ? 0 : (spellDamageInfo->damage - malus));
3066 }
3067 
3068 void Unit::CalculateHealAbsorb(const uint32 heal, uint32* absorb)
3069 {
3070  if (!IsAlive() || !heal)
3071  return;
3072 
3073  int32 RemainingHeal = heal;
3074 
3075  // Need remove expired auras after
3076  bool existExpired = false;
3077 
3078  // absorb
3079  AuraList const& vHealAbsorb = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_HEAL_ABSORB);
3080  for (AuraList::const_iterator i = vHealAbsorb.begin(); i != vHealAbsorb.end() && RemainingHeal > 0; ++i)
3081  {
3082  Modifier* mod = (*i)->GetModifier();
3083 
3084  // Max Amount can be absorbed by this aura
3085  int32 currentAbsorb = mod->m_amount;
3086 
3087  // Found empty aura (impossible but..)
3088  if (currentAbsorb <= 0)
3089  {
3090  existExpired = true;
3091  continue;
3092  }
3093 
3094  // currentAbsorb - heal can be absorbed
3095  // If need absorb less heal
3096  if (RemainingHeal < currentAbsorb)
3097  currentAbsorb = RemainingHeal;
3098 
3099  RemainingHeal -= currentAbsorb;
3100 
3101  // Reduce aura amount
3102  mod->m_amount -= currentAbsorb;
3103  if ((*i)->GetHolder()->DropAuraCharge())
3104  mod->m_amount = 0;
3105  // Need remove it later
3106  if (mod->m_amount <= 0)
3107  existExpired = true;
3108  }
3109 
3110  // Remove all expired absorb auras
3111  if (existExpired)
3112  {
3113  for (AuraList::const_iterator i = vHealAbsorb.begin(); i != vHealAbsorb.end();)
3114  {
3115  if ((*i)->GetModifier()->m_amount <= 0)
3116  {
3117  RemoveAurasDueToSpell((*i)->GetId(), nullptr, AURA_REMOVE_BY_SHIELD_BREAK);
3118  i = vHealAbsorb.begin();
3119  }
3120  else
3121  ++i;
3122  }
3123  }
3124 
3125  *absorb = heal - RemainingHeal;
3126 }
3127 
3128 void Unit::AttackerStateUpdate(Unit* pVictim, WeaponAttackType attType, bool extra)
3129 {
3130  if (hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_CAN_NOT_REACT) || HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED))
3131  return;
3132 
3133  if (!pVictim->IsAlive())
3134  return;
3135 
3136  if (!extra && IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false))
3137  return;
3138 
3139  if (attType == RANGED_ATTACK)
3140  return; // ignore ranged case
3141 
3142  // melee attack spell casted at main hand attack only - but only if its not already being executed
3143  if (attType == BASE_ATTACK && m_currentSpells[CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL] && !m_currentSpells[CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL]->IsExecutedCurrently())
3144  {
3145  SpellCastResult result = m_currentSpells[CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL]->cast();
3146  if (result == SPELL_CAST_OK)
3147  {
3148  RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_ATTACKING);
3149  return;
3150  }
3151  }
3152 
3153  RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_ATTACKING);
3154 
3155  // attack can be redirected to another target
3156  if (Unit* magnetTarget = SelectMagnetTarget(pVictim))
3157  pVictim = magnetTarget;
3158 
3159  CalcDamageInfo meleeDamageInfo;
3160  CalculateMeleeDamage(pVictim, &meleeDamageInfo, attType);
3161 
3162  // Send log damage message to client
3163  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[attType].lines; i++)
3164  {
3165  meleeDamageInfo.totalDamage -= meleeDamageInfo.subDamage[i].damage;
3166  Unit::DealDamageMods(this, pVictim, meleeDamageInfo.subDamage[i].damage, &meleeDamageInfo.subDamage[i].absorb, DIRECT_DAMAGE);
3167  meleeDamageInfo.totalDamage += meleeDamageInfo.subDamage[i].damage;
3168  meleeDamageInfo.absorb += meleeDamageInfo.subDamage[i].absorb;
3169  }
3170 
3171  SendAttackStateUpdate(&meleeDamageInfo);
3172  DealMeleeDamage(&meleeDamageInfo, true);
3173  ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(this, meleeDamageInfo.target, meleeDamageInfo.procAttacker, meleeDamageInfo.procVictim, meleeDamageInfo.procEx, meleeDamageInfo.totalDamage, meleeDamageInfo.attackType));
3174 
3175  uint32 totalAbsorb = 0;
3176  uint32 totalResist = 0;
3177 
3178  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[attType].lines; i++)
3179  {
3180  totalAbsorb += meleeDamageInfo.subDamage[i].absorb;
3181  totalResist += meleeDamageInfo.subDamage[i].resist;
3182  }
3183 
3184  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3185  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "AttackerStateUpdate: (Player) %u attacked %u (TypeId: %u) for %u dmg, absorbed %u, blocked %u, resisted %u.",
3186  GetGUIDLow(), pVictim->GetGUIDLow(), pVictim->GetTypeId(), meleeDamageInfo.totalDamage, totalAbsorb, meleeDamageInfo.blocked_amount, totalResist);
3187  else
3188  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "AttackerStateUpdate: (NPC) %u attacked %u (TypeId: %u) for %u dmg, absorbed %u, blocked %u, resisted %u.",
3189  GetGUIDLow(), pVictim->GetGUIDLow(), pVictim->GetTypeId(), meleeDamageInfo.totalDamage, totalAbsorb, meleeDamageInfo.blocked_amount, totalResist);
3190 }
3191 
3192 void Unit::DoExtraAttacks(Unit* pVictim)
3193 {
3194  m_extraAttacksExecuting = true;
3195  while (m_extraAttacks)
3196  {
3197  AttackerStateUpdate(pVictim, BASE_ATTACK, true);
3198  if (m_extraAttacks > 0)
3199  --m_extraAttacks;
3200  }
3201  m_extraAttacksExecuting = false;
3202 }
3203 
3204 MeleeHitOutcome Unit::RollMeleeOutcomeAgainst(const Unit* pVictim, WeaponAttackType attType, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask) const
3205 {
3206  if (pVictim->GetCombatManager().IsInEvadeMode())
3207  return MELEE_HIT_EVADE;
3208 
3209  if (m_alwaysHit)
3210  return MELEE_HIT_NORMAL;
3211 
3212  Die<UnitCombatDieSide, UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_HIT, NUM_UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_SIDES> die;
3213  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_MISS, CalculateEffectiveMissChance(pVictim, attType));
3214  if (pVictim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !pVictim->IsStandState() && CanCrit(attType))
3215  {
3216  die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_CRIT] = 10000;
3217  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "RollMeleeOutcomeAgainst: New attack die: [MISS:%u, CRIT:%u] (target is sitting)",
3218  die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_MISS], die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_CRIT]);
3219  }
3220  else
3221  {
3222  if (pVictim->CanReactInCombat())
3223  {
3224  if (pVictim->CanDodgeInCombat(this))
3225  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DODGE, pVictim->CalculateEffectiveDodgeChance(this, attType));
3226  if (pVictim->CanParryInCombat(this))
3227  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_PARRY, pVictim->CalculateEffectiveParryChance(this, attType));
3228  if (pVictim->CanBlockInCombat(this, schoolMask))
3229  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_BLOCK, pVictim->CalculateEffectiveBlockChance(this, attType));
3230  }
3231  if (CanGlanceInCombat(pVictim))
3232  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_GLANCE, CalculateEffectiveGlanceChance(pVictim, attType));
3233  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_CRIT, CalculateEffectiveCritChance(pVictim, attType));
3234  if (CanCrushInCombat(pVictim))
3235  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_CRUSH, CalculateEffectiveCrushChance(pVictim, attType));
3236  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "RollMeleeOutcomeAgainst: New attack die: [MISS:%u, DODGE:%u, PARRY:%u, BLOCK:%u, GLANCE:%u, CRIT:%u, CRUSH:%u]",
3237  die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_MISS], die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DODGE], die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_PARRY], die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_BLOCK],
3238  die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_GLANCE], die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_CRIT], die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_CRUSH]);
3239  }
3240 
3241  const uint32 random = urand(1, 10000);
3242  const UnitCombatDieSide side = die.roll(random);
3243  if (side != UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_HIT)
3244  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "RollMeleeOutcomeAgainst: Rolled %u, result: %s (chance %u)", random, UnitCombatDieSideText(side), die.chance[side]);
3245  switch (uint32(side))
3246  {
3247  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_MISS: return MELEE_HIT_MISS;
3248  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DODGE: return MELEE_HIT_DODGE;
3249  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_PARRY: return MELEE_HIT_PARRY;
3250  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_BLOCK: return MELEE_HIT_BLOCK;
3251  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_GLANCE: return MELEE_HIT_GLANCING;
3252  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_CRIT: return MELEE_HIT_CRIT;
3253  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_CRUSH: return MELEE_HIT_CRUSHING;
3254  }
3255  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "RollMeleeOutcomeAgainst: Rolled %u, result: HIT", random);
3256  return MELEE_HIT_NORMAL;
3257 }
3258 
3259 uint32 Unit::CalculateDamage(WeaponAttackType attType, bool normalized, uint8 index)
3260 {
3261  float min_damage, max_damage;
3262 
3263  if (GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER && index != 0)
3264  return 0;
3265 
3266  if ((normalized || index != 0) && GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3267  ((Player*)this)->CalculateMinMaxDamage(attType, normalized, min_damage, max_damage, index);
3268  else
3269  {
3270  switch (attType)
3271  {
3272  case RANGED_ATTACK:
3273  min_damage = GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_MINRANGEDDAMAGE);
3274  max_damage = GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_MAXRANGEDDAMAGE);
3275  break;
3276  case BASE_ATTACK:
3277  min_damage = GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_MINDAMAGE);
3278  max_damage = GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_MAXDAMAGE);
3279  break;
3280  case OFF_ATTACK:
3281  min_damage = GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_MINOFFHANDDAMAGE);
3282  max_damage = GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_MAXOFFHANDDAMAGE);
3283  break;
3284  // Just for good manner
3285  default:
3286  min_damage = 0.0f;
3287  max_damage = 0.0f;
3288  break;
3289  }
3290  }
3291 
3292  if (min_damage > max_damage)
3293  {
3294  std::swap(min_damage, max_damage);
3295  }
3296 
3297  if (max_damage == 0.0f)
3298  max_damage = 5.0f;
3299 
3300  return urand((uint32)min_damage, (uint32)max_damage);
3301 }
3302 
3303 float Unit::CalculateLevelPenalty(SpellEntry const* spellProto) const
3304 {
3305  uint32 spellLevel = spellProto->spellLevel;
3306  if (spellLevel <= 0)
3307  return 1.0f;
3308 
3309  float LvlPenalty = 0.0f;
3310 
3311  if (spellLevel < 20)
3312  LvlPenalty = (20.0f - spellLevel) * 3.75f;
3313  float LvlFactor = (float(spellLevel) + 6.0f) / float(GetLevel());
3314  if (LvlFactor > 1.0f)
3315  LvlFactor = 1.0f;
3316 
3317  return (100.0f - LvlPenalty) * LvlFactor / 100.0f;
3318 }
3319 
3320 void Unit::SendMeleeAttackStart(const Unit& victim) const
3321 {
3322  WorldPacket data(SMSG_ATTACKSTART, 8 + 8);
3323  data << GetObjectGuid();
3324  data << victim.GetObjectGuid();
3325 
3326  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
3327  DETAIL_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "WORLD: Sent SMSG_ATTACKSTART");
3328 }
3329 
3330 void Unit::SendMeleeAttackStop(const Unit& victim) const
3331 {
3332  WorldPacket data(SMSG_ATTACKSTOP, (4 + 16)); // we guess size
3333  data << GetPackGUID();
3334  data << victim.GetPackGUID();
3335  data << uint32(IsDead() ? 1 : 0);
3336  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
3337  DETAIL_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "%s stopped attacking %s", GetGuidStr().c_str(), victim.GetGuidStr().c_str());
3338 }
3339 
3340 SpellMissInfo Unit::MeleeSpellHitResult(Unit* pVictim, SpellEntry const* spell, uint32* heartbeatResistChance/* = nullptr*/)
3341 {
3342  Die<UnitCombatDieSide, UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_HIT, NUM_UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_SIDES> die;
3343  if (!spell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_NO_ATTACK_MISS))
3344  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_MISS, CalculateSpellMissChance(pVictim, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, spell));
3345  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_RESIST, CalculateSpellResistChance(pVictim, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, spell));
3346  if (pVictim->CanReactOnAbility(spell))
3347  {
3348  const WeaponAttackType attackType = GetWeaponAttackType(spell);
3349  if (pVictim->CanDodgeAbility(this, spell))
3350  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DODGE, pVictim->CalculateEffectiveDodgeChance(this, attackType, spell));
3351  if (pVictim->CanParryAbility(this, spell))
3352  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_PARRY, pVictim->CalculateEffectiveParryChance(this, attackType, spell));
3353  if (pVictim->CanDeflectAbility(this, spell))
3354  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DEFLECT, pVictim->CalculateAbilityDeflectChance(this, spell));
3355  if (pVictim->CanBlockAbility(this, spell, true))
3356  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_BLOCK, pVictim->CalculateEffectiveBlockChance(this, attackType, spell));
3357  }
3358  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "MeleeSpellHitResult: New ability hit die: %u [MISS:%u, RESIST:%u, DODGE:%u, PARRY:%u, DEFLECT:%u, BLOCK:%u]", spell->Id,
3359  die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_MISS], die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_RESIST], die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DODGE],
3360  die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_PARRY], die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DEFLECT], die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_BLOCK]);
3361 
3362  // Memorize heartbeat resist chance if needed:
3363  if (heartbeatResistChance && spell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_HEARTBEAT_RESIST))
3364  *heartbeatResistChance = (die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_RESIST] + die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_MISS]);
3365 
3366  const uint32 random = urand(1, 10000);
3367  const UnitCombatDieSide side = die.roll(random);
3368  if (side != UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_HIT)
3369  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "MeleeSpellHitResult: Rolled %u, result: %s (chance %u)", random, UnitCombatDieSideText(side), die.chance[side]);
3370  switch (uint32(side))
3371  {
3372  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_MISS: return SPELL_MISS_MISS;
3373  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_RESIST: return SPELL_MISS_RESIST;
3374  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DODGE: return SPELL_MISS_DODGE;
3375  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_PARRY: return SPELL_MISS_PARRY;
3376  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DEFLECT: return SPELL_MISS_DEFLECT;
3377  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_BLOCK: return SPELL_MISS_BLOCK;
3378  }
3379  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "MeleeSpellHitResult: Rolled %u, result: HIT", random);
3380  return SPELL_MISS_NONE;
3381 }
3382 
3383 SpellMissInfo Unit::MagicSpellHitResult(Unit* pVictim, SpellEntry const* spell, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask, uint32* heartbeatResistChance/* = nullptr*/)
3384 {
3385  Die<UnitCombatDieSide, UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_HIT, NUM_UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_SIDES> die;
3386  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_MISS, CalculateSpellMissChance(pVictim, schoolMask, spell));
3387  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_RESIST, CalculateSpellResistChance(pVictim, schoolMask, spell));
3388  if (pVictim->CanDeflectAbility(this, spell))
3389  die.set(UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DEFLECT, pVictim->CalculateAbilityDeflectChance(this, spell));
3390  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "MagicSpellHitResult: New spell hit die: %u [MISS:%u, RESIST:%u, DEFLECT:%u]", spell->Id,
3391  die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_MISS], die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_RESIST], die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DEFLECT]);
3392 
3393  // Memorize heartbeat resist chance if needed:
3394  if (heartbeatResistChance && spell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_HEARTBEAT_RESIST))
3395  *heartbeatResistChance = (die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_RESIST] + die.chance[UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_MISS]);
3396 
3397  const uint32 random = urand(1, 10000);
3398  const UnitCombatDieSide side = die.roll(random);
3399  if (side != UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_HIT)
3400  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "MagicSpellHitResult: Rolled %u, result: %s (chance %u)", random, UnitCombatDieSideText(side), die.chance[side]);
3401  switch (uint32(side))
3402  {
3403  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_MISS: return SPELL_MISS_MISS;
3404  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_RESIST: return SPELL_MISS_RESIST;
3405  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DEFLECT: return SPELL_MISS_DEFLECT;
3406  }
3407  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "MagicSpellHitResult: Rolled %u, result: HIT", random);
3408  return SPELL_MISS_NONE;
3409 }
3410 
3411 SpellMissInfo Unit::SpellHitResult(WorldObject* caster, Unit* pVictim, SpellEntry const* spell, uint8 effectMask, bool reflectable, bool reflected, uint32* heartbeatResistChance/* = nullptr*/)
3412 {
3413  // Dead units can't be missed, can't resist, reflect, etc
3414  if (!pVictim->IsAlive())
3415  return SPELL_MISS_NONE;
3416 
3417  // Return evade for units in evade mode
3418  if (pVictim->GetCombatManager().IsInEvadeMode())
3419  return SPELL_MISS_EVADE;
3420 
3421  // !!!
3422  SpellSchoolMask schoolMask = GetSpellSchoolMask(spell);
3423 
3424  // All positive spells can`t miss
3425  // TODO: client not show miss log for this spells - so need find info for this in dbc and use it!
3426  if (IsPositiveEffectMask(spell, effectMask, caster, pVictim))
3427  {
3428  if (pVictim->IsImmuneToSpell(spell, reflected ? false : (caster == pVictim), effectMask, caster))
3429  return SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE;
3430 
3431  // Check for immune to damage as hit result if spell hit composed entirely out of damage effects
3432  if (IsSpellEffectsDamage(*spell, effectMask) && pVictim->IsImmuneToDamage(schoolMask))
3433  return SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE;
3434 
3435  return SPELL_MISS_NONE;
3436  }
3437  // !!!UNHACKME: Self-resists suppression hack for channeled spells until spell execution is modernized with effectmasks: Drain Soul, Blizzard, RoF
3438  if (pVictim == caster && IsChanneledSpell(spell))
3439  {
3440  for (uint32 i = EFFECT_INDEX_0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
3441  {
3442  if (IsCasterSourceTarget(spell->EffectImplicitTargetA[i]) || IsCasterSourceTarget(spell->EffectImplicitTargetB[i]))
3443  return SPELL_MISS_NONE;
3444  }
3445  }
3446 
3447  // wand case
3448  bool wand = spell->Id == 5019;
3449  if (wand && caster->IsPlayer() && !!(static_cast<Unit*>(caster)->getClassMask() & CLASSMASK_WAND_USERS))
3450  schoolMask = static_cast<Unit*>(caster)->GetRangedDamageSchoolMask();
3451 
3452  // Reflect (when available)
3453  if (reflectable)
3454  {
3455  const float chance = pVictim->GetReflectChance(schoolMask);
3456  if (roll_chance_combat(chance))
3457  return SPELL_MISS_REFLECT;
3458  }
3459  if (!spell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_NO_IMMUNITIES))
3460  {
3461  // TODO: improve for partial application
3462  // Check for immune
3463  if (!wand && pVictim->IsImmuneToSpell(spell, reflected ? false : (caster == pVictim), effectMask, caster))
3464  return SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE;
3465  // Check for immune to damage as hit result if spell hit composed entirely out of damage effects
3466  if (IsSpellEffectsDamage(*spell, effectMask) && pVictim->IsImmuneToDamage(schoolMask))
3467  return SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE;
3468  }
3469 
3470  Unit* hitCaster = nullptr;
3471  if (caster->IsUnit())
3472  hitCaster = static_cast<Unit*>(caster);
3473  else if (caster->IsGameObject())
3474  hitCaster = static_cast<GameObject*>(caster)->GetOwner();
3475 
3476  if (hitCaster && !spell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_NO_AVOIDANCE))
3477  {
3478  switch (spell->DmgClass)
3479  {
3480  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
3481  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
3482  return hitCaster->MeleeSpellHitResult(pVictim, spell, heartbeatResistChance);
3483  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC:
3484  return hitCaster->MagicSpellHitResult(pVictim, spell, schoolMask, heartbeatResistChance);
3485  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE:
3486  // Usually never misses, but needs more research for some spells
3487  break;
3488  }
3489  }
3490 
3491  return SPELL_MISS_NONE;
3492 }
3493 
3494 bool Unit::IsBlockCritical() const
3495 {
3496  int32 chance = GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_BLOCK_CRIT_CHANCE);
3497  if (!chance) // dont roll if no chance
3498  return false;
3499 
3500  return roll_chance_i(chance);
3501 }
3502 
3503 uint32 Unit::GetDefenseSkillValue(Unit const* target) const
3504 {
3505  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3506  {
3507  // in PvP always use full skill (and bonuses on top of it if present)
3508  uint32 value = (target && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3509  ? std::max(((Player*)this)->GetSkillMax(SKILL_DEFENSE), ((Player*)this)->GetSkillValue(SKILL_DEFENSE))
3510  : ((Player*)this)->GetSkillValue(SKILL_DEFENSE);
3511  value += uint32(((Player*)this)->GetRatingBonusValue(CR_DEFENSE_SKILL));
3512  return value;
3513  }
3514  return GetUnitMeleeSkill(target);
3515 }
3516 
3517 bool Unit::CanCrush() const
3518 {
3519  // Generally, only npcs and npc-controlled players/units are eligible to deal crushing blows
3520  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
3521  return GetCharmerGuid().IsCreature();
3522  return !GetMasterGuid().IsPlayer();
3523 }
3524 
3525 bool Unit::CanGlance() const
3526 {
3527  // Generally, only players and player-controlled units are eligible to deal glancing blows
3528  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
3529  return !GetCharmerGuid().IsCreature();
3530  return false;
3531 }
3532 
3533 bool Unit::CanDaze() const
3534 {
3535  // Generally, only npcs are able to daze targets in melee
3536  return (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED));
3537 }
3538 
3539 void Unit::SetCanDodge(const bool flag)
3540 {
3541  if (m_canDodge == flag)
3542  return;
3543 
3544  m_canDodge = flag;
3545  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3546  ((Player*)this)->UpdateDodgePercentage();
3547 }
3548 
3549 void Unit::SetCanParry(const bool flag)
3550 {
3551  if (m_canParry == flag)
3552  return;
3553 
3554  m_canParry = flag;
3555  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3556  ((Player*)this)->UpdateParryPercentage();
3557 }
3558 
3559 void Unit::SetCanBlock(const bool flag)
3560 {
3561  if (m_canBlock == flag)
3562  return;
3563 
3564  m_canBlock = flag;
3565  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3566  ((Player*)this)->UpdateBlockPercentage();
3567 }
3568 
3569 bool Unit::CanDodgeInCombat() const
3570 {
3571  if (!CanDodge() || !CanReactInCombat())
3572  return false;
3573  // Own chance appears to be zero / below zero / unmeaningful for some reason (debuffs?): unit is incapable
3574  if (GetDodgeChance() < 0.005f)
3575  return false;
3576  return true;
3577 }
3578 
3579 bool Unit::CanDodgeInCombat(const Unit* attacker) const
3580 {
3581  if (!attacker || !CanDodgeInCombat() || IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false))
3582  return false;
3583  // Players can't dodge attacks from behind
3584  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3585  return attacker->IsFacingTargetsFront(this);
3586  return true;
3587 }
3588 
3589 bool Unit::CanParryInCombat() const
3590 {
3591  if (!CanParry() || !CanReactInCombat() || HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_DISARMED) || IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false))
3592  return false;
3593  // Own chance appears to be zero / below zero / unmeaningful for some reason (debuffs?): unit is incapable
3594  if (GetParryChance() < 0.005f)
3595  return false;
3596  // Players need a melee weapon they can use to parry an attack
3597  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3598  {
3599  const Player* player = (const Player*)this;
3600  return (player->GetWeaponForAttack(BASE_ATTACK, true, true) || player->GetWeaponForAttack(OFF_ATTACK, true, true));
3601  }
3602  return true;
3603 }
3604 
3605 bool Unit::CanParryInCombat(const Unit* attacker) const
3606 {
3607  return (attacker && CanParryInCombat() && (HasAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_PARRY_FROM_BEHIND_PERCENT) || attacker->IsFacingTargetsFront(this)));
3608 }
3609 
3610 bool Unit::CanBlockInCombat(SpellSchoolMask /*weaponSchoolMask*/) const
3611 {
3612  if (!CanBlock() || !CanReactInCombat() || IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false))
3613  return false;
3614  // Own chance appears to be zero / below zero / unmeaningful for some reason (debuffs?): unit is incapable
3615  if (GetBlockChance() < 0.005f)
3616  return false;
3617  // Players need a shield equipped to block an attack
3618  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3619  {
3620  const Player* player = (const Player*)this;
3621  if (player->CanUseEquippedWeapon(OFF_ATTACK))
3622  {
3623  const Item* offhand = player->GetItemByPos(INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0, EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND);
3624  return (offhand && !offhand->IsBroken() && offhand->GetProto()->Block);
3625  }
3626  return false;
3627  }
3628  return true;
3629 }
3630 
3631 bool Unit::CanBlockInCombat(const Unit* attacker, SpellSchoolMask weaponSchoolMask) const
3632 {
3633  return (attacker && CanBlockInCombat(weaponSchoolMask) && attacker->IsFacingTargetsFront(this));
3634 }
3635 
3636 bool Unit::CanCrushInCombat() const
3637 {
3638  if (!CanCrush())
3639  return false;
3640  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((Creature*)this)->GetSettings().HasFlag(CreatureStaticFlags2::NO_CRUSHING_BLOWS))
3641  return false;
3642  return true;
3643 }
3644 
3645 bool Unit::CanCrushInCombat(const Unit* victim) const
3646 {
3647  return (victim && CanCrushInCombat() && victim->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED));
3648 }
3649 
3650 bool Unit::CanGlanceInCombat(const Unit* victim) const
3651 {
3652  return (victim && CanGlanceInCombat() && !victim->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED) && victim->GetLevelForTarget(this) > 10);
3653 }
3654 
3655 bool Unit::CanDazeInCombat(const Unit* victim) const
3656 {
3657  return (victim && CanDazeInCombat() && !victim->IsVehicle() && (victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) && victim->GetLevelForTarget(this) > 5 && IsFacingTargetsBack(victim));
3658 }
3659 
3660 bool Unit::CanReactOnAbility(const SpellEntry* ability) const
3661 {
3662  return (ability && !ability->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_NO_ACTIVE_DEFENSE));
3663 }
3664 
3665 bool Unit::CanDodgeAbility(const Unit* attacker, const SpellEntry* ability) const
3666 {
3667  // Can't dodge unavoidable and ranged attacks
3668  if (!CanReactOnAbility(ability) || ability->DmgClass != SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE)
3669  return false;
3670  if (ability->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_NO_ATTACK_DODGE))
3671  return false;
3672  // Check if attacker can be dodged at the moment
3673  if (!CanDodgeInCombat(attacker))
3674  return false;
3675  // Check if attacker cuts through dodge with this ability
3676  const AuraList& ignore = attacker->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_IGNORE_COMBAT_RESULT);
3677  for (auto i : ignore)
3678  {
3679  if (i->isAffectedOnSpell(ability) && i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue == MELEE_HIT_DODGE)
3680  return false;
3681  }
3682  return true;
3683 }
3684 
3685 bool Unit::CanParryAbility(const Unit* attacker, const SpellEntry* ability) const
3686 {
3687  // Can't parry unavoidable attacks
3688  if (!CanReactOnAbility(ability))
3689  return false;
3690  // Only physical melee attacks can be parried, deflect for magical and ranged
3691  if (ability->DmgClass != SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE || (GetSpellSchoolMask(ability) & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_MAGIC))
3692  return false;
3693  // Only close range melee attacks can be parried, longer range abilities use deflect
3694  if (ability->rangeIndex != SPELL_RANGE_IDX_COMBAT && ability->rangeIndex != SPELL_RANGE_IDX_SELF_ONLY)
3695  return false;
3696  if (ability->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_NO_ATTACK_PARRY))
3697  return false;
3698  // Check if attacker can be parried at the moment
3699  if (!CanParryInCombat(attacker))
3700  return false;
3701  // Check if attacker cuts through parry with this ability
3702  const AuraList& ignore = attacker->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_IGNORE_COMBAT_RESULT);
3703  for (auto i : ignore)
3704  {
3705  if (i->isAffectedOnSpell(ability) && i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue == MELEE_HIT_PARRY)
3706  return false;
3707  }
3708  return true;
3709 }
3710 
3711 bool Unit::CanBlockAbility(const Unit* attacker, const SpellEntry* ability, bool miss) const
3712 {
3713  // Can't block unavoidable attacks
3714  if (!CanReactOnAbility(ability))
3715  return false;
3716  // Melee and ranged spells only
3717  switch (ability->DmgClass)
3718  {
3719  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
3720  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
3721  break;
3722  default:
3723  return false;
3724  }
3725  // There are 2 types of ability blocks: partial and full
3726  // Fully blockable spells have a specific attribute, which generates a miss instead of a partial block
3727  // Spells with an attribute must be rolled for block once on spell hit die
3728  // Spells without an attribute must be rolled for partial block only inside damage calculation
3729  // This function can query both scenarios via an argument flag
3730  if (miss != ability->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_COMPLETELY_BLOCKED))
3731  return false;
3732  // Check if attacker can be blocked at the moment
3733  if (!CanBlockInCombat(attacker))
3734  return false;
3735  // Check if attacker cuts through block with this ability
3736  const AuraList& ignore = attacker->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_IGNORE_COMBAT_RESULT);
3737  for (auto i : ignore)
3738  {
3739  if (i->isAffectedOnSpell(ability) && i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue == MELEE_HIT_BLOCK)
3740  return false;
3741  }
3742  return true;
3743 }
3744 
3745 bool Unit::CanDeflectAbility(const Unit* attacker, const SpellEntry* ability) const
3746 {
3747  // Can't deflect unavoidable attacks
3748  if (!CanReactOnAbility(ability))
3749  return false;
3750  // Only magical melee attacks, ranged attacks and spells can be deflected, parry for the rest
3751  switch (ability->DmgClass)
3752  {
3753  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
3754  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC:
3755  break;
3756  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
3757  if (!(GetSpellSchoolMask(ability) & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_MAGIC))
3758  return false;
3759  if (ability->rangeIndex == SPELL_RANGE_IDX_COMBAT || ability->rangeIndex == SPELL_RANGE_IDX_SELF_ONLY)
3760  return false;
3761  break;
3762  default:
3763  return false;
3764  }
3765  // Check if attacker can be parried/deflected at the moment
3766  if (!CanParryInCombat(attacker))
3767  return false;
3768  // Check if attacker cuts through parry/deflect with this ability
3769  const AuraList& ignore = attacker->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_IGNORE_COMBAT_RESULT);
3770  for (auto i : ignore)
3771  {
3772  if (i->isAffectedOnSpell(ability) && i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue == MELEE_HIT_PARRY)
3773  return false;
3774  }
3775  return true;
3776 }
3777 
3778 static const float AVOIDANCE_DIMINISHING_COEFFICIENT[MAX_CLASSES] =
3779 {
3780  0.0000f, // [0] <Unused>
3781  0.9560f, // [1] Warrior
3782  0.9560f, // [2] Paladin
3783  0.9880f, // [3] Hunter
3784  0.9880f, // [4] Rogue
3785  0.9830f, // [5] Priest
3786  0.9560f, // [6] DK
3787  0.9880f, // [7] Shaman
3788  0.9830f, // [8] Mage
3789  0.9830f, // [9] Warlock
3790  0.0000f, // [10] <Unused>
3791  0.9720f // [11] Druid
3792 };
3793 
3794 static const float AVOIDANCE_DIMINISHING_DODGE_CAP[MAX_CLASSES] =
3795 {
3796  0.000000f, // [0] <Unused>
3797  88.129021f, // [1] Warrior
3798  88.129021f, // [2] Paladin
3799  145.560408f, // [3] Hunter
3800  145.560408f, // [4] Rogue
3801  150.375940f, // [5] Priest
3802  88.129021f, // [6] DK
3803  145.560408f, // [7] Shaman
3804  150.375940f, // [8] Mage
3805  150.375940f, // [9] Warlock
3806  0.000000f, // [10] <Unused>
3807  116.890707f, // [11] Druid
3808 };
3809 
3810 float Unit::CalculateEffectiveDodgeChance(const Unit* attacker, WeaponAttackType attType, const SpellEntry* ability) const
3811 {
3812  float chance = 0.0f;
3813 
3814  chance += GetDodgeChance();
3815  // Own chance appears to be zero / below zero / unmeaningful for some reason (debuffs?): skip calculation, unit is incapable
3816  if (chance < 0.005f)
3817  return 0.0f;
3818  const bool weapon = (!ability || ability->EquippedItemClass == ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON);
3819  // Skill difference can be negative (and reduce our chance to mitigate an attack), which means:
3820  // a) Attacker's level is higher
3821  // b) Attacker has +skill bonuses
3822  const bool isPlayerOrPet = HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
3823  const uint32 skill = (weapon ? attacker->GetWeaponSkillValue(attType, this) : attacker->GetSkillMaxForLevel(this));
3824  int32 difference = int32(GetDefenseSkillValue(attacker) - skill);
3825  // Defense/weapon skill factor: for players and NPCs
3826  float factor = 0.04f;
3827  // NPCs gain additional bonus dodge chance based on positive skill difference
3828  if (!isPlayerOrPet && difference > 0)
3829  factor = 0.1f;
3830  // Dynamic diminishing for player's tanking gear
3831  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3832  {
3833  const uint8 pclass = getClass();
3834  if (pclass < MAX_CLASSES)
3835  {
3836  const float cap = AVOIDANCE_DIMINISHING_DODGE_CAP[pclass];
3837  const float k = AVOIDANCE_DIMINISHING_COEFFICIENT[pclass];
3838  if (cap >= 1 && k >= 0.001f)
3839  {
3840  float diminishing = m_modDodgeChanceDiminishing;
3841  // We need to diminish extra defense from rating only, before that it is just compensating for lack of skill
3842  if (difference > 0)
3843  {
3844  const int32 extra = int32(((const Player*)this)->GetRatingBonusValue(CR_DEFENSE_SKILL));
3845  const int32 amount = std::min(difference, extra);
3846  // Substract it from difference to use in diminished formula
3847  diminishing += (amount * factor);
3848  difference -= amount;
3849  }
3850  const float nondiminishing = (chance - diminishing);
3851  chance = nondiminishing + ((diminishing * cap) / (diminishing + (cap * k)));
3852  }
3853  }
3854  }
3855  chance += (difference * factor);
3856  // Attacker's SPELL_AURA_MOD_COMBAT_RESULT_CHANCE contribution (or reduction)
3857  chance += attacker->GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_COMBAT_RESULT_CHANCE, VICTIMSTATE_DODGE);
3858  // Attacker's expertise reduction
3859  chance -= attacker->GetExpertisePercent(attType);
3860  return std::max(0.0f, std::min(chance, 100.0f));
3861 }
3862 
3863 const float AVOIDANCE_DIMINISHING_PARRY_CAP[MAX_CLASSES] =
3864 {
3865  0.000000f, // [0] <Unused>
3866  47.003525f, // [1] Warrior
3867  47.003525f, // [2] Paladin
3868  145.560408f, // [3] Hunter
3869  145.560408f, // [4] Rogue
3870  0.000000f, // [5] Priest
3871  47.003525f, // [6] DK
3872  145.560408f, // [7] Shaman
3873  0.000000f, // [8] Mage
3874  0.000000f, // [9] Warlock
3875  0.000000f, // [10] <Unused>
3876  0.000000f, // [11] Druid
3877 };
3878 
3879 float Unit::CalculateEffectiveParryChance(const Unit* attacker, WeaponAttackType attType, const SpellEntry* ability) const
3880 {
3881  float chance = 0.0f;
3882 
3883  if (attType == RANGED_ATTACK)
3884  {
3885  int32 deflect = GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_DEFLECT_SPELLS);
3886  // TODO: Attack brom behind: verify if chance from behind should be additive
3887  if (deflect && attacker->IsFacingTargetsBack(this))
3888  chance = float(deflect) * (float(GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_PARRY_FROM_BEHIND_PERCENT)) / 100.0f);
3889  return std::max(0.0f, std::min(chance, 100.0f));
3890  }
3891 
3892  chance += GetParryChance();
3893  // Own chance appears to be zero / below zero / unmeaningful for some reason (debuffs?): skip calculation, unit is incapable
3894  if (chance < 0.005f)
3895  return 0.0f;
3896  const bool weapon = (!ability || ability->EquippedItemClass == ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON);
3897  // Skill difference can be negative (and reduce our chance to mitigate an attack), which means:
3898  // a) Attacker's level is higher
3899  // b) Attacker has +skill bonuses
3900  const bool isPlayerOrPet = HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
3901  const uint32 skill = (weapon ? attacker->GetWeaponSkillValue(attType, this) : attacker->GetSkillMaxForLevel(this));
3902  int32 difference = int32(GetDefenseSkillValue(attacker) - skill);
3903  // Defense/weapon skill factor: for players and NPCs
3904  float factor = 0.04f;
3905  // NPCs gain additional bonus parry chance based on positive skill difference (same value as bonus miss rate)
3906  if (!isPlayerOrPet && difference > 0)
3907  {
3908  if (difference > 10)
3909  {
3910  // First 10 points of difference (2 levels): usual decrease
3911  chance += (10 * 0.1f);
3912  difference -= 10;
3913  // Each additional point of difference:
3914  factor = 0.4f;
3915  }
3916  else
3917  factor = 0.1f;
3918  }
3919  // Dynamic diminishing for player's tanking gear
3920  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3921  {
3922  const uint8 pclass = getClass();
3923  if (pclass < MAX_CLASSES)
3924  {
3925  const float cap = AVOIDANCE_DIMINISHING_PARRY_CAP[pclass];
3926  const float k = AVOIDANCE_DIMINISHING_COEFFICIENT[pclass];
3927  if (cap >= 1 && k >= 0.001f)
3928  {
3929  float diminishing = m_modParryChanceDiminishing;
3930  // We need to diminish extra defense from rating only, before that it is just compensating for lack of skill
3931  if (difference > 0)
3932  {
3933  const int32 extra = int32(((const Player*)this)->GetRatingBonusValue(CR_DEFENSE_SKILL));
3934  const int32 amount = std::min(difference, extra);
3935  // Substract it from difference to use in diminished formula
3936  diminishing += (amount * factor);
3937  difference -= amount;
3938  }
3939  const float nondiminishing = (chance - diminishing);
3940  chance = nondiminishing + ((diminishing * cap) / (diminishing + (cap * k)));
3941  }
3942  }
3943  }
3944  chance += (difference * factor);
3945  // Attacker's SPELL_AURA_MOD_COMBAT_RESULT_CHANCE contribution (or reduction)
3946  chance += attacker->GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_COMBAT_RESULT_CHANCE, VICTIMSTATE_PARRY);
3947  // Attacker's expertise reduction
3948  chance -= attacker->GetExpertisePercent(attType);
3949 
3950  // TODO: Attack brom behind: verify if chance from behind should be additive
3951  if (attacker->IsFacingTargetsBack(this))
3952  chance = chance * (float(GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_PARRY_FROM_BEHIND_PERCENT)) / 100.0f);
3953 
3954  return std::max(0.0f, std::min(chance, 100.0f));
3955 }
3956 
3957 float Unit::CalculateEffectiveBlockChance(const Unit* attacker, WeaponAttackType attType, const SpellEntry* ability) const
3958 {
3959  float chance = 0.0f;
3960 
3961  chance += GetBlockChance();
3962  // Own chance appears to be zero / below zero / unmeaningful for some reason (debuffs?): skip calculation, unit is incapable
3963  if (chance < 0.005f)
3964  return 0.0f;
3965  const bool weapon = (!ability || ability->EquippedItemClass == ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON);
3966  // Skill difference can be negative (and reduce our chance to mitigate an attack), which means:
3967  // a) Attacker's level is higher
3968  // b) Attacker has +skill bonuses
3969  const bool isPlayerOrPet = HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
3970  const uint32 skill = (weapon ? attacker->GetWeaponSkillValue(attType, this) : attacker->GetSkillMaxForLevel(this));
3971  const int32 difference = int32(GetDefenseSkillValue(attacker) - skill);
3972  // Defense/weapon skill factor: for players and NPCs
3973  float factor = 0.04f;
3974  // NPCs cannot gain bonus block chance based on positive skill difference
3975  if (!isPlayerOrPet && difference > 0)
3976  factor = 0.0f;
3977  chance += (difference * factor);
3978  // Attacker's SPELL_AURA_MOD_COMBAT_RESULT_CHANCE contribution (or reduction)
3979  chance += attacker->GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_COMBAT_RESULT_CHANCE, VICTIMSTATE_BLOCKS);
3980  return std::max(0.0f, std::min(chance, 100.0f));
3981 }
3982 
3983 float Unit::CalculateEffectiveCrushChance(const Unit* victim, WeaponAttackType attType) const
3984 {
3985  float chance = 0.0f;
3986 
3987  // Crushing blow chance is present when attacker's weapon skill is >= 20 over victim's own capped defense skill
3988  // The chance starts at 15% and increased by 2% per each additional skill point of defense deficit
3989  const uint32 cap = victim->GetSkillMaxForLevel();
3990  const uint32 defense = std::min(victim->GetDefenseSkillValue(this), cap);
3991  const int32 deficit = (int32(GetWeaponSkillValue(attType, victim)) - int32(defense));
3992  if (deficit >= 20)
3993  chance += ((2 * deficit) - 15);
3994  return std::max(0.0f, std::min(chance, 100.0f));
3995 }
3996 
3997 float Unit::CalculateEffectiveGlanceChance(const Unit* victim, WeaponAttackType attType) const
3998 {
3999  float chance = 0.0f;
4000 
4001  // Glancing blow chance starts at 1% when victim's defense skill is > 10 lower than attacker's own capped weapon skill
4002  // The chance is increased for each point of skill diffrernce
4003  const uint32 cap = GetSkillMaxForLevel();
4004  const uint32 skill = std::min(GetWeaponSkillValue(attType, victim), cap);
4005  const uint32 defense = victim->GetDefenseSkillValue(this);
4006  chance += (10 + int32(defense - skill));
4007  return std::max(0.0f, std::min(chance, 100.0f));
4008 }
4009 
4010 float Unit::CalculateEffectiveDazeChance(const Unit* victim, WeaponAttackType attType) const
4011 {
4012  float chance = 0.0f;
4013 
4014  // Base chance starts at 20% and is modified by difference between victim's defense skill and attacker's weapon skill
4015  const uint32 level = victim->GetLevelForTarget(this);
4016  // Base chance is reduced for lower levels
4017  if (level < 30)
4018  chance += (0.65f * level) + 0.5f;
4019  else
4020  chance += 20.0f;
4021  // Same mechanics as miss chance, but premultiplied by 4 (20% base instead of 5% base)
4022  chance += (int32(GetWeaponSkillValue(attType, victim)) - int32(victim->GetDefenseSkillValue(this))) * 0.04f * 4;
4023  // Chance is capped at 40%
4024  return std::max(0.0f, std::min(chance, 40.0f));
4025 }
4026 
4027 uint32 Unit::CalculateGlanceAmount(CalcDamageInfo* meleeInfo) const
4028 {
4029  if (!meleeInfo)
4030  return 0;
4031  // Post-2.0.1: capped skill value
4032  const uint32 cap = GetSkillMaxForLevel();
4033  const uint32 skill = std::min(GetWeaponSkillValue(meleeInfo->attackType, meleeInfo->target), cap);
4034  const uint32 defense = meleeInfo->target->GetDefenseSkillValue(this);
4035  const int32 difference = int32(defense - skill);
4036  // Attacker's skill beats victim's defense: no action required
4037  if (difference < 0)
4038  return meleeInfo->totalDamage;
4039  // calculate base values and mods
4040  const bool caster = (getClassMask() & CLASSMASK_WAND_USERS) != 0;
4041  const float baseHighEnd = (caster ? 0.9f : 1.2f);
4042  const float baseLowEnd = (caster ? 0.6f : 1.3f);
4043  const float maxLowEnd = (caster ? 0.6f : 0.91f);
4044 
4045  float highEnd = baseHighEnd - (0.03f * difference);
4046  float lowEnd = baseLowEnd - (0.05f * difference);
4047  // 0.2f <= highEnd <= 0.99f
4048  highEnd = std::min(std::max(highEnd, 0.2f), 0.99f);
4049  // 0.01f <= lowEnd <= maxLowEnd <= highEnd
4050  lowEnd = std::min(std::max(lowEnd, 0.01f), std::min(maxLowEnd, highEnd));
4051  // Roll for final glance damage multiplier and calculate amount of damage glancing blow will deal
4052  const float multiplier = (urand(uint32(lowEnd * 100), uint32(highEnd * 100)) * 0.01f);
4053  const uint32 result = uint32(meleeInfo->totalDamage * multiplier);
4054  meleeInfo->cleanDamage += (meleeInfo->totalDamage - result);
4055  meleeInfo->totalDamage = result;
4056  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[meleeInfo->attackType].lines; i++)
4057  meleeInfo->subDamage[i].damage = uint32(meleeInfo->subDamage[i].damage * multiplier);
4058  return result;
4059 }
4060 
4061 float Unit::CalculateAbilityDeflectChance(const Unit* attacker, const SpellEntry* ability) const
4062 {
4063  switch (ability->DmgClass)
4064  {
4065  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
4066  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED: return CalculateEffectiveParryChance(attacker, GetWeaponAttackType(ability), ability);
4067  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC: return CalculateEffectiveParryChance(attacker, RANGED_ATTACK, ability);
4068  }
4069  return 0.0f;
4070 }
4071 
4072 bool Unit::RollAbilityPartialBlockOutcome(const Unit* attacker, WeaponAttackType attType, const SpellEntry* ability) const
4073 {
4074  if (!CanBlockAbility(attacker, ability))
4075  return false;
4076  const float chance = CalculateEffectiveBlockChance(attacker, attType, ability);
4077  return roll_chance_combat(chance);
4078 }
4079 
4080 float Unit::GetDodgeChance() const
4081 {
4082  float chance = 0.0f;
4083  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4084  chance += 5.0f;
4085  chance += m_modDodgeChance;
4086  return chance;
4087 }
4088 
4089 float Unit::GetParryChance() const
4090 {
4091  float chance = 0.0f;
4092  // FIXME: Verify which creatures are eligible for parry together with DB team and implement in a more clean way
4093  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4094  chance += 5.0f;
4095  chance += m_modParryChance;
4096  return chance;
4097 }
4098 
4099 float Unit::GetBlockChance() const
4100 {
4101  float chance = 0.0f;
4102  // FIXME: Verify which creatures are eligible for block together with DB team and implement in a more clean way
4103  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4104  chance += 5.0f;
4105  chance += m_modBlockChance;
4106  return chance;
4107 }
4108 
4109 float Unit::GetReflectChance(SpellSchoolMask schoolMask) const
4110 {
4111  float chance = 0.0f;
4112  chance += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_REFLECT_SPELLS);
4113  // Reflect works in victim's favour when multi-school spells are involved
4114  chance += GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_REFLECT_SPELLS_SCHOOL, schoolMask);
4115  return chance;
4116 }
4117 
4118 bool Unit::CanCrit(const SpellEntry* entry, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask, WeaponAttackType attType) const
4119 {
4120  // Only players, player pets and totems can crit with spells
4121  if (!HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
4122  return false;
4123  if (HasAffectedAura(SPELL_AURA_ABILITY_PERIODIC_CRIT, entry))
4124  return true;
4125  if (!IsSpellAbleToCrit(entry))
4126  return false;
4127  switch (entry->DmgClass)
4128  {
4129  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
4130  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED: return CanCrit(attType);
4131  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE:
4132  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC: return CanCrit(schoolMask);
4133  }
4134  return false;
4135 }
4136 
4137 float Unit::GetCritChance(WeaponAttackType attType) const
4138 {
4139  float chance = 0.0f;
4140  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4141  // Base crit chance (needed for units only, already included for players)
4142  chance += 5.0f;
4143  chance += m_modCritChance[attType];
4144  return chance;
4145 }
4146 
4147 float Unit::GetCritChance(SpellSchoolMask schoolMask) const
4148 {
4149  float chance = 0.0f;
4150 
4151  uint32 mask = uint32(schoolMask);
4152  if (!mask)
4153  return 0.0f;
4154 
4155  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4156  // Base crit chance (needed for units only, already included for players)
4157  chance += 5.0f;
4158  // Pick highest spell crit available for given school mask
4159  for (uint8 school = 0; mask; ++school)
4160  {
4161  if (mask & 1)
4162  {
4163  const float crit = m_modSpellCritChance[school];
4164  if (crit > chance)
4165  chance = crit;
4166  }
4167  mask >>= 1;
4168  }
4169  return chance;
4170 }
4171 
4172 float Unit::GetCritChance(const SpellEntry* entry, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask) const
4173 {
4174  float chance = 0.0f;
4175 
4176  if (!entry)
4177  return 0.0f;
4178 
4179  if (entry->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_NORMAL_RANGED_ATTACK)) // Wand shoot forced to use ranged crit
4180  chance += GetCritChance(GetWeaponAttackType(entry));
4181  else
4182  {
4183  // Add own hit chance
4184  switch (entry->DmgClass)
4185  {
4186  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC:
4187  chance += GetCritChance(schoolMask);
4188  break;
4189  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
4190  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
4191  chance += GetCritChance(GetWeaponAttackType(entry));
4192  break;
4193  }
4194  }
4195 
4196  // Add mod
4197  if (Player* modOwner = GetSpellModOwner())
4198  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(entry->Id, SPELLMOD_CRITICAL_CHANCE, chance);
4199  return chance;
4200 }
4201 
4202 float Unit::GetCritTakenChance(Unit const* attacker, SpellSchoolMask dmgSchoolMask, SpellDmgClass dmgClass, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, bool heal) const
4203 {
4204  float chance = 0.0f;
4205  // Resilience and resilience-like auras:
4206  if (!heal)
4207  {
4208  // Resilience percent decreases chance to be crit 1:1
4209  switch (uint32(dmgClass))
4210  {
4211  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
4212  chance += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_MELEE_CRIT_CHANCE);
4213  chance -= GetCombatRatingReduction(CR_CRIT_TAKEN_MELEE);
4214  break;
4215  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
4216  chance += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_RANGED_CRIT_CHANCE);
4217  chance -= GetCombatRatingReduction(CR_CRIT_TAKEN_RANGED);
4218  break;
4219  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC:
4220  chance += GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_SPELL_CRIT_CHANCE, dmgSchoolMask);
4221  chance -= GetCombatRatingReduction(CR_CRIT_TAKEN_SPELL);
4222  break;
4223  }
4224  chance += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_SPELL_AND_WEAPON_CRIT_CHANCE);
4225  }
4226 
4227  if (spellInfo) // optimization
4228  {
4229  chance += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CRIT_CHANCE_FOR_CASTER, [attacker, spellInfo](Aura const* aura) -> bool
4230  {
4231  if (aura->GetCasterGuid() == attacker->GetObjectGuid() && aura->isAffectedOnSpell(spellInfo))
4232  return true;
4233  return false;
4234  });
4235  }
4236  else
4237  {
4238  chance += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CRIT_CHANCE_FOR_CASTER, [attacker](Aura const* aura) -> bool
4239  {
4240  if (aura->GetCasterGuid() == attacker->GetObjectGuid())
4241  return true;
4242  return false;
4243  });
4244  }
4245  return chance;
4246 }
4247 
4248 float Unit::GetCritMultiplier(SpellSchoolMask dmgSchoolMask, uint32 /*creatureTypeMask*/, const SpellEntry* spell, bool heal) const
4249 {
4250  const float pct = 0.01f;
4251  // Default crit multiplier (attacks): 2x
4252  float multiplier = 2.0f;
4253  // Default crit multiplier for spells: 1.5x
4254  if (spell)
4255  {
4256  switch (spell->DmgClass)
4257  {
4258  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE:
4259  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC:
4260  multiplier = 1.5f;
4261  break;
4262  }
4263  }
