4264  // Override default multiplier for auras which are able to crit
4265  if (spell && IsSpellAppliesAura(spell))
4266  {
4267  int32 bonus = 0;
4268  const Unit::AuraList& auras = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_ABILITY_PERIODIC_CRIT);
4269  for (auto aura : auras)
4270  {
4271  if (aura->isAffectedOnSpell(spell))
4272  bonus += aura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
4273  }
4274  if (bonus)
4275  multiplier = (1.0f + (bonus * pct));
4276  }
4277  // Multiplier bonus coefficient for damage
4278  if (!heal)
4279  {
4280  float bonus = 0;
4281  if (dmgSchoolMask)
4282  bonus += GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CRIT_DAMAGE_BONUS, dmgSchoolMask); // Gems, talents
4283  // ToDo: research if this is still needed, as there are no spells with aura 169
4284  // if (creatureTypeMask)
4285  // bonus += GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_169, creatureTypeMask); // Creature slaying
4286  multiplier *= (1.0f + (bonus * pct));
4287  }
4288  else
4289  {
4290  float bonus = 0;
4291  if (dmgSchoolMask)
4292  bonus += GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CRITICAL_HEALING_AMOUNT, dmgSchoolMask);
4293  multiplier *= (1.0f + (bonus / 100.0f));
4294  }
4295  // Apply spell mods
4296  if (spell)
4297  {
4298  if (Player* modOwner = GetSpellModOwner())
4299  {
4300  // Extract crit bonus part only from multiplier (exclude base of 1) and modify it
4301  float bonus = (multiplier - 1.0f);
4302  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spell->Id, SPELLMOD_CRIT_DAMAGE_BONUS, bonus);
4303  // Reconstruct final multiplier now with increased bonus part
4304  multiplier = (1.0f + bonus);
4305  }
4306  }
4307  return std::max(0.0f, multiplier);
4308 }
4309 
4310 float Unit::GetCritTakenMultiplier(SpellSchoolMask dmgSchoolMask, SpellDmgClass dmgClass, float ignorePct, bool heal) const
4311 {
4312  // Default incoming crit multiplier: 1x (receive full damage)
4313  float multiplier = 1.0f;
4314  // Resilience and resilience-like auras:
4315  if (!heal)
4316  {
4317  const float pct = 0.01f;
4318  // Resilience cap and factor: % of incoming crit dmg reduction per % of resilience
4319  const float factor = 2.2f * pct; // WotLK
4320  const float cap = 33.0f * pct; // WotLK
4321  const float ratio = (100.0f - ignorePct) * pct;
4322  switch (uint32(dmgClass))
4323  {
4324  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
4325  multiplier += (GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_MELEE_CRIT_DAMAGE) * pct);
4326  multiplier -= std::min(cap, (GetCombatRatingReduction(CR_CRIT_TAKEN_MELEE) * factor)) * ratio;
4327  break;
4328  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
4329  multiplier += (GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_RANGED_CRIT_DAMAGE) * pct);
4330  multiplier -= std::min(cap, (GetCombatRatingReduction(CR_CRIT_TAKEN_RANGED) * factor)) * ratio;
4331  break;
4332  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC:
4333  multiplier += (GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_SPELL_CRIT_DAMAGE, dmgSchoolMask) * pct);
4334  multiplier -= std::min(cap, (GetCombatRatingReduction(CR_CRIT_TAKEN_SPELL) * factor)) * ratio;
4335  break;
4336  }
4337  }
4338  return std::max(0.0f, multiplier);
4339 }
4340 
4341 uint32 Unit::CalculateCritAmount(const Unit *victim, uint32 amount, const SpellEntry* entry, bool heal) const
4342 {
4343  if (!entry)
4344  return 0;
4345  const SpellSchoolMask schoolMask = GetSpellSchoolMask(entry);
4346  const uint32 creatureTypeMask = (victim ? victim->GetCreatureTypeMask() : 0);
4347  const float multiplier = GetCritMultiplier(schoolMask, creatureTypeMask, entry, heal);
4348  const SpellDmgClass dmgClass = SpellDmgClass(entry->DmgClass);
4349  const float ignoreReduction = (heal ? 0.0f : GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_IGNORE_DAMAGE_REDUCTION_SCHOOL, schoolMask));
4350  const float taken = (victim ? victim->GetCritTakenMultiplier(schoolMask, dmgClass, ignoreReduction, heal) : 1.0f);
4351  const uint32 outgoing = uint32(amount * multiplier);
4352  // Crit amount can't be less than normal hit
4353  const uint32 result = std::max(amount, uint32(outgoing * taken));
4354  return result;
4355 }
4356 
4357 uint32 Unit::CalculateCritAmount(CalcDamageInfo* meleeInfo) const
4358 {
4359  if (!meleeInfo)
4360  return 0;
4361  uint32 clean = 0;
4362  uint32 total = 0;
4363  const Unit* victim = meleeInfo->target;
4364  const uint32 creatureTypeMask = (victim ? victim->GetCreatureTypeMask() : 0);
4365  const SpellDmgClass dmgClass = ((meleeInfo->attackType == RANGED_ATTACK) ? SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED : SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE);
4366  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[meleeInfo->attackType].lines; i++)
4367  {
4368  SubDamageInfo& subDamage = meleeInfo->subDamage[i];
4369  const uint32 amount = subDamage.damage;
4370  const SpellSchoolMask schoolMask = subDamage.damageSchoolMask;
4371  const float multiplier = GetCritMultiplier(schoolMask, creatureTypeMask);
4372  const float ignoreReduction = GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_IGNORE_DAMAGE_REDUCTION_SCHOOL, schoolMask);
4373  const float taken = (victim ? victim->GetCritTakenMultiplier(schoolMask, dmgClass, ignoreReduction) : 1.0f);
4374  const uint32 outgoing = uint32(amount * multiplier);
4375  // Crit amount can't be less than normal hit
4376  const uint32 result = std::max(amount, uint32(outgoing * taken));
4377  subDamage.damage = result;
4378  total += result;
4379  clean += std::max(result, outgoing);
4380  }
4381  meleeInfo->cleanDamage = clean;
4382  return total;
4383 }
4384 
4385 float Unit::GetHitChance(WeaponAttackType attackType) const
4386 {
4387  if (attackType == RANGED_ATTACK)
4388  return m_modRangedHitChance;
4389  return m_modMeleeHitChance;
4390 }
4391 
4392 float Unit::GetHitChance(SpellSchoolMask schoolMask) const
4393 {
4394  float chance = 0.0f;
4395 
4396  if (!uint32(schoolMask))
4397  return 0.0f;
4398 
4399  chance += m_modSpellHitChance;
4400  // Pick highest spell hit available for given school mask
4401  chance += GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASES_SPELL_PCT_TO_HIT, schoolMask);
4402  return chance;
4403 }
4404 
4405 float Unit::GetHitChance(const SpellEntry* entry, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask) const
4406 {
4407  float chance = 0.0f;
4408 
4409  if (!entry)
4410  return 0.0f;
4411 
4412  if (entry->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_ADD_MELEE_HIT_RATING))
4413  chance += GetHitChance(GetWeaponAttackType(entry));
4414  else
4415  {
4416  // Add own hit chance
4417  switch (entry->DmgClass)
4418  {
4419  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC:
4420  chance += GetHitChance(schoolMask);
4421  break;
4422  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
4423  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
4424  chance += GetHitChance(GetWeaponAttackType(entry));
4425  break;
4426  }
4427  }
4428  // Add mod
4429  if (Player* modOwner = GetSpellModOwner())
4430  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(entry->Id, SPELLMOD_RESIST_MISS_CHANCE, chance);
4431  return chance;
4432 }
4433 
4434 float Unit::GetMissChance(WeaponAttackType attackType) const
4435 {
4436  // Totems have no inherit miss chance
4437  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((const Creature*)this)->IsTotem())
4438  return 0.0f;
4439  // Default base chance to be missed for all acting units: 5%
4440  float chance = 5.0f;
4441  // Rating contribution
4442  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4443  chance += ((const Player*)this)->GetRatingBonusValue((attackType == RANGED_ATTACK) ? CR_HIT_TAKEN_RANGED : CR_HIT_TAKEN_MELEE);
4444  return chance;
4445 }
4446 
4447 float Unit::GetMissChance(SpellSchoolMask /*schoolMask*/) const
4448 {
4449  // Totems have no inherit miss chance
4450  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((const Creature*)this)->IsTotem())
4451  return 0.0f;
4452  // Default base chance to be missed by a spell for all acting units: 4%
4453  float chance = 4.0f;
4454  // Rating contribution
4455  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4456  chance += ((const Player*)this)->GetRatingBonusValue(CR_HIT_TAKEN_SPELL);
4457  return chance;
4458 }
4459 
4460 float Unit::GetMissChance(const SpellEntry* entry, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask) const
4461 {
4462  float chance = 0.0f;
4463 
4464  if (!entry)
4465  return 0.0f;
4466 
4467  if (entry->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_ADD_MELEE_HIT_RATING))
4468  chance += GetMissChance(GetWeaponAttackType(entry));
4469  else
4470  {
4471  // Add own miss chance
4472  switch (entry->DmgClass)
4473  {
4474  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
4475  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
4476  chance += GetMissChance(GetWeaponAttackType(entry));
4477  break;
4478  // By default, we use spell miss chance even for spells without dmgclass
4479  default:
4480  chance += GetMissChance(schoolMask);
4481  break;
4482  }
4483  }
4484  // AoE avoidance
4485  if (IsAreaOfEffectSpell(entry) || entry->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_TREAT_AS_AREA_EFFECT))
4486  chance += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_AOE_AVOIDANCE);
4487  return chance;
4488 }
4489 
4490 float Unit::CalculateEffectiveCritChance(const Unit* victim, WeaponAttackType attType, const SpellEntry* ability) const
4491 {
4492  float chance = 0.0f;
4493 
4494  chance += (ability ? GetCritChance(ability, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL) : GetCritChance(attType));
4495  // Own chance appears to be zero / below zero / unmeaningful for some reason (debuffs?): skip calculation, unit is incapable
4496  if (chance < 0.005f)
4497  return 0.0f;
4498  // Skip victim calculation if positive ability
4499  if (ability && IsPositiveSpell(ability, this, victim))
4500  return std::max(0.0f, std::min(chance, 100.0f));
4501  const bool weapon = (!ability || ability->EquippedItemClass == ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON);
4502  // Skill difference can be both negative and positive.
4503  // a) Positive means that attacker's level is higher or additional weapon +skill bonuses
4504  // b) Negative means that victim's level is higher or additional +defense bonuses
4505  const bool vsPlayerOrPet = victim->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
4506  const bool ranged = (attType == RANGED_ATTACK);
4507  // weapon skill does not benefit crit% vs NPCs
4508  const uint32 skill = (weapon && !vsPlayerOrPet ? GetWeaponSkillValue(attType, victim) : GetSkillMaxForLevel(victim));
4509  const int32 difference = int32(skill - victim->GetDefenseSkillValue(this));
4510  // Weapon skill factor: for players and NPCs
4511  float factor = 0.04f;
4512  // Crit suppression against NPCs with higher level
4513  if (!vsPlayerOrPet) // decrease by 1% of crit per level of target
4514  factor = 0.2f;
4515  chance += (difference * factor);
4516  // Victim's crit taken chance
4517  const SpellDmgClass dmgClass = (ranged ? SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED : SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE);
4518  chance += victim->GetCritTakenChance(this, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, dmgClass, ability);
4519  return std::max(0.0f, std::min(chance, 100.0f));
4520 }
4521 
4522 const float AVOIDANCE_DIMINISHING_MISS_CAP[MAX_CLASSES] =
4523 {
4524  0.0f, // [0] <Unused>
4525  16.0f, // [1] Warrior
4526  16.0f, // [2] Paladin
4527  0.0f, // [3] Hunter
4528  0.0f, // [4] Rogue
4529  0.0f, // [5] Priest
4530  16.0f, // [6] DK
4531  0.0f, // [7] Shaman
4532  0.0f, // [8] Mage
4533  0.0f, // [9] Warlock
4534  0.0f, // [10] <Unused>
4535  0.0f, // [11] Druid
4536 };
4537 
4538 float Unit::CalculateEffectiveMissChance(const Unit* victim, WeaponAttackType attType, const SpellEntry* ability) const
4539 {
4540  float chance = 0.0f;
4541 
4542  chance += (ability ? victim->GetMissChance(ability, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL) : victim->GetMissChance(attType));
4543  // Victim's own chance appears to be zero / below zero / unmeaningful for some reason (debuffs?): skip calculation, unit can't be missed
4544  if (chance < 0.005f)
4545  return 0.0f;
4546  const bool ranged = (attType == RANGED_ATTACK);
4547  const bool weapon = (!ability || ability->EquippedItemClass == ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON);
4548  // Check if dual wielding, add additional miss penalty - when mainhand has on next swing spell, offhand doesnt suffer penalty
4549  if (!ability && !ranged && hasOffhandWeaponForAttack() && (!m_currentSpells[CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL] || !IsNextMeleeSwingSpell(m_currentSpells[CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL]->m_spellInfo)))
4550  chance += 19.0f;
4551  // Skill difference can be both negative and positive. Positive difference means that:
4552  // a) Victim's level is higher
4553  // b) Victim has additional defense skill bonuses
4554  const bool vsPlayerOrPet = victim->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
4555  const uint32 skill = (weapon ? GetWeaponSkillValue(attType, victim) : GetSkillMaxForLevel(victim));
4556  int32 difference = int32(victim->GetDefenseSkillValue(this) - skill);
4557  // Defense/weapon skill factor: for players and NPCs
4558  float factor = 0.04f;
4559  // NPCs gain additional bonus to incoming hit chance reduction based on positive skill difference (same value as bonus parry rate)
4560  if (!vsPlayerOrPet && difference > 0)
4561  {
4562  if (difference > 10)
4563  {
4564  // First 10 points of difference (2 levels): usual decrease
4565  chance += (10 * 0.1f);
4566  difference -= 10;
4567  // Each additional point of difference:
4568  factor = 0.4f;
4569  }
4570  else
4571  factor = 0.1f;
4572  }
4573  // Dynamic diminishing for player's tanking gear
4574  if (victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4575  {
4576  const uint8 pclass = victim->getClass();
4577  if (pclass < MAX_CLASSES)
4578  {
4579  const float cap = AVOIDANCE_DIMINISHING_MISS_CAP[pclass];
4580  const float k = AVOIDANCE_DIMINISHING_COEFFICIENT[pclass];
4581  if (cap >= 1 && k >= 0.001f && difference > 0)
4582  {
4583  // We need to diminish extra defense from rating only, before that it is just compensating for lack of skill
4584  const int32 extra = int32(((const Player*)victim)->GetRatingBonusValue(CR_DEFENSE_SKILL));
4585  const int32 amount = std::min(difference, extra);
4586  // Substract it from difference to use in diminished formula
4587  float diminishing = (amount * factor);
4588  difference -= amount;
4589  const float nondiminishing = (chance - diminishing);
4590  chance = nondiminishing + ((diminishing * cap) / (diminishing + (cap * k)));
4591  }
4592  }
4593  }
4594  chance += (difference * factor);
4595  // Victim's auras affecting attacker's hit contribution:
4596  chance -= victim->GetTotalAuraModifier(ranged ? SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_RANGED_HIT_CHANCE : SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_MELEE_HIT_CHANCE);
4597  // For elemental melee auto-attacks: full resist outcome converted into miss chance (original research on combat logs)
4598  if (!ranged && !ability)
4599  {
4600  const float percent = victim->CalculateEffectiveMagicResistancePercent(this, GetMeleeDamageSchoolMask((attType == BASE_ATTACK), true));
4601  if (percent > 0)
4602  {
4603  if (const uint32 uindex = uint32(percent * 100))
4604  {
4605  const SpellPartialResistChanceEntry &chances = SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_DISTRIBUTION.at(uindex);
4606  chance += float(chances.at(SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_PCT_100) / 100);
4607  }
4608  }
4609  }
4610  // Finally, take hit chance
4611  chance -= (ability ? GetHitChance(ability, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL) : GetHitChance(attType));
4612  float minimum = (ability && ability->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC) || difference > 10 ? 1.f : 0;
4613  return std::max(minimum, std::min(chance, 100.0f));
4614 }
4615 
4616 float Unit::CalculateSpellCritChance(const Unit* victim, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask, const SpellEntry* spell) const
4617 {
4618  if (!spell || spell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_CANT_CRIT))
4619  return 0.0f;
4620 
4621  float chance = 0.0f;
4622 
4623  switch (spell->DmgClass)
4624  {
4625  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
4626  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
4627  return CalculateEffectiveCritChance(victim, GetWeaponAttackType(spell), spell);
4628  }
4629  chance += GetCritChance(spell, schoolMask);
4630  // Own chance appears to be zero / below zero / unmeaningful for some reason (debuffs?): skip calculation, unit is incapable
4631  if (chance < 0.005f)
4632  return 0.0f;
4633  // Modify by victim in case of hostile hit
4634  if (!IsPositiveSpell(spell, this, victim))
4635  chance += victim->GetCritTakenChance(this, schoolMask, SpellDmgClass(spell->DmgClass), spell);
4636  // TODO: Scripted crit chance auras: class script auras need to be orgnaized and re-implemented in the future as a part of scripting system
4637  const AuraList& scripts = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_OVERRIDE_CLASS_SCRIPTS);
4638  for (auto script : scripts)
4639  {
4640  if (!(script->isAffectedOnSpell(spell)))
4641  continue;
4642  switch (script->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue)
4643  {
4644  // Shatter
4645  case 849: if (victim->isFrozen() || IsIgnoreUnitState(spell, IGNORE_UNIT_TARGET_NON_FROZEN)) chance += 17.0f; break;
4646  case 910: if (victim->isFrozen() || IsIgnoreUnitState(spell, IGNORE_UNIT_TARGET_NON_FROZEN)) chance += 34.0f; break;
4647  case 911: if (victim->isFrozen() || IsIgnoreUnitState(spell, IGNORE_UNIT_TARGET_NON_FROZEN)) chance += 50.0f; break;
4648  // Glyph of Shadowburn
4649  case 7917: if (victim->HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_HEALTHLESS_35_PERCENT)) chance += script->GetModifier()->m_amount; break;
4650  // Renewed Hope
4651  case 7997:
4652  case 7998: if (victim->HasAura(6788)) chance += script->GetModifier()->m_amount; break;
4653  default:
4654  break;
4655  }
4656  }
4657  // TODO: More scripted crit chance auras: needs better implementation
4658  switch (spell->SpellFamilyName)
4659  {
4660  case SPELLFAMILY_MAGE:
4661  {
4662  // Fire Blast
4663  if (spell->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x0000000000000002)) && spell->SpellIconID == 12)
4664  {
4665  // Glyph of Fire Blast
4666  if (victim->IsStunned())
4667  {
4668  if (Aura* aura = GetDummyAura(56369))
4669  chance += aura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
4670  }
4671  }
4672  break;
4673  }
4674  case SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST:
4675  // Flash Heal
4676  if (spell->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x0000000000000800)))
4677  {
4678  if (victim->GetHealth() > (victim->GetMaxHealth() / 2))
4679  break;
4680  const AuraList& dummies = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
4681  for (auto dummie : dummies)
4682  {
4683  // Improved Flash Heal
4684  if (dummie->GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST &&
4685  dummie->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2542)
4686  {
4687  chance += dummie->GetModifier()->m_amount;
4688  break;
4689  }
4690  }
4691  }
4692  break;
4693  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
4694  // Starfire
4695  if (spell->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x0000000000000004)))
4696  {
4697  // Search for Moonfire on target
4698  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, uint64(0x000000000000002), 0, GetObjectGuid()))
4699  {
4700  const AuraList& dummies = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
4701  for (auto dummie : dummies)
4702  {
4703  // Improved Insect Swarm
4704  if (dummie->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 1771)
4705  {
4706  chance += dummie->GetModifier()->m_amount;
4707  break;
4708  }
4709  }
4710  }
4711  }
4712  break;
4713  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
4714  // Flash of Light
4715  if (spell->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000040000000))
4716  {
4717  // Sacred Shield
4718  Aura* aura = victim->GetDummyAura(58597);
4719  if (aura && aura->GetCasterGuid() == GetObjectGuid())
4720  chance += aura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
4721  }
4722  // Exorcism
4723  else if (spell->Category == 19)
4724  {
4725  if (victim->GetCreatureTypeMask() & CREATURE_TYPEMASK_DEMON_OR_UNDEAD)
4726  return 100.0f;
4727  }
4728  break;
4729  case SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN:
4730  // Lava Burst
4731  if (spell->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x0000100000000000)))
4732  {
4733  // Flame Shock
4734  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN, uint64(0x0000000010000000), 0, GetObjectGuid()))
4735  return 100.0f;
4736  }
4737  break;
4738  }
4739  return std::max(0.0f, std::min(chance, 100.0f));
4740 }
4741 
4742 float Unit::CalculateSpellMissChance(const Unit* victim, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask, const SpellEntry* spell) const
4743 {
4744  if (!spell || spell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_ALWAYS_HIT))
4745  return 0.0f;
4746 
4747  float chance = 0.0f;
4748  const float minimum = 0.0f; // WotLK: no unavoidable miss chance
4749 
4750  switch (spell->DmgClass)
4751  {
4752  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE:
4753  case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED:
4754  return CalculateEffectiveMissChance(victim, GetWeaponAttackType(spell), spell);
4755  }
4756  if (spell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_ADD_MELEE_HIT_RATING))
4757  {
4758  // How it works:
4759  // - First introduced in patch 2.3 for Taunt, Growl, Righteous Defense, Challenging Shout and Challenging Roar
4760  // - Switches spell to use ability miss chance calculation, but leaves standard unavoidable miss percent
4761  // In WotLK+:
4762  // - Removed for Taunt, Growl and Righteous Defense, so these spells have 17% miss against bosses
4763  // - Added glyphs for Taunt and Growl to negate remaining 8% of spell miss difference
4764  // - AoE taunts on cooldowns still use ability miss calculation
4765  return CalculateEffectiveMissChance(victim, GetWeaponAttackType(spell), spell);
4766  }
4767  chance += victim->GetMissChance(spell, schoolMask);
4768  // Victim's own chance appears to be zero / below zero / unmeaningful for some reason (debuffs?): skip calculation, unit can't be missed
4769  if (chance < 0.005f)
4770  return 0.0f;
4771  // Level difference: positive adds to miss chance, negative substracts
4772  const bool vsPlayerOrPet = victim->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
4773  int32 difference = int32(victim->GetLevelForTarget(this) - GetLevelForTarget(victim));
4774  // Level difference factor: 1% per level
4775  uint8 factor = 1;
4776  // NPCs and players gain additional bonus to incoming spell hit chance reduction based on positive level difference
4777  if (difference > 2)
4778  {
4779  chance += (2 * factor);
4780  // Miss bonus for each additional level of difference above 2
4781  factor = (vsPlayerOrPet ? 7 : 11);
4782  chance += ((difference - 2) * factor);
4783  }
4784  else
4785  chance += (difference * factor);
4786 
4787  if (victim->HasAura(45210)) // Taunt Hit Chance - Brutallus
4788  chance -= 20.f;
4789 
4790  // Reduce by caster's spell hit chance
4791  chance -= GetHitChance(spell, schoolMask);
4792  // Reduce (or increase) by victim SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_SPELL_HIT_CHANCE auras
4793  chance -= victim->GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_SPELL_HIT_CHANCE, schoolMask);
4794  return std::max(minimum, std::min(chance, 100.0f));
4795 }
4796 
4797 bool Unit::RollSpellCritOutcome(Unit* caster, const Unit* victim, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask, const SpellEntry* spell)
4798 {
4799  if (!caster || !caster->CanCrit(spell, schoolMask, GetWeaponAttackType(spell)))
4800  return false;
4801 
4802  if (spell->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE && victim->IsPlayer() && !victim->IsStandState()) // autocrit on not standing for melee ability
4803  return true;
4804 
4805  const float chance = caster->CalculateSpellCritChance(victim, schoolMask, spell);
4806  return roll_chance_combat(chance);
4807 }
4808 
4809 float Unit::GetExpertisePercent(WeaponAttackType attType) const
4810 {
4811  int32 expertise = 0;
4812  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4813  {
4814  switch (uint32(attType))
4815  {
4816  case BASE_ATTACK:
4817  expertise += int32(GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_EXPERTISE));
4818  break;
4819  case OFF_ATTACK:
4820  expertise += int32(GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_OFFHAND_EXPERTISE));
4821  break;
4822  }
4823  }
4824  else if (attType != RANGED_ATTACK)
4825  expertise += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_EXPERTISE);
4826  return (expertise * 0.25f); // (expertise / 4)
4827 }
4828 
4829 int32 Unit::GetResistancePenetration(SpellSchools school) const
4830 {
4831  // Technically, it is target resistance mod, but it's used as penetration (negative sign) 99.9% of the time
4832  // So, let's logically reverse the sign and use it as such
4833  return -(GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_TARGET_RESISTANCE, (1 << school)));
4834 }
4835 
4836 float Unit::CalculateEffectiveMagicResistancePercent(const Unit* attacker, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask, bool binary) const
4837 {
4838  // Non-magical or contains Physical as a component (such as Chaos) - ignores resistances completely
4839  if (!schoolMask || (schoolMask & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL))
4840  return 0.0f;
4841  // Completely ignore holy resistance value (since beta stages)
4842  uint32 schools = uint32(schoolMask & ~uint32(SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_HOLY));
4843  // Select a resistance value matching given school mask, prefer mininal for multischool spells
4844  int32 resistance = 0;
4845  for (uint32 school = 0; schools; (schools >>= 1), ++school)
4846  {
4847  if (schools & 1)
4848  {
4849  int32 amount = GetResistance(SpellSchools(school));
4850  int32 penetration = attacker ? attacker->GetResistancePenetration(SpellSchools(school)) : 0;
4851 
4852  // Modify by penetration, but can't go negative with it
4853  int32 result = (amount - penetration);
4854 
4855  if (result < 0)
4856  result = std::min(amount, 0);
4857 
4858  if (!resistance || result < resistance)
4859  resistance = result;
4860  }
4861  }
4862 
4863  float percent = 0;
4864 
4865  if (resistance >= 0) // Magic resistance calculation
4866  {
4867  // Attacker's level based skill, penalize when calculating for low levels (< 20):
4868  const float skill = std::max(attacker ? attacker->GetSkillMaxForLevel(this) : GetSkillMaxForLevel(), uint16(100));
4869  // Convert resistance value to resistance percentage through comparision with skill
4870  percent += (float(resistance) / skill) * 100;
4871  // Bonus resistance percent by positive level difference when calculating damage hit for NPCs only
4872  if (!binary && GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
4873  percent += (0.4f * std::max(int32(GetSkillMaxForLevel(attacker) - skill), 0));
4874  // Magic resistance percentage cap (same as armor cap)
4875  percent = std::min(percent, 75.0f);
4876  }
4877  else // Magic vulnerability calculation
4878  {
4879  // Victim's level based skill, penalize when calculating for low levels (< 20):
4880  const float skill = std::max(GetSkillMaxForLevel(attacker), uint16(100));
4881  // Convert resistance value to vulnerability percentage through comparision with skill
4882  percent += (float(resistance) / skill) * 100;
4883  }
4884  return percent;
4885 }
4886 
4887 float Unit::RollMagicResistanceMultiplierOutcomeAgainst(const Unit* attacker, const Unit *victim, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask, DamageEffectType /*dmgType*/, bool /*binary*/)
4888 {
4889  float percentage = victim->CalculateEffectiveMagicResistancePercent(attacker, schoolMask);
4890 
4891  // Magic vulnerability instead of magic resistance:
4892  if (percentage < 0)
4893  return (percentage * 0.01f);
4894 
4895  const uint32 index = uint32(percentage * 100);
4896 
4897  if (!index)
4898  return 0.0f;
4899 
4900  const SpellPartialResistChanceEntry &chances = SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_DISTRIBUTION.at(index);
4901  Die<SpellPartialResist, SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_NONE, NUM_SPELL_PARTIAL_RESISTS> die;
4902 
4903  for (uint8 outcome = SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_NONE; outcome < NUM_SPELL_PARTIAL_RESISTS; ++outcome)
4904  die.chance[outcome] = chances.at(outcome);
4905 
4906  const uint32 random = urand(1, 10000);
4907  // We must exclude full resist chance from it, we already rolled for it as miss type in attack table (so n-1)
4908  uint8 portion = std::min(uint8(die.roll(random)), uint8(NUM_SPELL_PARTIAL_RESISTS - 1));
4909 
4910  // To get resisted part ratio, we exclude zero outcome (it is n-1 anyway, so we reuse local var)
4911  return (float(portion) / float(NUM_SPELL_PARTIAL_RESISTS));
4912 }
4913 
4914 float Unit::CalculateSpellResistChance(const Unit* victim, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask, const SpellEntry* spell) const
4915 {
4916  float chance = 0.0f;
4917 
4918  // Chance to fully resist a spell by magic resistance
4919  // TODO: check if binaries are affected by SPELL_ATTR_EX3_ALWAYS_HIT
4920  if (IsResistableSpell(spell) && spell->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC)
4921  {
4922  const bool binary = IsBinarySpell(*spell);
4923  const float percent = victim->CalculateEffectiveMagicResistancePercent(this, schoolMask, binary);
4924  if (percent > 0)
4925  {
4926  if (binary)
4927  chance += percent;
4928  // Only non-binary spells used by players and pets can be fully resisted by magic resistance, NPC spells can be cut-off
4929  else if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
4930  chance += float(SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_DISTRIBUTION.at(uint32(percent * 100)).at(SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_PCT_100)) * 0.01f;
4931  }
4932  }
4933  // Chance to fully resist entire spell by it's dispel type
4934  if (const int32 type = int32(spell->Dispel))
4935  chance += victim->GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DEBUFF_RESISTANCE, type);
4936  // Chance to fully resist entire spell by it's mechanic
4937  if (const int32 mechanic = int32(spell->Mechanic))
4938  chance += victim->GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MECHANIC_RESISTANCE, mechanic);
4939 
4940  // TODO: Move it in the future, effect mechanic resist must be processed differently
4941  float effects = 0.0f;
4942  for (uint32 i = EFFECT_INDEX_0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
4943  {
4944  if (!spell->Effect[i])
4945  continue;
4946  if (const int32 mechanic = int32(spell->EffectMechanic[i]))
4947  {
4948  const float resist = victim->GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MECHANIC_RESISTANCE, mechanic);
4949  if (resist > effects)
4950  effects = resist;
4951  }
4952  }
4953  chance += effects;
4954  //
4955  return std::max(0.0f, std::min(chance, 100.0f));
4956 }
4957 
4958 uint32 Unit::GetWeaponSkillValue(WeaponAttackType attType, Unit const* target) const
4959 {
4960  uint32 value;
4961  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4962  {
4963  Item* item = ((Player*)this)->GetWeaponForAttack(attType, true, true);
4964 
4965  // feral or unarmed skill only for base attack
4966  if (attType != BASE_ATTACK && !item)
4967  return 0;
4968 
4969  if (IsNoWeaponShapeShift())
4970  return GetSkillMaxForLevel(); // always maximized SKILL_FERAL_COMBAT in fact
4971 
4972  // weapon skill or (unarmed for base attack)
4973  uint32 skill = item ? item->GetSkill() : uint32(SKILL_UNARMED);
4974 
4975  // in PvP always use full skill (and bonuses on top of it if present)
4976  value = (target && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4977  ? std::max(((Player*)this)->GetSkillMax(skill), ((Player*)this)->GetSkillValue(skill))
4978  : ((Player*)this)->GetSkillValue(skill);
4979  // Modify value from ratings
4980  value += uint32(((Player*)this)->GetRatingBonusValue(CR_WEAPON_SKILL));
4981  switch (attType)
4982  {
4983  case BASE_ATTACK: value += uint32(((Player*)this)->GetRatingBonusValue(CR_WEAPON_SKILL_MAINHAND)); break;
4984  case OFF_ATTACK: value += uint32(((Player*)this)->GetRatingBonusValue(CR_WEAPON_SKILL_OFFHAND)); break;
4985  case RANGED_ATTACK: value += uint32(((Player*)this)->GetRatingBonusValue(CR_WEAPON_SKILL_RANGED)); break;
4986  }
4987  }
4988  else
4989  value = GetUnitMeleeSkill(target);
4990  return value;
4991 }
4992 
4993 void Unit::_UpdateSpells(uint32 time)
4994 {
4995 #ifdef BUILD_METRICS
4996  metric::duration<std::chrono::microseconds> meas("unit.update.spells", {
4997  { "entry", std::to_string(GetEntry()) },
4998  { "guid", std::to_string(GetGUIDLow()) },
4999  { "unit_type", std::to_string(GetGUIDHigh()) },
5000  { "map_id", std::to_string(GetMapId()) },
5001  { "instance_id", std::to_string(GetInstanceId()) }
5002  }, 1000);
5003 
5004  std::vector<uint32> updatedSpellIds;
5005 #endif
5006 
5007  if (m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL])
5008  _UpdateAutoRepeatSpell();
5009 
5010  // remove finished spells from current pointers
5011  for (auto& m_currentSpell : m_currentSpells)
5012  {
5013  if (m_currentSpell && m_currentSpell->getState() == SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
5014  {
5015  m_currentSpell->SetReferencedFromCurrent(false);
5016  m_currentSpell = nullptr; // remove pointer
5017  }
5018  }
5019 
5020  // update auras
5021  // m_AurasUpdateIterator can be updated in inderect called code at aura remove to skip next planned to update but removed auras
5022  for (m_spellAuraHoldersUpdateIterator = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); m_spellAuraHoldersUpdateIterator != m_spellAuraHolders.end();)
5023  {
5024  SpellAuraHolder* i_holder = m_spellAuraHoldersUpdateIterator->second;
5025  ++m_spellAuraHoldersUpdateIterator; // need shift to next for allow update if need into aura update
5026  i_holder->UpdateHolder(time);
5027 #ifdef BUILD_METRICS
5028  updatedSpellIds.push_back(i_holder->GetId());
5029 #endif
5030  }
5031 
5032  // remove expired auras
5033  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); iter != m_spellAuraHolders.end();)
5034  {
5035  SpellAuraHolder* holder = iter->second;
5036 
5037  if (!(holder->IsPermanent() || holder->IsPassive()) && holder->GetAuraDuration() == 0)
5038  {
5039  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(holder, AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE);
5040  iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin();
5041  }
5042  else
5043  ++iter;
5044  }
5045 #ifdef BUILD_METRICS
5046  std::string logging;
5047  for (uint32 spellId : updatedSpellIds)
5048  logging += std::to_string(spellId) + ",";
5049  meas.add_field("spells", "\"" + logging + "\"");
5050 #endif
5051 }
5052 
5053 void Unit::_UpdateAutoRepeatSpell()
5054 {
5055  SpellEntry const* autoRepeatSpellInfo = m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL]->m_spellInfo;
5056 
5057  // check "real time" interrupts - auto shot in wotlk clips through SPELL_ATTR_EX2_NOT_RESET_AUTO_ACTIONS
5058  if (IsMovingIgnoreFlying() || IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false, false, true, false, autoRepeatSpellInfo->Id == 75))
5059  {
5060  if (!IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false, false, true, false, true)) // stricter check to see if we should introduce cooldown or just return
5061  return;
5062  // cancel wand shoot
5063  if ((m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL]->m_spellInfo->ChannelInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_MOVING) != 0)
5064  {
5065  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL);
5066  return;
5067  }
5068  // set 0.5 second wind-up time.
5069  m_AutoRepeatFirstCast = true;
5070  return;
5071  }
5072 
5073  // apply delay
5074  if (m_AutoRepeatFirstCast)
5075  {
5076  TimePoint expirationTime;
5077  bool isPermanent;
5078  if (GetExpireTime(*m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL]->m_spellInfo, expirationTime, isPermanent))
5079  {
5080  if (GetMap()->GetCurrentClockTime() + std::chrono::milliseconds(500) > expirationTime)
5081  {
5082  RemoveSpellCooldown(*m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL]->m_spellInfo, false);
5083  AddCooldown(*m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL]->m_spellInfo, nullptr, false, 500);
5084  }
5085  }
5086  else
5087  AddCooldown(*m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL]->m_spellInfo, nullptr, false, 500);
5088  m_AutoRepeatFirstCast = false;
5089  return;
5090  }
5091 
5092  // cast routine
5093  if (IsSpellReady(*m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL]->m_spellInfo))
5094  {
5095  // be sure the unit is stand up
5096  if (getStandState() != UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND)
5097  SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
5098 
5099  Unit* currSpellTarget = GetMap()->GetUnit(m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL]->m_targets.getUnitTargetGuid());
5100  Unit* currTarget = nullptr;
5101 
5102  // Check i there is new target
5103  ObjectGuid const& currTargetGuid = GetTargetGuid();
5104  if (!currTargetGuid.IsEmpty() && currTargetGuid.IsUnit())
5105  {
5106  if (!currSpellTarget || currTargetGuid != currSpellTarget->GetObjectGuid())
5107  currTarget = GetMap()->GetUnit(currTargetGuid);
5108  else
5109  currTarget = currSpellTarget;
5110  }
5111 
5112  // some check about new target are necessary
5113  if (!currTarget || !CanAttack(currTarget))
5114  {
5115  // no valid target
5116  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL);
5117  return;
5118  }
5119 
5120  SpellCastTargets targets;
5121  targets.setUnitTarget(currTarget);
5122 
5123  // we want to shoot
5124  Spell* spell = new Spell(this, m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL]->m_spellInfo, TRIGGERED_AUTOREPEAT);
5125 
5126  // Check if able to cast
5127  if (spell->SpellStart(&targets) != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5128  {
5129  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL);
5130  return;
5131  }
5132  }
5133 }
5134 
5135 void Unit::SetCurrentCastedSpell(Spell* newSpell)
5136 {
5137  MANGOS_ASSERT(newSpell); // nullptr may be never passed here, use InterruptSpell or InterruptNonMeleeSpells
5138 
5139  CurrentSpellTypes CSpellType = newSpell->GetCurrentContainer();
5140 
5141  if (newSpell == m_currentSpells[CSpellType]) return; // avoid breaking self
5142 
5143  // break same type spell if it is not delayed
5144  InterruptSpell(CSpellType, false);
5145 
5146  // special breakage effects:
5147  switch (CSpellType)
5148  {
5149  case CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL:
5150  {
5151  // generic spells always break channeled not delayed spells
5152  // Unless they have this attribute
5153  if (Spell const* channeledSpell = m_currentSpells[CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL])
5154  {
5155  bool isChanneling = channeledSpell->getState() == SPELL_STATE_CHANNELING;
5156  if (!isChanneling || !channeledSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_ALLOW_ACTIONS_DURING_CHANNEL))
5157  if (!channeledSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_ALLOW_CAST_WHILE_CASTING) && !newSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_ALLOW_CAST_WHILE_CASTING))
5158  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL, false);
5159  }
5160 
5161  // autorepeat breaking
5162  if (m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL])
5163  {
5164  // break autorepeat if not Auto Shot
5165  if (m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL]->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_CASTING_CANCELS_AUTOREPEAT))
5166  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL);
5167  }
5168  } break;
5169 
5170  case CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL:
5171  {
5172  // channel spells always break generic non-delayed and any channeled spells
5173  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL);
5174 
5175  // Channeled spell can only be one
5176  // Spells with this attribute can be cast in parallel with generic spells
5177  if (!newSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_ALLOW_CAST_WHILE_CASTING) && !newSpell->m_IsTriggeredSpell)
5178  {
5179  if (Spell const* genericSpell = m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL])
5180  if (!genericSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_ALLOW_CAST_WHILE_CASTING))
5181  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL, false);
5182 
5183  // it also does break autorepeat if not Auto Shot
5184  if (m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL] &&
5185  m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL]->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_CASTING_CANCELS_AUTOREPEAT))
5186  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL);
5187  }
5188  } break;
5189 
5190  case CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL:
5191  {
5192  // only Auto Shoot does not break anything
5193  if (newSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_CASTING_CANCELS_AUTOREPEAT))
5194  {
5195  // generic autorepeats break generic non-delayed and channeled non-delayed spells
5196  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL, false);
5197 
5198  if (m_currentSpells[CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL])
5199  {
5200  if (!newSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_ALLOW_CAST_WHILE_CASTING))
5201  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL, false);
5202  }
5203  // special action: first cast delay
5204  if (getAttackTimer(RANGED_ATTACK) < 500)
5205  setAttackTimer(RANGED_ATTACK, 500);
5206  }
5207  // special action: set first cast flag
5208  ResetAutoRepeatSpells();
5209  } break;
5210 
5211  default:
5212  {
5213  // other spell types don't break anything now
5214  } break;
5215  }
5216 
5217  // current spell (if it is still here) may be safely deleted now
5218  if (m_currentSpells[CSpellType])
5219  m_currentSpells[CSpellType]->SetReferencedFromCurrent(false);
5220 
5221  // set new current spell
5222  m_currentSpells[CSpellType] = newSpell;
5223  newSpell->SetReferencedFromCurrent(true);
5224 }
5225 
5226 void Unit::InterruptSpell(CurrentSpellTypes spellType, bool withDelayed, bool sendAutoRepeatCancelToClient)
5227 {
5228  if (m_currentSpells[spellType] && (withDelayed || m_currentSpells[spellType]->getState() != SPELL_STATE_TRAVELING))
5229  {
5230  // send autorepeat cancel message for autorepeat spells
5231  if (spellType == CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL && sendAutoRepeatCancelToClient)
5232  {
5233  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5234  ((Player*)this)->SendAutoRepeatCancel(this);
5235  }
5236 
5237  if (m_currentSpells[spellType]->CanBeInterrupted())
5238  {
5239  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = m_currentSpells[spellType]->m_spellInfo;
5240  m_currentSpells[spellType]->cancel();
5241 
5242  if (AI())
5243  AI()->OnSpellInterrupt(spellInfo);
5244 
5245  // cancel can interrupt spell already (caster cancel ->target aura remove -> caster iterrupt)
5246  if (m_currentSpells[spellType])
5247  {
5248  m_currentSpells[spellType]->SetReferencedFromCurrent(false);
5249  m_currentSpells[spellType] = nullptr;
5250  }
5251  }
5252  }
5253 }
5254 
5255 void Unit::FinishSpell(CurrentSpellTypes spellType, bool ok /*= true*/)
5256 {
5257  Spell* spell = m_currentSpells[spellType];
5258  if (!spell)
5259  return;
5260 
5261  if (spellType == CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL)
5262  spell->SendChannelUpdate(0);
5263 
5264  spell->finish(ok);
5265 }
5266 
5267 bool Unit::IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(bool withDelayed, bool skipChanneled, bool skipAutorepeat, bool forMovement, bool forAutoIgnore, bool forEquip) const
5268 {
5269  // We don't do loop here to explicitly show that melee spell is excluded.
5270  // Maybe later some special spells will be excluded too.
5271 
5272  // generic spells are casted when they are not finished and not delayed
5273  if (Spell const* genericSpell = m_currentSpells[CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL])
5274  {
5275  if (genericSpell->getState() != SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
5276  {
5277  bool specialResult = true;
5278  if (forMovement) // mobs can move during spells without this flag
5279  specialResult = genericSpell->m_spellInfo->InterruptFlags & SPELL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_MOVEMENT;
5280  if (forEquip)
5281  specialResult = !genericSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_ALLOW_EQUIP_WHILE_CASTING);
5282  bool isAutoNonInterrupting = forAutoIgnore && genericSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_DO_NOT_RESET_COMBAT_TIMERS);
5283  if (!isAutoNonInterrupting && specialResult && (withDelayed || genericSpell->getState() != SPELL_STATE_TRAVELING))
5284  return true;
5285  }
5286  }
5287 
5288  // channeled spells may be delayed, but they are still considered casted
5289  if (!skipChanneled)
5290  {
5291  if (Spell const* channeledSpell = m_currentSpells[CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL])
5292  {
5293  bool isChannelling = channeledSpell->getState() == SPELL_STATE_CHANNELING;
5294  bool isCasting = channeledSpell->getState() == SPELL_STATE_CASTING;
5295  bool attributeResult = false;
5296  if (isChannelling)
5297  attributeResult |= channeledSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_ALLOW_ACTIONS_DURING_CHANNEL);
5298  if (!forMovement)
5299  attributeResult |= channeledSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_ALLOW_CAST_WHILE_CASTING);
5300  if (forEquip && isCasting)
5301  attributeResult |= channeledSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_ALLOW_EQUIP_WHILE_CASTING);
5302 
5303  bool isAutoNonInterrupting = forAutoIgnore && channeledSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_DO_NOT_RESET_COMBAT_TIMERS);
5304  if (!isAutoNonInterrupting && !attributeResult && !channeledSpell->m_IsTriggeredSpell && (channeledSpell->getState() != SPELL_STATE_FINISHED))
5305  return true;
5306  }
5307  }
5308 
5309  // autorepeat spells may be finished or delayed, but they are still considered casted
5310  if (!skipAutorepeat && m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL])
5311  return true;
5312 
5313  return false;
5314 }
5315 
5316 bool Unit::IsDelayCombatTimerSpellCasted() const
5317 {
5318  if (Spell const* genericSpell = m_currentSpells[CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL])
5319  if (genericSpell->getState() == SPELL_STATE_CASTING && genericSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_DELAY_COMBAT_TIMER_DURING_CAST))
5320  return true;
5321 
5322  // attribute also applies to channeling but no spell uses it with channel in wotlk
5323  if (Spell const* genericSpell = m_currentSpells[CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL])
5324  if (genericSpell->getState() == SPELL_STATE_CASTING && genericSpell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_DELAY_COMBAT_TIMER_DURING_CAST))
5325  return true;
5326 
5327  return false;
5328 }
5329 
5330 void Unit::InterruptNonMeleeSpells(bool withDelayed, uint32 spell_id)
5331 {
5332  // generic spells are interrupted if they are not finished or delayed
5333  if (m_currentSpells[CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL] && (!spell_id || m_currentSpells[CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL]->m_spellInfo->Id == spell_id))
5334  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL, withDelayed);
5335 
5336  // autorepeat spells are interrupted if they are not finished or delayed
5337  if (m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL] && (!spell_id || m_currentSpells[CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL]->m_spellInfo->Id == spell_id))
5338  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL, withDelayed);
5339 
5340  // channeled spells are interrupted if they are not finished, even if they are delayed
5341  if (m_currentSpells[CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL] && (!spell_id || m_currentSpells[CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL]->m_spellInfo->Id == spell_id))
5342  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL, true);
5343 }
5344 
5345 void Unit::InterruptSpellsWithChannelFlags(uint32 flags)
5346 {
5347  if (m_currentSpells[CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL] && (m_currentSpells[CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL]->m_spellInfo->ChannelInterruptFlags & flags) != 0)
5348  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL, true);
5349 }
5350 
5351 void Unit::InterruptSpellsAndAurasWithInterruptFlags(uint32 flags)
5352 {
5353  InterruptSpellsWithChannelFlags(flags);
5354  RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(flags);
5355 }
5356 
5357 bool Unit::IsInterruptible() const
5358 {
5359  // TODO: Maybe need to check for immunities and static flags
5360  for (uint32 i = 0; i < CURRENT_MAX_SPELL; ++i)
5361  if (m_currentSpells[i] && m_currentSpells[i]->IsInterruptible())
5362  return true;
5363  return false;
5364 }
5365 
5366 Spell* Unit::FindCurrentSpellBySpellId(uint32 spell_id) const
5367 {
5368  for (auto m_currentSpell : m_currentSpells)
5369  if (m_currentSpell && m_currentSpell->m_spellInfo->Id == spell_id)
5370  return m_currentSpell;
5371  return nullptr;
5372 }
5373 
5374 void Unit::SetInFront(Unit const* target)
5375 {
5376  SetOrientation(GetAngle(target));
5377 }
5378 
5379 void Unit::SetFacingTo(float ori)
5380 {
5381  Movement::MoveSplineInit init(*this);
5382  // supplied orientation is global space but we need local orientation
5383  if (GenericTransport* transport = GetTransport())
5384  transport->CalculatePassengerOrientation(ori);
5385  init.SetFacing(ori);
5386  init.Launch();
5387  // orientation change is in-place
5388  UpdateSplinePosition();
5389  movespline->_Finalize();
5390 }
5391 
5392 void Unit::SetFacingToObject(WorldObject* object)
5393 {
5394  // never face when already moving
5395  if (!IsStopped())
5396  return;
5397 
5398  Movement::MoveSplineInit init(*this);
5399  init.SetFacing(object);
5400  init.Launch();
5401  // orientation change is in-place
5402  UpdateSplinePosition();
5403  movespline->_Finalize();
5404 }
5405 
5406 bool Unit::isInAccessablePlaceFor(Unit const* unit) const
5407 {
5408  if (IsInWater())
5409  return unit->CanSwim();
5410  return unit->CanWalk() || unit->CanFly();
5411 }
5412 
5413 bool Unit::IsInWater() const
5414 {
5415  return GetTerrain()->IsInWater(GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ());
5416 }
5417 
5418 bool Unit::IsInSwimmableWater() const
5419 {
5420  return GetTerrain()->IsSwimmable(GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ());
5421 }
5422 
5423 bool Unit::IsUnderwater() const
5424 {
5425  return GetTerrain()->IsUnderWater(GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ());
5426 }
5427 
5428 bool Unit::IsAboveGround(float diff) const
5429 {
5430  float x, y, z;
5431  GetPosition(x, y, z);
5432  float floorZ = GetMap()->GetHeight(GetPhaseMask(), x, y, z);
5433  return std::abs(z - floorZ) > diff;
5434 }
5435 
5436 void Unit::DeMorph()
5437 {
5438  SetDisplayId(GetNativeDisplayId());
5439 }
5440 
5441 int32 Unit::GetTotalAuraModifier(AuraType auratype) const
5442 {
5443  int32 modifier = 0;
5444 
5445  AuraList const& mTotalAuraList = GetAurasByType(auratype);
5446  for (auto i : mTotalAuraList)
5447  modifier += i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
5448 
5449  return modifier;
5450 }
5451 
5452 int32 Unit::GetTotalAuraModifier(AuraType auratype, std::function<bool(Aura const*)> predicate) const
5453 {
5454  int32 modifier = 0;
5455 
5456  AuraList const& mTotalAuraList = GetAurasByType(auratype);
5457  for (auto i : mTotalAuraList)
5458  if (predicate(i))
5459  modifier += i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
5460 
5461  return modifier;
5462 }
5463 
5464 float Unit::GetTotalAuraMultiplier(AuraType auratype) const
5465 {
5466  float multiplier = 1.0f;
5467 
5468  AuraList const& mTotalAuraList = GetAurasByType(auratype);
5469  for (auto i : mTotalAuraList)
5470  multiplier *= (100.0f + i->GetModifier()->m_amount) / 100.0f;
5471 
5472  return multiplier;
5473 }
5474 
5475 int32 Unit::GetMaxPositiveAuraModifier(AuraType auratype) const
5476 {
5477  int32 modifier = 0;
5478 
5479  AuraList const& mTotalAuraList = GetAurasByType(auratype);
5480  for (auto i : mTotalAuraList)
5481  if (i->GetModifier()->m_amount > modifier)
5482  modifier = i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
5483 
5484  return modifier;
5485 }
5486 
5487 int32 Unit::GetMaxNegativeAuraModifier(AuraType auratype) const
5488 {
5489  int32 modifier = 0;
5490 
5491  AuraList const& mTotalAuraList = GetAurasByType(auratype);
5492  for (auto i : mTotalAuraList)
5493  if (i->GetModifier()->m_amount < modifier)
5494  modifier = i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
5495 
5496  return modifier;
5497 }
5498 
5499 int32 Unit::GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(AuraType auratype, uint32 misc_mask) const
5500 {
5501  if (!misc_mask)
5502  return 0;
5503 
5504  int32 modifier = 0;
5505 
5506  AuraList const& mTotalAuraList = GetAurasByType(auratype);
5507  for (auto i : mTotalAuraList)
5508  {
5509  Modifier* mod = i->GetModifier();
5510  if (mod->m_miscvalue & misc_mask)
5511  modifier += mod->m_amount;
5512  }
5513  return modifier;
5514 }
5515 
5516 float Unit::GetTotalAuraMultiplierByMiscMask(AuraType auratype, uint32 misc_mask) const
5517 {
5518  if (!misc_mask)
5519  return 1.0f;
5520 
5521  float multiplier = 1.0f;
5522 
5523  AuraList const& mTotalAuraList = GetAurasByType(auratype);
5524  for (auto i : mTotalAuraList)
5525  {
5526  Modifier* mod = i->GetModifier();
5527  if (mod->m_miscvalue & misc_mask)
5528  multiplier *= (100.0f + mod->m_amount) / 100.0f;
5529  }
5530  return multiplier;
5531 }
5532 
5533 int32 Unit::GetMaxPositiveAuraModifierByMiscMask(AuraType auratype, uint32 misc_mask) const
5534 {
5535  if (!misc_mask)
5536  return 0;
5537 
5538  int32 modifier = 0;
5539 
5540  AuraList const& mTotalAuraList = GetAurasByType(auratype);
5541  for (auto i : mTotalAuraList)
5542  {
5543  Modifier* mod = i->GetModifier();
5544  if (mod->m_miscvalue & misc_mask && mod->m_amount > modifier)
5545  modifier = mod->m_amount;
5546  }
5547 
5548  return modifier;
5549 }
5550

5552 {
5553  if (!misc_mask)
5554  return 0;
5555 
5556  int32 modifier = 0;
5557 
5558  AuraList const& mTotalAuraList = GetAurasByType(auratype);
5559  for (auto i : mTotalAuraList)
5560  {
5561  Modifier* mod = i->GetModifier();
5562  if (mod->m_miscvalue & misc_mask && mod->m_amount < modifier)
5563  modifier = mod->m_amount;
5564  }
5565 
5566  return modifier;
5567 }
5568 
5569 int32 Unit::GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscValue(AuraType auratype, int32 misc_value) const
5570 {
5571  int32 modifier = 0;
5572 
5573  AuraList const& mTotalAuraList = GetAurasByType(auratype);
5574  for (auto i : mTotalAuraList)
5575  {
5576  Modifier* mod = i->GetModifier();
5577  if (mod->m_miscvalue == misc_value)
5578  modifier += mod->m_amount;
5579  }
5580  return modifier;
5581 }
5582 
5583 float Unit::GetTotalAuraMultiplierByMiscValue(AuraType auratype, int32 misc_value) const
5584 {
5585  float multiplier = 1.0f;
5586 
5587  AuraList const& mTotalAuraList = GetAurasByType(auratype);
5588  for (auto i : mTotalAuraList)
5589  {
5590  Modifier* mod = i->GetModifier();
5591  if (mod->m_miscvalue == misc_value)
5592  multiplier *= (100.0f + mod->m_amount) / 100.0f;
5593  }
5594  return multiplier;
5595 }
5596 
5597 int32 Unit::GetMaxPositiveAuraModifierByMiscValue(AuraType auratype, int32 misc_value) const
5598 {
5599  int32 modifier = 0;
5600 
5601  AuraList const& mTotalAuraList = GetAurasByType(auratype);
5602  for (auto i : mTotalAuraList)
5603  {
5604  Modifier* mod = i->GetModifier();
5605  if (mod->m_miscvalue == misc_value && mod->m_amount > modifier)
5606  modifier = mod->m_amount;
5607  }
5608 
5609  return modifier;
5610 }
5611 
5612 int32 Unit::GetMaxNegativeAuraModifierByMiscValue(AuraType auratype, int32 misc_value) const
5613 {
5614  int32 modifier = 0;
5615 
5616  AuraList const& mTotalAuraList = GetAurasByType(auratype);
5617  for (auto i : mTotalAuraList)
5618  {
5619  Modifier* mod = i->GetModifier();
5620  if (mod->m_miscvalue == misc_value && mod->m_amount < modifier)
5621  modifier = mod->m_amount;
5622  }
5623 
5624  return modifier;
5625 }
5626 
5627 float Unit::GetTotalAuraMultiplierByMiscValueForMask(AuraType auratype, uint32 mask) const
5628 {
5629  if (!mask)
5630  return 1.0f;
5631 
5632  float multiplier = 1.0f;
5633 
5634  AuraList const& mTotalAuraList = GetAurasByType(auratype);
5635  for (auto i : mTotalAuraList)
5636  {
5637  Modifier* mod = i->GetModifier();
5638  if (mask & (1 << (mod->m_miscvalue - 1)))
5639  multiplier *= (100.0f + mod->m_amount) / 100.0f;
5640  }
5641  return multiplier;
5642 }
5643 
5644 bool Unit::AddSpellAuraHolder(SpellAuraHolder* holder)
5645 {
5646  SpellEntry const* aurSpellInfo = holder->GetSpellProto();
5647 
5648  // ghost spell check, allow apply any auras at player loading in ghost mode (will be cleanup after load)
5649  if (!IsAlive() && !IsDeathPersistentSpell(aurSpellInfo) &&
5650  !IsDeathOnlySpell(aurSpellInfo) && !aurSpellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_ALLOW_DEAD_TARGET) &&
5651  (GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !((Player*)this)->GetSession()->PlayerLoading()))
5652  {
5653  return false;
5654  }
5655 
5656  if (holder->GetTarget() != this)
5657  {
5658  sLog.outError("Holder (spell %u) add to spell aura holder list of %s (lowguid: %u) but spell aura holder target is %s (lowguid: %u)",
5659  holder->GetId(), (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? "player" : "creature"), GetGUIDLow(),
5660  (holder->GetTarget()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? "player" : "creature"), holder->GetTarget()->GetGUIDLow());
5661  return false;
5662  }
5663 
5664  // passive and persistent auras can stack with themselves any number of times
5665  if ((!holder->IsPassive() && !holder->IsPersistent()) || holder->IsAreaAura())
5666  {
5667  SpellAuraHolderBounds spair = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(aurSpellInfo->Id);
5668 
5669  // take out same spell
5670  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = spair.first; iter != spair.second; ++iter)
5671  {
5672  SpellAuraHolder* foundHolder = iter->second;
5673  if (foundHolder->GetCasterGuid() == holder->GetCasterGuid())
5674  {
5675  // Aura can stack on self -> Stack it;
5676  if (aurSpellInfo->StackAmount)
5677  {
5678  // can be created with >1 stack by some spell mods
5679  foundHolder->ModStackAmount(holder->GetStackAmount(), holder->GetCaster());
5680  return false;
5681  }
5682 
5683  if (holder->GetId() == 33045)
5684  continue;
5685 
5686  // Check for coexisting Weapon-proced Auras
5687  if (holder->IsWeaponBuffCoexistableWith(foundHolder))
5688  continue;
5689 
5690  // Carry over removed Aura's remaining damage if Aura still has ticks remaining
5691  if (foundHolder->GetSpellProto()->Id == 12654) // Rolling ignites
5692  {
5693  for (int32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
5694  {
5695  if (Aura* aur = holder->GetAuraByEffectIndex(SpellEffectIndex(i)))
5696  {
5697  // m_auraname can be modified to SPELL_AURA_NONE for area auras, use original
5698  AuraType aurNameReal = AuraType(aurSpellInfo->EffectApplyAuraName[i]);
5699 
5700  if (aurNameReal == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE && aur->GetAuraDuration() > 0)
5701  {
5702  if (Aura* existing = foundHolder->GetAuraByEffectIndex(SpellEffectIndex(i)))
5703  {
5704  int32 remainingTicks = existing->GetAuraMaxTicks() - existing->GetAuraTicks();
5705  int32 remainingDamage = existing->GetModifier()->m_amount * remainingTicks;
5706 
5707  aur->GetModifier()->m_amount += int32(remainingDamage / aur->GetAuraMaxTicks());
5708  }
5709  else
5710  DEBUG_LOG("Holder (spell %u) on target (lowguid: %u) doesn't have aura on effect index %u. skipping.", aurSpellInfo->Id, holder->GetTarget()->GetGUIDLow(), i);
5711  }
5712  }
5713  }
5714  }
5715 
5716  // can be only single
5717  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(foundHolder, AURA_REMOVE_BY_STACK);
5718  break;
5719  }
5720  else
5721  {
5722  //any stackable case with amount should mod existing stack amount
5723  if (aurSpellInfo->StackAmount && !IsChanneledSpell(aurSpellInfo) && !aurSpellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_DOT_STACKING_RULE))
5724  {
5725  foundHolder->ModStackAmount(holder->GetStackAmount(), holder->GetCaster());
5726  return false;
5727  }
5728  else if (!IsStackableSpell(aurSpellInfo, foundHolder->GetSpellProto(), holder->GetTarget()))
5729  {
5730  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(foundHolder, AURA_REMOVE_BY_STACK);
5731  break;
5732  }
5733  }
5734  }
5735  }
5736 
5737  // normal spell or passive auras not stackable with other ranks
5738  if (!IsPassiveSpell(aurSpellInfo) || !IsPassiveSpellStackableWithRanks(aurSpellInfo))
5739  {
5740  if (!RemoveNoStackAurasDueToAuraHolder(holder))
5741  {
5742  return false; // couldn't remove conflicting aura with higher rank
5743  }
5744  }
5745 
5746  // update tracked aura targets list (before aura add to aura list, to prevent unexpected remove recently added aura)
5747  if (TrackedAuraType trackedType = holder->GetTrackedAuraType())
5748  {
5749  if (Unit* caster = holder->GetCaster()) // caster not in world
5750  {
5751  // Only compare TrackedAuras of same tracking type
5752  TrackedAuraTargetMap& scTargets = caster->GetTrackedAuraTargets(trackedType);
5753  for (TrackedAuraTargetMap::iterator itr = scTargets.begin(); itr != scTargets.end();)
5754  {
5755  SpellEntry const* itr_spellEntry = itr->first;
5756  ObjectGuid itr_targetGuid = itr->second; // Target on whom the tracked aura is
5757 
5758  if (itr_targetGuid == GetObjectGuid()) // Note: I don't understand this check (based on old aura concepts, kept when adding holders)
5759  {
5760  ++itr;
5761  continue;
5762  }
5763 
5764  bool removed = false;
5765  switch (trackedType)
5766  {
5767  case TRACK_AURA_TYPE_SINGLE_TARGET:
5768  if (sSpellMgr.IsSingleTargetSpells(itr_spellEntry, aurSpellInfo))
5769  {
5770  removed = true;
5771  // remove from target if target found
5772  if (Unit* itr_target = GetMap()->GetUnit(itr_targetGuid))
5773  itr_target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(itr_spellEntry->Id); // TODO AURA_REMOVE_BY_TRACKING (might require additional work elsewhere)
5774  else // Normally the tracking will be removed by the AuraRemoval
5775  scTargets.erase(itr);
5776  }
5777  break;
5778  case TRACK_AURA_TYPE_CONTROL_VEHICLE:
5779  {
5780  // find minimal effect-index that applies an aura
5781  uint8 i = EFFECT_INDEX_0;
5782  for (; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
5783  if (IsAuraApplyEffect(aurSpellInfo, SpellEffectIndex(i)))
5784  break;
5785 
5786  // Remove auras when first holder is applied
5787  if ((1 << i) & holder->GetAuraFlags())
5788  {
5789  removed = true; // each caster can only control one vehicle
5790 
5791  // remove from target if target found
5792  if (Unit* itr_target = GetMap()->GetUnit(itr_targetGuid))
5793  itr_target->RemoveAurasByCasterSpell(itr_spellEntry->Id, caster->GetObjectGuid());
5794  else // Normally the tracking will be removed by the AuraRemoval
5795  scTargets.erase(itr);
5796  }
5797  break;
5798  }
5799  case TRACK_AURA_TYPE_NOT_TRACKED: // These two can never happen
5800  case MAX_TRACKED_AURA_TYPES:
5801  MANGOS_ASSERT(false);
5802  break;
5803  }
5804 
5805  if (removed)
5806  {
5807  itr = scTargets.begin(); // list can be chnaged at remove aura
5808  continue;
5809  }
5810 
5811  ++itr;
5812  }
5813 
5814  // TODO remove this switch after confirming that we dont need other cases
5815  switch (trackedType)
5816  {
5817  case TRACK_AURA_TYPE_CONTROL_VEHICLE: // Only track the controlled vehicle, no secondary effects
5818  if (!IsSpellHaveAura(aurSpellInfo, SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE, holder->GetAuraFlags()))
5819  break;
5820  // no break here, track other controlled
5821  case TRACK_AURA_TYPE_SINGLE_TARGET: // Register spell holder single target
5822  scTargets[aurSpellInfo] = GetObjectGuid();
5823  break;
5824  default:
5825  break;
5826  }
5827  }
5828  }
5829 
5830  // add aura, register in lists and arrays
5831  holder->_AddSpellAuraHolder();
5832  holder->SetCreationDelayFlag();
5833  m_spellAuraHolders.insert(SpellAuraHolderMap::value_type(holder->GetId(), holder));
5834 
5835  for (int32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
5836  if (Aura* aur = holder->GetAuraByEffectIndex(SpellEffectIndex(i)))
5837  AddAuraToModList(aur);
5838 
5839  holder->ApplyAuraModifiers(true, true); // This is the place where auras are actually applied onto the target
5840  DETAIL_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Holder of spell %u now is in use", holder->GetId());
5841 
5842  // if aura deleted before boosts apply ignore
5843  // this can be possible it it removed indirectly by triggered spell effect at ApplyModifier
5844  if (!holder->IsDeleted())
5845  {
5846  holder->HandleSpellSpecificBoosts(true);
5847  SpellProcEventEntry const* procEntry = sSpellMgr.GetSpellProcEvent(aurSpellInfo->Id);
5848  if (aurSpellInfo->procFlags & PROC_FLAG_HEARTBEAT || (procEntry && procEntry->procFlags & PROC_FLAG_HEARTBEAT))
5849  ++m_hasHeartbeatProcCounter;
5850  }
5851 
5852  return true;
5853 }
5854 
5855 void Unit::AddAuraToModList(Aura* aura)
5856 {
5857  if (aura->GetModifier()->m_auraname < TOTAL_AURAS)
5858  m_modAuras[aura->GetModifier()->m_auraname].push_back(aura);
5859 }
5860 
5861 void Unit::RemoveRankAurasDueToSpell(uint32 spellId)
5862 {
5863  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
5864  if (!spellInfo)
5865  return;
5866  SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator next;
5867  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator i = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); i != m_spellAuraHolders.end(); i = next)
5868  {
5869  next = i;
5870  ++next;
5871  uint32 i_spellId = (*i).second->GetId();
5872  if ((*i).second && i_spellId && i_spellId != spellId)
5873  {
5874  if (sSpellMgr.IsSpellAnotherRankOfSpell(spellId, i_spellId))
5875  {
5876  RemoveAurasDueToSpell(i_spellId);
5877 
5878  if (m_spellAuraHolders.empty())
5879  break;
5880  next = m_spellAuraHolders.begin();
5881  }
5882  }
5883  }
5884 }
5885 
5886 void Unit::RemoveAllGroupBuffsFromCaster(ObjectGuid casterGuid)
5887 {
5888  SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator next;
5889  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator i = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); i != m_spellAuraHolders.end(); i = next)
5890  {
5891  next = i;
5892  ++next;
5893  SpellAuraHolder* holder = (*i).second;
5894  if ((casterGuid.IsEmpty() || holder->GetCasterGuid() == casterGuid) && IsGroupRestrictedBuff(holder->GetSpellProto()))
5895  {
5896  RemoveAurasDueToSpell((*i).first);
5897 
5898  if (m_spellAuraHolders.empty())
5899  break;
5900  next = m_spellAuraHolders.begin();
5901  }
5902  }
5903 }
5904 
5905 bool Unit::RemoveNoStackAurasDueToAuraHolder(SpellAuraHolder* holder)
5906 {
5907  if (!holder)
5908  return false;
5909 
5910  SpellEntry const* spellProto = holder->GetSpellProto();
5911  if (!spellProto)
5912  return false;
5913 
5914  // passive spell special case (only non stackable with ranks)
5915  if (IsPassiveSpell(spellProto) && IsPassiveSpellStackableWithRanks(spellProto))
5916  return true;
5917 
5918  const uint32 spellId = holder->GetId();
5919  const SpellSpecific specific = GetSpellSpecific(spellId);
5920  auto drGroup = holder->getDiminishGroup();
5921  SpellEntry const* triggeredBy = holder->GetTriggeredBy();
5922 
5923  SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator next;
5924  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator i = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); i != m_spellAuraHolders.end(); i = next)
5925  {
5926  next = i;
5927  ++next;
5928  if (!(*i).second) continue;
5929 
5930  SpellAuraHolder* existing = (*i).second;
5931  SpellEntry const* existingSpellProto = existing->GetSpellProto();
5932 
5933  if (!existingSpellProto)
5934  continue;
5935 
5936  const uint32 existingSpellId = existingSpellProto->Id;
5937  const SpellSpecific existingSpecific = GetSpellSpecific(existingSpellId);
5938  auto existingDrGroup = existing->getDiminishGroup();
5939  const bool own = (holder->GetCasterGuid() == existing->GetCasterGuid());
5940 
5941  // early checks that spellId is passive non stackable spell
5942  // Experimental: passive abilities dont stack with itself
5943  if (IsPassiveSpell(existingSpellProto) && (spellId != existingSpellId || !spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_IS_ABILITY)))
5944  {
5945  // passive non-stackable spells not stackable only for same caster
5946  if (!own)
5947  continue;
5948 
5949  // passive non-stackable spells not stackable only with another rank of same spell
5950  if (!sSpellMgr.IsSpellAnotherRankOfSpell(spellId, existingSpellId))
5951  continue;
5952  }
5953 
5954  // prevent triggering aura of removing aura that triggered it
5955  if (((*i).second->GetTriggeredBy() && (*i).second->GetTriggeredBy()->Id == spellId)
5956  || (holder->GetTriggeredBy() && holder->GetTriggeredBy()->Id == existingSpellId))
5957  continue;
5958 
5959  bool unique = false;
5960  bool personal = false;
5961  if (specific && existingSpecific && IsSpellSpecificIdentical(specific, existingSpecific))
5962  {
5963  personal = IsSpellSpecificUniquePerCaster(specific);
5964  unique = (personal || IsSpellSpecificUniquePerTarget(specific));
5965  }
5966 
5967  bool diminished = false;
5968  // Remove any existing holders from the same diminishing returns group by treating as unique
5969  if (!unique && drGroup && drGroup != DIMINISHING_LIMITONLY)
5970  {
5971  diminished = (drGroup == existingDrGroup);
5972  unique = diminished;
5973  }
5974 
5975  bool stackable = (own ? sSpellMgr.IsSpellStackableWithSpell(spellProto, existingSpellProto) : sSpellMgr.IsSpellStackableWithSpellForDifferentCasters(spellProto, existingSpellProto));
5976 
5977  // Remove only own auras when multiranking
5978  if (!unique && own && stackable && sSpellMgr.IsSpellAnotherRankOfSpell(spellId, existingSpellId))
5979  {
5980  // Check for same item source (allow two weapon enchants)
5981  if (const ObjectGuid &itemGuid = holder->GetCastItemGuid())
5982  {
5983  if (itemGuid != existing->GetCastItemGuid())
5984  continue;
5985  }
5986 
5987  unique = true;
5988  personal = true;
5989  }
5990 
5991  if (unique || !stackable)
5992  {
5993  // check if this spell can be triggered by any talent aura
5994  if (!unique && triggeredBy && sSpellMgr.IsSpellCanAffectSpell(triggeredBy, existingSpellProto))
5995  continue;
5996 
5997  if (!own && personal && stackable)
5998  continue;
5999 
6000  if (!IsSpellWithCasterSourceTargetsOnly(spellProto) && !IsSpellWithCasterSourceTargetsOnly(existingSpellProto))
6001  {
6002  // holder cannot remove higher/stronger rank if it isn't from the same caster
6003  // judgement excluded due to invalid comparison of dummy auras
6004  if (specific != SPELL_JUDGEMENT && IsSimilarExistingAuraStronger(holder, existing)) // TROLOLO
6005  return false;
6006 
6007  if (!diminished && sSpellMgr.IsSpellAnotherRankOfSpell(spellId, existingSpellId) && sSpellMgr.IsSpellHigherRankOfSpell(existingSpellId, spellId))
6008  return false;
6009  }
6010 
6011  if (personal && stackable)
6012  RemoveAurasByCasterSpell(existingSpellId, holder->GetCasterGuid());
6013  else
6014  RemoveAurasDueToSpell(existingSpellId);
6015 
6016  if (m_spellAuraHolders.empty())
6017  break;
6018 
6019  next = m_spellAuraHolders.begin();
6020  }
6021  }
6022  return true;
6023 }
6024 
6025 void Unit::RemoveAurasByCasterSpell(uint32 spellId, ObjectGuid casterGuid, AuraRemoveMode mode)
6026 {
6027  SpellAuraHolderBounds spair = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6028  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = spair.first; iter != spair.second;)
6029  {
6030  if (iter->second->GetCasterGuid() == casterGuid)
6031  {
6032  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second, mode);
6033  spair = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6034  iter = spair.first;
6035  }
6036  else
6037  ++iter;
6038  }
6039 }
6040 
6041 void Unit::RemoveSingleAuraFromSpellAuraHolder(uint32 spellId, SpellEffectIndex effindex, ObjectGuid casterGuid, AuraRemoveMode mode)
6042 {
6043  SpellAuraHolderBounds spair = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6044  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = spair.first; iter != spair.second;)
6045  {
6046  Aura* aur = iter->second->m_auras[effindex];
6047  if (aur && aur->GetCasterGuid() == casterGuid)
6048  {
6049  RemoveSingleAuraFromSpellAuraHolder(iter->second, effindex, mode);
6050  spair = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6051  iter = spair.first;
6052  }
6053  else
6054  ++iter;
6055  }
6056 }
6057 
6058 void Unit::RemoveAuraHolderDueToSpellByDispel(uint32 spellId, uint32 dispellingSpellId, uint32 stackAmount, ObjectGuid casterGuid, Unit* dispeller)
6059 {
6060  // Flame Shock
6061  SpellEntry const* spellEntry = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
6062  if (spellEntry->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN && (spellEntry->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x10000000)))
6063  {
6064  Unit* caster = nullptr;
6065  uint32 triggeredSpell = 0;
6066 
6067  if (Aura* dotAura = GetAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN, uint64(0x10000000), 0x00000000, casterGuid))
6068  caster = dotAura->GetCaster();
6069 
6070  if (caster && !caster->IsDead())
6071  {
6072  Unit::AuraList const& auras = caster->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
6073  for (auto aura : auras)
6074  {
6075  switch (aura->GetId())
6076  {
6077  case 51480: triggeredSpell = 64694; break; // Lava Flows, Rank 1
6078  case 51481: triggeredSpell = 65263; break; // Lava Flows, Rank 2
6079  case 51482: triggeredSpell = 65264; break; // Lava Flows, Rank 3
6080  default: continue;
6081  }
6082  break;
6083  }
6084  }
6085 
6086  // Remove spell auras from stack
6087  RemoveAuraHolderFromStack(spellId, stackAmount, casterGuid, AURA_REMOVE_BY_DISPEL);
6088 
6089  // Haste
6090  if (triggeredSpell)
6091  caster->CastSpell(caster, triggeredSpell, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
6092  return;
6093  }
6094  // Vampiric touch (first dummy aura)
6095  else if (spellEntry->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST && spellEntry->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000040000000000))
6096  {
6097  if (Aura* dot = GetAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST, uint64(0x0000040000000000), 0x00000000, casterGuid))
6098  {
6099  if (dot->GetCaster())
6100  {
6101  // use clean value for initial damage
6102  int32 bp0 = dot->GetSpellProto()->CalculateSimpleValue(EFFECT_INDEX_1);
6103  bp0 *= 8;
6104 
6105  // Remove spell auras from stack
6106  RemoveAuraHolderFromStack(spellId, stackAmount, casterGuid, AURA_REMOVE_BY_DISPEL);
6107 
6108  CastCustomSpell(this, 64085, &bp0, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, casterGuid);
6109  return;
6110  }
6111  }
6112  }
6113 
6114  SpellAuraHolderBounds spair = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6115  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = spair.first; iter != spair.second; ++iter)
6116  {
6117  SpellAuraHolder* holder = iter->second; // need to save due to iterator corruption
6118  if (!casterGuid || holder->GetCasterGuid() == casterGuid)
6119  {
6120  uint32 originalStacks = holder->GetStackAmount();
6121  if (holder->GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_DISPEL_REMOVES_CHARGES))
6122  {
6123  if (holder->DropAuraCharge())
6124  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(holder, AURA_REMOVE_BY_DISPEL);
6125  }
6126  else
6127  {
6128  if (holder->ModStackAmount(-int32(stackAmount), nullptr))
6129  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(holder, AURA_REMOVE_BY_DISPEL);
6130  }
6131  holder->OnDispel(dispeller, dispellingSpellId, originalStacks);
6132  break;
6133  }
6134  }
6135 }
6136 
6137 void Unit::RemoveAurasDueToSpellBySteal(SpellAuraHolder* holder, Unit* stealer)
6138 {
6139  SpellEntry const* spellProto = holder->GetSpellProto();
6140  SpellAuraHolder* new_holder = CreateSpellAuraHolder(spellProto, stealer, stealer);
6141 
6142  // set its duration and maximum duration
6143  // max duration 2 minutes (in msecs)
6144  int32 dur = holder->GetAuraDuration();
6145  int32 max_dur = 2 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS;
6146  int32 new_max_dur = max_dur > dur ? dur : max_dur;
6147  new_holder->SetAuraMaxDuration(new_max_dur);
6148  new_holder->SetAuraDuration(new_max_dur);
6149 
6150  for (int32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
6151  {
6152  Aura* aur = holder->GetAuraByEffectIndex(SpellEffectIndex(i));
6153 
6154  if (!aur)
6155  continue;
6156 
6157  int32 basePoints = aur->GetBasePoints();
6158  int32 damage = aur->GetModifier()->m_baseAmount;
6159  // construct the new aura for the attacker - will never return nullptr, it's just a wrapper for
6160  // some different constructors
6161  Aura* new_aur = CreateAura(aur->GetSpellProto(), aur->GetEffIndex(), &damage, &basePoints, new_holder, stealer, stealer);
6162 
6163  // set periodic to do at least one tick (for case when original aura has been at last tick preparing)
6164  int32 periodic = aur->GetModifier()->periodictime;
6165  new_aur->GetModifier()->periodictime = periodic < new_max_dur ? periodic : new_max_dur;
6166 
6167  // add the new aura to stealer
6168  new_holder->AddAura(new_aur, new_aur->GetEffIndex());
6169  }
6170 
6171  if (holder->ModStackAmount(-1, nullptr))
6172  // Remove aura as dispel
6173  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(holder, AURA_REMOVE_BY_DISPEL);
6174 
6175  // strange but intended behaviour: Stolen single target auras won't be treated as single targeted
6176  new_holder->SetTrackedAuraType(TRACK_AURA_TYPE_NOT_TRACKED);
6177 
6178  if (!stealer->AddSpellAuraHolder(new_holder))
6179  delete new_holder;
6180 }
6181 
6182 void Unit::RemoveAurasDueToSpellByCancel(uint32 spellId)
6183 {
6184  SpellAuraHolderBounds spair = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6185  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = spair.first; iter != spair.second;)
6186  {
6187  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second, AURA_REMOVE_BY_CANCEL);
6188  spair = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6189  iter = spair.first;
6190  }
6191 }
6192 
6193 void Unit::RemoveAurasTriggeredBySpell(uint32 spellId, ObjectGuid casterGuid /*= ObjectGuid()*/)
6194 {
6195  if (!spellId)
6196  return;
6197 
6198  SpellAuraHolderMap& auras = GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
6199  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator itr = auras.begin(); itr != auras.end();)
6200  {
6201  const SpellEntry* entry = itr->second->GetTriggeredBy();
6202  if ((entry && entry->Id == spellId) && (casterGuid.IsEmpty() || casterGuid == itr->second->GetCasterGuid()))
6203  {
6204  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(itr->second);
6205  itr = auras.begin();
6206  }
6207  else
6208  ++itr;
6209  }
6210 }
6211 
6212 void Unit::RemoveAuraStack(uint32 spellId, int32 modifier)
6213 {
6214  if (SpellAuraHolder* holder = GetSpellAuraHolder(spellId))
6215  if (holder->ModStackAmount(modifier, nullptr)) // Remove aura on return true
6216  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(holder, AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT);
6217 }
6218 
6219 void Unit::RemoveAuraCharge(uint32 spellId)
6220 {
6221  if (SpellAuraHolder* holder = GetSpellAuraHolder(spellId))
6222  if (holder->DropAuraCharge())
6223  RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spellId);
6224 }
6225 
6226 void Unit::RemoveAurasWithDispelType(DispelType type, ObjectGuid casterGuid)
6227 {
6228  // Create dispel mask by dispel type
6229  uint32 dispelMask = GetDispellMask(type);
6230  // Dispel all existing auras vs current dispel type
6231  SpellAuraHolderMap& auras = GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
6232  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator itr = auras.begin(); itr != auras.end();)
6233  {
6234  SpellEntry const* spell = itr->second->GetSpellProto();
6235  if (((1 << spell->Dispel) & dispelMask) && (!casterGuid || casterGuid == itr->second->GetCasterGuid()))
6236  {
6237  // Dispel aura
6238  RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spell->Id);
6239  itr = auras.begin();
6240  }
6241  else
6242  ++itr;
6243  }
6244 }
6245 
6246 void Unit::RemoveAuraHolderFromStack(uint32 spellId, uint32 stackAmount, ObjectGuid casterGuid, AuraRemoveMode mode)
6247 {
6248  SpellAuraHolderBounds spair = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6249  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = spair.first; iter != spair.second; ++iter)
6250  {
6251  if (!casterGuid || iter->second->GetCasterGuid() == casterGuid)
6252  {
6253  if (iter->second->ModStackAmount(-int32(stackAmount), nullptr))
6254  {
6255  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second, mode);
6256  break;
6257  }
6258  }
6259  }
6260 }
6261 
6262 void Unit::RemoveAurasDueToSpell(uint32 spellId, SpellAuraHolder* except, AuraRemoveMode mode)
6263 {
6264  SpellEntry const* spellEntry = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
6265  if (spellEntry && spellEntry->SpellDifficultyId && IsInWorld() && GetMap()->IsDungeon())
6266  if (SpellEntry const* spellDiffEntry = GetSpellEntryByDifficulty(spellEntry->SpellDifficultyId, GetMap()->GetDifficulty(), GetMap()->IsRaid()))
6267  spellId = spellDiffEntry->Id;
6268 
6269  SpellAuraHolderBounds bounds = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6270  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = bounds.first; iter != bounds.second;)
6271  {
6272  if (iter->second != except)
6273  {
6274  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second, mode);
6275  bounds = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6276  iter = bounds.first;
6277  }
6278  else
6279  ++iter;
6280  }
6281 }
6282 
6283 void Unit::RemoveAurasDueToItemSpell(Item* castItem, uint32 spellId)
6284 {
6285  SpellAuraHolderBounds bounds = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6286  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = bounds.first; iter != bounds.second;)
6287  {
6288  if (iter->second->GetCastItemGuid() == castItem->GetObjectGuid())
6289  {
6290  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second);
6291  bounds = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6292  iter = bounds.first;
6293  }
6294  else
6295  ++iter;
6296  }
6297 }
6298 
6299 void Unit::RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(uint32 flags)
6300 {
6301  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); iter != m_spellAuraHolders.end();)
6302  {
6303  if (iter->second->GetSpellProto()->AuraInterruptFlags & flags)
6304  {
6305  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second);
6306  iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin();
6307  }
6308  else
6309  ++iter;
6310  }
6311 }
6312 
6313 void Unit::RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(uint32 flags, SpellAuraHolder* except)
6314 {
6315  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); iter != m_spellAuraHolders.end();)
6316  {
6317  if (iter->second->GetSpellProto()->AuraInterruptFlags & flags && iter->second != except)
6318  {
6319  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second);
6320  iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin();
6321  }
6322  else
6323  ++iter;
6324  }
6325 }
6326 
6327 template <class T>
6328 void Unit::RemoveAurasWithAttribute(T flags)
6329 {
6330  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); iter != m_spellAuraHolders.end();)
6331  {
6332  if (iter->second->GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(T(flags)))
6333  {
6334  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second);
6335  iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin();
6336  }
6337  else
6338  ++iter;
6339  }
6340 }
6341
