6342 template void Unit::RemoveAurasWithAttribute(SpellAttributes flags);
6343 template void Unit::RemoveAurasWithAttribute(SpellAttributesEx flags);
6344 template void Unit::RemoveAurasWithAttribute(SpellAttributesEx2 flags);
6345 template void Unit::RemoveAurasWithAttribute(SpellAttributesEx3 flags);
6346 template void Unit::RemoveAurasWithAttribute(SpellAttributesEx4 flags);
6347 template void Unit::RemoveAurasWithAttribute(SpellAttributesEx5 flags);
6348 template void Unit::RemoveAurasWithAttribute(SpellAttributesEx6 flags);
6349 template void Unit::RemoveAurasWithAttribute(SpellAttributesEx7 flags);
6350 
6351 void Unit::RemoveAurasOnCast(uint32 flag, SpellEntry const* castedSpellEntry)
6352 {
6353  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); iter != m_spellAuraHolders.end();)
6354  {
6355  SpellAuraHolder* holder = iter->second;
6356  SpellEntry const* spellEntry = holder->GetSpellProto();
6357  bool removeThisHolder = false;
6358 
6359  if (spellEntry->AuraInterruptFlags & flag && (spellEntry->Id != castedSpellEntry->Id || GetObjectGuid() != holder->GetCasterGuid()))
6360  {
6361  if (!castedSpellEntry->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_ALLOW_WHILE_STEALTHED) || holder->GetSpellProto()->Dispel != DISPEL_STEALTH)
6362  if (!castedSpellEntry->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_ALLOW_WHILE_INVISIBLE) || holder->GetSpellProto()->Dispel != DISPEL_INVISIBILITY)
6363  removeThisHolder = true;
6364  }
6365 
6366  if (removeThisHolder)
6367  {
6368  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second);
6369  iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin();
6370  }
6371  else
6372  ++iter;
6373  }
6374 }
6375 
6376 void Unit::RemoveNotOwnTrackedTargetAuras(uint32 newPhase)
6377 {
6378  // tracked aura targets from other casters are removed if the phase does no more fit
6379  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); iter != m_spellAuraHolders.end();)
6380  {
6381  TrackedAuraType trackedType = iter->second->GetTrackedAuraType();
6382  if (!trackedType)
6383  {
6384  ++iter;
6385  continue;
6386  }
6387 
6388  if (trackedType == TRACK_AURA_TYPE_CONTROL_VEHICLE || iter->second->GetCasterGuid() != GetObjectGuid())
6389  {
6390  if (!newPhase)
6391  {
6392  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second);
6393  iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin();
6394  continue;
6395  }
6396  Unit* caster = iter->second->GetCaster();
6397  if (!caster || !caster->InSamePhase(newPhase))
6398  {
6399  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second);
6400  iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin();
6401  continue;
6402  }
6403  }
6404 
6405  ++iter;
6406  }
6407 
6408  // tracked aura targets at other targets
6409  for (uint8 type = TRACK_AURA_TYPE_SINGLE_TARGET; type < MAX_TRACKED_AURA_TYPES; ++type)
6410  {
6411  TrackedAuraTargetMap& scTargets = GetTrackedAuraTargets(TrackedAuraType(type));
6412  for (TrackedAuraTargetMap::iterator itr = scTargets.begin(); itr != scTargets.end();)
6413  {
6414  SpellEntry const* itr_spellEntry = itr->first;
6415  ObjectGuid itr_targetGuid = itr->second;
6416 
6417  if (itr_targetGuid != GetObjectGuid())
6418  {
6419  if (!newPhase)
6420  {
6421  scTargets.erase(itr); // remove for caster in any case
6422 
6423  // remove from target if target found
6424  if (Unit* itr_target = GetMap()->GetUnit(itr_targetGuid))
6425  itr_target->RemoveAurasByCasterSpell(itr_spellEntry->Id, GetObjectGuid());
6426 
6427  itr = scTargets.begin(); // list can be changed at remove aura
6428  continue;
6429  }
6430  Unit* itr_target = GetMap()->GetUnit(itr_targetGuid);
6431  if (!itr_target || !itr_target->InSamePhase(newPhase))
6432  {
6433  scTargets.erase(itr); // remove for caster in any case
6434 
6435  // remove from target if target found
6436  if (itr_target)
6437  itr_target->RemoveAurasByCasterSpell(itr_spellEntry->Id, GetObjectGuid());
6438 
6439  itr = scTargets.begin(); // list can be changed at remove aura
6440  continue;
6441  }
6442  }
6443 
6444  ++itr;
6445  }
6446  }
6447 }
6448 
6449 void Unit::RemoveSpellAuraHolder(SpellAuraHolder* holder, AuraRemoveMode mode)
6450 {
6451  MANGOS_ASSERT(!holder->IsDeleted());
6452 
6453  // Statue unsummoned at holder remove
6454  SpellEntry const* aurSpellInfo = holder->GetSpellProto();
6455  Totem* statue = nullptr;
6456  Unit* caster = holder->GetCaster();
6457  if (caster && IsChanneledSpell(aurSpellInfo))
6458  if (caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((Creature*)caster)->IsTotem() && ((Totem*)caster)->GetTotemType() == TOTEM_STATUE)
6459  statue = ((Totem*)caster);
6460 
6461  if (m_spellAuraHoldersUpdateIterator != m_spellAuraHolders.end() && m_spellAuraHoldersUpdateIterator->second == holder)
6462  ++m_spellAuraHoldersUpdateIterator;
6463 
6464  SpellAuraHolderBounds bounds = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(holder->GetId());
6465  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator itr = bounds.first; itr != bounds.second; ++itr)
6466  {
6467  if (itr->second == holder)
6468  {
6469  m_spellAuraHolders.erase(itr);
6470  break;
6471  }
6472  }
6473 
6474  holder->SetRemoveMode(mode);
6475 
6476  uint32 auraFlags = holder->GetAuraFlags();
6477 
6478  for (auto aura : holder->m_auras)
6479  {
6480  if (aura)
6481  RemoveAura(aura, mode);
6482  }
6483 
6484  holder->UnregisterAndCleanupTrackedAuras(auraFlags);
6485 
6486  holder->_RemoveSpellAuraHolder();
6487 
6488  if (mode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_DELETE)
6489  holder->HandleSpellSpecificBoosts(false);
6490 
6491  if (statue)
6492  statue->UnSummon();
6493 
6494  // If holder in use (removed from code that plan access to it data after return)
6495  // store it in holder list with delayed deletion
6496  holder->SetDeleted();
6497  m_deletedHolders.push_back(holder);
6498 
6499  if (m_hasHeartbeatProcCounter)
6500  {
6501  SpellProcEventEntry const* procEntry = sSpellMgr.GetSpellProcEvent(aurSpellInfo->Id);
6502  if (aurSpellInfo->procFlags & PROC_FLAG_HEARTBEAT || (procEntry && procEntry->procFlags & PROC_FLAG_HEARTBEAT))
6503  --m_hasHeartbeatProcCounter;
6504  }
6505 
6506  if (mode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE && IsChanneledSpell(aurSpellInfo) && !IsAreaOfEffectSpell(aurSpellInfo) &&
6507  caster && caster->GetChannelObjectGuid() == GetObjectGuid())
6508  {
6509  caster->InterruptSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL);
6510  }
6511 
6512  // Combustion removal: remove child when removing parent and in reverse
6513  // FIXME: Make a general rule out of this in the future for similar spells
6514  if (aurSpellInfo && (aurSpellInfo->Id == 28682 || aurSpellInfo->Id == 11129))
6515  RemoveAurasDueToSpell(aurSpellInfo->Id == 28682 ? 11129 : 28682);
6516 }
6517 
6518 void Unit::RemoveSingleAuraFromSpellAuraHolder(SpellAuraHolder* holder, SpellEffectIndex index, AuraRemoveMode mode)
6519 {
6520  Aura* aura = holder->GetAuraByEffectIndex(index);
6521  if (!aura)
6522  return;
6523 
6524  if (aura->IsLastAuraOnHolder())
6525  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(holder, mode);
6526  else
6527  RemoveAura(aura, mode);
6528 }
6529 
6530 void Unit::RemoveAura(Aura* Aur, AuraRemoveMode mode)
6531 {
6532  // remove from list before mods removing (prevent cyclic calls, mods added before including to aura list - use reverse order)
6533  if (Aur->GetModifier()->m_auraname < TOTAL_AURAS)
6534  {
6535  m_modAuras[Aur->GetModifier()->m_auraname].remove(Aur);
6536  }
6537 
6538  // Set remove mode
6539  Aur->SetRemoveMode(mode);
6540 
6541  // some ShapeshiftBoosts at remove trigger removing other auras including parent Shapeshift aura
6542  // remove aura from list before to prevent deleting it before
6544 
6545  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Aura %u now is remove mode %d", Aur->GetModifier()->m_auraname, mode);
6546 
6547  // aura _MUST_ be remove from holder before unapply.
6548  // un-apply code expected that aura not find by diff searches
6549  // in another case it can be double removed for example, if target die/etc in un-apply process.
6550  Aur->GetHolder()->RemoveAura(Aur->GetEffIndex());
6551 
6552  // some auras also need to apply modifier (on caster) on remove
6553  if (mode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_DELETE)
6554  {
6555  switch (Aur->GetModifier()->m_auraname)
6556  {
6557  // need properly undo any auras with player-caster mover set (or will crash at next caster move packet)
6558  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS:
6559  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS_PET:
6560  case SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE:
6561  Aur->ApplyModifier(false, true);
6562  break;
6563  default: break;
6564  }
6565  }
6566  else
6567  Aur->ApplyModifier(false, true);
6568 
6569  // If aura in use (removed from code that plan access to it data after return)
6570  // store it in aura list with delayed deletion
6571  m_deletedAuras.push_back(Aur);
6572 }
6573 
6574 void Unit::RemoveAllAuras(AuraRemoveMode mode /*= AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT*/)
6575 {
6576  while (!m_spellAuraHolders.empty())
6577  {
6578  SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin();
6579  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second, mode);
6580  }
6581 }
6582 
6583 void Unit::RemoveArenaAuras(bool onleave)
6584 {
6585  // in join, remove positive buffs, on end, remove negative
6586  // used to remove positive visible auras in arenas
6587  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); iter != m_spellAuraHolders.end();)
6588  {
6589  if ((!iter->second->GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_ALLOW_ENTERING_ARENA) &&
6590  // don't remove stances, shadowform, pally/hunter auras
6591  !iter->second->IsPassive() && // don't remove passive auras
6592  (!iter->second->GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_NO_IMMUNITIES) ||
6593  !iter->second->GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_DO_NOT_LOG)) &&
6594  !HasAreaAuraEffect(iter->second->GetSpellProto()) &&
6595  // not unaffected by invulnerability auras or not having that unknown flag (that seemed the most probable)
6596  (iter->second->IsPositive() != onleave)) // remove positive buffs on enter, negative buffs on leave
6597  || iter->second->GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_REMOVE_ENTERING_ARENA))
6598  {
6599  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second);
6600  iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin();
6601  }
6602  else
6603  ++iter;
6604  }
6605 }
6606 
6607 void Unit::RemoveAllAurasOnDeath()
6608 {
6609  // used just after dieing to remove all visible auras
6610  // and disable the mods for the passive ones
6611  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); iter != m_spellAuraHolders.end();)
6612  {
6613  if (!iter->second->IsPassive() && !iter->second->IsDeathPersistent())
6614  {
6615  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second, AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEATH);
6616  iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin();
6617  }
6618  else
6619  ++iter;
6620  }
6621 }
6622 
6623 void Unit::RemoveAllAurasOnEvade()
6624 {
6625  // used when evading to remove all auras except some special auras
6626  // Fly should not be removed on evade - neither should linked auras
6627  // Some cosmetic script auras should not be removed on evade either
6628  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); iter != m_spellAuraHolders.end();)
6629  {
6630  SpellEntry const* proto = iter->second->GetSpellProto();
6631  if (IsSpellRemovedOnEvade(proto))
6632  {
6633  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second, AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT);
6634  iter = m_spellAuraHolders.begin();
6635  }
6636  else
6637  ++iter;
6638  }
6639 }
6640 
6641 void Unit::DelaySpellAuraHolder(uint32 spellId, int32 delaytime, ObjectGuid casterGuid)
6642 {
6643  SpellAuraHolderBounds bounds = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6644  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = bounds.first; iter != bounds.second; ++iter)
6645  {
6646  SpellAuraHolder* holder = iter->second;
6647 
6648  if (casterGuid != holder->GetCasterGuid())
6649  continue;
6650 
6651  if (holder->GetAuraDuration() < delaytime)
6652  holder->SetAuraDuration(0);
6653  else
6654  holder->SetAuraDuration(holder->GetAuraDuration() - delaytime);
6655 
6656  holder->SendAuraUpdate(false);
6657 
6658  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Spell %u partially interrupted on %s, new duration: %u ms", spellId, GetGuidStr().c_str(), holder->GetAuraDuration());
6659  }
6660 }
6661 
6662 void Unit::_RemoveAllAuraMods()
6663 {
6664  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator i = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); i != m_spellAuraHolders.end(); ++i)
6665  {
6666  (*i).second->ApplyAuraModifiers(false);
6667  }
6668 }
6669 
6670 void Unit::_ApplyAllAuraMods()
6671 {
6672  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator i = m_spellAuraHolders.begin(); i != m_spellAuraHolders.end(); ++i)
6673  {
6674  (*i).second->ApplyAuraModifiers(true);
6675  }
6676 }
6677 
6678 bool Unit::HasAuraType(AuraType auraType) const
6679 {
6680  return !GetAurasByType(auraType).empty();
6681 }
6682 
6683 bool Unit::HasAuraTypeWithMiscvalue(AuraType auraType, int32 miscvalue) const
6684 {
6685  Unit::AuraList const& auraList = GetAurasByType(auraType);
6686  for (Aura* aura : auraList)
6687  if (miscvalue == aura->GetMiscValue())
6688  return true;
6689  return false;
6690 }
6691 
6692 bool Unit::HasAffectedAura(AuraType auraType, SpellEntry const* spellProto) const
6693 {
6694  Unit::AuraList const& auras = GetAurasByType(auraType);
6695 
6696  for (auto aura : auras)
6697  {
6698  if (aura->isAffectedOnSpell(spellProto))
6699  return true;
6700  }
6701 
6702  return false;
6703 }
6704 
6705 Aura* Unit::GetAura(uint32 spellId, SpellEffectIndex effindex)
6706 {
6707  SpellAuraHolderBounds bounds = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6708  if (bounds.first != bounds.second)
6709  return bounds.first->second->GetAuraByEffectIndex(effindex);
6710  return nullptr;
6711 }
6712 
6713 Aura* Unit::GetAura(AuraType type, SpellFamily family, uint64 familyFlag, uint32 familyFlag2, ObjectGuid casterGuid) const
6714 {
6715  AuraList const& auras = GetAurasByType(type);
6716  for (auto aura : auras)
6717  if (aura->GetSpellProto()->IsFitToFamily(family, familyFlag, familyFlag2) &&
6718  (!casterGuid || aura->GetCasterGuid() == casterGuid))
6719  return aura;
6720 
6721  return nullptr;
6722 }
6723 
6724 Aura* Unit::GetTriggeredByClientAura(uint32 spellId) const
6725 {
6726  MANGOS_ASSERT(spellId);
6727 
6728  AuraList const& auras = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_BY_CLIENT);
6729  for (auto aura : auras)
6730  {
6731  SpellAuraHolder const* holder = aura->GetHolder();
6732  if (!holder || holder->IsDeleted())
6733  continue;
6734 
6735  // NOTE for further development: If there are more spells of this aura type, it might be required to check that this is the effect that applies SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_BY_CLIENT
6736  if (holder->GetCasterGuid() == GetObjectGuid() && holder->GetSpellProto()->EffectTriggerSpell[aura->GetEffIndex()] == spellId)
6737  return aura;
6738  }
6739 
6740  return nullptr;
6741 }
6742 
6743 bool Unit::HasAura(uint32 spellId, SpellEffectIndex effIndex) const
6744 {
6745  SpellAuraHolderConstBounds spair = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6746  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator i_holder = spair.first; i_holder != spair.second; ++i_holder)
6747  if (i_holder->second->GetAuraByEffectIndex(effIndex))
6748  return true;
6749 
6750  return false;
6751 }
6752 
6753 bool Unit::HasAuraOfDifficulty(uint32 spellId) const
6754 {
6755  SpellEntry const* spellEntry = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
6756  if (spellEntry && spellEntry->SpellDifficultyId && IsInWorld() && GetMap()->IsDungeon())
6757  if (SpellEntry const* spellDiffEntry = GetSpellEntryByDifficulty(spellEntry->SpellDifficultyId, GetMap()->GetDifficulty(), GetMap()->IsRaid()))
6758  spellId = spellDiffEntry->Id;
6759 
6760  return m_spellAuraHolders.find(spellId) != m_spellAuraHolders.end();
6761 }
6762 
6763 bool Unit::HasAuraTypeWithCaster(AuraType auratype, ObjectGuid caster) const
6764 {
6765  AuraList const& auras = GetAurasByType(auratype);
6766  for (auto aura : auras)
6767  if (aura->GetCasterGuid() == caster)
6768  return true;
6769  return false;
6770 }
6771 
6772 bool Unit::HasMechanicMaskOrDispelMaskAura(uint32 dispelMask, uint32 mechanicMask, Unit const* caster) const
6773 {
6774  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap const& Auras = GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
6775  for (auto itr = Auras.begin(); itr != Auras.end(); ++itr)
6776  {
6777  SpellAuraHolder* holder = itr->second;
6778  if (dispelMask && holder->IsDispellableByMask(dispelMask, caster, nullptr))
6779  return true;
6780  if (mechanicMask && holder->HasMechanicMask(mechanicMask))
6781  return true;
6782  }
6783  return false;
6784 }
6785 
6786 bool Unit::HasNegativeAuraWithInterruptFlag(SpellAuraInterruptFlags flag) const
6787 {
6788  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap const& Auras = GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
6789  for (auto itr = Auras.begin(); itr != Auras.end(); ++itr)
6790  {
6791  SpellAuraHolder* holder = itr->second;
6792  if (holder->GetSpellProto()->AuraInterruptFlags & flag && holder->IsPositive())
6793  return true;
6794  }
6795  return false;
6796 }
6797 
6798 uint32 Unit::GetAuraCount(uint32 spellId) const
6799 {
6800  uint32 count = 0;
6801  SpellAuraHolderConstBounds spair = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellId);
6802 
6803  for (auto itr = spair.first; itr != spair.second; ++itr)
6804  {
6805  if (itr->second->GetStackAmount() == 0)
6806  ++count;
6807  else
6808  count += (uint32)itr->second->GetStackAmount();
6809  }
6810 
6811  return count;
6812 }
6813 
6814 void Unit::AddDynObject(DynamicObject* dynObj)
6815 {
6816  m_dynObjGUIDs.push_back(dynObj->GetObjectGuid());
6817 }
6818 
6819 void Unit::RemoveDynObject(uint32 spellid)
6820 {
6821  if (m_dynObjGUIDs.empty())
6822  return;
6823  for (GuidList::iterator i = m_dynObjGUIDs.begin(); i != m_dynObjGUIDs.end();)
6824  {
6825  DynamicObject* dynObj = GetMap()->GetDynamicObject(*i);
6826  if (!dynObj)
6827  {
6828  i = m_dynObjGUIDs.erase(i);
6829  }
6830  else if (spellid == 0 || dynObj->GetSpellId() == spellid)
6831  {
6832  dynObj->Delete();
6833  i = m_dynObjGUIDs.erase(i);
6834  }
6835  else
6836  ++i;
6837  }
6838 }
6839 
6840 void Unit::RemoveAllDynObjects()
6841 {
6842  while (!m_dynObjGUIDs.empty())
6843  {
6844  if (DynamicObject* dynObj = GetMap()->GetDynamicObject(*m_dynObjGUIDs.begin()))
6845  dynObj->Delete();
6846  m_dynObjGUIDs.erase(m_dynObjGUIDs.begin());
6847  }
6848 }
6849 
6850 DynamicObject* Unit::GetDynObject(uint32 spellId, SpellEffectIndex effIndex, Unit* target)
6851 {
6852  for (GuidList::iterator i = m_dynObjGUIDs.begin(); i != m_dynObjGUIDs.end();)
6853  {
6854  DynamicObject* dynObj = GetMap()->GetDynamicObject(*i);
6855  if (!dynObj)
6856  {
6857  i = m_dynObjGUIDs.erase(i);
6858  continue;
6859  }
6860 
6861  if (target)
6862  {
6863  if (dynObj->GetSpellId() == spellId && dynObj->GetEffIndex() == effIndex && dynObj->IsAffecting(target))
6864  return dynObj;
6865  }
6866  else
6867  {
6868  if (dynObj->GetSpellId() == spellId && dynObj->GetEffIndex() == effIndex)
6869  return dynObj;
6870  }
6871 
6872  ++i;
6873  }
6874  return nullptr;
6875 }
6876 
6877 DynamicObject* Unit::GetDynObject(uint32 spellId)
6878 {
6879  for (GuidList::iterator i = m_dynObjGUIDs.begin(); i != m_dynObjGUIDs.end();)
6880  {
6881  DynamicObject* dynObj = GetMap()->GetDynamicObject(*i);
6882  if (!dynObj)
6883  {
6884  i = m_dynObjGUIDs.erase(i);
6885  continue;
6886  }
6887 
6888  if (dynObj->GetSpellId() == spellId)
6889  return dynObj;
6890  ++i;
6891  }
6892  return nullptr;
6893 }
6894 
6895 GameObject* Unit::GetGameObject(uint32 spellId) const
6896 {
6897  for (auto i : m_gameObj)
6898  if (i->GetSpellId() == spellId)
6899  return i;
6900 
6901  WildGameObjectMap::const_iterator find = m_wildGameObjs.find(spellId);
6902  if (find != m_wildGameObjs.end())
6903  return GetMap()->GetGameObject(find->second); // Can be nullptr
6904 
6905  return nullptr;
6906 }
6907 
6908 void Unit::AddGameObject(GameObject* gameObj)
6909 {
6910  MANGOS_ASSERT(gameObj && !gameObj->GetOwnerGuid());
6911  m_gameObj.push_back(gameObj);
6912  gameObj->SetOwnerGuid(GetObjectGuid());
6913 
6914  if (gameObj->GetSpellId())
6915  {
6916  SpellEntry const* createBySpell = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(gameObj->GetSpellId());
6917  // Need disable spell use for owner
6918  if (createBySpell && createBySpell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_COOLDOWN_ON_EVENT))
6919  // note: item based cooldowns and cooldown spell mods with charges ignored (unknown existing cases)
6920  AddCooldown(*createBySpell);
6921  }
6922 }
6923 
6924 void Unit::AddWildGameObject(GameObject* gameObj)
6925 {
6926  MANGOS_ASSERT(gameObj && gameObj->GetOwnerGuid().IsEmpty());
6927  m_wildGameObjs[gameObj->GetSpellId()] = gameObj->GetObjectGuid();
6928 
6929  // As of 335 there are no wild-summon spells with SPELL_ATTR_DISABLED_WHILE_ACTIVE
6930 
6931  // Remove outdated wild summoned GOs
6932  for (WildGameObjectMap::iterator itr = m_wildGameObjs.begin(); itr != m_wildGameObjs.end();)
6933  {
6934  GameObject* pGo = GetMap()->GetGameObject(itr->second);
6935  if (pGo)
6936  ++itr;
6937  else
6938  m_wildGameObjs.erase(itr++);
6939  }
6940 }
6941 
6942 void Unit::RemoveGameObject(GameObject* gameObj, bool del, bool removeAura)
6943 {
6944  MANGOS_ASSERT(gameObj && gameObj->GetOwnerGuid() == GetObjectGuid());
6945 
6946  // already removed - case for totem slots
6947  auto itr = std::find(m_gameObj.begin(), m_gameObj.end(), gameObj);
6948  if (itr == m_gameObj.end())
6949  return;
6950 
6951  gameObj->SetOwnerGuid(ObjectGuid());
6952 
6953  // GO created by some spell
6954  if (uint32 spellid = gameObj->GetSpellId())
6955  {
6956  if (removeAura)
6957  RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spellid);
6958 
6959  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6960  {
6961  SpellEntry const* createBySpell = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellid);
6962  // Need activate spell use for owner
6963  if (createBySpell && createBySpell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_COOLDOWN_ON_EVENT))
6964  // note: item based cooldowns and cooldown spell mods with charges ignored (unknown existing cases)
6965  AddCooldown(*createBySpell);
6966  }
6967  }
6968 
6969  m_gameObj.remove(gameObj);
6970 
6971  if (del)
6972  {
6973  gameObj->SetRespawnTime(0);
6974  gameObj->Delete();
6975  }
6976 }
6977 
6978 void Unit::RemoveGameObject(uint32 spellid, bool del)
6979 {
6980  if (m_gameObj.empty())
6981  return;
6982 
6983  GameObjectList::iterator next;
6984  for (GameObjectList::iterator i = m_gameObj.begin(); i != m_gameObj.end(); i = next)
6985  {
6986  next = i;
6987  if (spellid == 0 || (*i)->GetSpellId() == spellid)
6988  {
6989  (*i)->SetOwnerGuid(ObjectGuid());
6990  if (del)
6991  {
6992  (*i)->SetRespawnTime(0);
6993  (*i)->Delete();
6994  }
6995 
6996  next = m_gameObj.erase(i);
6997  }
6998  else
6999  ++next;
7000  }
7001 }
7002 
7003 void Unit::RemoveAllGameObjects()
7004 {
7005  // wild summoned GOs - only remove references, do not remove GOs
7006  m_gameObj.clear();
7007  m_wildGameObjs.clear();
7008 }
7009 
7010 void Unit::AddCreature(uint32 spellId, Creature* creature)
7011 {
7012  m_creatures.emplace(spellId, creature);
7013 }
7014 
7015 void Unit::RemoveCreature(uint32 spellId, bool del)
7016 {
7017  if (del)
7018  {
7019  auto itr = m_creatures.find(spellId);
7020  if (itr != m_creatures.end())
7021  itr->second->ForcedDespawn();
7022  }
7023 
7024  m_creatures.erase(spellId);
7025 }
7026 
7027 void Unit::SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(SpellNonMeleeDamage* log)
7028 {
7029  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELLNONMELEEDAMAGELOG, (8 + 8 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 1 + 4 + 4 + 1 + 1 + 4 + 4 + 1));
7030  data << log->target->GetPackGUID();
7031  data << log->attacker->GetPackGUID();
7032  data << uint32(log->SpellID);
7033  data << uint32(log->damage); // damage amount
7034  data << uint32(std::max(int64(0), (int64(log->damage) - log->target->GetHealth()))); // overkill
7035  data << uint8(log->schoolMask); // damage school
7036  data << uint32(log->absorb); // AbsorbedDamage
7037  data << int32(log->resist); // resist
7038  data << uint8(log->periodicLog); // if 1, then client show spell name (example: %s's ranged shot hit %s for %u school or %s suffers %u school damage from %s's spell_name
7039  data << uint8(log->unused); // unused
7040  data << uint32(log->blocked); // blocked
7041  data << uint32(log->HitInfo);
7042 
7043  // Debug mode bool switch (extended data):
7044  if (!(log->HitInfo & (SPELL_HIT_TYPE_CRIT_DEBUG | SPELL_HIT_TYPE_HIT_DEBUG | SPELL_HIT_TYPE_ATTACK_TABLE_DEBUG)))
7045  data << uint8(0);
7046  else
7047  {
7048  data << uint8(1);
7049 
7050  if (log->HitInfo & SPELL_HIT_TYPE_CRIT_DEBUG)
7051  {
7052  data << float(0); // roll
7053  data << float(0); // needed
7054  }
7055 
7056  if (log->HitInfo & SPELL_HIT_TYPE_HIT_DEBUG)
7057  {
7058  data << float(0); // roll
7059  data << float(0); // needed
7060  }
7061 
7062  if (log->HitInfo & SPELL_HIT_TYPE_ATTACK_TABLE_DEBUG)
7063  {
7064  data << float(0); // miss chance
7065  data << float(0); // dodge chance
7066  data << float(0); // parry chance
7067  data << float(0); // block chance
7068  data << float(0); // glance chance
7069  data << float(0); // crush chance
7070  }
7071  }
7072 
7073  log->attacker->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
7074 }
7075 
7076 void Unit::SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(WorldObject* attacker, Unit* target, uint32 spellID, uint32 damage, SpellSchoolMask damageSchoolMask, uint32 absorbedDamage, int32 resist, bool isPeriodic, uint32 blocked, bool criticalHit, bool split)
7077 {
7078  SpellNonMeleeDamage log(attacker, target, spellID, damageSchoolMask);
7079  log.damage = damage;
7080  log.damage += (resist < 0 ? uint32(std::abs(resist)) : 0);
7081  log.damage -= (absorbedDamage + (resist > 0 ? uint32(resist) : 0) + blocked);
7082  log.absorb = absorbedDamage;
7083  log.resist = resist;
7084  log.periodicLog = isPeriodic;
7085  log.blocked = blocked;
7086  log.HitInfo = 0;
7087  if (criticalHit)
7088  log.HitInfo |= SPELL_HIT_TYPE_CRIT;
7089  if (split)
7090  log.HitInfo |= SPELL_HIT_TYPE_SPLIT;
7091  SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(&log);
7092 }
7093 
7094 void Unit::SendPeriodicAuraLog(SpellPeriodicAuraLogInfo* pInfo) const
7095 {
7096  Aura* aura = pInfo->aura;
7097  Modifier* mod = aura->GetModifier();
7098 
7099  WorldPacket data(SMSG_PERIODICAURALOG, 30);
7100  data << aura->GetTarget()->GetPackGUID();
7101  data << aura->GetCasterGuid().WriteAsPacked();
7102  data << uint32(aura->GetId()); // spellId
7103  data << uint32(1); // count
7104  data << uint32(mod->m_auraname); // auraId
7105  switch (mod->m_auraname)
7106  {
7107  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE:
7108  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE_PERCENT:
7109  data << uint32(pInfo->damage); // damage
7110  data << uint32(pInfo->overDamage); // overkill?
7111  data << uint32(GetSpellSchoolMask(aura->GetSpellProto()));
7112  data << uint32(pInfo->absorb); // absorb
7113  data << int32(pInfo->resist); // resist
7114  data << uint8(pInfo->critical ? 1 : 0); // new 3.1.2 critical flag
7115  break;
7116  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL:
7117  case SPELL_AURA_OBS_MOD_HEALTH:
7118  data << uint32(pInfo->damage); // damage
7119  data << uint32(pInfo->overDamage); // overheal?
7120  data << uint32(pInfo->absorb); // absorb
7121  data << uint8(pInfo->critical ? 1 : 0); // new 3.1.2 critical flag
7122  break;
7123  case SPELL_AURA_OBS_MOD_MANA:
7124  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_ENERGIZE:
7125  data << uint32(mod->m_miscvalue); // power type
7126  data << uint32(pInfo->damage); // damage
7127  break;
7128  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_MANA_LEECH:
7129  data << uint32(mod->m_miscvalue); // power type
7130  data << uint32(pInfo->damage); // amount
7131  data << float(pInfo->multiplier); // gain multiplier
7132  break;
7133  default:
7134  sLog.outError("Unit::SendPeriodicAuraLog: unknown aura %u", uint32(mod->m_auraname));
7135  return;
7136  }
7137 
7138  aura->GetTarget()->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
7139 }
7140 
7141 void Unit::SendSpellMiss(WorldObject* caster, Unit* target, uint32 spellID, SpellMissInfo missInfo)
7142 {
7143  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELLLOGMISS, (4 + 8 + 1 + 4 + 8 + 1));
7144  data << uint32(spellID);
7145  data << caster->GetObjectGuid();
7146  data << uint8(0); // can be 0 or 1
7147  data << uint32(1); // target count
7148  // for(i = 0; i < target count; ++i)
7149  data << target->GetObjectGuid(); // target GUID
7150  data << uint8(missInfo);
7151  // end loop
7152  caster->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
7153 }
7154 
7155 void Unit::SendSpellDamageResist(Unit* target, uint32 spellId) const
7156 {
7157  WorldPacket data(SMSG_PROCRESIST, 8+8+4+1);
7158  data << GetObjectGuid();
7159  data << target->GetObjectGuid();
7160  data << uint32(spellId);
7161  data << uint8(0); // bool - log format: 0-default, 1-debug
7162  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
7163 }
7164 
7165 void Unit::SendSpellOrDamageImmune(ObjectGuid casterGuid, Unit* target, uint32 spellID)
7166 {
7167  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELLORDAMAGE_IMMUNE, (8 + 8 + 4 + 1));
7168  data << casterGuid;
7169  data << target->GetObjectGuid();
7170  data << uint32(spellID);
7171  data << uint8(0);
7172  target->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
7173 }
7174 
7175 void Unit::SendEnchantmentLog(ObjectGuid targetGuid, uint32 itemEntry, uint32 enchantId) const
7176 {
7177  WorldPacket data(SMSG_ENCHANTMENTLOG, (8 + 8 + 4 + 4));
7178  data << GetPackGUID();
7179  data << targetGuid.WriteAsPacked();
7180  data << uint32(itemEntry);
7181  data << uint32(enchantId);
7182  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
7183 }
7184 
7185 void Unit::CasterHitTargetWithSpell(Unit* realCaster, Unit* target, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, bool triggered, bool success/* = true*/)
7186 {
7187  switch (spellInfo->Id)
7188  {
7189  case 32785: // infernal rain - neutral targets
7190  case 33814:
7191  return;
7192  }
7193 
7194  if (realCaster->CanAttack(target))
7195  {
7196  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_NO_INITIAL_THREAT) && !spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_PVP_ENABLING))
7197  return;
7198 
7199  // we want to change the stand state of each character if possible/required
7200  // Since patch 1.5.0 sitting creature always stand up on attack (even if stunned)
7201  if (success && !target->IsStandState() && !target->IsInCombat())
7202  target->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
7203 
7204  // Hostile spell hits count as attack made against target (if detected), stealth removed at Spell::cast if spell break it
7205  const bool attack = (!IsPositiveSpell(spellInfo->Id, realCaster, target) && realCaster->IsVisibleForOrDetect(target, target, false) && realCaster->CanEnterCombat() && target->CanEnterCombat());
7206 
7207  // Mind soothe confirmed to aggro on resist
7208  if (attack && (!success || !spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_THREAT_ONLY_ON_MISS)) && !spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_NO_THREAT))
7209  {
7210  if (success && !spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_NOT_AN_ACTION))
7211  {
7212  target->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_HOSTILE_ACTION);
7213 
7214  // caster can be detected but have stealth aura
7215  if (!spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_ALLOW_WHILE_STEALTHED))
7216  realCaster->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STEALTH);
7217  }
7218 
7219  target->AttackedBy(realCaster);
7220 
7221  target->AddThreat(realCaster);
7222  realCaster->AddThreat(target);
7223  target->SetInCombatWithAggressor(realCaster);
7224  realCaster->SetInCombatWithVictim(target);
7225  realCaster->GetCombatManager().TriggerCombatTimer(target);
7226 
7227  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_TAPS_IMMEDIATELY))
7228  if (Creature* creatureVictim = static_cast<Creature*>(target))
7229  if (!creatureVictim->IsPet() && !creatureVictim->HasLootRecipient())
7230  creatureVictim->SetLootRecipient(realCaster);
7231  }
7232 
7233  if (attack && spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_PVP_ENABLING))
7234  {
7235  target->SetOutOfCombatWithAggressor(realCaster);
7236  realCaster->SetOutOfCombatWithVictim(target);
7237  }
7238  }
7239  else if (realCaster->CanAssist(target) && target->IsInCombat())
7240  {
7241  // assisting case, healing and resurrection
7242  if (!spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_NO_INITIAL_THREAT) && !spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_NO_THREAT) && realCaster->CanEnterCombat() && target->CanEnterCombat())
7243  {
7244  realCaster->SetInCombatWithAssisted(target);
7245  target->getHostileRefManager().threatAssist(realCaster, 0.0f, spellInfo, false, triggered);
7246  }
7247 
7248  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_PVP_ENABLING))
7249  realCaster->SetOutOfCombatWithAssisted(target);
7250  }
7251 }
7252 
7253 void Unit::SendAIReaction(AiReaction reactionType)
7254 {
7255  WorldPacket data(SMSG_AI_REACTION, 12);
7256 
7257  data << GetObjectGuid();
7258  data << uint32(reactionType);
7259 
7260  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
7261 
7262  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_AI_AND_MOVEGENSS, "WORLD: Sent SMSG_AI_REACTION, type %u.", reactionType);
7263 }
7264 
7265 bool Unit::CanInitiateAttack() const
7266 {
7267  if (hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_CAN_NOT_REACT))
7268  return false;
7269 
7270  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SPAWNING | UNIT_FLAG_UNINTERACTIBLE))
7271  if (GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || !((Creature*)this)->GetForceAttackingCapability())
7272  return false;
7273 
7274  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !((Creature*)this)->CanAggro())
7275  return false;
7276 
7277  return true;
7278 }
7279 
7280 void Unit::SendAttackStateUpdate(CalcDamageInfo* calcDamageInfo) const
7281 {
7282  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "WORLD: Sending SMSG_ATTACKERSTATEUPDATE");
7283 
7284  // Subdamage count:
7285  uint32 lines = m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[calcDamageInfo->attackType].lines;
7286 
7287  WorldPacket data(SMSG_ATTACKERSTATEUPDATE, (4 + 8 + 8 + 4 + 4) + 1 + (lines * (4 + 4 + 4)) + (1 + 4 + 4));
7288 
7289  data << uint32(calcDamageInfo->HitInfo);
7290  data << calcDamageInfo->attacker->GetPackGUID();
7291  data << calcDamageInfo->target->GetPackGUID();
7292  data << uint32(calcDamageInfo->totalDamage);
7293 
7294  // Overkill value:
7295  data << uint32(std::max(int64(0), (int64(calcDamageInfo->totalDamage) - calcDamageInfo->target->GetHealth())));
7296 
7297  data << uint8(lines);
7298 
7299  // Subdamage information:
7300  for (uint8 i = 0; i < lines; ++i)
7301  {
7302  auto &line = calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i];
7303 
7304  data << uint32(line.damageSchoolMask);
7305  data << float(line.damage);
7306  data << uint32(line.damage);
7307  }
7308 
7309  if (calcDamageInfo->HitInfo & (HITINFO_ABSORB | HITINFO_ABSORB2))
7310  {
7311  for (uint32 i = 0; i < lines; ++i)
7312  data << uint32(calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i].absorb);
7313  }
7314 
7315  if (calcDamageInfo->HitInfo & (HITINFO_RESIST | HITINFO_RESIST2))
7316  {
7317  for (uint32 i = 0; i < lines; ++i)
7318  data << int32(calcDamageInfo->subDamage[i].resist);
7319  }
7320 
7321  data << uint8(calcDamageInfo->TargetState);
7322  data << uint32(0); // unknown, usually seen with -1, 0 and 1000
7323  data << uint32(0); // spell id, seen with heroic strike and disarm as examples.
7324  // HITINFO_NOACTION normally set if spell
7325 
7326  // Blocked amount:
7327  if (calcDamageInfo->HitInfo & HITINFO_BLOCK)
7328  data << uint32(calcDamageInfo->blocked_amount);
7329 
7330  if (calcDamageInfo->HitInfo & HITINFO_UNK22)
7331  data << uint32(0); // count of some sort?
7332 
7333  // Debug info
7334  if (calcDamageInfo->HitInfo & HITINFO_UNK0)
7335  {
7336  data << uint32(0);
7337  data << float(0);
7338  data << float(0);
7339  data << float(0);
7340  data << float(0);
7341  data << float(0);
7342  data << float(0);
7343  data << float(0);
7344  data << float(0);
7345  for (uint8 i = 0; i < 5; ++i)
7346  {
7347  data << float(0);
7348  data << float(0);
7349  }
7350  data << uint32(0);
7351  }
7352 
7353  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
7354 }
7355 
7356 void Unit::SendAttackStateUpdate(uint32 HitInfo, Unit* target, SpellSchoolMask damageSchoolMask, uint32 Damage,
7357  uint32 AbsorbDamage, int32 Resist, VictimState TargetState, uint32 BlockedAmount)
7358 {
7359  CalcDamageInfo dmgInfo;
7360  dmgInfo.HitInfo = HitInfo;
7361  dmgInfo.attacker = this;
7362  dmgInfo.target = target;
7363  dmgInfo.attackType = BASE_ATTACK;
7364  dmgInfo.totalDamage = Damage;
7365  dmgInfo.totalDamage += (Resist < 0 ? uint32(std::abs(Resist)) : 0);
7366  dmgInfo.totalDamage -= (AbsorbDamage + (Resist > 0 ? uint32(Resist) : 0) + BlockedAmount);
7367  dmgInfo.subDamage[0].damage = dmgInfo.totalDamage;
7368  dmgInfo.subDamage[0].damageSchoolMask = damageSchoolMask;
7369  dmgInfo.subDamage[0].absorb = AbsorbDamage;
7370  dmgInfo.subDamage[0].resist = Resist;
7371  dmgInfo.TargetState = TargetState;
7372  dmgInfo.blocked_amount = BlockedAmount;
7373  SendAttackStateUpdate(&dmgInfo);
7374 }
7375 
7376 void Unit::SetPowerType(Powers new_powertype, bool sendUpdate/*=true*/)
7377 {
7378  // set power type
7379  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_POWER_TYPE, new_powertype);
7380 
7381  // group updates
7382  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7383  {
7384  if (((Player*)this)->GetGroup())
7385  ((Player*)this)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_POWER_TYPE);
7386  }
7387  else if (HasCharmer())
7388  {
7389  Unit* charmer = GetCharmer();
7390  if (charmer && (charmer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) && ((Player*)charmer)->GetGroup())
7391  ((Player*)charmer)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_PET_POWER_TYPE);
7392  }
7393 
7394  // special cases for power type switching (druid and pets only)
7395  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((Creature*)this)->IsPet()))
7396  {
7397  uint32 maxValue = GetCreatePowers(new_powertype);
7398  uint32 curValue = maxValue;
7399 
7400  // special cases with current power = 0
7401  switch (new_powertype)
7402  {
7403  case POWER_RAGE:
7404  case POWER_RUNE:
7405  case POWER_RUNIC_POWER:
7406  curValue = 0;
7407  break;
7408  default:
7409  break;
7410  }
7411 
7412  // set power (except for mana)
7413  if (new_powertype != POWER_MANA)
7414  {
7415  SetMaxPower(new_powertype, maxValue);
7416  SetPower(new_powertype, curValue);
7417  }
7418 
7419  // send power type update to client
7420  WorldPacket data(SMSG_POWER_UPDATE);
7421  data << GetPackGUID();
7422  data << uint8(new_powertype);
7423  data << uint32(curValue);
7424  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
7425  }
7426 }
7427 
7428 FactionTemplateEntry const* Unit::GetFactionTemplateEntry() const
7429 {
7430  FactionTemplateEntry const* entry = sFactionTemplateStore.LookupEntry(GetFaction());
7431  if (!entry)
7432  {
7433  static ObjectGuid guid; // prevent repeating spam same faction problem
7434 
7435  if (GetObjectGuid() != guid)
7436  {
7437  guid = GetObjectGuid();
7438 
7439  if (guid.GetHigh() == HIGHGUID_PET)
7440  sLog.outError("%s (base creature entry %u) have invalid faction template id %u, owner %s",
7441  GetGuidStr().c_str(), GetEntry(), GetFaction(), ((Pet*)this)->GetOwnerGuid().GetString().c_str());
7442  else
7443  sLog.outError("%s have invalid faction template id %u", GetGuidStr().c_str(), GetFaction());
7444  }
7445  }
7446  return entry;
7447 }
7448 
7449 bool Unit::IsNeutralToAll() const
7450 {
7451  FactionTemplateEntry const* my_faction = GetFactionTemplateEntry();
7452  if (!my_faction || !my_faction->faction)
7453  return true;
7454 
7455  FactionEntry const* raw_faction = sFactionStore.LookupEntry(my_faction->faction);
7456  if (raw_faction && raw_faction->reputationListID >= 0)
7457  return false;
7458 
7459  return my_faction->IsNeutralToAll();
7460 }
7461 
7462 void Unit::AttackedBy(Unit* attacker)
7463 {
7464  if (!IsAlive())
7465  return;
7466 
7467  // trigger AI reaction
7468  if (AI())
7469  AI()->AttackedBy(attacker);
7470 
7471  // do not pet reaction for self inflicted damage (like environmental)
7472  if (attacker == this)
7473  return;
7474 
7475  // trigger pet AI reaction
7476  if (Pet* pet = GetPet())
7477  pet->AttackedBy(attacker);
7478 }
7479 
7480 bool Unit::Attack(Unit* victim, bool meleeAttack)
7481 {
7482  if (!victim || victim == this)
7483  return false;
7484 
7485  // dead units can neither attack nor be attacked
7486  if (!IsAlive() || !victim->IsInWorld() || !victim->IsAlive())
7487  return false;
7488 
7489  // player cannot attack in mount state
7490  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && IsMounted())
7491  return false;
7492 
7493  // nobody can attack GM in GM-mode
7494  if (victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7495  {
7496  if (((Player*)victim)->IsGameMaster())
7497  return false;
7498  }
7499  else
7500  {
7501  if (victim->GetCombatManager().IsInEvadeMode())
7502  return false;
7503  }
7504 
7505  // remove SPELL_AURA_MOD_UNATTACKABLE at attack (in case non-interruptible spells stun aura applied also that not let attack)
7506  if (HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_UNATTACKABLE))
7507  RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_UNATTACKABLE);
7508 
7509  // in fighting already
7510  if (m_attacking)
7511  {
7512  if (m_attacking == victim)
7513  {
7514  bool attacked = false;
7515  // need to regenerate target guid after certain scenarios
7516  if (AI() && AI()->CanExecuteCombatAction())
7517  {
7518  if (GetTargetGuid().IsEmpty())
7519  attacked = true;
7520  SetTargetGuid(victim->GetObjectGuid());
7521  }
7522  // switch to melee attack from ranged/magic
7523  if (meleeAttack)
7524  {
7525  MeleeAttackStart(m_attacking);
7526  return true;
7527  }
7528  return attacked;
7529  }
7530 
7531  // remove old target data
7532  AttackStop(true);
7533  }
7534 
7535  // Do not set new target, creatures automatically turn to target clientside if target is set, leading to desync
7536  if (AI() && AI()->CanExecuteCombatAction())
7537  SetTargetGuid(victim->GetObjectGuid());
7538 
7539  // If attacker was already added, it means we have m_attacking cleared due to some other
7540  if (!victim->_addAttacker(this))
7541  return false;
7542 
7543  m_attacking = victim;
7544  if (CanHaveThreatList())
7545  getThreatManager().setCurrentVictimByTarget(victim);
7546 
7547  // delay offhand weapon attack to half of offhand attack speed
7548  if (hasOffhandWeaponForAttack())
7549  setAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK, (GetAttackTime(OFF_ATTACK) * m_modAttackSpeedPct[OFF_ATTACK]) / 2);
7550 
7551  if (meleeAttack)
7552  MeleeAttackStart(m_attacking);
7553 
7554  if (AI())
7555  SendAIReaction(AI_REACTION_HOSTILE);
7556 
7557  return true;
7558 }
7559 
7560 bool Unit::AttackStop(bool targetSwitch /*= false*/, bool includingCast /*= false*/, bool includingCombo /*= false*/, bool clientInitiated /*= false*/)
7561 {
7562  if (includingCombo)
7563  ClearComboPoints();
7564 
7565  // interrupt cast only id includingCast == true and we have something to interrupt.
7566  if (includingCast && IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false))
7567  InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
7568 
7569  // Clear our target only if targetSwitch == true
7570  if (targetSwitch && GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7571  SetTargetGuid(ObjectGuid());
7572 
7573  if (!clientInitiated && IsPlayer())
7574  ((Player*)this)->SendAttackSwingCancelAttack(); // melee and ranged forced attack cancel
7575  MeleeAttackStop(m_attacking);
7576 
7577  if (m_attacking)
7578  {
7579  m_attacking->_removeAttacker(this);
7580  m_attacking = nullptr;
7581  return true;
7582  }
7583  return false;
7584 }
7585 
7586 void Unit::CombatStop(bool includingCast, bool includingCombo)
7587 {
7588  AttackStop(true, includingCast, includingCombo);
7589 
7590  RemoveAllAttackers();
7591  DeleteThreatList();
7592 
7593  if (GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7594  {
7595  ((Creature*)this)->SetNoCallAssistance(false);
7596 
7597  if (((Creature*)this)->GetTemporaryFactionFlags() & TEMPFACTION_RESTORE_COMBAT_STOP)
7598  ((Creature*)this)->ClearTemporaryFaction();
7599  }
7600 
7601 
7602  if (AI())
7603  AI()->CombatStop();
7604 
7605  GetCombatManager().StopCombatTimer();
7606 
7607  ClearInCombat();
7608 }
7609 
7610 void Unit::MeleeAttackStart(Unit* victim)
7611 {
7612  if (!hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_MELEE_ATTACKING))
7613  {
7614  addUnitState(UNIT_STAT_MELEE_ATTACKING);
7615  if (victim)
7616  SendMeleeAttackStart(*victim);
7617  }
7618 }
7619 
7620 void Unit::MeleeAttackStop(Unit* victim)
7621 {
7622  if (hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_MELEE_ATTACKING))
7623  {
7624  clearUnitState(UNIT_STAT_MELEE_ATTACKING);
7625  InterruptSpell(CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL);
7626  if (victim)
7627  SendMeleeAttackStop(*victim);
7628  }
7629 }
7630 
7631 struct CombatStopWithPetsHelper
7632 {
7633  explicit CombatStopWithPetsHelper(bool _includingCast, bool _includingCombo) : includingCast(_includingCast), includingCombo(_includingCombo) {}
7634  void operator()(Unit* unit) const { unit->CombatStop(includingCast, includingCombo); }
7635  bool includingCast, includingCombo;
7636 };
7637 
7638 void Unit::CombatStopWithPets(bool includingCast, bool includingCombo)
7639 {
7640  CombatStop(includingCast, includingCombo);
7641  CallForAllControlledUnits(CombatStopWithPetsHelper(includingCast, includingCombo), CONTROLLED_PET | CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS | CONTROLLED_CHARM);
7642 }
7643 
7644 void Unit::RemoveAllAttackers()
7645 {
7646  while (!m_attackers.empty())
7647  {
7648  AttackerSet::iterator iter = m_attackers.begin();
7649  (*iter)->AttackStop();
7650  }
7651 }
7652 
7653 bool Unit::HasAuraStateForCaster(AuraState flag, ObjectGuid casterGuid) const
7654 {
7655  if (!HasAuraState(flag))
7656  return false;
7657 
7658  // single per-caster aura state
7659  if (flag == AURA_STATE_CONFLAGRATE)
7660  {
7661  Unit::AuraList const& dotList = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE);
7662  for (auto i : dotList)
7663  {
7664  if (i->GetCasterGuid() == casterGuid &&
7665  // Immolate or Shadowflame
7666  i->GetSpellProto()->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK, uint64(0x0000000000000004), 0x00000002))
7667  {
7668  return true;
7669  }
7670  }
7671 
7672  return false;
7673  }
7674 
7675  return true;
7676 }
7677 
7678 void Unit::ModifyAuraState(AuraState flag, bool apply)
7679 {
7680  if (apply)
7681  {
7682  if (!HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_AURASTATE, 1 << (flag - 1)))
7683  {
7684  SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_AURASTATE, 1 << (flag - 1));
7685  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7686  {
7687  const PlayerSpellMap& sp_list = ((Player*)this)->GetSpellMap();
7688  for (const auto& itr : sp_list)
7689  {
7690  if (itr.second.state == PLAYERSPELL_REMOVED) continue;
7691  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(itr.first);
7692  if (!spellInfo || !IsPassiveSpell(spellInfo)) continue;
7693  if (AuraState(spellInfo->CasterAuraState) == flag)
7694  CastSpell(this, itr.first, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
7695  }
7696  }
7697  }
7698  }
7699  else
7700  {
7701  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_AURASTATE, 1 << (flag - 1)))
7702  {
7703  RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_AURASTATE, 1 << (flag - 1));
7704 
7705  if (flag != AURA_STATE_ENRAGE) // enrage aura state triggering continues auras
7706  {
7707  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap& tAuras = GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
7708  for (Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator itr = tAuras.begin(); itr != tAuras.end();)
7709  {
7710  SpellEntry const* spellProto = (*itr).second->GetSpellProto();
7711  if (AuraState(spellProto->CasterAuraState) == flag)
7712  {
7713  RemoveSpellAuraHolder(itr->second);
7714  itr = tAuras.begin();
7715  }
7716  else
7717  ++itr;
7718  }
7719  }
7720  }
7721  }
7722 }
7723 
7724 Unit* Unit::GetBeneficiary() const
7725 {
7726  Unit* master = GetMaster();
7727  return (master ? master : const_cast<Unit*>(this));
7728 }
7729 
7730 Player* Unit::GetBeneficiaryPlayer() const
7731 {
7732  Unit const* beneficiary = GetBeneficiary();
7733  if (beneficiary)
7734  return (beneficiary->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? const_cast<Player*>(static_cast<Player const*>(beneficiary)) : nullptr);
7735  return (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? const_cast<Player*>(static_cast<Player const*>(this)) : nullptr);
7736 }
7737 
7738 bool Unit::IsClientControlled(Player const* exactClient /*= nullptr*/) const
7739 {
7740  // Severvide method to check if unit is client controlled (optionally check for specific client in control)
7741 
7742  // Applies only to player controlled units
7743  if (!HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
7744  return false;
7745 
7746  // These flags are meant to be used when server controls this unit, client control is taken away
7747  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, (UNIT_FLAG_CLIENT_CONTROL_LOST | UNIT_FLAG_CONFUSED | UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING)))
7748  return false;
7749 
7750  // If unit is possessed, it has lost original control...
7751  if (ObjectGuid const &guid = GetCharmerGuid())
7752  {
7753  // ... but if it is a possessing charm, then we have to check if some other player controls it
7754  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_POSSESSED) && guid.IsPlayer())
7755  return (exactClient ? (exactClient->GetObjectGuid() == guid) : true);
7756  return false;
7757  }
7758 
7759  // By default: players have client control over themselves
7760  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7761  return (exactClient ? (exactClient == this) : true);
7762  return false;
7763 }
7764 
7765 Player const* Unit::GetClientControlling() const
7766 {
7767  // Serverside reverse "mover" deduction logic at controlled unit
7768 
7769  // Applies only to player controlled units
7770  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
7771  {
7772  // Charm always removes control from original client...
7773  if (HasCharmer())
7774  {
7775  // ... but if it is a possessing charm, some other client may have control
7776  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_POSSESSED))
7777  {
7778  Unit const* charmer = GetCharmer();
7779  if (charmer && charmer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7780  return static_cast<Player const*>(charmer);
7781  }
7782  }
7783  else if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7784  {
7785  // Check if anything prevents original client from controlling
7786  if (IsClientControlled(static_cast<Player const*>(this)))
7787  return static_cast<Player const*>(this);
7788  }
7789  }
7790  return nullptr;
7791 }
7792 
7793 Unit* Unit::GetCharm(WorldObject const* pov /*= nullptr*/) const
7794 {
7795  if (ObjectGuid const& guid = GetCharmGuid())
7796  {
7797  WorldObject const* accessor = (pov ? pov : this);
7798  if (!accessor->IsInWorld())
7799  {
7800  // If this is a pet and not placed on any map yet (loading), we have to look for a player within world globally in all maps
7801  if (guid.IsPlayer() && accessor->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
7802  {
7803  if (static_cast<Creature const*>(accessor)->IsPet() && static_cast<Pet const*>(accessor)->isLoading())
7804  return ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(guid);
7805  }
7806  // Bugcheck
7807  sLog.outDebug("Unit::GetCharm: Guid field management continuity violation for %s, can't look up %s while accessor is outside of the world",
7808  GetGuidStr().c_str(), guid.GetString().c_str());
7809  return nullptr;
7810  }
7811  // We need a unit in the same map only
7812  if (Unit* unit = accessor->GetMap()->GetUnit(guid))
7813  return unit;
7814  // Bugcheck
7815  sLog.outDebug("Unit::GetCharm: Guid field management continuity violation for %s in map '%s', %s does not exist in this instance",
7816  GetGuidStr().c_str(), accessor->GetMap()->GetMapName(), guid.GetString().c_str());
7817  // const_cast<Unit*>(this)->SetCharm(nullptr);
7818  }
7819  return nullptr;
7820 }
7821 
7822 Unit* Unit::GetCharmer(WorldObject const* pov /*= nullptr*/) const
7823 {
7824  if (ObjectGuid const& guid = GetCharmerGuid())
7825  {
7826  WorldObject const* accessor = (pov ? pov : this);
7827  if (!accessor->IsInWorld())
7828  {
7829  // If this is a pet and not placed on any map yet (loading), we have to look for a player within world globally in all maps
7830  if (guid.IsPlayer() && accessor->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
7831  {
7832  if (static_cast<Creature const*>(accessor)->IsPet() && static_cast<Pet const*>(accessor)->isLoading())
7833  return ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(guid);
7834  }
7835  // Bugcheck
7836  sLog.outDebug("Unit::GetCharmer: Guid field management continuity violation for %s, can't look up %s while accessor is outside of the world",
7837  GetGuidStr().c_str(), guid.GetString().c_str());
7838  return nullptr;
7839  }
7840  // We need a unit in the same map only
7841  if (Unit* unit = accessor->GetMap()->GetUnit(guid))
7842  return unit;
7843  // Bugcheck
7844  sLog.outDebug("Unit::GetCharmer: Guid field management continuity violation for %s in map '%s', %s does not exist in this instance",
7845  GetGuidStr().c_str(), accessor->GetMap()->GetMapName(), guid.GetString().c_str());
7846  // const_cast<Unit*>(this)->SetCharmer(nullptr);
7847  }
7848  return nullptr;
7849 }
7850 
7851 Unit* Unit::GetCreator(WorldObject const* pov /*= nullptr*/) const
7852 {
7853  if (ObjectGuid const& guid = GetCreatorGuid())
7854  {
7855  WorldObject const* accessor = (pov ? pov : this);
7856  if (!accessor->IsInWorld())
7857  {
7858  // If this is a pet and not placed on any map yet (loading), we have to look for a player within world globally in all maps
7859  if (guid.IsPlayer() && accessor->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
7860  {
7861  if (static_cast<Creature const*>(accessor)->IsPet() && static_cast<Pet const*>(accessor)->isLoading())
7862  return ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(guid);
7863  }
7864  // Bugcheck
7865  sLog.outDebug("Unit::GetCreator: Guid field management continuity violation for %s, can't look up %s while accessor is outside of the world",
7866  GetGuidStr().c_str(), guid.GetString().c_str());
7867  return nullptr;
7868  }
7869  // We need a unit in the same map only
7870  if (Unit* unit = accessor->GetMap()->GetUnit(guid))
7871  return unit;
7872  // Bugcheck
7873  sLog.outDebug("Unit::GetCreator: Guid field management continuity violation for %s in map '%s', %s does not exist in this instance",
7874  GetGuidStr().c_str(), accessor->GetMap()->GetMapName(), guid.GetString().c_str());
7875  // const_cast<Unit*>(this)->SetCreator(nullptr);
7876  }
7877  return nullptr;
7878 }
7879 
7880 Unit* Unit::GetTarget(WorldObject const* pov /*= nullptr*/) const
7881 {
7882  if (ObjectGuid const& guid = GetTargetGuid())
7883  {
7884  WorldObject const* accessor = (pov ? pov : this);
7885  if (!accessor->IsInWorld())
7886  {
7887  // If this is a pet and not placed on any map yet (loading), we have to look for a player within world globally in all maps
7888  if (guid.IsPlayer() && accessor->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
7889  {
7890  if (static_cast<Creature const*>(accessor)->IsPet() && static_cast<Pet const*>(accessor)->isLoading())
7891  return ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(guid);
7892  }
7893  // Bugcheck
7894  sLog.outDebug("Unit::GetTarget: Guid field management continuity violation for %s, can't look up %s while accessor is outside of the world",
7895  GetGuidStr().c_str(), guid.GetString().c_str());
7896  return nullptr;
7897  }
7898  // We need a unit in the same map only
7899  if (Unit* unit = accessor->GetMap()->GetUnit(guid))
7900  return unit;
7901  // Bugcheck
7902  sLog.outDebug("Unit::GetTarget: Guid field management continuity violation for %s in map '%s', %s does not exist in this instance",
7903  GetGuidStr().c_str(), accessor->GetMap()->GetMapName(), guid.GetString().c_str());
7904  // const_cast<Unit*>(this)->SetTarget(nullptr);
7905  }
7906  return nullptr;
7907 }
7908 
7909 WorldObject* Unit::GetChannelObject(WorldObject const* pov /*= nullptr*/) const
7910 {
7911  if (ObjectGuid const& guid = GetChannelObjectGuid())
7912  {
7913  WorldObject const* accessor = (pov ? pov : this);
7914  if (!accessor->IsInWorld())
7915  {
7916  // If this is a pet and not placed on any map yet (loading), we have to look for a player within world globally in all maps
7917  if (guid.IsPlayer() && accessor->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
7918  {
7919  if (static_cast<Creature const*>(accessor)->IsPet() && static_cast<Pet const*>(accessor)->isLoading())
7920  return ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(guid);
7921  }
7922  // Bugcheck
7923  sLog.outDebug("Unit::GetChannelObject: Guid field management continuity violation for %s, can't look up %s while accessor is outside of the world",
7924  GetGuidStr().c_str(), guid.GetString().c_str());
7925  return nullptr;
7926  }
7927  // We need a unit in the same map only
7928  if (WorldObject* unit = accessor->GetMap()->GetWorldObject(guid))
7929  return unit;
7930  // Bugcheck
7931  sLog.outDebug("Unit::GetChannelObject: Guid field management continuity violation for %s in map '%s', %s does not exist in this instance",
7932  GetGuidStr().c_str(), accessor->GetMap()->GetMapName(), guid.GetString().c_str());
7933  // const_cast<Unit*>(this)->SetChannelObject(nullptr);
7934  }
7935  return nullptr;
7936 }
7937 
7938 Unit* Unit::GetOwner(WorldObject const* pov /*= nullptr*/, bool recursive /*= false*/) const
7939 {
7940  // Default, creator field as owner is present in everything: totems, pets, guardians, etc
7941  Unit* owner = GetCreator(pov);
7942  // Query owner recursively (ascending)
7943  if (recursive)
7944  {
7945  while (Unit* grandowner = (owner ? owner->GetOwner(pov, recursive) : nullptr))
7946  owner = grandowner;
7947  }
7948  return owner;
7949 }
7950 
7951 bool Unit::HasMaster() const
7952 {
7953  return HasCharmer() || GetOwnerGuid().IsUnit();
7954 }
7955 
7956 Unit* Unit::GetMaster(WorldObject const* pov /*= nullptr*/) const
7957 {
7958  Unit* charmer = GetCharmer(pov);
7959  return (charmer ? charmer : GetOwner(pov));
7960 }
7961 
7962 Unit* Unit::GetSpawner(WorldObject const* pov /*= nullptr*/) const
7963 {
7964  if (ObjectGuid const& guid = GetSpawnerGuid())
7965  {
7966  WorldObject const* accessor = (pov ? pov : this);
7967  if (!accessor->IsInWorld())
7968  {
7969  // If this is a pet and not placed on any map yet (loading), we have to look for a player within world globally in all maps
7970  if (guid.IsPlayer() && accessor->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
7971  {
7972  if (static_cast<Creature const*>(accessor)->IsPet() && static_cast<Pet const*>(accessor)->isLoading())
7973  return ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(guid);
7974  }
7975  // Bugcheck
7976  sLog.outDebug("Unit::GetSpawner: Guid field management continuity violation for %s, can't look up %s while accessor is outside of the world",
7977  GetGuidStr().c_str(), guid.GetString().c_str());
7978  return nullptr;
7979  }
7980  // We need a unit in the same map only
7981  if (Unit* unit = accessor->GetMap()->GetUnit(guid))
7982  return unit;
7983  // Bugcheck
7984  sLog.outDebug("Unit::GetSpawner: Guid field management continuity violation for %s in map '%s', %s does not exist in this instance",
7985  GetGuidStr().c_str(), accessor->GetMap()->GetMapName(), guid.GetString().c_str());
7986  }
7987  return nullptr;
7988 }
7989 
7990 Unit* Unit::_GetUnit(ObjectGuid guid) const
7991 {
7992  if (Map* map = GetMap())
7993  return map->GetUnit(guid);
7994  return nullptr;
7995 }
7996 
7997 Pet* Unit::GetPet() const
7998 {
7999  if (ObjectGuid pet_guid = GetPetGuid())
8000  {
8001  if (Pet* pet = GetMap()->GetPet(pet_guid))
8002  return pet;
8003 
8004  sLog.outError("Unit::GetPet: %s not exist.", pet_guid.GetString().c_str());
8005  const_cast<Unit*>(this)->SetPet(nullptr);
8006  }
8007 
8008  return nullptr;
8009 }
8010 
8011 Pet* Unit::_GetPet(ObjectGuid guid) const
8012 {
8013  return GetMap()->GetPet(guid);
8014 }
8015 
8016 Pet* Unit::GetMiniPet() const
8017 {
8018  if (!GetCritterGuid())
8019  return nullptr;
8020 
8021  return GetMap()->GetPet(GetCritterGuid());
8022 }
8023 
8024 void Unit::RemoveMiniPet()
8025 {
8026  if (Pet* pet = GetMiniPet())
8027  pet->Unsummon(PET_SAVE_AS_DELETED, this);
8028  else
8029  SetCritterGuid(ObjectGuid());
8030 }
8031 
8032 void Unit::AddGuardian(Pet* pet)
8033 {
8034  m_guardianPets.insert(pet->GetObjectGuid());
8035 }
8036 
8037 void Unit::RemoveGuardian(Pet* pet)
8038 {
8039  if (m_guardianPetsIterator != m_guardianPets.end() && *m_guardianPetsIterator == pet->GetObjectGuid())
8040  ++m_guardianPetsIterator;
8041  m_guardianPets.erase(pet->GetObjectGuid());
8042 }
8043 
8044 void Unit::RemoveGuardians(bool force)
8045 {
8046  while (!m_guardianPets.empty())
8047  {
8048  ObjectGuid guid = *m_guardianPets.begin();
8049 
8050  if (Pet* pet = GetMap()->GetPet(guid))
8051  if (!pet->IgnoresOwnersDeath())
8052  if (force || !pet->IsInCombat())
8053  pet->Unsummon(PET_SAVE_AS_DELETED, this); // can remove pet guid from m_guardianPets
8054 
8055  m_guardianPets.erase(guid);
8056  }
8057 }
8058 
8059 Pet* Unit::FindGuardianWithEntry(uint32 entry)
8060 {
8061  for (auto m_guardianPet : m_guardianPets)
8062  if (Pet* guardian = GetMap()->GetPet(m_guardianPet))
8063  if (guardian->GetEntry() == entry)
8064  return guardian;
8065 
8066  return nullptr;
8067 }
8068 
8069 uint32 Unit::CountGuardiansWithEntry(uint32 entry)
8070 {
8071  uint32 count = 0;
8072 
8073  for (auto m_guardianPet : m_guardianPets)
8074  if (Pet* guardian = GetMap()->GetPet(m_guardianPet))
8075  if (guardian->GetEntry() == entry)
8076  count++;
8077 
8078  return count;
8079 }
8080 
8081 Pet* Unit::GetProtectorPet()
8082 {
8083  for (auto m_guardianPet : m_guardianPets)
8084  if (Pet* pet = GetMap()->GetPet(m_guardianPet))
8085  if (pet->getPetType() == PROTECTOR_PET)
8086  return pet;
8087 
8088  return nullptr;
8089 }
8090 
8091 bool Unit::HasAnyPet() const
8092 {
8093  return !m_guardianPets.empty() || GetPetGuid() || GetCritterGuid();
8094 }
8095 
8096 Unit* Unit::_GetTotem(TotemSlot slot) const
8097 {
8098  return GetTotem(slot);
8099 }
8100 
8101 Totem* Unit::GetTotem(TotemSlot slot) const
8102 {
8103  if (!IsInWorld() || !m_TotemSlot[slot])
8104  return nullptr;
8105 
8106  Creature* totem = GetMap()->GetCreature(m_TotemSlot[slot]);
8107  return totem && totem->IsTotem() ? (Totem*)totem : nullptr;
8108 }
8109 
8110 bool Unit::IsAllTotemSlotsUsed() const
8111 {
8112  for (auto i : m_TotemSlot)
8113  if (!i)
8114  return false;
8115  return true;
8116 }
8117 
8118 void Unit::_AddTotem(TotemSlot slot, Totem* totem)
8119 {
8120  m_TotemSlot[slot] = totem->GetObjectGuid();
8121 }
8122 
8123 void Unit::_RemoveTotem(Totem* totem)
8124 {
8125  for (auto& i : m_TotemSlot)
8126  {
8127  if (i == totem->GetObjectGuid())
8128  {
8129  i.Clear();
8130  break;
8131  }
8132  }
8133 }
8134 
8135 void Unit::UnsummonAllTotems() const
8136 {
8137  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_TOTEM_SLOT; ++i)
8138  if (Totem* totem = GetTotem(TotemSlot(i)))
8139  totem->UnSummon();
8140 }
8141 
8142 int32 Unit::DealHeal(Unit* pVictim, uint32 addhealth, SpellEntry const* spellProto, bool critical, uint32 absorb)
8143 {
8144  int32 gain = pVictim->ModifyHealth(int32(addhealth));
8145 
8146  Unit* unit = this;
8147 
8148  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((Creature*)this)->IsTotem() && ((Totem*)this)->GetTotemType() != TOTEM_STATUE)
8149  unit = GetOwner();
8150 
8151  // overheal = addhealth - gain
8152  unit->SendHealSpellLog(pVictim, spellProto->Id, addhealth, addhealth - gain, critical, absorb);
8153 
8154  if (unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8155  {
8156  if (BattleGround* bg = ((Player*)unit)->GetBattleGround())
8157  bg->UpdatePlayerScore((Player*)unit, SCORE_HEALING_DONE, gain);
8158 
8159  // use the actual gain, as the overheal shall not be counted, skip gain 0 (it ignored anyway in to criteria)
8160  if (gain)
8161  ((Player*)unit)->GetAchievementMgr().UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HEALING_DONE, gain, 0, pVictim);
8162 
8163  ((Player*)unit)->GetAchievementMgr().UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_HEAL_CASTED, addhealth);
8164  }
8165 
8166  if (pVictim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8167  {
8168  ((Player*)pVictim)->GetAchievementMgr().UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_TOTAL_HEALING_RECEIVED, gain);
8169  ((Player*)pVictim)->GetAchievementMgr().UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_HIGHEST_HEALING_RECEIVED, addhealth);
8170  }
8171 
8172  // Script Event HealedBy
8173  if (pVictim->AI())
8174  pVictim->AI()->HealedBy(this, addhealth);
8175 
8176  return gain;
8177 }
8178 
8179 Unit* Unit::SelectMagnetTarget(Unit* victim, Spell* spell)
8180 {
8181  if (!victim)
8182  return nullptr;
8183 
8184  // Magic case
8185  if (spell && spell->m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC)
8186  {
8187  if (spell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_IS_ABILITY) || spell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_NO_REDIRECTION) || spell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_NO_IMMUNITIES))
8188  return nullptr;
8189 
8190  Unit::AuraList const& magnetAuras = victim->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_SPELL_MAGNET);
8191  for (auto magnetAura : magnetAuras)
8192  {
8193  if (Unit* magnet = magnetAura->GetCaster())
8194  {
8195  if (magnet->IsAlive() && CanAttack(magnet))
8196  {
8197  magnetAura->UseMagnet();
8198  return magnet;
8199  }
8200  }
8201  }
8202  }
8203  // Melee && ranged case
8204  else
8205  {
8206  if (spell && spell->m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_NO_REDIRECTION))
8207  return nullptr;
8208 
8209  AuraList const& hitTriggerAuras = victim->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_ADD_CASTER_HIT_TRIGGER);
8210  for (auto hitTriggerAura : hitTriggerAuras)
8211  {
8212  if (Unit* magnet = hitTriggerAura->GetCaster())
8213  {
8214  if (magnet->IsAlive() && CanAttack(magnet))
8215  {
8216  if (roll_chance_i(hitTriggerAura->GetModifier()->m_amount))
8217  {
8218  if (SpellAuraHolder* holder = hitTriggerAura->GetHolder())
8219  if (holder->DropAuraCharge())
8220  victim->RemoveSpellAuraHolder(holder);
8221  return magnet;
8222  }
8223  }
8224  }
8225  }
8226  }
8227 
8228  // No magnet Target found
8229  return nullptr;
8230 }
8231 
8232 void Unit::SendHealSpellLog(Unit* pVictim, uint32 SpellID, uint32 Damage, uint32 OverHeal, bool critical, uint32 absorb) const
8233 {
8234  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELLHEALLOG, (8 + 8 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 1 + 1));
8235  data << pVictim->GetPackGUID();
8236  data << GetPackGUID();
8237  data << uint32(SpellID);
8238  data << uint32(Damage);
8239  data << uint32(OverHeal);
8240  data << uint32(absorb);
8241  data << uint8(critical ? 1 : 0);
8242  data << uint8(0); // unused in client?
8243  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
8244 }
8245 
8246 void Unit::SendEnergizeSpellLog(Unit* pVictim, uint32 SpellID, uint32 Damage, Powers powertype) const
8247 {
8248  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELLENERGIZELOG, (8 + 8 + 4 + 4 + 4));
8249  data << pVictim->GetPackGUID();
8250  data << GetPackGUID();
8251  data << uint32(SpellID);
8252  data << uint32(powertype);
8253  data << uint32(Damage);
8254  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
8255 }
8256 
8257 void Unit::SendEnvironmentalDamageLog(uint8 type, uint32 damage, uint32 absorb, int32 resist) const
8258 {
8259  WorldPacket data(SMSG_ENVIRONMENTALDAMAGELOG, (8 + 1 + 4 + 4 + 4));
8260  data << GetObjectGuid();
8261  data << uint8(type != DAMAGE_FALL_TO_VOID ? type : DAMAGE_FALL);
8262  data << uint32(damage);
8263  data << uint32(absorb);
8264  data << int32(resist);
8265  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
8266 }
8267 
8268 void Unit::EnergizeBySpell(Unit* victim, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, uint32 damage, Powers powerType, bool sendLog)
8269 {
8270  if (sendLog)
8271  SendEnergizeSpellLog(victim, spellInfo->Id, damage, powerType);
8272  // needs to be called after sending spell log
8273  victim->ModifyPower(powerType, damage);
8274  victim->getHostileRefManager().threatAssist(this, float(damage) * 0.5f * sSpellMgr.GetSpellThreatMultiplier(spellInfo), spellInfo);
8275 }
8276 
8288 int32 Unit::SpellBonusWithCoeffs(SpellEntry const* spellProto, int32 total, int32 benefit, int32 ap_benefit, DamageEffectType damagetype, bool donePart, float defCoeffMod)
8289 {
8290  // Distribute Damage over multiple effects, reduce by AoE
8291  float coeff = 1.0f;
8292 
8293  // Not apply this to creature casted spells
8294  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !((Creature*)this)->IsPet())
8295  coeff = 1.0f;
8296  // Check for table values
8297  else if (SpellBonusEntry const* bonus = sSpellMgr.GetSpellBonusData(spellProto->Id))
8298  {
8299  coeff = damagetype == DOT ? bonus->dot_damage : bonus->direct_damage;
8300 
8301  // apply ap bonus at done part calculation only (it flat total mod so common with taken)
8302  if (donePart && (bonus->ap_bonus || bonus->ap_dot_bonus))
8303  {
8304  float ap_bonus = damagetype == DOT ? bonus->ap_dot_bonus : bonus->ap_bonus;
8305 
8306  // Impurity
8307  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && spellProto->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT)
8308  {
8309  if (SpellEntry const* spell = ((Player*)this)->GetKnownTalentRankById(2005))
8310  ap_bonus += ((spell->CalculateSimpleValue(EFFECT_INDEX_0) * ap_bonus) / 100.0f);
8311  }
8312 
8313  total += int32(ap_bonus * (GetTotalAttackPowerValue(IsSpellRequiresRangedAP(spellProto) ? RANGED_ATTACK : BASE_ATTACK) + ap_benefit));
8314  }
8315  }
8316  // Default calculation
8317  else if (benefit)
8318  coeff = CalculateDefaultCoefficient(spellProto, damagetype) * defCoeffMod;
8319 
8320  if (benefit)
8321  {
8322  float LvlPenalty = CalculateLevelPenalty(spellProto);
8323 
8324  // Spellmod SpellDamage
8325  if (coeff) // If something has 0 coeff to begin with, do not add spellmod
8326  {
8327  if (Player* modOwner = GetSpellModOwner()) // Spellmod SpellDamage
8328  {
8329  coeff *= 100.0f;
8330  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spellProto->Id, SPELLMOD_SPELL_BONUS_DAMAGE, coeff);
8331  coeff /= 100.0f;
8332  }
8333  }
8334 
8335  total += int32(benefit * coeff * LvlPenalty);
8336  }
8337 
8338  return total;
8339 };
8340 
8345 uint32 Unit::SpellDamageBonusDone(Unit* victim, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask, SpellEntry const* spellProto, uint32 pdamage, DamageEffectType damagetype, uint32 stack)
8346 {
8347  if (!spellProto || !victim || damagetype == DIRECT_DAMAGE)
8348  return pdamage;
8349 
8350  // Some spells don't benefit from done mods
8351  if (spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_IGNORE_CASTER_MODIFIERS))
8352  return pdamage;
8353 
8354  // For totems get damage bonus from owner (statue isn't totem in fact)
8355  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((Creature*)this)->IsTotem() && ((Totem*)this)->GetTotemType() != TOTEM_STATUE)
8356  {
8357  if (Unit* owner = GetOwner())
8358  return owner->SpellDamageBonusDone(victim, schoolMask, spellProto, pdamage, damagetype);
8359  }
8360 
8361  uint32 creatureTypeMask = victim->GetCreatureTypeMask();
8362  float DoneTotalMod = 1.0f;
8363  int32 DoneTotal = 0;
8364 
8365  // Add flat bonus from spell damage versus
8366  DoneTotal += GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLAT_SPELL_DAMAGE_VERSUS, creatureTypeMask);
8367 
8368  // Add flat bonus from spell damage creature
8369  DoneTotal += GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE_CREATURE, creatureTypeMask);
8370 
8371  if (spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_CASTER_DAMAGE_MODIFIERS))
8372  {
8373  // Creature damage
8374  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !((Creature*)this)->IsPet())
8375  DoneTotalMod *= Creature::_GetSpellDamageMod(((Creature*)this)->GetCreatureInfo()->Rank);
8376 
8377  AuraList const& mModDamagePercentDone = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_PERCENT_DONE);
8378  for (auto i : mModDamagePercentDone)
8379  {
8380  if ((i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & schoolMask) &&
8381  i->GetSpellProto()->EquippedItemClass == -1 &&
8382  // -1 == any item class (not wand then)
8383  i->GetSpellProto()->EquippedItemInventoryTypeMask == 0)
8384  // 0 == any inventory type (not wand then)
8385  {
8386  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8387  }
8388  }
8389 
8390  // Add pct bonus from spell damage versus
8391  DoneTotalMod *= GetTotalAuraMultiplierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE_VERSUS, creatureTypeMask);
8392 
8393  // Add pct bonus from spell damage versus aura state
8394  AuraList const& mDamageDoneVersusAuraState = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DAMAGE_DONE_VERSUS_AURA_STATE_PCT);
8395  for (auto i : mDamageDoneVersusAuraState)
8396  {
8397  if (victim->HasAuraState(AuraState(i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue)))
8398  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8399  }
8400  }
8401 
8402  // done scripted mod (take it from owner)
8403  Unit* owner = GetOwner();
8404  if (!owner)
8405  owner = this;
8406 
8407  // Done fixed damage bonus auras
8408  int32 DoneAdvertisedBenefit = SpellBaseDamageBonusDone(schoolMask);
8409 
8410  for (auto i : GetScriptedLocationAuras(SCRIPT_LOCATION_SPELL_DAMAGE_DONE))
8411  {
8412  if (!i->isAffectedOnSpell(spellProto))
8413  continue;
8414  i->OnDamageCalculate(victim, DoneAdvertisedBenefit, DoneTotalMod);
8415  }
8416 
8417  AuraList const& mOverrideClassScript = owner->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_OVERRIDE_CLASS_SCRIPTS);
8418  for (auto i : mOverrideClassScript)
8419  {
8420  if (!i->isAffectedOnSpell(spellProto))
8421  continue;
8422  switch (i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue)
8423  {
8424  case 4920: // Molten Fury
8425  case 4919:
8426  case 6917: // Death's Embrace
8427  case 6926:
8428  case 6928:
8429  {
8430  if (victim->HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_HEALTHLESS_20_PERCENT))
8431  DoneTotalMod *= (100.0f + i->GetModifier()->m_amount) / 100.0f;
8432  break;
8433  }
8434  // Soul Siphon
8435  case 4992:
8436  case 4993:
8437  {
8438  // effect 1 m_amount
8439  int32 maxPercent = i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
8440  // effect 0 m_amount
8441  int32 stepPercent = CalculateSpellEffectValue(this, i->GetSpellProto(), EFFECT_INDEX_0);
8442  // count affliction effects and calc additional damage in percentage
8443  int32 modPercent = 0;
8444  SpellAuraHolderMap const& victimAuras = victim->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
8445  for (const auto& victimAura : victimAuras)
8446  {
8447  SpellEntry const* m_spell = victimAura.second->GetSpellProto();
8448  if (m_spell->SpellFamilyName != SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK || !(m_spell->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0004071B8044C402)))
8449  continue;
8450  modPercent += stepPercent * victimAura.second->GetStackAmount();
8451  if (modPercent >= maxPercent)
8452  {
8453  modPercent = maxPercent;
8454  break;
8455  }
8456  }
8457  DoneTotalMod *= (modPercent + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8458  break;
8459  }
8460  case 6916: // Death's Embrace
8461  case 6925:
8462  case 6927:
8463  if (HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_HEALTHLESS_20_PERCENT))
8464  DoneTotalMod *= (100.0f + i->GetModifier()->m_amount) / 100.0f;
8465  break;
8466  case 5481: // Starfire Bonus
8467  {
8468  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, uint64(0x0000000000200002)))
8469  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8470  break;
8471  }
8472  // Subject to downranking, i.e. normal per spell spelldamage
8473  case 4418: // Increased Shock Damage
8474  case 4554: // Increased Lightning Damage
8475  case 4555: // Improved Moonfire
8476  case 5142: // Increased Lightning Damage
8477  case 5147: // Improved Consecration / Libram of Resurgence
8478  case 5148: // Idol of the Shooting Star
8479  case 6008: // Increased Lightning Damage
8480  case 8627: // Totem of Hex
8481  {
8482  DoneAdvertisedBenefit += i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
8483  break;
8484  }
8485  // Tundra Stalker
8486  // Merciless Combat
8487  case 7277:
8488  {
8489  // Merciless Combat
8490  if (i->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2656)
8491  {
8492  if (victim->HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_HEALTHLESS_35_PERCENT))
8493  DoneTotalMod *= (100.0f + i->GetModifier()->m_amount) / 100.0f;
8494  }
8495  else // Tundra Stalker
8496  {
8497  // Frost Fever (target debuff)
8498  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MELEE_HASTE, SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT, uint64(0x0000000000000000), 0x00000002))
8499  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8500  break;
8501  }
8502  break;
8503  }
8504  case 7293: // Rage of Rivendare
8505  {
8506  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT, uint64(0x0200000000000000)))
8507  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8508  break;
8509  }
8510  // Twisted Faith
8511  case 7377:
8512  {
8513  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST, uint64(0x0000000000008000), 0, GetObjectGuid()))
8514  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8515  break;
8516  }
8517  // Marked for Death
8518  case 7598:
8519  case 7599:
8520  case 7600:
8521  case 7601:
8522  case 7602:
8523  {
8524  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STALKED, SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER, uint64(0x0000000000000400)))
8525  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8526  break;
8527  }
8528  }
8529  }
8530 
8531  // Custom scripted damage
8532  switch (spellProto->SpellFamilyName)
8533  {
8534  case SPELLFAMILY_MAGE:
8535  {
8536  // Ice Lance
8537  if (spellProto->SpellIconID == 186)
8538  {
8539  if (victim->isFrozen() || IsIgnoreUnitState(spellProto, IGNORE_UNIT_TARGET_NON_FROZEN))
8540  {
8541  float multiplier = 3.0f;
8542 
8543  // if target have higher level
8544  if (victim->GetLevel() > GetLevel())
8545  // Glyph of Ice Lance
8546  if (Aura* glyph = GetDummyAura(56377))
8547  multiplier = glyph->GetModifier()->m_amount;
8548 
8549  DoneTotalMod *= multiplier;
8550  }
8551  }
8552  // Torment the weak affected (Arcane Barrage, Arcane Blast, Frostfire Bolt, Arcane Missiles, Fireball)
8553  if ((spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000900020200021)) &&
8554  (victim->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED) || victim->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_HASTE_ALL)))
8555  {
8556  // Search for Torment the weak dummy aura
8557  Unit::AuraList const& ttw = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
8558  for (auto i : ttw)
8559  {
8560  if (i->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 3263)
8561  {
8562  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8563  break;
8564  }
8565  }
8566  }
8567  break;
8568  }
8569  case SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK:
8570  {
8571  // Drain Soul
8572  if (spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000004000))
8573  {
8574  if (victim->GetHealth() * 100 / victim->GetMaxHealth() <= 25)
8575  DoneTotalMod *= 4;
8576  }
8577  break;
8578  }
8579  case SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST:
8580  {
8581  // Smite
8582  if (spellProto->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x0000000000000080)))
8583  {
8584  // Holy Fire
8585  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST, uint64(0x00100000)))
8586  // Glyph of Smite
8587  if (Aura* aur = GetAura(55692, EFFECT_INDEX_0))
8588  DoneTotalMod *= (aur->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8589  }
8590  // Shadow word: Death
8591  else if (spellProto->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x0000000200000000)))
8592  {
8593  // Glyph of Shadow word: Death
8594  if (SpellAuraHolder const* glyph = GetSpellAuraHolder(55682))
8595  {
8596  Aura const* hpPct = glyph->GetAuraByEffectIndex(EFFECT_INDEX_0);
8597  Aura const* dmPct = glyph->GetAuraByEffectIndex(EFFECT_INDEX_1);
8598  if (hpPct && dmPct && victim->GetHealth() * 100 <= victim->GetMaxHealth() * hpPct->GetModifier()->m_amount)
8599  DoneTotalMod *= (dmPct->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8600  }
8601  }
8602  break;
8603  }
8604  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
8605  {
8606  // Improved Insect Swarm (Wrath part)
8607  if (spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000001))
8608  {
8609  // if Insect Swarm on target
8610  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, uint64(0x000000000200000), 0, GetObjectGuid()))
8611  {
8612  Unit::AuraList const& improvedSwarm = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
8613  for (auto iter : improvedSwarm)
8614  {
8615  if (iter->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 1771)
8616  {
8617  DoneTotalMod *= (iter->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8618  break;
8619  }
8620  }
8621  }
8622  }
8623  break;
8624  }
8625  case SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT:
8626  {
8627  // Icy Touch and Howling Blast
8628  if (spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000200000002))
8629  {
8630  // search disease
8631  bool found = false;
8632  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap const& auras = victim->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
8633  for (const auto& aura : auras)
8634  {
8635  if (aura.second->GetSpellProto()->Dispel == DISPEL_DISEASE)
8636  {
8637  found = true;
8638  break;
8639  }
8640  }
8641  if (!found)
8642  break;
8643 
8644  // search for Glacier Rot dummy aura
8645  Unit::AuraList const& dummyAuras = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
8646  for (auto dummyAura : dummyAuras)
8647  {
