8648  if (dummyAura->GetSpellProto()->EffectMiscValue[dummyAura->GetEffIndex()] == 7244)
8649  {
8650  DoneTotalMod *= (dummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8651  break;
8652  }
8653  }
8654  }
8655  // Death Coil (bonus from Item - Death Knight T8 DPS Relic)
8656  else if (spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x00002000))
8657  {
8658  if (Aura* sigil = GetDummyAura(64962))
8659  DoneTotal += sigil->GetModifier()->m_amount;
8660  }
8661  break;
8662  }
8663  default:
8664  break;
8665  }
8666 
8667  // apply ap bonus and benefit affected by spell power implicit coeffs and spell level penalties
8668  DoneTotal = SpellBonusWithCoeffs(spellProto, DoneTotal, DoneAdvertisedBenefit, 0, damagetype, true);
8669 
8670  if (spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_CASTER_DAMAGE_MODIFIERS))
8671  DoneTotalMod = 1.f; // reset it
8672 
8673  float tmpDamage = (int32(pdamage) + DoneTotal * int32(stack)) * DoneTotalMod;
8674  // apply spellmod to Done damage (flat and pct)
8675  if (Player* modOwner = GetSpellModOwner())
8676  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spellProto->Id, damagetype == DOT ? SPELLMOD_DOT : SPELLMOD_DAMAGE, tmpDamage);
8677 
8678  return tmpDamage > 0 ? uint32(tmpDamage) : 0;
8679 }
8680 
8685 uint32 Unit::SpellDamageBonusTaken(Unit* caster, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask, SpellEntry const* spellProto, uint32 pdamage, DamageEffectType damagetype, uint32 stack)
8686 {
8687  if (!spellProto || damagetype == DIRECT_DAMAGE || spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_IGNORE_DAMAGE_TAKEN_MODIFIERS))
8688  return pdamage;
8689 
8690  // Taken total percent damage auras
8691  float TakenTotalMod = 1.0f;
8692  int32 TakenTotal = 0;
8693 
8694  // ..taken
8695  TakenTotalMod *= GetTotalAuraMultiplierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_PERCENT_TAKEN, schoolMask);
8696 
8697  // .. taken pct: dummy auras
8698  AuraList const& mDummyAuras = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
8699  for (auto mDummyAura : mDummyAuras)
8700  {
8701  switch (mDummyAura->GetId())
8702  {
8703  case 45182: // Cheating Death
8704  if (mDummyAura->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL)
8705  {
8706  if (GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
8707  continue;
8708 
8709  float mod = ((Player*)this)->GetRatingBonusValue(CR_CRIT_TAKEN_MELEE) * (-8.0f);
8710  if (mod < float(mDummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount))
8711  mod = float(mDummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount);
8712 
8713  TakenTotalMod *= (mod + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8714  }
8715  break;
8716  case 20911: // Blessing of Sanctuary
8717  case 25899: // Greater Blessing of Sanctuary
8718  TakenTotalMod *= (mDummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8719  break;
8720  case 47580: // Pain and Suffering (Rank 1) TODO: can be pct modifier aura
8721  case 47581: // Pain and Suffering (Rank 2)
8722  case 47582: // Pain and Suffering (Rank 3)
8723  // Shadow Word: Death
8724  if (spellProto->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x0000000200000000)))
8725  TakenTotalMod *= (mDummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8726  break;
8727  }
8728  }
8729 
8730  // From caster spells
8731  AuraList const& mOwnerTaken = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_FROM_CASTER);
8732  for (auto i : mOwnerTaken)
8733  {
8734  if (i->GetCasterGuid() == caster->GetObjectGuid() && i->isAffectedOnSpell(spellProto))
8735  TakenTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8736  }
8737 
8738  // Mod damage from spell mechanic
8739  TakenTotalMod *= GetTotalAuraMultiplierByMiscValueForMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MECHANIC_DAMAGE_TAKEN_PERCENT, GetAllSpellMechanicMask(spellProto));
8740 
8741  // Mod damage taken from AoE spells
8742  if (IsAreaOfEffectSpell(spellProto) || spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_TREAT_AS_AREA_EFFECT))
8743  {
8744  TakenTotalMod *= GetTotalAuraMultiplierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_AOE_DAMAGE_AVOIDANCE, schoolMask);
8745  if (caster && !caster->IsPlayerControlled() || spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_TREAT_AS_NPC_AOE))
8746  TakenTotalMod *= GetTotalAuraMultiplierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CREATURE_AOE_DAMAGE_AVOIDANCE, schoolMask);
8747  }
8748 
8749  // Taken fixed damage bonus auras
8750  int32 TakenAdvertisedBenefit = SpellBaseDamageBonusTaken(GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto));
8751 
8752  for (auto i : GetScriptedLocationAuras(SCRIPT_LOCATION_SPELL_DAMAGE_TAKEN))
8753  {
8754  if (!i->isAffectedOnSpell(spellProto))
8755  continue;
8756  i->OnDamageCalculate(this, TakenAdvertisedBenefit, TakenTotalMod);
8757  }
8758 
8759  // apply benefit affected by spell power implicit coeffs and spell level penalties
8760  if (caster)
8761  TakenTotal = caster->SpellBonusWithCoeffs(spellProto, TakenTotal, TakenAdvertisedBenefit, 0, damagetype, false);
8762 
8763  float tmpDamage = (int32(pdamage) + TakenTotal * int32(stack)) * TakenTotalMod;
8764 
8765  return tmpDamage > 0 ? uint32(tmpDamage) : 0;
8766 }
8767 
8768 int32 Unit::SpellBaseDamageBonusDone(SpellSchoolMask schoolMask)
8769 {
8770  int32 DoneAdvertisedBenefit = 0;
8771 
8772  // ..done
8773  AuraList const& mDamageDone = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE);
8774  for (auto i : mDamageDone)
8775  {
8776  if ((i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & schoolMask) != 0 &&
8777  i->GetSpellProto()->EquippedItemClass == -1 && // -1 == any item class (not wand then)
8778  i->GetSpellProto()->EquippedItemInventoryTypeMask == 0) // 0 == any inventory type (not wand then)
8779  DoneAdvertisedBenefit += i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
8780  }
8781 
8782  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8783  {
8784  // Base value
8785  DoneAdvertisedBenefit += ((Player*)this)->GetBaseSpellPowerBonus();
8786 
8787  // Damage bonus from stats
8788  AuraList const& mDamageDoneOfStatPercent = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SPELL_DAMAGE_OF_STAT_PERCENT);
8789  for (auto i : mDamageDoneOfStatPercent)
8790  {
8791  if (i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & schoolMask)
8792  {
8793  // stat used stored in miscValueB for this aura
8794  Stats usedStat = Stats(i->GetMiscBValue());
8795  DoneAdvertisedBenefit += int32(GetStat(usedStat) * i->GetModifier()->m_amount / 100.0f);
8796  }
8797  }
8798  // ... and attack power
8799  AuraList const& mDamageDonebyAP = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SPELL_DAMAGE_OF_ATTACK_POWER);
8800  for (auto i : mDamageDonebyAP)
8801  {
8802  if (i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & schoolMask)
8803  DoneAdvertisedBenefit += int32(GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK) * i->GetModifier()->m_amount / 100.0f);
8804  }
8805  }
8806  return DoneAdvertisedBenefit;
8807 }
8808 
8809 int32 Unit::SpellBaseDamageBonusTaken(SpellSchoolMask schoolMask) const
8810 {
8811  int32 TakenAdvertisedBenefit = 0;
8812 
8813  // ..taken
8814  AuraList const& mDamageTaken = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_TAKEN);
8815  for (auto i : mDamageTaken)
8816  {
8817  if ((i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & schoolMask) != 0)
8818  TakenAdvertisedBenefit += i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
8819  }
8820 
8821  return TakenAdvertisedBenefit;
8822 }
8823 
8828 uint32 Unit::SpellHealingBonusDone(Unit* victim, SpellEntry const* spellProto, int32 healamount, DamageEffectType damagetype, uint32 stack)
8829 {
8830  // Some spells don't benefit from done mods
8831  if (spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_IGNORE_CASTER_MODIFIERS) || spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_HEALING_MODIFIERS))
8832  return healamount;
8833 
8834  // For totems get healing bonus from owner (statue isn't totem in fact)
8835  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((Creature*)this)->IsTotem() && ((Totem*)this)->GetTotemType() != TOTEM_STATUE)
8836  if (Unit* owner = GetOwner())
8837  return owner->SpellHealingBonusDone(victim, spellProto, healamount, damagetype, stack);
8838 
8839  // No heal amount for this class spells
8840  if (spellProto->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE)
8841  return healamount < 0 ? 0 : healamount;
8842 
8843  // Healing Done
8844  // Done total percent damage auras
8845  float DoneTotalMod = 1.0f;
8846  int32 DoneTotal = 0;
8847 
8848  // Healing done percent
8849  AuraList const& mHealingDonePct = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALING_DONE_PERCENT);
8850  for (auto i : mHealingDonePct)
8851  DoneTotalMod *= (100.0f + i->GetModifier()->m_amount) / 100.0f;
8852 
8853  // Done fixed damage bonus auras
8854  int32 DoneAdvertisedBenefit = SpellBaseHealingBonusDone(GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto));
8855 
8856  // done scripted mod (take it from owner)
8857  Unit* owner = GetOwner();
8858  if (!owner) owner = this;
8859 
8860  AuraList const& mOverrideClassScript = owner->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_OVERRIDE_CLASS_SCRIPTS);
8861  for (auto i : mOverrideClassScript)
8862  {
8863  if (!i->isAffectedOnSpell(spellProto))
8864  continue;
8865  switch (i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue)
8866  {
8867  case 4415: // Increased Rejuvenation Healing
8868  case 4953:
8869  case 3736: // Hateful Totem of the Third Wind / Increased Lesser Healing Wave / LK Arena (4/5/6) Totem of the Third Wind / Savage Totem of the Third Wind
8870  DoneAdvertisedBenefit += i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
8871  break;
8872  case 7997: // Renewed Hope
8873  case 7998:
8874  if (victim->HasAura(6788))
8875  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8876  break;
8877  case 21: // Test of Faith
8878  case 6935:
8879  case 6918:
8880  if (victim->GetHealth() < victim->GetMaxHealth() / 2)
8881  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8882  break;
8883  case 7798: // Glyph of Regrowth
8884  {
8885  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL, SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, uint64(0x0000000000000040)))
8886  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8887  break;
8888  }
8889  case 8477: // Nourish Heal Boost
8890  {
8891  int32 stepPercent = i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
8892 
8893  int ownHotCount = 0; // counted HoT types amount, not stacks
8894 
8895  Unit::AuraList const& RejorRegr = victim->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL);
8896  for (auto itr : RejorRegr)
8897  if (itr->GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DRUID &&
8898  itr->GetCasterGuid() == GetObjectGuid())
8899  ++ownHotCount;
8900 
8901  if (ownHotCount)
8902  DoneTotalMod *= (stepPercent * ownHotCount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8903  break;
8904  }
8905  case 7871: // Glyph of Lesser Healing Wave
8906  {
8907  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY, SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN, uint64(0x0000040000000000), 0, GetObjectGuid()))
8908  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8909  break;
8910  }
8911  default:
8912  break;
8913  }
8914  }
8915 
8916  if (spellProto->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DRUID)
8917  {
8918  // Nourish 20% of heal increase if target is affected by Druids HOTs
8919  if (spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0200000000000000))
8920  {
8921  int ownHotCount = 0; // counted HoT types amount, not stacks
8922  Unit::AuraList const& RejorRegr = victim->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL);
8923  for (auto i : RejorRegr)
8924  if (i->GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DRUID &&
8925  i->GetCasterGuid() == GetObjectGuid())
8926  ++ownHotCount;
8927 
8928  if (ownHotCount)
8929  {
8930  DoneTotalMod *= 1.2f; // base bonus at HoTs
8931 
8932  if (Aura* glyph = GetAura(62971, EFFECT_INDEX_0))// Glyph of Nourish
8933  DoneTotalMod *= (glyph->GetModifier()->m_amount * ownHotCount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
8934  }
8935  }
8936  }
8937 
8938  AuraList const& auraDummy = owner->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
8939  for (auto i : auraDummy)
8940  {
8941  if (!i->isAffectedOnSpell(spellProto))
8942  continue;
8943  switch (i->GetSpellProto()->Id)
8944  {
8945  case 28851: // Flash of Light - need to create generic container for this and the above
8946  case 28853:
8947  case 32403:
8948  case 34246: // Lifebloom
8949  case 60779: // Idol of Lush Moss
8950  DoneAdvertisedBenefit += i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
8951  break;
8952  }
8953  }
8954 
8955  for (auto i : GetScriptedLocationAuras(SCRIPT_LOCATION_SPELL_HEALING_DONE))
8956  {
8957  if (!i->isAffectedOnSpell(spellProto))
8958  continue;
8959  i->OnDamageCalculate(victim, DoneAdvertisedBenefit, DoneTotalMod);
8960  }
8961 
8962  // apply ap bonus and benefit affected by spell power implicit coeffs and spell level penalties
8963  DoneTotal = SpellBonusWithCoeffs(spellProto, DoneTotal, DoneAdvertisedBenefit, 0, damagetype, true, SCALE_SPELLPOWER_HEALING);
8964 
8965  // use float as more appropriate for negative values and percent applying
8966  float heal = (healamount + DoneTotal * int32(stack)) * DoneTotalMod;
8967  // apply spellmod to Done amount
8968  if (Player* modOwner = GetSpellModOwner())
8969  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spellProto->Id, damagetype == DOT ? SPELLMOD_DOT : SPELLMOD_DAMAGE, heal);
8970 
8971  return heal < 0 ? 0 : uint32(heal);
8972 }
8973 
8978 uint32 Unit::SpellHealingBonusTaken(Unit* pCaster, SpellEntry const* spellProto, int32 healamount, DamageEffectType damagetype, uint32 stack)
8979 {
8980  if (spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_HEALING_MODIFIERS))
8981  return healamount;
8982 
8983  float TakenTotalMod = 1.0f;
8984 
8985  // Healing taken percent
8986  float minval = float(GetMaxNegativeAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALING_PCT));
8987  if (damagetype == DOT)
8988  {
8989  // overwrite max SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALING_PCT if greater negative effect
8990  float minDotVal = float(GetMaxNegativeAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_PERIODIC_HEAL));
8991  minval = (minDotVal < minval) ? minDotVal : minval;
8992  }
8993  if (minval)
8994  TakenTotalMod *= (100.0f + minval) / 100.0f;
8995 
8996  float maxval = float(GetMaxPositiveAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALING_PCT));
8997  // no SPELL_AURA_MOD_PERIODIC_HEAL positive cases
8998  if (maxval)
8999  TakenTotalMod *= (100.0f + maxval) / 100.0f;
9000 
9001  // No heal amount for this class spells
9002  if (spellProto->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE)
9003  {
9004  healamount = int32(healamount * TakenTotalMod);
9005  return healamount < 0 ? 0 : healamount;
9006  }
9007 
9008  // Healing Done
9009  // Done total percent damage auras
9010  int32 TakenTotal = 0;
9011 
9012  // Taken fixed damage bonus auras
9013  int32 TakenAdvertisedBenefit = SpellBaseHealingBonusTaken(GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto));
9014 
9015  // Blessing of Light dummy affects healing taken from Holy Light and Flash of Light
9016  if (spellProto->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN && (spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x00000000C0000000)))
9017  {
9018  AuraList const& auraDummy = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
9019  for (auto i : auraDummy)
9020  {
9021  if (i->GetSpellProto()->SpellVisual[0] == 9180)
9022  {
9023  if (((spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000040000000)) && i->GetEffIndex() == EFFECT_INDEX_1) || // Flash of Light
9024  ((spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000080000000)) && i->GetEffIndex() == EFFECT_INDEX_0)) // Holy Light
9025  {
9026  TakenAdvertisedBenefit += (i->GetModifier()->m_amount); // BoL is penalized since 2.3.0
9027  // Note: This forces the caster to keep libram equipped, but works regardless if the BOL is his or not
9028  if (Aura* aura = pCaster->GetAura(38320, EFFECT_INDEX_0)) // improved Blessing of light
9029  {
9030  if (i->GetEffIndex() == EFFECT_INDEX_0)
9031  TakenAdvertisedBenefit += aura->GetModifier()->m_amount; // holy light gets full amount
9032  else
9033  TakenAdvertisedBenefit += (aura->GetModifier()->m_amount / 2); // flash of light gets half
9034  }
9035  }
9036  }
9037  }
9038  }
9039 
9040  AuraList const& mHealingGet = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALING_RECEIVED);
9041  for (auto i : mHealingGet)
9042  if (i->isAffectedOnSpell(spellProto))
9043  TakenTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
9044 
9045  for (auto i : GetScriptedLocationAuras(SCRIPT_LOCATION_SPELL_HEALING_TAKEN))
9046  {
9047  if (!i->isAffectedOnSpell(spellProto))
9048  continue;
9049  i->OnDamageCalculate(this, TakenAdvertisedBenefit, TakenTotalMod);
9050  }
9051 
9052  // apply benefit affected by spell power implicit coeffs and spell level penalties
9053  TakenTotal = pCaster->SpellBonusWithCoeffs(spellProto, TakenTotal, TakenAdvertisedBenefit, 0, damagetype, false, SCALE_SPELLPOWER_HEALING);
9054 
9055  // use float as more appropriate for negative values and percent applying
9056  float heal = (healamount + TakenTotal * int32(stack)) * TakenTotalMod;
9057 
9058  return heal < 0 ? 0 : uint32(heal);
9059 }
9060 
9061 int32 Unit::SpellBaseHealingBonusDone(SpellSchoolMask schoolMask)
9062 {
9063  int32 AdvertisedBenefit = 0;
9064 
9065  AuraList const& mHealingDone = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALING_DONE);
9066  for (auto i : mHealingDone)
9067  if ((i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & schoolMask) != 0)
9068  AdvertisedBenefit += i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
9069 
9070  // Healing bonus of spirit, intellect and strength
9071  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
9072  {
9073  // Base value
9074  AdvertisedBenefit += ((Player*)this)->GetBaseSpellPowerBonus();
9075 
9076  // Healing bonus from stats
9077  AuraList const& mHealingDoneOfStatPercent = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SPELL_HEALING_OF_STAT_PERCENT);
9078  for (auto i : mHealingDoneOfStatPercent)
9079  {
9080  // stat used dependent from misc value (stat index)
9081  Stats usedStat = Stats(i->GetSpellProto()->EffectMiscValue[i->GetEffIndex()]);
9082  AdvertisedBenefit += int32(GetStat(usedStat) * i->GetModifier()->m_amount / 100.0f);
9083  }
9084 
9085  // ... and attack power
9086  AuraList const& mHealingDonebyAP = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SPELL_HEALING_OF_ATTACK_POWER);
9087  for (auto i : mHealingDonebyAP)
9088  if (i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & schoolMask)
9089  AdvertisedBenefit += int32(GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK) * i->GetModifier()->m_amount / 100.0f);
9090  }
9091  return AdvertisedBenefit;
9092 }
9093 
9094 int32 Unit::SpellBaseHealingBonusTaken(SpellSchoolMask schoolMask) const
9095 {
9096  int32 AdvertisedBenefit = 0;
9097  AuraList const& mDamageTaken = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALING);
9098  for (auto i : mDamageTaken)
9099  if (i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & schoolMask)
9100  AdvertisedBenefit += i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
9101 
9102  return AdvertisedBenefit;
9103 }
9104 
9105 bool Unit::IsImmuneToDamage(SpellSchoolMask shoolMask)
9106 {
9107  // If m_immuneToSchool type contain this school type, IMMUNE damage.
9108  SpellImmuneList const& schoolList = m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_SCHOOL];
9109  for (auto itr : schoolList)
9110  if (itr.type & shoolMask)
9111  return true;
9112 
9113  // If m_immuneToDamage type contain magic, IMMUNE damage.
9114  SpellImmuneList const& damageList = m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_DAMAGE];
9115  for (auto itr : damageList)
9116  if (itr.type & shoolMask)
9117  return true;
9118 
9119  return false;
9120 }
9121 
9122 bool Unit::IsImmuneToSpell(SpellEntry const* spellInfo, bool /*castOnSelf*/, uint8 effectMask, WorldObject const* caster)
9123 {
9124  if (!spellInfo)
9125  return false;
9126 
9127  // TODO add spellEffect immunity checks!, player with flag in bg is immune to immunity buffs from other friendly players!
9128  // SpellImmuneList const& dispelList = m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_EFFECT];
9129 
9130  SpellImmuneList const& dispelList = m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_DISPEL];
9131  for (auto itr : dispelList)
9132  if (itr.type == spellInfo->Dispel)
9133  return true;
9134 
9135  {
9136  bool isPositive = IsPositiveEffectMask(spellInfo, effectMask, caster, this);
9137  if (IsAuraApplyEffects(spellInfo, SpellEffectIndexMask(effectMask)))
9138  {
9139  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_AURA_IS_DEBUFF))
9140  isPositive = false;
9141  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_AURA_IS_BUFF))
9142  isPositive = true;
9143  }
9144  SpellImmuneList const& schoolList = m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_SCHOOL];
9145  for (auto itr : schoolList)
9146  if ((itr.type & GetSpellSchoolMask(spellInfo)) && !(itr.aura && itr.aura->IsPositive() && isPositive) && !CanPierceImmuneAura(spellInfo, itr.aura ? itr.aura->GetSpellProto() : nullptr, effectMask, itr.aura ? itr.aura->GetEffIndex() : EFFECT_INDEX_0))
9147  return true;
9148  }
9149 
9150  if (uint32 mechanic = spellInfo->Mechanic)
9151  {
9152  SpellImmuneList const& mechanicList = m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_MECHANIC];
9153  for (auto itr : mechanicList)
9154  if (itr.type == mechanic)
9155  return true;
9156 
9157  AuraList const& immuneAuraApply = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MECHANIC_IMMUNITY_MASK);
9158  for (auto iter : immuneAuraApply)
9159  if (iter->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & (1 << (mechanic - 1)))
9160  return true;
9161  }
9162 
9163  return false;
9164 }
9165 
9166 bool Unit::IsImmuneToSpellEffect(SpellEntry const* spellInfo, SpellEffectIndex index, bool /*castOnSelf*/) const
9167 {
9168  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_NO_IMMUNITIES))
9169  return false;
9170 
9171  // If m_immuneToEffect type contain this effect type, IMMUNE effect.
9172  uint32 effect = spellInfo->Effect[index];
9173  SpellImmuneList const& effectList = m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_EFFECT];
9174  for (auto itr : effectList)
9175  if (itr.type == effect)
9176  return true;
9177 
9178  if (uint32 mechanic = spellInfo->EffectMechanic[index])
9179  {
9180  SpellImmuneList const& mechanicList = m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_MECHANIC];
9181  for (auto itr : mechanicList)
9182  if (itr.type == mechanic)
9183  return true;
9184 
9185  AuraList const& immuneAuraApply = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MECHANIC_IMMUNITY_MASK);
9186  for (auto iter : immuneAuraApply)
9187  if (iter->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & (1 << (mechanic - 1)))
9188  return true;
9189  }
9190 
9191  if (uint32 aura = spellInfo->EffectApplyAuraName[index])
9192  {
9193  SpellImmuneList const& list = m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_STATE];
9194  for (auto itr : list)
9195  if (itr.type == aura)
9196  return true;
9197 
9198  // Check for immune to application of harmful magical effects
9199  AuraList const& immuneAuraApply = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_IMMUNE_AURA_APPLY_SCHOOL);
9200  if (!immuneAuraApply.empty() &&
9201  spellInfo->Dispel == DISPEL_MAGIC && // Magic debuff)
9202  !IsPositiveEffect(spellInfo, index)) // Harmful
9203  {
9204  // Check school
9205  SpellSchoolMask schoolMask = GetSpellSchoolMask(spellInfo);
9206  for (auto iter : immuneAuraApply)
9207  if (iter->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & schoolMask)
9208  return true;
9209  }
9210  }
9211 
9212  return false;
9213 }
9214 
9215 bool Unit::IsImmuneToSchool(SpellEntry const* spellInfo, uint8 effectMask) const
9216 {
9217  SpellImmuneList const& schoolList = m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_SCHOOL];
9218  for (auto itr : schoolList)
9219  {
9220  if (itr.aura && itr.aura->GetSpellProto() == spellInfo) // do not let itself immune out - fixes 39872 - Tidal Shield
9221  continue;
9222 
9223  if ((itr.type & GetSpellSchoolMask(spellInfo)) && !CanPierceImmuneAura(spellInfo, itr.aura ? itr.aura->GetSpellProto() : nullptr, effectMask, itr.aura ? itr.aura->GetEffIndex() : EFFECT_INDEX_0))
9224  return true;
9225  }
9226 
9227  return false;
9228 }
9229 
9230 uint32 Unit::GetSchoolImmunityMask() const
9231 {
9232  uint32 mask = 0;
9233  SpellImmuneList const& schoolList = m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_SCHOOL];
9234  for (auto itr = schoolList.begin(); itr != schoolList.end(); ++itr)
9235  mask |= itr->type;
9236 
9237  return mask;
9238 }
9239 
9240 uint32 Unit::GetDamageImmunityMask() const
9241 {
9242  uint32 mask = 0;
9243  SpellImmuneList const& damageList = m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_DAMAGE];
9244  for (auto itr = damageList.begin(); itr != damageList.end(); ++itr)
9245  mask |= itr->type;
9246 
9247  return mask;
9248 }
9249 
9250 uint32 Unit::GetMechanicImmunityMask() const
9251 {
9252  uint32 mask = 0;
9253  SpellImmuneList const& mechanicList = m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_MECHANIC];
9254  for (auto itr = mechanicList.begin(); itr != mechanicList.end(); ++itr)
9255  mask |= (1 << itr->type);
9256 
9257  return mask;
9258 }
9259 
9264 uint32 Unit::MeleeDamageBonusDone(Unit* victim, uint32 pdamage, WeaponAttackType attType, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask, SpellEntry const* spellProto, DamageEffectType damagetype, uint32 stack, bool flat)
9265 {
9266  if (!victim || pdamage == 0)
9267  return pdamage;
9268 
9269  // Some spells don't benefit from done mods
9270  if (spellProto && spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_IGNORE_CASTER_MODIFIERS))
9271  return pdamage;
9272 
9273  // differentiate for weapon damage based spells
9274  bool isWeaponDamageBasedSpell = !(spellProto && (damagetype == DOT || IsSpellHaveEffect(spellProto, SPELL_EFFECT_SCHOOL_DAMAGE)));
9275  Item* pWeapon = GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? ((Player*)this)->GetWeaponForAttack(attType, true, false) : nullptr;
9276  uint32 creatureTypeMask = victim->GetCreatureTypeMask();
9277  schoolMask = ((spellProto && schoolMask != spellProto->SchoolMask) ? SpellSchoolMask(spellProto->SchoolMask) : schoolMask);
9278 
9279  // FLAT damage bonus auras
9280  // =======================
9281  int32 DoneFlat = 0;
9282  int32 APbonus = 0;
9283 
9284  // ..done flat, already included in weapon damage based spells
9285  if (!isWeaponDamageBasedSpell || (spellProto && (schoolMask &~ SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL) != 0))
9286  {
9287  AuraList const& mModDamageDone = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE);
9288  for (auto i : mModDamageDone)
9289  {
9290  if (i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & schoolMask && // schoolmask has to fit with the intrinsic spell school
9291  ((i->GetSpellProto()->EquippedItemClass == -1) || // general, weapon independent
9292  (pWeapon && pWeapon->IsFitToSpellRequirements(i->GetSpellProto())))) // OR used weapon fits aura requirements
9293  {
9294  DoneFlat += i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
9295  }
9296  }
9297  }
9298 
9299  // ..done flat (by creature type mask)
9300  DoneFlat += GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE_CREATURE, creatureTypeMask);
9301 
9302  // ..done flat (base at attack power for marked target and base at attack power for creature type)
9303  if (attType == RANGED_ATTACK)
9304  {
9305  APbonus += victim->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER_ATTACKER_BONUS);
9306  APbonus += GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER_VERSUS, creatureTypeMask);
9307  }
9308  else
9309  {
9310  APbonus += victim->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MELEE_ATTACK_POWER_ATTACKER_BONUS);
9311  APbonus += GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MELEE_ATTACK_POWER_VERSUS, creatureTypeMask);
9312  }
9313 
9314  // PERCENT damage auras
9315  // ====================
9316  float DoneTotalMod = 1.0f;
9317 
9318  // ..done pct, already included in weapon damage based spells
9319  if (!isWeaponDamageBasedSpell)
9320  {
9321  if (!spellProto || !spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_CASTER_DAMAGE_MODIFIERS))
9322  {
9323  AuraList const& mModDamagePercentDone = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_PERCENT_DONE);
9324  for (auto i : mModDamagePercentDone)
9325  {
9326  if (i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & schoolMask && // schoolmask has to fit with the intrinsic spell school
9327  i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & GetMeleeDamageSchoolMask(attType == BASE_ATTACK) && // AND schoolmask has to fit with weapon damage school (essential for non-physical spells)
9328  ((i->GetSpellProto()->EquippedItemClass == -1) || // general, weapon independent
9329  (pWeapon && pWeapon->IsFitToSpellRequirements(i->GetSpellProto())))) // OR used weapon fits aura requirements
9330  {
9331  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
9332  }
9333  }
9334 
9335  if (attType == OFF_ATTACK)
9336  DoneTotalMod *= GetModifierValue(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_OFFHAND, TOTAL_PCT); // no school check required
9337  }
9338  }
9339 
9340  // ..done pct (by creature type mask)
9341  DoneTotalMod *= GetTotalAuraMultiplierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE_VERSUS, creatureTypeMask);
9342 
9343  // special dummys/class scripts and other effects
9344  // =============================================
9345  Unit* owner = GetOwner();
9346  if (!owner)
9347  owner = this;
9348 
9349  // ..done pct (by aura state)
9350  AuraList const& mDamageDoneVersusAuraState = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DAMAGE_DONE_VERSUS_AURA_STATE_PCT);
9351  for (auto i : mDamageDoneVersusAuraState)
9352  {
9353  if (victim->HasAuraState(AuraState(i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue)))
9354  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
9355  }
9356 
9357  if (spellProto)
9358  {
9359  // dummies
9360  AuraList const& auraDummy = owner->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
9361  for (auto i : auraDummy)
9362  {
9363  if (!i->isAffectedOnSpell(spellProto))
9364  continue;
9365  switch (i->GetSpellProto()->Id)
9366  {
9367  case 20162: // Seal of the Crusader - all ranks
9368  case 20305:
9369  case 20306:
9370  case 20307:
9371  case 20308:
9372  case 21082:
9373  case 27158:
9374  {
9375  DoneTotalMod *= 1.4f;
9376  break;
9377  }
9378  }
9379  }
9380 
9381  // .. done (class scripts)
9382  AuraList const& mOverrideClassScript = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_OVERRIDE_CLASS_SCRIPTS);
9383  for (auto i : mOverrideClassScript)
9384  {
9385  if (!(i->isAffectedOnSpell(spellProto)))
9386  continue;
9387  switch (i->GetMiscValue())
9388  {
9389  // Tundra Stalker
9390  case 7277: // Merciless Combat
9391  {
9392  // Merciless Combat
9393  if (i->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2656)
9394  {
9395  if (victim->HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_HEALTHLESS_35_PERCENT))
9396  DoneTotalMod *= (100.0f + i->GetModifier()->m_amount) / 100.0f;
9397  }
9398  else // Tundra Stalker
9399  {
9400  // Frost Fever (target debuff)
9401  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MELEE_HASTE, SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT, uint64(0x0000000000000000), 0x00000002))
9402  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
9403  break;
9404  }
9405  break;
9406  }
9407  case 7293: // Rage of Rivendare
9408  {
9409  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT, uint64(0x0200000000000000)))
9410  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
9411  break;
9412  }
9413  // Marked for Death
9414  case 7598:
9415  case 7599:
9416  case 7600:
9417  case 7601:
9418  case 7602:
9419  {
9420  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STALKED, SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER, uint64(0x0000000000000400)))
9421  DoneTotalMod *= (i->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
9422  break;
9423  }
9424  }
9425  }
9426  }
9427 
9428  if (spellProto)
9429  {
9430  // Frost Strike
9431  if (spellProto->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT && spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000400000000))
9432  {
9433  // search disease
9434  bool found = false;
9435  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap const& auras = victim->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
9436  for (const auto& aura : auras)
9437  {
9438  if (aura.second->GetSpellProto()->Dispel == DISPEL_DISEASE)
9439  {
9440  found = true;
9441  break;
9442  }
9443  }
9444 
9445  if (found)
9446  {
9447  // search for Glacier Rot dummy aura
9448  Unit::AuraList const& dummyAuras = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
9449  for (auto dummyAura : dummyAuras)
9450  {
9451  if (dummyAura->GetSpellProto()->EffectMiscValue[dummyAura->GetEffIndex()] == 7244)
9452  {
9453  DoneTotalMod *= (dummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
9454  break;
9455  }
9456  }
9457  }
9458  }
9459  // Glyph of Steady Shot (Steady Shot check)
9460  else if (spellProto->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER && spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000100000000))
9461  {
9462  // search for glyph dummy aura
9463  if (Aura* aur = GetDummyAura(56826))
9464  // check for Serpent Sting at target
9465  if (victim->GetAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER, uint64(0x0000000000004000)))
9466  DoneTotalMod *= (aur->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
9467  }
9468 
9469  for (auto i : GetScriptedLocationAuras(SCRIPT_LOCATION_MELEE_DAMAGE_DONE))
9470  {
9471  if (!i->isAffectedOnSpell(spellProto))
9472  continue;
9473  i->OnDamageCalculate(victim, DoneFlat, DoneTotalMod);
9474  }
9475  }
9476 
9477  // final calculation
9478  // =================
9479 
9480  float DoneTotal = 0.0f;
9481 
9482  // scaling of non weapon based spells
9483  if (!isWeaponDamageBasedSpell || (spellProto && (schoolMask &~ SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL) !=0))
9484  {
9485  // apply ap bonus and benefit affected by spell power implicit coeffs and spell level penalties
9486  DoneTotal = SpellBonusWithCoeffs(spellProto, DoneTotal, DoneFlat, APbonus, damagetype, true);
9487  }
9488  // weapon damage based spells
9489  else if (isWeaponDamageBasedSpell && (APbonus || DoneFlat))
9490  {
9491  // have to add AP here to melee/spells because weapon damage is generic and this AP bonus is target specific
9492  bool normalized = spellProto ? IsSpellHaveEffect(spellProto, SPELL_EFFECT_NORMALIZED_WEAPON_DMG) : false;
9493  float baseValue = int32(APbonus / 14.0f * GetAPMultiplier(attType, normalized));
9494 
9495  // for weapon damage based spells we still have to apply damage done percent mods
9496  // (that are already included into pdamage) to not-yet included DoneFlat
9497  // e.g. from doneVersusCreature, apBonusVs...
9498  UnitMods unitMod;
9499  switch (attType)
9500  {
9501  default:
9502  case BASE_ATTACK: unitMod = UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_MAINHAND; break;
9503  case OFF_ATTACK: unitMod = UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_OFFHAND; break;
9504  case RANGED_ATTACK: unitMod = UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_RANGED; break;
9505  }
9506  baseValue *= GetModifierValue(unitMod, BASE_PCT);
9507  DoneTotal += DoneFlat + baseValue;
9508  DoneTotal *= GetModifierValue(unitMod, TOTAL_PCT);
9509  }
9510 
9511  if (!flat)
9512  DoneTotal = 0.0f;
9513 
9514  float tmpDamage = (int32(pdamage) + DoneTotal * int32(stack)) * DoneTotalMod;
9515 
9516  // apply spellmod to Done damage
9517  if (spellProto)
9518  {
9519  if (Player* modOwner = GetSpellModOwner())
9520  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spellProto->Id, damagetype == DOT ? SPELLMOD_DOT : SPELLMOD_DAMAGE, tmpDamage);
9521  }
9522 
9523  // bonus result can be negative
9524  return tmpDamage > 0 ? uint32(tmpDamage) : 0;
9525 }
9526 
9531 uint32 Unit::MeleeDamageBonusTaken(Unit* caster, uint32 pdamage, WeaponAttackType attType, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask, SpellEntry const* spellProto, DamageEffectType damagetype, uint32 stack, bool flat)
9532 {
9533  if (pdamage == 0)
9534  return pdamage;
9535 
9536  if (spellProto && spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_IGNORE_DAMAGE_TAKEN_MODIFIERS))
9537  return pdamage;
9538 
9539  // differentiate for weapon damage based spells
9540  bool isWeaponDamageBasedSpell = !(spellProto && (damagetype == DOT || IsSpellHaveEffect(spellProto, SPELL_EFFECT_SCHOOL_DAMAGE)));
9541  schoolMask = ((spellProto && schoolMask != spellProto->SchoolMask) ? SpellSchoolMask(spellProto->SchoolMask) : schoolMask);
9542  uint32 mechanicMask = spellProto ? GetAllSpellMechanicMask(spellProto) : 0;
9543 
9544  // Shred also have bonus as MECHANIC_BLEED damages
9545  if (spellProto && spellProto->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DRUID && spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x00008000))
9546  mechanicMask |= (1 << (MECHANIC_BLEED - 1));
9547 
9548  // FLAT damage bonus auras
9549  // =======================
9550  int32 TakenFlat = 0;
9551 
9552  // ..taken flat (base at attack power for marked target and base at attack power for creature type)
9553  if (attType == RANGED_ATTACK)
9554  TakenFlat += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_RANGED_DAMAGE_TAKEN);
9555  else
9556  TakenFlat += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MELEE_DAMAGE_TAKEN);
9557 
9558  // ..taken flat (by school mask)
9559  int32 TakenAdvertisedBenefit = GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_TAKEN, schoolMask);
9560 
9561  // PERCENT damage auras
9562  // ====================
9563  float TakenTotalMod = 1.0f;
9564 
9565  // ..taken pct (by school mask)
9566  TakenTotalMod *= GetTotalAuraMultiplierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_PERCENT_TAKEN, schoolMask);
9567 
9568  // ..taken pct (by mechanic mask)
9569  TakenTotalMod *= GetTotalAuraMultiplierByMiscValueForMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MECHANIC_DAMAGE_TAKEN_PERCENT, mechanicMask);
9570 
9571  // ..taken pct (melee/ranged)
9572  if (attType == RANGED_ATTACK)
9573  TakenTotalMod *= GetTotalAuraMultiplier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_RANGED_DAMAGE_TAKEN_PCT);
9574  else
9575  TakenTotalMod *= GetTotalAuraMultiplier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MELEE_DAMAGE_TAKEN_PCT);
9576 
9577  // ..taken pct (aoe avoidance)
9578  if (spellProto && (IsAreaOfEffectSpell(spellProto) || spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_TREAT_AS_AREA_EFFECT)))
9579  {
9580  TakenTotalMod *= GetTotalAuraMultiplierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_AOE_DAMAGE_AVOIDANCE, schoolMask);
9581  if (caster && !caster->IsPlayerControlled() || spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX7_TREAT_AS_NPC_AOE))
9582  TakenTotalMod *= GetTotalAuraMultiplierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CREATURE_AOE_DAMAGE_AVOIDANCE, schoolMask);
9583  }
9584 
9585  // special dummys/class scripts and other effects
9586  // =============================================
9587 
9588  // .. taken (dummy auras)
9589  AuraList const& mDummyAuras = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
9590  for (auto mDummyAura : mDummyAuras)
9591  {
9592  switch (mDummyAura->GetId())
9593  {
9594  case 45182: // Cheating Death
9595  if (mDummyAura->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL)
9596  {
9597  if (GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
9598  continue;
9599 
9600  float mod = ((Player*)this)->GetRatingBonusValue(CR_CRIT_TAKEN_MELEE) * (-8.0f);
9601  if (mod < float(mDummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount))
9602  mod = float(mDummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount);
9603 
9604  TakenTotalMod *= (mod + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
9605  }
9606  break;
9607  case 20911: // Blessing of Sanctuary
9608  case 25899: // Greater Blessing of Sanctuary
9609  TakenTotalMod *= (mDummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount + 100.0f) / 100.0f;
9610  break;
9611  }
9612  }
9613 
9614  if (spellProto)
9615  {
9616  for (auto i : GetScriptedLocationAuras(SCRIPT_LOCATION_MELEE_DAMAGE_TAKEN))
9617  {
9618  if (!i->isAffectedOnSpell(spellProto))
9619  continue;
9620  i->OnDamageCalculate(this, TakenAdvertisedBenefit, TakenTotalMod);
9621  }
9622  }
9623 
9624  // final calculation
9625  // =================
9626 
9627  // scaling of non weapon based spells
9628  if (!isWeaponDamageBasedSpell || (spellProto && (schoolMask &~ SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL) != 0))
9629  {
9630  // apply benefit affected by spell power implicit coeffs and spell level penalties
9631  if (caster)
9632  TakenAdvertisedBenefit = caster->SpellBonusWithCoeffs(spellProto, 0, TakenAdvertisedBenefit, 0, damagetype, false);
9633  }
9634 
9635  if (!flat)
9636  TakenFlat = 0.0f;
9637 
9638  float tmpDamage = (int32(pdamage) + (TakenFlat + TakenAdvertisedBenefit) * int32(stack)) * TakenTotalMod;
9639 
9640  // bonus result can be negative
9641  return tmpDamage > 0 ? uint32(tmpDamage) : 0;
9642 }
9643 
9644 void Unit::ApplySpellImmune(Aura const* aura, uint32 op, uint32 type, bool apply)
9645 {
9646  if (apply)
9647  {
9648  for (SpellImmuneList::iterator itr = m_spellImmune[op].begin(), next; itr != m_spellImmune[op].end(); itr = next)
9649  {
9650  next = itr; ++next;
9651  if (itr->type == type && (!aura || itr->aura == aura))
9652  {
9653  m_spellImmune[op].erase(itr);
9654  next = m_spellImmune[op].begin();
9655  }
9656  }
9657  SpellImmune Immune;
9658  Immune.aura = aura;
9659  Immune.type = type;
9660  m_spellImmune[op].push_back(Immune);
9661  }
9662  else
9663  {
9664  for (SpellImmuneList::iterator itr = m_spellImmune[op].begin(); itr != m_spellImmune[op].end(); ++itr)
9665  {
9666  if (itr->aura == aura && (aura || itr->type == type))
9667  {
9668  m_spellImmune[op].erase(itr);
9669  break;
9670  }
9671  }
9672  }
9673 }
9674 
9675 void Unit::ApplySpellDispelImmunity(const Aura* aura, DispelType type, bool apply)
9676 {
9677  ApplySpellImmune(aura, IMMUNITY_DISPEL, type, apply);
9678 
9679  if (apply && aura->GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_IMMUNITY_PURGES_EFFECT))
9680  RemoveAurasWithDispelType(type);
9681 }
9682 
9683 float Unit::GetWeaponProcChance() const
9684 {
9685  // normalized proc chance for weapon attack speed
9686  // (odd formula...)
9687  if (isAttackReady(BASE_ATTACK))
9688  return (GetAttackTime(BASE_ATTACK) * 1.8f / 1000.0f);
9689  if (hasOffhandWeaponForAttack() && isAttackReady(OFF_ATTACK))
9690  return (GetAttackTime(OFF_ATTACK) * 1.6f / 1000.0f);
9691 
9692  return 0.0f;
9693 }
9694 
9695 float Unit::GetPPMProcChance(uint32 WeaponSpeed, float PPM) const
9696 {
9697  // proc per minute chance calculation
9698  if (PPM <= 0.0f)
9699  return 0.0f;
9700  return WeaponSpeed * PPM / 600.0f; // result is chance in percents (probability = Speed_in_sec * (PPM / 60))
9701 }
9702 
9703 bool Unit::Mount(uint32 displayid, const Aura* aura/* = nullptr*/)
9704 {
9705  // Custom mount (non-aura such as taxi or command) overwrites aura mounts
9706  if (!displayid || (IsMounted() && aura && uint32(aura->GetAmount()) != GetMountID()))
9707  return false;
9708 
9709  RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_MOUNTING);
9710  if (!m_isMountOverriden)
9711  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MOUNTDISPLAYID, displayid);
9712  else
9713  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MOUNTDISPLAYID, m_overridenMountId);
9714 
9715  if (aura)
9716  SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_MOUNT);
9717  return true;
9718 }
9719 
9720 bool Unit::Unmount(const Aura* aura/* = nullptr*/)
9721 {
9722  if (!GetMountID())
9723  return false;
9724 
9725  if (aura)
9726  {
9727  // Custom mount (non-aura such as taxi or command) overwrites aura mounts, do not dismount on aura removal
9728  if (uint32(aura->GetAmount()) != GetMountID() && !m_isMountOverriden)
9729  return false;
9730  }
9731 
9732  RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_DISMOUNT);
9733  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MOUNTDISPLAYID, 0);
9734  RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_MOUNT); // always remove even if aura for safety
9735 
9736  if (aura)
9737  {
9738  WorldPacket data(SMSG_DISMOUNT, 8);
9739  data << GetPackGUID();
9740  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
9741  }
9742 
9743  return true;
9744 }
9745 
9746 void Unit::SetInCombatWith(Unit* enemy)
9747 {
9748  SetInCombatState(enemy && enemy->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED) && HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED), enemy);
9749 }
9750 
9751 void Unit::SetInCombatWithAggressor(Unit* aggressor, bool touchOnly/* = false*/)
9752 {
9753  // This is a wrapper for SetInCombatWith initially created to improve PvP timers responsiveness. Can be extended in the future for broader use.
9754  if (!aggressor)
9755  return;
9756 
9757  // PvP combat participation pulse: refresh pvp timers on pvp combat (we are the victim)
9758  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
9759  {
9760  if (aggressor->IsPvP() && aggressor->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
9761  {
9762  // Use beneficiary for detecting own player (pet's pets forced into combat is not counted as direct pvp action)
9763  if (Player* thisPlayer = GetBeneficiaryPlayer())
9764  {
9765  // Use controlling for detecting aggressor's player (forced into combat by pet's pets is counted as direct pvp action)
9766  if (Player const* aggressorPlayer = aggressor->GetControllingPlayer())
9767  {
9768  if (thisPlayer != aggressorPlayer && !thisPlayer->IsInDuelWith(aggressorPlayer))
9769  {
9770  thisPlayer->pvpInfo.inPvPCombat = (thisPlayer->pvpInfo.inPvPCombat || !touchOnly);
9771  thisPlayer->UpdatePvP(true);
9772  }
9773  }
9774  }
9775  }
9776  }
9777 
9778  if (!touchOnly)
9779  SetInCombatWith(aggressor);
9780 }
9781 
9782 void Unit::SetInCombatWithAssisted(Unit* assisted, bool touchOnly/* = false*/)
9783 {
9784  // This is a wrapper for SetInCombatWith initially created to improve PvP timers responsiveness. Can be extended in the future for broader use.
9785 
9786  if (!assisted)
9787  return;
9788 
9789  bool pvp = false;
9790 
9791  // PvP combat participation pulse: refresh pvp timers on pvp combat (we are the assister)
9792  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
9793  {
9794  if (assisted->IsPvP() && assisted->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
9795  {
9796  // Use beneficiary for detecting own player (pet's pets entering combat is not counted as assist)
9797  if (Player* thisPlayer = GetBeneficiaryPlayer())
9798  {
9799  // Use controlling for detecting asissted unit's player (entering combat with pet's pets is counted as assist)
9800  if (Player const* assistedPlayer = assisted->GetControllingPlayer())
9801  {
9802  if (thisPlayer != assistedPlayer)
9803  {
9804  if (assistedPlayer->pvpInfo.inPvPCombat)
9805  thisPlayer->pvpInfo.inPvPCombat = (thisPlayer->pvpInfo.inPvPCombat || !touchOnly);
9806 
9807  thisPlayer->UpdatePvP(true);
9808 
9809  if (assistedPlayer->IsPvPContested())
9810  thisPlayer->UpdatePvPContested(true);
9811 
9812  pvp = true;
9813  }
9814  }
9815  }
9816  }
9817  }
9818 
9819  if (!touchOnly)
9820  SetInCombatState(pvp);
9821 }
9822 
9823 void Unit::SetInCombatWithVictim(Unit* victim, bool touchOnly/* = false*/)
9824 {
9825  // This is a wrapper for SetInCombatWith initially created to improve PvP timers responsiveness. Can be extended in the future for broader use.
9826  if (!victim)
9827  return;
9828 
9829  // PvP combat participation pulse: refresh pvp timers on pvp combat (we are the aggressor)
9830  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
9831  {
9832  if (victim->IsPvP() && victim->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
9833  {
9834  // Use beneficiary for detecting own player (pet's pets entering combat is not an act of aggression)
9835  if (Player* thisPlayer = GetBeneficiaryPlayer())
9836  {
9837  // Use controlling for detecting victim's player (entering combat with pet's pets is an act of aggression)
9838  if (Player const* victimPlayer = victim->GetControllingPlayer())
9839  {
9840  if (thisPlayer != victimPlayer && !thisPlayer->IsInDuelWith(victimPlayer))
9841  {
9842  thisPlayer->pvpInfo.inPvPCombat = (thisPlayer->pvpInfo.inPvPCombat || !touchOnly);
9843  thisPlayer->UpdatePvP(true);
9844  thisPlayer->UpdatePvPContested(true);
9845  }
9846  }
9847  }
9848  }
9849  }
9850 
9851  if (!touchOnly)
9852  SetInCombatWith(victim);
9853 }
9854 
9855 void Unit::SetInCombatState(bool PvP, Unit* enemy)
9856 {
9857  // only alive units can be in combat
9858  if (!IsAlive())
9859  return;
9860 
9861  bool notInCombat = !HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IN_COMBAT);
9862  bool creatureNotInCombat = GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && notInCombat;
9863 
9864  // For player itself and his pet during pvp combat enable own combat timer
9865  if (PvP || creatureNotInCombat)
9866  GetCombatManager().TriggerCombatTimer(PvP);
9867 
9868  SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IN_COMBAT);
9869 
9870  if (HasCharmer() || !GetOwnerGuid().IsEmpty())
9871  {
9872  SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PET_IN_COMBAT);
9873  if (enemy && (notInCombat || PvP))
9874  {
9875  // TODO: Unify this combat propagation with linking combat propagation in threat system
9876  Unit* controller = GetMaster();
9877 
9878  if (IsPropagatingThreatToOwner() && controller && controller->CanJoinInAttacking(enemy))
9879  {
9880  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
9881  {
9882  controller->SetInCombatWith(enemy); // player only enters combat
9883  enemy->AddThreat(controller);
9884  }
9885  else if (controller->IsInCombat())
9886  {
9887  controller->AddThreat(enemy);
9888  enemy->AddThreat(controller);
9889  enemy->SetInCombatWith(controller);
9890  if (PvP || creatureNotInCombat)
9891  enemy->GetCombatManager().TriggerCombatTimer(controller);
9892  }
9893  else
9894  {
9895  MANGOS_ASSERT(controller->AI()); // a player without UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED should always have AI
9896  controller->AI()->AttackStart(enemy);
9897  }
9898  }
9899  }
9900  }
9901 
9902  // interrupt all delayed non-combat casts
9903  for (uint32 i = CURRENT_FIRST_NON_MELEE_SPELL; i < CURRENT_MAX_SPELL; ++i)
9904  if (Spell* spell = GetCurrentSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i)))
9905  if (IsNonCombatSpell(spell->m_spellInfo))
9906  InterruptSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i), false);
9907 
9908  if (notInCombat)
9909  {
9910  RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_ENTERING_COMBAT_CANCELS);
9911  GetCombatManager().OnCombatStart();
9912  }
9913 
9914  if (creatureNotInCombat)
9915  {
9916  Creature* creature = static_cast<Creature*>(this);
9917 
9918  m_damageByOthers = 0;
9919 
9920  // clear stand state if set in addon - else script has to do it on its own
9921  CreatureDataAddon const* cainfo = creature->GetCreatureAddon();
9922  if (cainfo)
9923  {
9924  if (getStandState() == cainfo->standState)
9925  SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
9926  if (cainfo->emote && GetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_EMOTESTATE) == cainfo->emote)
9927  HandleEmoteState(0);
9928  }
9929 
9930  if (creature->GetCombatStartPosition().IsEmpty())
9931  creature->SetCombatStartPosition(GetPosition(GetTransport()));
9932 
9933  if (!creature->CanAggro()) // if creature aggroed during initial ignoration period, clear the state
9934  {
9935  creature->SetCanAggro(true);
9936  AbortAINotifyEvent();
9937  }
9938 
9939  if (creature->AI())
9940  creature->AI()->EnterCombat(enemy);
9941 
9942  // Some bosses are set into combat with zone
9943  if (GetMap()->IsDungeon() && (creature->GetCreatureInfo()->ExtraFlags & CREATURE_EXTRA_FLAG_AGGRO_ZONE) && enemy && enemy->IsControlledByPlayer())
9944  creature->SetInCombatWithZone();
9945 
9946  if (InstanceData* mapInstance = GetInstanceData())
9947  mapInstance->OnCreatureEnterCombat(creature);
9948 
9949  creature->CallAssistance();
9950 
9951  creature->SetCanCheckForHelp(false);
9952  creature->m_events.AddEvent(new UnitLambdaEvent(*creature, [](Unit& unit)
9953  {
9954  static_cast<Creature&>(unit).SetCanCheckForHelp(true);
9955  }), creature->m_events.CalculateTime(sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_UINT32_CREATURE_CHECK_FOR_HELP_AGGRO_DELAY)));
9956 
9957  TriggerAggroLinkingEvent(enemy);
9958  }
9959 }
9960 
9961 void Unit::EngageInCombatWith(Unit* enemy)
9962 {
9963  MANGOS_ASSERT(enemy);
9964  AddThreat(enemy);
9965  SetInCombatWith(enemy);
9966  enemy->SetInCombatWith(this);
9967  GetCombatManager().TriggerCombatTimer(enemy);
9968 }
9969 
9970 void Unit::EngageInCombatWithAggressor(Unit* aggressor)
9971 {
9972  MANGOS_ASSERT(aggressor);
9973  SetInCombatWithAggressor(aggressor);
9974  aggressor->SetInCombatWithAggressor(this);
9975  GetCombatManager().TriggerCombatTimer(aggressor);
9976 }
9977 
9978 void Unit::ClearInCombat()
9979 {
9980  RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IN_COMBAT);
9981  RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PET_IN_COMBAT);
9982 
9983  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
9984  {
9985  static_cast<Player*>(this)->pvpInfo.inPvPCombat = false;
9986  static_cast<Player*>(this)->UpdatePotionCooldown();
9987  }
9988 
9989  RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_LEAVING_COMBAT_CANCELS);
9990 }
9991 
9992 void Unit::HandleExitCombat(bool pvpCombat)
9993 {
9994  if (AI() && !GetClientControlling())
9995  {
9996  // guardians despawn on evade if their owner already despawned
9997  if (IsCreature() && static_cast<Creature*>(this)->IsPet() && !static_cast<Pet*>(this)->IgnoresOwnersDeath() && GetOwner() == nullptr)
9998  static_cast<Pet*>(this)->Unsummon(PET_SAVE_AS_DELETED);
9999  else
10000  AI()->EnterEvadeMode();
10001  }
10002  else
10003  CombatStop(false, !pvpCombat);
10004 
10005  CallForAllControlledUnits([](Unit* unit) { unit->HandleExitCombat(); }, CONTROLLED_PET | CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS | CONTROLLED_CHARM | CONTROLLED_TOTEMS);
10006 }
10007 
10008 int32 Unit::ModifyHealth(int32 dVal)
10009 {
10010  if (dVal == 0)
10011  return 0;
10012 
10013  int32 curHealth = (int32)GetHealth();
10014 
10015  int32 val = dVal + curHealth;
10016  if (val <= 0)
10017  {
10018  SetHealth(0);
10019  return -curHealth;
10020  }
10021 
10022  int32 maxHealth = (int32)GetMaxHealth();
10023 
10024  int32 gain;
10025  if (val < maxHealth)
10026  {
10027  SetHealth(val);
10028  gain = val - curHealth;
10029  }
10030  else
10031  {
10032  SetHealth(maxHealth);
10033  gain = maxHealth - curHealth;
10034  }
10035 
10036  return gain;
10037 }
10038 
10039 int32 Unit::ModifyPower(Powers power, int32 dVal)
10040 {
10041  if (dVal == 0)
10042  return 0;
10043 
10044  int32 curPower = (int32)GetPower(power);
10045 
10046  int32 val = dVal + curPower;
10047  if (val <= 0)
10048  {
10049  SetPower(power, 0);
10050  return -curPower;
10051  }
10052 
10053  int32 maxPower = (int32)GetMaxPower(power);
10054 
10055  int32 gain;
10056  if (val < maxPower)
10057  {
10058  SetPower(power, val);
10059  gain = val - curPower;
10060  }
10061  else
10062  {
10063  SetPower(power, maxPower);
10064  gain = maxPower - curPower;
10065  }
10066 
10067  return gain;
10068 }
10069 
10070 bool Unit::IsVisibleForOrDetect(Unit const* u, WorldObject const* viewPoint, bool detect, bool /*inVisibleList*/, bool is3dDistance, bool spell, bool ignorePhase) const
10071 {
10072  if (!u)
10073  return false;
10074 
10075  if (ignorePhase)
10076  {
10077  if (!IsInMapIgnorePhase(u))
10078  return false;
10079  }
10080  else if (!IsInMap(u))
10081  return false;
10082 
10083 
10084  // Always can see self
10085  if (u == this)
10086  return true;
10087 
10088  // player visible for other player if not logout and at same transport
10089  // including case when player is out of world
10090  bool at_same_transport = GetTransport() && GetTransport() == u->GetTransport();
10091 
10092  // not in world
10093  if (!at_same_transport && (!IsInWorld() || !u->IsInWorld()))
10094  return false;
10095 
10096  // forbidden to seen (while Removing corpse)
10097  if (m_Visibility == VISIBILITY_REMOVE_CORPSE)
10098  return false;
10099 
10100  Map& _map = *u->GetMap();
10101  // Grid dead/alive checks
10102  if (u->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
10103  {
10104  // non visible at grid for any stealth state
10105  if (!IsVisibleInGridForPlayer((Player*)u))
10106  return false;
10107 
10108  // if player is dead then he can't detect anyone in any cases
10109  if (!u->IsAlive())
10110  detect = false;
10111  }
10112  else if (spell)
10113  {
10114  // all despawned creatures/players not visible for any creatures spells
10115  if (u->GetDeathState() == DEAD || GetDeathState() == DEAD)
10116  return false;
10117  }
10118  else
10119  {
10120  // all dead creatures/players not visible for any creatures
10121  if (!u->IsAlive() || !IsAlive())
10122  return false;
10123  }
10124 
10125  // Any units far than max visible distance for viewer or not in our map are not visible too
10126  if (!at_same_transport) // distance for show player/pet/creature (no transport case)
10127  {
10128  if (!IsWithinDistInMap(viewPoint, u->GetVisibilityData().GetVisibilityDistanceFor((WorldObject *)this), is3dDistance))
10129  return false;
10130  }
10131 
10132  // when restriction not set, visible to all
10133  if (!IsOnlyVisibleTo(u->GetObjectGuid()))
10134  return false;
10135 
10136  // always seen by owner
10137  if (GetMasterGuid() == u->GetObjectGuid())
10138  return true;
10139 
10140  // isInvisibleForAlive() those units can only be seen by dead or if other
10141  // unit is also invisible for alive.. if an isinvisibleforalive unit dies we
10142  // should be able to see it too
10143  if (u->IsAlive() && IsAlive() && isInvisibleForAlive() != u->isInvisibleForAlive())
10144  if (u->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !((Player*)u)->IsGameMaster())
10145  return false;
10146 
10147  // Visible units, always are visible for all units, except for units under invisibility and phases
10148  if (m_Visibility == VISIBILITY_ON && u->GetVisibilityData().GetInvisibilityMask() == 0)
10149  return true;
10150 
10151  // GMs see any players, not higher GMs and all units in any phase
10152  if (u->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && ((Player*)u)->IsGameMaster())
10153  {
10154  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
10155  return ((Player*)this)->GetSession()->GetSecurity() <= ((Player*)u)->GetSession()->GetSecurity();
10156  return true;
10157  }
10158 
10159  // non faction visibility non-breakable for non-GMs
10160  if (m_Visibility == VISIBILITY_OFF)
10161  return false;
10162 
10163  // Spell check for travelling spells - stealth and invisibility are ignored - when creature was able to target it, it should go through
10164  if (spell)
10165  return true;
10166 
10167  // check group settings
10168  if (IsFogOfWarVisibleStealth(u))
10169  return true;
10170 
10171  // raw invisibility
10172  bool invisible = (GetVisibilityData().GetInvisibilityMask() != 0 || u->GetVisibilityData().GetInvisibilityMask() != 0);
10173 
10174  if (u->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) // if object is player with mover, use its visibility masks, so that an invisible player MCing a creature can see stuff
10175  if (Unit* mover = ((Player*)u)->GetMover())
10176  invisible = (GetVisibilityData().GetInvisibilityMask() != 0 || mover->GetVisibilityData().GetInvisibilityMask() != 0);
10177 
10178  // detectable invisibility case
10179  if (invisible && (
10180  // Invisible units, always are visible for units under same invisibility type
10181  (GetVisibilityData().GetInvisibilityMask() & u->GetVisibilityData().GetInvisibilityMask()) != 0 ||
10182  // Invisible units, always are visible for unit that can detect this invisibility (have appropriate level for detect)
10183  u->GetVisibilityData().CanDetectInvisibilityOf(this) ||
10184  // Units that can detect invisibility always are visible for units that can be detected
10185  GetVisibilityData().CanDetectInvisibilityOf(u)))
10186  {
10187  invisible = false;
10188  }
10189 
10190  // special cases for always overwrite invisibility/stealth
10191  if (invisible || (m_Visibility == VISIBILITY_GROUP_STEALTH || m_Visibility == VISIBILITY_GROUP_NO_DETECT))
10192  {
10193  if (u->CanAttack(this)) // Hunter mark functionality
10194  if (HasAuraTypeWithCaster(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STALKED, u->GetObjectGuid()))
10195  return true;
10196 
10197  // none other cases for detect invisibility, so invisible
10198  if (invisible)
10199  return false;
10200  }
10201 
10202  // unit got in stealth in this moment and must ignore old detected state
10203  if (m_Visibility == VISIBILITY_GROUP_NO_DETECT)
10204  return false;
10205 
10206  // GM invisibility checks early, invisibility if any detectable, so if not stealth then visible
10207  if (m_Visibility != VISIBILITY_GROUP_STEALTH)
10208  return true;
10209 
10210  // NOW ONLY STEALTH CASE
10211 
10212  // if in non-detect mode then invisible for unit
10213  // mobs always detect players (detect == true)... return 'false' for those mobs which have (detect == false)
10214  // players detect players only in Player::HandleStealthedUnitsDetection()
10215  if (!detect)
10216  return (u->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) ? ((Player*)u)->HasAtClient(this) : false;
10217 
10218  // Special cases
10219 
10220  // If is attacked then stealth is lost, some creature can use stealth too
10221  if (!getAttackers().empty())
10222  return true;
10223 
10224  // If a mob or player is stunned he will not be able to detect stealth
10225  if (u->IsStunned() && (u != this))
10226  return false;
10227 
10228  // set max distance
10229  float visibleDistance = (u->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) ? MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE : ((Creature const*)u)->GetAttackDistance(this);
10230 
10231  // Always invisible from back (when stealth detection is on), also filter max distance cases
10232  bool isInFront = viewPoint->isInFrontInMap(this, visibleDistance);
10233  if (!isInFront)
10234  return false;
10235 
10236  // if doesn't have stealth detection (Shadow Sight), then check how stealthy the unit is, otherwise just check los
10237  if (!u->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH))
10238  {
10239  visibleDistance = GetVisibilityData().GetStealthVisibilityDistance(u, HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED));
10240 
10241  // recheck new distance
10242  if (visibleDistance <= 0 || GetDistance(viewPoint, true, DIST_CALC_NONE) > visibleDistance * visibleDistance)
10243  return false;
10244  }
10245  else
10246  return true; // Shadow Sight seems to allow ignoring LoS check (not confirmed 100%)
10247 
10248  // Now check is target visible with LoS
10249  float x, y, z;
10250  viewPoint->GetPosition(x, y, z);
10251  return IsWithinLOS(x, y, z + viewPoint->GetCollisionHeight());
10252 }
10253 
10254 void Unit::UpdateVisibilityAndView()
10255 {
10256  static const AuraType auratypes[] = {SPELL_AURA_BIND_SIGHT, SPELL_AURA_FAR_SIGHT, SPELL_AURA_NONE};
10257  for (AuraType const* type = &auratypes[0]; *type != SPELL_AURA_NONE; ++type)
10258  {
10259  AuraList& alist = m_modAuras[*type];
10260  if (alist.empty())
10261  continue;
10262 
10263  for (AuraList::iterator it = alist.begin(); it != alist.end();)
10264  {
10265  Aura* aura = (*it);
10266  Unit* owner = aura->GetCaster();
10267 
10268  if (!owner || !IsVisibleForOrDetect(owner, this, false))
10269  {
10270  alist.erase(it);
10271  RemoveAura(aura);
10272  it = alist.begin();
10273  }
10274  else
10275  ++it;
10276  }
10277  }
10278 
10279  GetViewPoint().Call_UpdateVisibilityForOwner();
10280  UpdateObjectVisibility();
10281  ScheduleAINotify(0);
10282  GetViewPoint().Event_ViewPointVisibilityChanged();
10283 }
10284 
10285 SpellSchoolMask Unit::GetMainAttackSchoolMask()
10286 {
10287  if (UnitAI* ai = AI())
10288  return ai->GetMainAttackSchoolMask();
10289  else
10290  return GetMeleeDamageSchoolMask();
10291 }
10292 
10293 void Unit::SetVisibility(UnitVisibility x)
10294 {
10295  m_Visibility = x;
10296 
10297  if (IsInWorld())
10298  UpdateVisibilityAndView();
10299 }
10300 
10301 void Unit::UpdateSpeed(UnitMoveType mtype, bool forced, float ratio)
10302 {
10303  int32 main_speed_mod = 0;
10304  float stack_bonus = 1.0f;
10305  float non_stack_bonus = 1.0f;
10306 
10307  switch (mtype)
10308  {
10309  case MOVE_WALK:
10310  break;
10311  case MOVE_RUN:
10312  {
10313  if (IsMounted()) // Use on mount auras
10314  {
10315  main_speed_mod = GetMaxPositiveAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_MOUNTED_SPEED);
10316  stack_bonus = GetTotalAuraMultiplier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MOUNTED_SPEED_ALWAYS);
10317  non_stack_bonus = (100.0f + GetMaxPositiveAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MOUNTED_SPEED_NOT_STACK)) / 100.0f;
10318  }
10319  else
10320  {
10321  main_speed_mod = GetMaxPositiveAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_SPEED);
10322  stack_bonus = GetTotalAuraMultiplier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SPEED_ALWAYS);
10323  non_stack_bonus = (100.0f + GetMaxPositiveAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SPEED_NOT_STACK)) / 100.0f;
10324  }
10325  break;
10326  }
10327  case MOVE_RUN_BACK:
10328  break;
10329  case MOVE_SWIM:
10330  {
10331  main_speed_mod = GetMaxPositiveAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_SWIM_SPEED);
10332  break;
10333  }
10334  case MOVE_SWIM_BACK:
10335  return;
10336  case MOVE_FLIGHT:
10337  {
10338  if (IsMounted()) // Use on mount auras
10339  {
10340  main_speed_mod = GetMaxPositiveAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED_MOUNTED);
10341  stack_bonus = GetTotalAuraMultiplier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED_MOUNTED_STACKING);
10342  non_stack_bonus = (100.0f + GetMaxPositiveAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED_MOUNTED_NOT_STACKING)) / 100.0f;
10343  }
10344  else // Use not mount (shapeshift for example) auras (should stack)
10345  {
10346  main_speed_mod = GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED);
10347  stack_bonus = GetTotalAuraMultiplier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED_STACKING);
10348  non_stack_bonus = (100.0f + GetMaxPositiveAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED_NOT_STACKING)) / 100.0f;
10349  }
10350  break;
10351  }
10352  case MOVE_FLIGHT_BACK:
10353  return;
10354  default:
10355  sLog.outError("Unit::UpdateSpeed: Unsupported move type (%d)", mtype);
10356  return;
10357  }
10358 
10359  float bonus = non_stack_bonus > stack_bonus ? non_stack_bonus : stack_bonus;
10360  // now we ready for speed calculation
10361  float speed = main_speed_mod ? bonus * (100.0f + main_speed_mod) / 100.0f : bonus;
10362 
10363  switch (mtype)
10364  {
10365  case MOVE_RUN:
10366  case MOVE_SWIM:
10367  case MOVE_FLIGHT:
10368  {
10369  // Normalize speed by 191 aura SPELL_AURA_USE_NORMAL_MOVEMENT_SPEED if need
10370  // TODO: possible affect only on MOVE_RUN
10371  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
10372  {
10373  if (int32 normalization = GetMaxPositiveAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_USE_NORMAL_MOVEMENT_SPEED))
10374  {
10375  // Use speed from aura
10376  float max_speed = normalization / baseMoveSpeed[mtype];
10377  if (speed > max_speed)
10378  speed = max_speed;
10379  }
10380  }
10381  break;
10382  }
10383  default:
10384  break;
10385  }
10386 
10387  // for player case, we look for some custom rates
10388  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
10389  {
10390  if (GetDeathState() == CORPSE)
10391  speed *= sWorld.getConfig(((Player*)this)->InBattleGround() ? CONFIG_FLOAT_GHOST_RUN_SPEED_BG : CONFIG_FLOAT_GHOST_RUN_SPEED_WORLD);
10392  }
10393 
10394  // Apply strongest slow aura mod to speed
10395  int32 slow = GetMaxNegativeAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED);
10396  if (slow)
10397  {
10398  speed *= (100.0f + slow) / 100.0f;
10399  float min_speed = (float)GetMaxPositiveAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_MINIMUM_SPEED) / 100.0f;
10400  if (speed < min_speed)
10401  speed = min_speed;
10402  }
10403 
10404  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
10405  {
10406  switch (mtype)
10407  {
10408  case MOVE_RUN:
10409  speed *= m_baseSpeedRun;
10410  break;
10411  case MOVE_WALK:
10412  speed *= m_baseSpeedWalk;
10413  break;
10414  default:
10415  break;
10416  }
10417  }
10418 
10419  SetSpeedRate(mtype, speed * ratio, forced);
10420 }
10421 
10422 float Unit::GetSpeedInMotion() const
10423 {
10424  return (movespline->Finalized() ? GetSpeed(m_movementInfo.GetSpeedType()) : movespline->Speed());
10425 }
10426 
10427 float Unit::GetSpeed(UnitMoveType mtype) const
10428 {
10429  return m_speed_rate[mtype] * baseMoveSpeed[mtype];
10430 }
10431 
10432 float Unit::GetSpeedRateInMotion() const
10433 {
10434  const UnitMoveType type = m_movementInfo.GetSpeedType();
10435  return (movespline->Finalized() ? GetSpeedRate(type) : (movespline->Speed() / GetSpeed(type)));
10436 }
10437 
10438 float Unit::GetXYFlagBasedSpeed() const
10439 {
10440  return GetXYFlagBasedSpeed(m_movementInfo.moveFlags);
10441 }
10442 
10443 float Unit::GetXYFlagBasedSpeed(uint32 moveFlags) const
10444 {
10445  // not moving laterally? zero!
10446  if (!(moveFlags & MOVEFLAG_MASK_XY))
10447  return 0.f;
10448 
10449  // swimming?
10450  if (!!(moveFlags & MOVEFLAG_SWIMMING))
10451  {
10452  if (!!(moveFlags & MOVEFLAG_BACKWARD))
10453  return GetSpeed(MOVE_SWIM_BACK);
10454 
10455  return GetSpeed(MOVE_SWIM);
10456  }
10457 
10458  // walking?
10459  if (!!(moveFlags & MOVEFLAG_WALK_MODE))
10460  {
10461  // Seems to always be same speed forward and backward when walking
10462  return GetSpeed(MOVE_WALK);
10463  }
10464 
10465  // Presumably only running left when IsMoving is true
10466  if (!!(moveFlags & MOVEFLAG_BACKWARD))
10467  return GetSpeed(MOVE_RUN_BACK);
10468 
10469  return GetSpeed(MOVE_RUN);
10470 }
10471 
10472 struct SetSpeedRateHelper
10473 {
10474  explicit SetSpeedRateHelper(UnitMoveType _mtype, bool _forced) : mtype(_mtype), forced(_forced) {}
10475  void operator()(Unit* unit) const { unit->UpdateSpeed(mtype, forced); }
10476  UnitMoveType mtype;
10477  bool forced;
10478 };
10479 
10480 void Unit::SetSpeedRate(UnitMoveType mtype, float rate, bool forced)
10481 {
10482  rate = std::max(rate, 0.01f);
10483 
10484  // Update speed only on change
10485  if (m_speed_rate[mtype] != rate)
10486  {
10487  m_speed_rate[mtype] = rate;
10488  propagateSpeedChange();
10489 
10490  const SpeedOpcodePair& speedOpcodes = SetSpeed2Opc_table[mtype];
10491 
10492  if (forced && IsClientControlled())
10493  {
10494  Player* player = const_cast<Player*>(GetControllingPlayer());
10495  auto const counter = player->GetSession()->GetOrderCounter();
10496 
10497  // register forced speed changes for WorldSession::HandleForceSpeedChangeAck
10498  // and do it only for real sent packets and use run for run/mounted as client expected
10499  ++player->m_forced_speed_changes[mtype];
10500 
10501  WorldPacket data(speedOpcodes[0], 18);
10502  data << GetPackGUID();
10503  data << counter;
10504  if (mtype == MOVE_RUN)
10505  data << uint8(0); // new 2.1.0
10506  data << GetSpeed(mtype);
10507  player->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
10508  player->GetSession()->GetAnticheat()->OrderSent(data.GetOpcode(), counter);
10509  player->GetSession()->IncrementOrderCounter();
10510  }
10511  else
10512  {
10513  WorldPacket data(speedOpcodes[1], 12);
10514  data << GetPackGUID();
10515  data << float(GetSpeed(mtype));
10516  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
10517  }
10518  }
10519 
10520  CallForAllControlledUnits(SetSpeedRateHelper(mtype, forced), CONTROLLED_PET | CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS | CONTROLLED_CHARM | CONTROLLED_MINIPET);
10521 }
10522 
10523 void Unit::SetDeathState(DeathState s)
10524 {
10525  if (s == JUST_DIED)
10526  {
10527  RemoveAllAurasOnDeath();
10528  BreakCharmOutgoing();
10529  BreakCharmIncoming();
10530  RemoveMiniPet();
10531  UnsummonAllTotems();
10532 
10533  StopMoving();
10534  i_motionMaster.Clear(false, true);
10535  if (!CanFly() || !i_motionMaster.MoveFall())
10536  i_motionMaster.MoveIdle();
10537 
10538  // Unsummon vehicle accessories
10539  if (IsVehicle())
10540  m_vehicleInfo->RemoveAccessoriesFromMap();
10541 
10542  // Unboard from transport
10543  if (GetTransportInfo() && ((Unit*)GetTransportInfo()->GetTransport())->IsVehicle())
10544  ((Unit*)GetTransportInfo()->GetTransport())->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE, GetObjectGuid());
10545 
10546  GetCombatManager().StopEvade();
10547 
10548  ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_HEALTHLESS_20_PERCENT, false);
10549  ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_HEALTHLESS_35_PERCENT, false);
10550  // remove aurastates allowing special moves
10551  ClearAllReactives();
10552  ClearDiminishings();
10553 
10554  DespawnSummonsOnDeath();
10555  }
10556  else if (s == JUST_ALIVED)
10557  {
10558  RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SKINNABLE); // clear skinnable for creature and player (at battleground)
10559  ScheduleAINotify(GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT ? sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_UINT32_CREATURE_RESPAWN_AGGRO_DELAY) : 0, true);
10560  }
10561 
10562  if (s != ALIVE && s != JUST_ALIVED)
10563  {
10564  CombatStop();
10565  ClearComboPointHolders(); // any combo points pointed to unit lost at it death
10566 
10567  InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
10568  }
10569 
10570  // TODO:: what is/was that?
10571  /*if (m_deathState != ALIVE && s == ALIVE)
10572  {
10573  //_ApplyAllAuraMods();
10574  }*/
10575  m_deathState = s;
10576 }
10577 
10578 /*########################################
10579 ######## ########
10580 ######## AGGRO SYSTEM ########
10581 ######## ########
10582 ########################################*/
10583 
10584 // Check if this unit is controlled by provided controller or by one of its friendly faction
10585 bool Unit::IsTargetUnderControl(Unit const& target) const
10586 {
10587  ObjectGuid charmerGuid = GetCharmerGuid();
10588 
10589  if (!charmerGuid)
10590  return false;
10591 
10592  if (target.GetCharmerGuid() == charmerGuid)
10593  return true;
10594 
10595  // also check if this unit is controlled by another creature from friendly faction
10596  if (Unit const* charmer = GetMap()->GetUnit(charmerGuid))
10597  {
10598  if (target.IsEnemy(charmer))
10599  return true;
10600  }
10601 
10602  return false;
10603 }
10604 
10605 bool Unit::CanHaveThreatList(bool ignoreAliveState/*=false*/) const
10606 {
10607  // only alive units can have threat list
10608  if (!IsAlive() && !ignoreAliveState)
10609  return false;
10610 
10611  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) // only charmed players have a threat list
10612  return !HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
10613 
10614  Creature const* creature = static_cast<Creature const*>(this);
10615 
10616  // totems can not have threat list
10617  if (creature->IsTotem() && HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
10618  return false;
10619 
10620  // pets can not have a threat list, unless they are controlled by a creature
10621  if (creature->IsPet() && HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
10622  {
10623  Pet const* pet = static_cast<Pet const*>(creature);
10624  return pet->getPetType() == GUARDIAN_PET || pet->getPetType() == PROTECTOR_PET;
10625  }
10626 
10627  // charmed units can not have a threat list if charmed by player
10628  if (creature->GetCharmerGuid().IsPlayer())
10629  return false;
10630 
10631  return true;
10632 }
10633 
10634 //======================================================================
10635 
10636 float Unit::ApplyTotalThreatModifier(float threat, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask)
10637 {
10638  if (!HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_THREAT))
10639  return threat;
10640 
10641  if (schoolMask == SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NONE)
10642  return threat;
10643 
10644  SpellSchools school = GetFirstSchoolInMask(schoolMask);
10645 
10646  return threat * m_threatModifier[school];
10647 }
10648 
10649 //======================================================================
10650 
10651 void Unit::AddThreat(Unit* pVictim, float threat /*= 0.0f*/, bool crit /*= false*/, SpellSchoolMask schoolMask /*= SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NONE*/, SpellEntry const* threatSpell /*= nullptr*/ /*= nullptr*/)
10652 {
10653  if (threatSpell && threatSpell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_NO_HARMFUL_THREAT))
10654  return;
10655 
10656  // Only mobs can manage threat lists
10657  if (CanHaveThreatList())
10658  getThreatManager().addThreat(pVictim, threat, crit, schoolMask, threatSpell, false);
10659 }
10660 
10661 //======================================================================
10662 
10663 void Unit::DeleteThreatList()
10664 {
10665  if (CanHaveThreatList(true) && !getThreatManager().isThreatListEmpty())
10666  SendThreatClear();
10667 
10668  getThreatManager().clearReferences();
10669  getHostileRefManager().deleteReferences();
10670 }
10671 
10672 //======================================================================
10673 
10674 void Unit::TauntUpdate()
10675 {
10676  if (!CanHaveThreatList())
10677  return;
10678 
10679  getThreatManager().TauntUpdate();
10680 }
10681 
10682 void Unit::FixateTarget(Unit* taunter)
10683 {
10684  if (!CanHaveThreatList())
10685  return;
10686 
10687  getThreatManager().FixateTarget(taunter);
10688 }
10689 
10690 //======================================================================
10691 
10692 bool Unit::SelectHostileTarget()
10693 {
10694  // function provides main threat functionality
10695  // next-victim-selection algorithm and evade mode are called
10696  // threat list sorting etc.
10697 
10698  if (!this->IsAlive())
10699  return false;
10700 
10701  // This function only useful once AI has been initialized
10702  if (!AI())
10703  return false;
10704 
10705  auto evadeFunc = [&]()
10706  {
10707  // enter in evade mode in other case
10708  FixateTarget(nullptr);
10709  AI()->EnterEvadeMode();
10710  };
10711 
10712  if (!AI()->CanExecuteCombatAction())
10713  {
10714  if (Unit* target = GetMap()->GetUnit(GetTargetGuid()))
10715  if (target != this)
10716  SetInFront(target);
10717 
10718  // do not evade during combat script running
10719  // some scripts start in combat and disengage all attackers but npc is still locked in combat
10720  if (IsInCombat() && getThreatManager().isThreatListEmpty() && IsCrowdControlled() && !AI()->GetCombatScriptStatus())
10721  evadeFunc();
10722  return !((AI()->GetCombatScriptStatus() || IsCrowdControlled()) && getThreatManager().isThreatListEmpty());
10723  }
10724 
10725  Unit* target = nullptr;
10726  Unit* oldTarget = GetVictim();
10727 
10728  if (!target && !getThreatManager().isThreatListEmpty())
10729  target = getThreatManager().getHostileTarget();
10730 
10731  if (!target && oldTarget)
10732  {
10733  if (IsIgnoringRangedTargets())
10734  {
10735  if (CanReachWithMeleeAttack(oldTarget))
10736  target = oldTarget;
10737  else
10738  {
10739  m_attacking = nullptr;
10740  SetTargetGuid(ObjectGuid());
10741  oldTarget->_removeAttacker(this);
10742  }
10743  }
10744  }
10745 
10746  if (target)
10747  {
10748  if (!AI()->IsTargetingRestricted())
10749  {
10750  // needs a much better check, seems to cause quite a bit of trouble
10751  SetInFront(target);
10752 
10753  if (oldTarget != target || GetTarget() != target)
10754  AI()->AttackStart(target);
10755  }
10756 
10757  bool evade = false;
10758 
10759  // check if currently selected target is reachable
10760  // NOTE: path alrteady generated from AttackStart()
10761  if (AI()->IsCombatMovement())
10762  {
10763  if (!GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrent()->IsReachable())
10764  {
10765  if (!AI()->IsRangedUnit() && getThreatManager().getThreatList().size() == 1 && target->IsFlying() &&
10766  GetDistanceZ(target) > CREATURE_Z_ATTACK_RANGE_MELEE)
10767  {
10768  getThreatManager().modifyThreatPercent(target, -101);
10769  evade = true;
10770  }
10771  else
10772  {
10773  if (!GetCombatManager().IsInEvadeMode())
10774  GetCombatManager().StartEvadeTimer();
10775  }
10776  }
10777  else if(GetCombatManager().IsInEvadeMode())
10778  GetCombatManager().StopEvade();
10779  }
10780 
10781  if (!evade)
10782  return true;
10783  }
10784  if (IsIgnoringRangedTargets() && !getThreatManager().isThreatListEmpty())
10785  return true;
10786  // return true but no target
10787 
10788  // no target but something prevent go to evade mode
10789  if (!IsInCombat())
10790  return false;
10791 
10792  // last case when creature don't must go to evade mode:
10793  // it in combat but attacker not make any damage and not enter to aggro radius to have record in threat list
10794  // for example at owner command to pet attack some far away creature
10795  // Note: creature not have targeted movement generator but have attacker in this case
10796  if (GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrentMovementGeneratorType() != CHASE_MOTION_TYPE)
10797  {
10798  for (auto m_attacker : m_attackers)
10799  {
10800  if (m_attacker->IsInMap(this) && CanAttack(m_attacker) && m_attacker->isInAccessablePlaceFor(this))
10801  return false;
10802  }
10803  }
10804 
10805  evadeFunc();
10806 
10807  return false;
10808 }
10809 
10810 //======================================================================
10811 //======================================================================
10812 //======================================================================
10813 int32 Unit::CalculateAuraDuration(SpellEntry const* spellProto, uint32 effectMask, int32 duration, Unit const* caster)
10814 {
10815  if (duration <= 0)
10816  return duration;
10817 
10818  int32 mechanicMod = 0;
10819  uint32 mechanicMask = GetSpellMechanicMask(spellProto, effectMask);
10820 
10821  for (int32 mechanic = FIRST_MECHANIC; mechanic < MAX_MECHANIC; ++mechanic)
10822  {
10823  if (!(mechanicMask & (1 << (mechanic - 1))))
10824  continue;
10825 
10826  int32 stackingMod = GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MECHANIC_DURATION_MOD, mechanic);
10827  int32 nonStackingMod = GetMaxNegativeAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MECHANIC_DURATION_MOD_NOT_STACK, mechanic);
10828 
10829  mechanicMod = std::min(mechanicMod, std::min(stackingMod, nonStackingMod));
10830  }
10831 
10832  int32 dispelMod = 0;
10833  int32 dmgClassMod = 0;
10834 
10835  if (!IsPositiveSpell(spellProto))
10836  {
10837  dispelMod = GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DURATION_OF_EFFECTS_BY_DISPEL, spellProto->Dispel);
10838  dmgClassMod = GetTotalAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DURATION_OF_MAGIC_EFFECTS, spellProto->DmgClass);
10839  }
10840 
10841  int32 durationMod = std::min(mechanicMod, std::min(dispelMod, dmgClassMod));
10842 
10843  if (durationMod != 0)
10844  {
10845  duration = int32(int64(duration) * (100 + durationMod) / 100);
10846 
10847  if (duration < 0)
10848  duration = 0;
10849  }
10850
