10851  if (caster == this)
10852  {
10853  switch (spellProto->SpellFamilyName)
10854  {
10855  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
10856  // Thorns
10857  if (spellProto->SpellIconID == 53 && (spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000100)))
10858  {
10859  // Glyph of Thorns
10860  if (Aura* aur = GetAura(57862, EFFECT_INDEX_0))
10861  duration += aur->GetModifier()->m_amount * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS;
10862  }
10863  break;
10864  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
10865  // Blessing of Might
10866  if (spellProto->SpellIconID == 298 && spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000002))
10867  {
10868  // Glyph of Blessing of Might
10869  if (Aura* aur = GetAura(57958, EFFECT_INDEX_0))
10870  duration += aur->GetModifier()->m_amount * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS;
10871  }
10872  // Blessing of Wisdom
10873  else if (spellProto->SpellIconID == 306 && spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000010000))
10874  {
10875  // Glyph of Blessing of Wisdom
10876  if (Aura* aur = GetAura(57979, EFFECT_INDEX_0))
10877  duration += aur->GetModifier()->m_amount * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS;
10878  }
10879  break;
10880  default:
10881  break;
10882  }
10883  }
10884 
10885  return duration;
10886 }
10887 
10888 DiminishingLevels Unit::GetDiminishing(DiminishingGroup group)
10889 {
10890  for (auto& i : m_Diminishing)
10891  {
10892  if (i.DRGroup != group)
10893  continue;
10894 
10895  if (!i.hitCount)
10896  return DIMINISHING_LEVEL_1;
10897 
10898  if (!i.hitTime)
10899  return DIMINISHING_LEVEL_1;
10900 
10901  const bool pvp = (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER);
10902  const bool diminished = IsDiminishingReturnsGroupDurationDiminished(group, pvp);
10903 
10904  // If enough time has passed sinc the last spell from this group was casted - reset the count
10905  if (diminished && i.stack == 0 && WorldTimer::getMSTimeDiff(i.hitTime, WorldTimer::getMSTime()) > (15 * IN_MILLISECONDS))
10906  {
10907  i.hitCount = DIMINISHING_LEVEL_1;
10908  return DIMINISHING_LEVEL_1;
10909  }
10910  // or else increase the count.
10911  return DiminishingLevels(i.hitCount);
10912  }
10913  return DIMINISHING_LEVEL_1;
10914 }
10915 
10916 void Unit::IncrDiminishing(DiminishingGroup group, bool pvp)
10917 {
10918  const bool diminished = IsDiminishingReturnsGroupDurationDiminished(group, pvp);
10919 
10920  // Checking for existing in the table
10921  for (auto& i : m_Diminishing)
10922  {
10923  if (i.DRGroup != group)
10924  continue;
10925 
10926  if (!diminished)
10927  i.hitCount += (i.hitCount < std::numeric_limits<uint32>::max() ? 1 : 0);
10928  else if (i.hitCount < DIMINISHING_LEVEL_IMMUNE)
10929  i.hitCount += 1;
10930  else
10931  i.hitCount = DIMINISHING_LEVEL_IMMUNE;
10932 
10933  return;
10934  }
10935  m_Diminishing.push_back(DiminishingReturn(group, GetMap()->GetCurrentMSTime(), DIMINISHING_LEVEL_2));
10936 }
10937 
10938 void Unit::ApplyDiminishingToDuration(DiminishingGroup group, int32& duration, Unit* caster, DiminishingLevels Level, bool isReflected, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, bool hasAuraScript)
10939 {
10940  if (duration == -1 || group == DIMINISHING_NONE || (!isReflected && caster->CanAssist(this)))
10941  return;
10942 
10943  const bool pvp = (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED) && caster->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED));
10944 
10945  if (!hasAuraScript) // Warning: A spell script will override this in GetAuraDuration and perform correct checks - all in the end should use this
10946  {
10947  // Duration of crowd control abilities on pvp target is limited by 10 sec. (2.2.0)
10948  int32 limitduration = GetDiminishingReturnsLimitDuration(group, spellInfo);
10949  if (limitduration > 0 && duration > limitduration)
10950  if (pvp)
10951  duration = limitduration;
10952  }
10953 
10954  float mod = 1.0f;
10955 
10956  // Some diminishings applies to mobs too (for example, Stun)
10957  if (IsSubjectToDiminishingLevels(group, pvp))
10958  {
10959  if (IsDiminishingReturnsGroupDurationDiminished(group, pvp))
10960  {
10961  DiminishingLevels diminish = Level;
10962 
10963  switch (diminish)
10964  {
10965  case DIMINISHING_LEVEL_1: break;
10966  case DIMINISHING_LEVEL_2: mod = 0.5f; break;
10967  case DIMINISHING_LEVEL_3: mod = 0.25f; break;
10968  case DIMINISHING_LEVEL_IMMUNE: mod = 0.0f; break;
10969  default: break;
10970  }
10971  }
10972  }
10973 
10974  duration = int32(duration * mod);
10975 }
10976 
10977 void Unit::ApplyDiminishingAura(DiminishingGroup group, bool apply)
10978 {
10979  // Checking for existing in the table
10980  for (auto& i : m_Diminishing)
10981  {
10982  if (i.DRGroup != group)
10983  continue;
10984 
10985  i.hitTime = WorldTimer::getMSTime();
10986 
10987  if (apply)
10988  i.stack += 1;
10989  else if (i.stack)
10990  i.stack -= 1;
10991 
10992  break;
10993  }
10994 }
10995 
10996 bool Unit::isVisibleForInState(Player const* u, WorldObject const* viewPoint, bool inVisibleList) const
10997 {
10998  return IsVisibleForOrDetect(u, viewPoint, false, inVisibleList, false);
10999 }
11000 
11002 bool Unit::isInvisibleForAlive() const
11003 {
11004  if (m_AuraFlags & UNIT_AURAFLAG_ALIVE_INVISIBLE)
11005  return true;
11006  // TODO: maybe spiritservices also have just an aura
11007  return isSpiritService();
11008 }
11009 
11010 bool Unit::IsSuppressedTarget(Unit* target) const
11011 {
11012  MANGOS_ASSERT(target);
11013 
11014  if (target->IsImmuneToDamage(GetMeleeDamageSchoolMask()))
11015  return true;
11016 
11017  if (target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_CONFUSED))
11018  return true;
11019 
11020  if (target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED) && target->HasDamageInterruptibleStunAura())
11021  return true;
11022 
11023 #ifdef PRENERF_2_1
11024  // 2.3.0 - fear no longer applies suppression - in case of uncomment, need to adjust IsSuppressedTarget
11025  if (target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING))
11026  return true;
11027 #endif
11028 
11029  return false;
11030 }
11031 
11032 bool Unit::IsOfflineTarget(Unit* victim) const
11033 {
11034  if (!IsIgnoringFeignDeath() && victim->IsFeigningDeathSuccessfully())
11035  return true;
11036 
11037  return false;
11038 }
11039 
11040 uint32 Unit::GetCreatureType() const
11041 {
11042  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
11043  {
11044  SpellShapeshiftFormEntry const* ssEntry = sSpellShapeshiftFormStore.LookupEntry(GetShapeshiftForm());
11045  if (ssEntry && ssEntry->creatureType > 0)
11046  return ssEntry->creatureType;
11047  return CREATURE_TYPE_HUMANOID;
11048  }
11049  return ((Creature*)this)->GetCreatureInfo()->CreatureType;
11050 }
11051 
11052 /*#######################################
11053 ######## ########
11054 ######## STAT SYSTEM ########
11055 ######## ########
11056 #######################################*/
11057 
11058 bool Unit::HandleStatModifier(UnitMods unitMod, UnitModifierType modifierType, float amount, bool apply)
11059 {
11060  if (unitMod >= UNIT_MOD_END || modifierType >= MODIFIER_TYPE_END)
11061  {
11062  sLog.outError("ERROR in HandleStatModifier(): nonexistent UnitMods or wrong UnitModifierType!");
11063  return false;
11064  }
11065 
11066  float val;
11067 
11068  switch (modifierType)
11069  {
11070  case BASE_VALUE:
11071  case TOTAL_VALUE:
11072  m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][modifierType] += apply ? amount : -amount;
11073  break;
11074  case BASE_PCT:
11075  case TOTAL_PCT:
11076  if (amount <= -100.0f) // small hack-fix for -100% modifiers
11077  amount = -200.0f;
11078 
11079  val = (100.0f + amount) / 100.0f;
11080  m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][modifierType] *= apply ? val : (1.0f / val);
11081  break;
11082 
11083  default:
11084  break;
11085  }
11086 
11087  if (!CanModifyStats())
11088  return false;
11089 
11090  switch (unitMod)
11091  {
11092  case UNIT_MOD_STAT_STRENGTH:
11093  case UNIT_MOD_STAT_AGILITY:
11094  case UNIT_MOD_STAT_STAMINA:
11095  case UNIT_MOD_STAT_INTELLECT:
11096  case UNIT_MOD_STAT_SPIRIT: UpdateStats(GetStatByAuraGroup(unitMod)); break;
11097 
11098  case UNIT_MOD_ARMOR: UpdateArmor(); break;
11099  case UNIT_MOD_HEALTH: UpdateMaxHealth(); break;
11100 
11101  case UNIT_MOD_MANA:
11102  case UNIT_MOD_RAGE:
11103  case UNIT_MOD_FOCUS:
11104  case UNIT_MOD_ENERGY:
11105  case UNIT_MOD_HAPPINESS:
11106  case UNIT_MOD_RUNE:
11107  case UNIT_MOD_RUNIC_POWER: UpdateMaxPower(GetPowerTypeByAuraGroup(unitMod)); break;
11108 
11109  case UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_HOLY:
11110  case UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_FIRE:
11111  case UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_NATURE:
11112  case UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_FROST:
11113  case UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_SHADOW:
11114  case UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_ARCANE: UpdateResistances(GetSpellSchoolByAuraGroup(unitMod)); break;
11115 
11116  case UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER: UpdateAttackPowerAndDamage(); break;
11117  case UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER_RANGED: UpdateAttackPowerAndDamage(true); break;
11118 
11119  case UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_MAINHAND: UpdateDamagePhysical(BASE_ATTACK); break;
11120  case UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_OFFHAND: UpdateDamagePhysical(OFF_ATTACK); break;
11121  case UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_RANGED: UpdateDamagePhysical(RANGED_ATTACK); break;
11122 
11123  default:
11124  break;
11125  }
11126 
11127  return true;
11128 }
11129 
11130 float Unit::GetModifierValue(UnitMods unitMod, UnitModifierType modifierType) const
11131 {
11132  if (unitMod >= UNIT_MOD_END || modifierType >= MODIFIER_TYPE_END)
11133  {
11134  sLog.outError("attempt to access nonexistent modifier value from UnitMods!");
11135  return 0.0f;
11136  }
11137 
11138  if (modifierType == TOTAL_PCT && m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][modifierType] <= 0.0f)
11139  return 0.0f;
11140 
11141  return m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][modifierType];
11142 }
11143 
11144 float Unit::GetTotalStatValue(Stats stat) const
11145 {
11146  UnitMods unitMod = UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_STAT_START + stat);
11147 
11148  if (m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][TOTAL_PCT] <= 0.0f)
11149  return 0.0f;
11150 
11151  // value = ((base_value * base_pct) + total_value) * total_pct
11152  float value = m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][BASE_VALUE] + GetCreateStat(stat);
11153  value *= m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][BASE_PCT];
11154  value += m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][TOTAL_VALUE];
11155  value *= m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][TOTAL_PCT];
11156 
11157  return value;
11158 }
11159 
11160 float Unit::GetTotalResistanceValue(SpellSchools school) const
11161 {
11162  UnitMods unitMod = UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START + school);
11163 
11164  if (m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][TOTAL_PCT] <= 0.0f)
11165  return 0.0f;
11166 
11167  // value = ((base_value * base_pct) + total_value) * total_pct
11168  float value = GetCreateResistance(school);
11169 
11170  const bool vulnerability = (value < 0);
11171 
11172  value += m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][BASE_VALUE];
11173  value *= m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][BASE_PCT];
11174  value += m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][TOTAL_VALUE];
11175  value *= m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][TOTAL_PCT];
11176 
11177  // Auras can't cause resistances to dip below 0 since early vanilla
11178  // PS: Actually, they can, but only visually advertised in the fields, calculations ignore it, we limit both
11179  if (value < 0 && !vulnerability)
11180  value = 0;
11181 
11182  return value;
11183 }
11184 
11185 float Unit::GetTotalAuraModValue(UnitMods unitMod) const
11186 {
11187  if (unitMod >= UNIT_MOD_END)
11188  {
11189  sLog.outError("attempt to access nonexistent UnitMods in GetTotalAuraModValue()!");
11190  return 0.0f;
11191  }
11192 
11193  if (m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][TOTAL_PCT] <= 0.0f)
11194  return 0.0f;
11195 
11196  float value = m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][BASE_VALUE];
11197  value *= m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][BASE_PCT];
11198  value += m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][TOTAL_VALUE];
11199  value *= m_auraModifiersGroup[unitMod][TOTAL_PCT];
11200 
11201  return value;
11202 }
11203 
11204 SpellSchools Unit::GetSpellSchoolByAuraGroup(UnitMods unitMod) const
11205 {
11206  SpellSchools school = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL;
11207 
11208  switch (unitMod)
11209  {
11210  case UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_HOLY: school = SPELL_SCHOOL_HOLY; break;
11211  case UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_FIRE: school = SPELL_SCHOOL_FIRE; break;
11212  case UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_NATURE: school = SPELL_SCHOOL_NATURE; break;
11213  case UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_FROST: school = SPELL_SCHOOL_FROST; break;
11214  case UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_SHADOW: school = SPELL_SCHOOL_SHADOW; break;
11215  case UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_ARCANE: school = SPELL_SCHOOL_ARCANE; break;
11216 
11217  default:
11218  break;
11219  }
11220 
11221  return school;
11222 }
11223 
11224 Stats Unit::GetStatByAuraGroup(UnitMods unitMod) const
11225 {
11226  Stats stat = STAT_STRENGTH;
11227 
11228  switch (unitMod)
11229  {
11230  case UNIT_MOD_STAT_STRENGTH: stat = STAT_STRENGTH; break;
11231  case UNIT_MOD_STAT_AGILITY: stat = STAT_AGILITY; break;
11232  case UNIT_MOD_STAT_STAMINA: stat = STAT_STAMINA; break;
11233  case UNIT_MOD_STAT_INTELLECT: stat = STAT_INTELLECT; break;
11234  case UNIT_MOD_STAT_SPIRIT: stat = STAT_SPIRIT; break;
11235 
11236  default:
11237  break;
11238  }
11239 
11240  return stat;
11241 }
11242 
11243 Powers Unit::GetPowerTypeByAuraGroup(UnitMods unitMod) const
11244 {
11245  switch (unitMod)
11246  {
11247  case UNIT_MOD_MANA: return POWER_MANA;
11248  case UNIT_MOD_RAGE: return POWER_RAGE;
11249  case UNIT_MOD_FOCUS: return POWER_FOCUS;
11250  case UNIT_MOD_ENERGY: return POWER_ENERGY;
11251  case UNIT_MOD_HAPPINESS: return POWER_HAPPINESS;
11252  case UNIT_MOD_RUNE: return POWER_RUNE;
11253  case UNIT_MOD_RUNIC_POWER: return POWER_RUNIC_POWER;
11254  default: return POWER_MANA;
11255  }
11256 }
11257 
11258 float Unit::GetTotalAttackPowerValue(WeaponAttackType attType) const
11259 {
11260  if (attType == RANGED_ATTACK)
11261  {
11262  int32 ap = GetInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER) + GetInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER_MODS);
11263  if (ap < 0)
11264  return 0.0f;
11265  return ap * (1.0f + GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER_MULTIPLIER));
11266  }
11267  int32 ap = GetInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_ATTACK_POWER) + GetInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_ATTACK_POWER_MODS);
11268  if (ap < 0)
11269  return 0.0f;
11270  return ap * (1.0f + GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_ATTACK_POWER_MULTIPLIER));
11271 }
11272 
11273 float Unit::GetBaseWeaponDamage(WeaponAttackType attType, WeaponDamageRange damageRange, uint8 index) const
11274 {
11275  if (attType == OFF_ATTACK && !hasOffhandWeaponForAttack())
11276  return 0.0f;
11277 
11278  return (m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[attType].damage[index].value[damageRange] * m_modAttackBaseDPSPct[attType]);
11279 }
11280 
11281 SpellSchoolMask Unit::GetAttackDamageSchoolMask(WeaponAttackType attType, bool first /*= false*/) const
11282 {
11283  if (first)
11284  return SpellSchoolMask(1 << (m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[attType].damage[0].school));
11285 
11286  uint32 mask = SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NONE;
11287  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[attType].lines; i++)
11288  mask |= (1 << m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[attType].damage[i].school);
11289  return SpellSchoolMask(mask);
11290 }
11291 
11292 void Unit::SetAttackDamageSchool(WeaponAttackType attType, SpellSchools school)
11293 {
11294  for (uint8 i = 0; i < m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[attType].lines; i++)
11295  m_weaponDamageInfo.weapon[attType].damage[i].school = school;
11296 }
11297 
11298 void Unit::SetLevel(uint32 lvl)
11299 {
11300  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_LEVEL, lvl);
11301 
11302  // group update
11303  if ((GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) && ((Player*)this)->GetGroup())
11304  ((Player*)this)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_LEVEL);
11305 }
11306 
11307 void Unit::SetHealth(uint32 val)
11308 {
11309  uint32 maxHealth = GetMaxHealth();
11310  if (maxHealth < val)
11311  val = maxHealth;
11312 
11313  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_HEALTH, val);
11314 
11315  // group update
11316  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
11317  {
11318  if (((Player*)this)->GetGroup())
11319  ((Player*)this)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_CUR_HP);
11320  }
11321  else if (HasCharmer())
11322  {
11323  Unit* charmer = GetCharmer();
11324  if (charmer && (charmer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) && ((Player*)charmer)->GetGroup())
11325  ((Player*)charmer)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_PET_CUR_HP);
11326  }
11327 }
11328 
11329 void Unit::SetMaxHealth(uint32 val)
11330 {
11331  uint32 health = GetHealth();
11332  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MAXHEALTH, val);
11333 
11334  // group update
11335  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
11336  {
11337  if (((Player*)this)->GetGroup())
11338  ((Player*)this)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_MAX_HP);
11339  }
11340  else if (HasCharmer())
11341  {
11342  Unit* charmer = GetCharmer();
11343  if (charmer && (charmer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) && ((Player*)charmer)->GetGroup())
11344  ((Player*)charmer)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_PET_MAX_HP);
11345  }
11346 
11347  if (val < health)
11348  SetHealth(val);
11349 }
11350 
11351 void Unit::SetHealthPercent(float percent)
11352 {
11353  uint32 newHealth = GetMaxHealth() * percent / 100.0f;
11354  SetHealth(newHealth);
11355 }
11356 
11357 void Unit::SetPower(Powers power, uint32 val, bool withPowerUpdate /*= true*/)
11358 {
11359  if (GetPower(power) == val)
11360  return;
11361 
11362  uint32 maxPower = GetMaxPower(power);
11363  if (maxPower < val)
11364  val = maxPower;
11365 
11366  SetStatInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_POWER1 + power, val);
11367 
11368  if (withPowerUpdate)
11369  {
11370  WorldPacket data(SMSG_POWER_UPDATE, 8 + 1 + 4);
11371  data << GetPackGUID();
11372  data << uint8(power);
11373  data << uint32(val);
11374  SendMessageToSet(data, GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER);
11375  }
11376 
11377  // group update
11378  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
11379  {
11380  if (((Player*)this)->GetGroup())
11381  ((Player*)this)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_CUR_POWER);
11382  }
11383  else if (HasCharmer())
11384  {
11385  Unit* charmer = GetCharmer();
11386  if (charmer && (charmer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) && ((Player*)charmer)->GetGroup())
11387  ((Player*)charmer)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_PET_CUR_POWER);
11388  }
11389 
11390  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((Creature*)this)->IsPet())
11391  {
11392  Pet* pet = (Pet*)this;
11393  // Update the pet's character sheet with happiness damage bonus
11394  if (pet->getPetType() == HUNTER_PET && power == POWER_HAPPINESS)
11395  pet->UpdateDamagePhysical(BASE_ATTACK);
11396  }
11397 }
11398 
11399 void Unit::SetMaxPower(Powers power, uint32 val)
11400 {
11401  uint32 cur_power = GetPower(power);
11402  SetStatInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MAXPOWER1 + power, val);
11403 
11404  // group update
11405  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
11406  {
11407  if (((Player*)this)->GetGroup())
11408  ((Player*)this)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_MAX_POWER);
11409  }
11410  else if (HasCharmer())
11411  {
11412  Unit* charmer = GetCharmer();
11413  if (charmer && (charmer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) && ((Player*)charmer)->GetGroup())
11414  ((Player*)charmer)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_PET_MAX_POWER);
11415  }
11416 
11417  if (val < cur_power)
11418  SetPower(power, val);
11419 }
11420 
11421 void Unit::ApplyPowerMod(Powers power, uint32 val, bool apply)
11422 {
11423  ApplyModUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_POWER1 + power, val, apply);
11424 
11425  // group update
11426  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
11427  {
11428  if (((Player*)this)->GetGroup())
11429  ((Player*)this)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_CUR_POWER);
11430  }
11431  else if (HasCharmer())
11432  {
11433  Unit* charmer = GetCharmer();
11434  if (charmer && (charmer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) && ((Player*)charmer)->GetGroup())
11435  ((Player*)charmer)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_PET_CUR_POWER);
11436  }
11437 }
11438 
11439 void Unit::ApplyMaxPowerMod(Powers power, uint32 val, bool apply)
11440 {
11441  ApplyModUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MAXPOWER1 + power, val, apply);
11442 
11443  // group update
11444  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
11445  {
11446  if (((Player*)this)->GetGroup())
11447  ((Player*)this)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_MAX_POWER);
11448  }
11449  else if (HasCharmer())
11450  {
11451  Unit* charmer = GetCharmer();
11452  if (charmer && (charmer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) && ((Player*)charmer)->GetGroup())
11453  ((Player*)charmer)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_PET_MAX_POWER);
11454  }
11455 }
11456 
11457 void Unit::ApplyAuraProcTriggerDamage(Aura* aura, bool apply)
11458 {
11459  AuraList& tAuraProcTriggerDamage = m_modAuras[SPELL_AURA_PROC_TRIGGER_DAMAGE];
11460  if (apply)
11461  tAuraProcTriggerDamage.push_back(aura);
11462  else
11463  tAuraProcTriggerDamage.remove(aura);
11464 }
11465 
11466 uint32 Unit::GetCreatePowers(Powers power) const
11467 {
11468  switch (power)
11469  {
11470  case POWER_HEALTH: return 0; // is it really should be here?
11471  case POWER_MANA: return GetCreateMana();
11472  case POWER_RAGE: return IsPlayer() ? POWER_RAGE_DEFAULT : 0;
11473  case POWER_FOCUS: return (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || !((Creature const*)this)->IsPet() || ((Pet const*)this)->getPetType() != HUNTER_PET ? 0 : POWER_FOCUS_DEFAULT);
11474  case POWER_ENERGY: return POWER_ENERGY_DEFAULT; // wotlk fills energy
11475  case POWER_HAPPINESS: return (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || !((Creature const*)this)->IsPet() || ((Pet const*)this)->getPetType() != HUNTER_PET ? 0 : POWER_HAPPINESS_DEFAULT);
11476  case POWER_RUNE: return (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && ((Player const*)this)->getClass() == CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT ? POWER_RUNE_DEFAULT : 0);
11477  case POWER_RUNIC_POWER: return (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && ((Player const*)this)->getClass() == CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT ? POWER_RUNIC_POWER_DEFAULT : 0);
11478  }
11479 
11480  return 0;
11481 }
11482 
11483 void Unit::AddToWorld()
11484 {
11485  WorldObject::AddToWorld();
11486  uint32 delay = 0;
11487  if (IsCreature() && !IsPlayerControlled())
11488  delay = GetUInt32Value(UNIT_CREATED_BY_SPELL) ? 1000 : sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_UINT32_CREATURE_RESPAWN_AGGRO_DELAY);
11489  ScheduleAINotify(delay);
11490 }
11491 
11492 void Unit::RemoveFromWorld()
11493 {
11494  // cleanup
11495  if (IsInWorld())
11496  {
11497  CombatStop();
11498  RemoveNotOwnTrackedTargetAuras();
11499  BreakCharmOutgoing();
11500  BreakCharmIncoming();
11501  RemoveGuardians(IsPlayer() || IsCreature() && static_cast<Creature*>(this)->IsTotem());
11502  // Remove non-guardian pet
11503  if (Pet* pet = GetPet())
11504  {
11505  pet->Unsummon(PET_SAVE_AS_DELETED, this);
11506  }
11507  RemoveMiniPet();
11508  UnsummonAllTotems();
11509  RemoveAllGameObjects();
11510  RemoveAllDynObjects();
11511  GetViewPoint().Event_RemovedFromWorld();
11512 
11513  if (!IsPlayer())
11514  if (GenericTransport* transport = GetTransport())
11515  transport->RemovePassenger(this);
11516 
11517  m_FollowingRefManager.clearReferences();
11518  }
11519 
11520  Object::RemoveFromWorld();
11521 }
11522 
11523 void Unit::CleanupsBeforeDelete()
11524 {
11525  if (m_uint32Values) // only for fully created object
11526  {
11527  InterruptNonMeleeSpells(true);
11528  m_events.KillAllEvents(false); // non-delatable (currently casted spells) will not deleted now but it will deleted at call in Map::RemoveAllObjectsInRemoveList
11529  ClearComboPointHolders();
11530  RemoveAllAuras(AURA_REMOVE_BY_DELETE);
11531  }
11532  WorldObject::CleanupsBeforeDelete();
11533 }
11534 
11535 CharmInfo* Unit::InitCharmInfo(Unit* charm)
11536 {
11537  delete m_charmInfo;
11538  m_charmInfo = new CharmInfo(charm);
11539 
11540  return m_charmInfo;
11541 }
11542 
11543 CharmInfo::CharmInfo(Unit* unit) :
11544  m_unit(unit), m_ai(nullptr), m_combatData(nullptr),
11545  m_CommandState(COMMAND_FOLLOW),
11546  m_petnumber(0), m_petLastAttackCommandTime(0), m_opener(0), m_openerMinRange(0),
11547  m_openerMaxRange(0), m_unitFieldFlags(0), m_unitFieldBytes2_1(0), m_retreating(false), m_stayPosSet(false),
11548  m_stayPosX(0), m_stayPosY(0), m_stayPosZ(0),
11549  m_stayPosO(0), m_walk(true), m_deleted(false)
11550 {
11551  for (auto& m_charmspell : m_charmspells)
11552  m_charmspell.SetActionAndType(0, ACT_DISABLED);
11553 }
11554 
11555 CharmInfo::~CharmInfo()
11556 {
11557  delete m_combatData;
11558  delete m_ai;
11559  m_deleted = true;
11560 }
11561 
11562 void CharmInfo::SetCharmState(std::string const& ainame, bool withNewThreatList /*= true*/)
11563 {
11564  SetCharmState(((!ainame.empty()) ? FactorySelector::GetSpecificAI(m_unit, ainame) : nullptr), withNewThreatList);
11565 }
11566 
11567 void CharmInfo::SetCharmState(UnitAI* ai, bool withNewThreatList /*= true*/)
11568 {
11569  m_ai = ai;
11570 
11571  if (withNewThreatList)
11572  m_combatData = new CombatData(m_unit);
11573 
11574  // Save specific pre-charm flags
11575  // Save entire bytes2_1
11576  m_unitFieldBytes2_1 = m_unit->GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, UNIT_BYTES_2_OFFSET_PVP_FLAG);
11577  // Save unit flags
11578  m_unitFieldFlags = m_unit->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS);
11579  SetWalk(m_unit->IsWalking());
11580 }
11581 
11582 void CharmInfo::ResetCharmState()
11583 {
11584  // Restore specific pre-charm flags
11585  // Restore entire bytes2_1
11586  m_unit->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, UNIT_BYTES_2_OFFSET_PVP_FLAG, m_unitFieldBytes2_1);
11587  // Restore unit flags
11588  uint32 savedUnitFlags = m_unitFieldFlags;
11589  if (savedUnitFlags & UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED)
11590  m_unit->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
11591  else
11592  m_unit->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
11593 
11594  if (savedUnitFlags & UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PLAYER)
11595  m_unit->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PLAYER);
11596  else
11597  m_unit->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PLAYER);
11598 
11599  if (savedUnitFlags & UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC)
11600  m_unit->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC);
11601  else
11602  m_unit->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC);
11603 
11604  m_unit->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PET_IN_COMBAT);
11605 
11606  if (m_unit->IsCreature())
11607  static_cast<Creature*>(m_unit)->SetWalk(GetWalk(), true);
11608 }
11609 
11610 void CharmInfo::InitPetActionBar()
11611 {
11612  // the first 3 SpellOrActions are attack, follow and stay
11613  for (uint32 i = 0; i < ACTION_BAR_INDEX_PET_SPELL_START - ACTION_BAR_INDEX_START; ++i)
11614  SetActionBar(ACTION_BAR_INDEX_START + i, COMMAND_ATTACK - i, ACT_COMMAND);
11615 
11616  // middle 4 SpellOrActions are spells/special attacks/abilities
11617  for (uint32 i = 0; i < ACTION_BAR_INDEX_PET_SPELL_END - ACTION_BAR_INDEX_PET_SPELL_START; ++i)
11618  SetActionBar(ACTION_BAR_INDEX_PET_SPELL_START + i, 0, ACT_DISABLED);
11619 
11620  // last 3 SpellOrActions are reactions
11621  for (uint32 i = 0; i < ACTION_BAR_INDEX_END - ACTION_BAR_INDEX_PET_SPELL_END; ++i)
11622  SetActionBar(ACTION_BAR_INDEX_PET_SPELL_END + i, COMMAND_ATTACK - i, ACT_REACTION);
11623 }
11624 
11625 void CharmInfo::InitEmptyActionBar()
11626 {
11627  for (uint32 x = ACTION_BAR_INDEX_START; x < ACTION_BAR_INDEX_END; ++x)
11628  SetActionBar(x, 0, ACT_PASSIVE);
11629 }
11630 
11631 void CharmInfo::InitVehicleCreateSpells()
11632 {
11633  InitEmptyActionBar();
11634 
11635  if (m_unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) // player vehicles don't have spells, keep the action bar empty
11636  return;
11637 
11638  std::vector<uint32> spells = m_unit->GetCharmSpells();
11639  for (uint32 x = 0; x < CREATURE_MAX_SPELLS; ++x)
11640  {
11641  if (IsPassiveSpell(spells[x]))
11642  m_unit->CastSpell(m_unit, spells[x], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
11643  else
11644  AddSpellToActionBar(spells[x], ActiveStates(0x8 + x), x);
11645  }
11646 }
11647 
11648 void CharmInfo::ProcessUnattackableTargets(CombatData* combatData)
11649 {
11650  // if after faction change and combat init cant attack target, remove it
11651  if (!combatData->threatManager.getThreatList().empty()) // threat list case
11652  {
11653  Unit::AttackerSet friendlyTargets;
11654  for (auto itr = combatData->threatManager.getThreatList().begin(); itr != combatData->threatManager.getThreatList().end(); ++itr)
11655  {
11656  Unit* attacker = (*itr)->getTarget();
11657  if (attacker->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
11658  continue;
11659 
11660  if (!m_unit->CanAttack(attacker))
11661  friendlyTargets.insert(attacker);
11662  }
11663 
11664  for (auto attacker : friendlyTargets)
11665  {
11666  attacker->AttackStop(true);
11667  attacker->getThreatManager().modifyThreatPercent(m_unit, -101);
11668  }
11669  }
11670  else // hostile refs case
11671  {
11672  Unit::AttackerSet friendlyTargets;
11673  for (auto itr = combatData->hostileRefManager.begin(); itr != combatData->hostileRefManager.end(); ++itr)
11674  {
11675  Unit* attacker = (*itr).getSource()->getOwner();
11676  if (attacker->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
11677  continue;
11678 
11679  if (!m_unit->CanAttack(attacker))
11680  friendlyTargets.insert(attacker);
11681  }
11682 
11683  for (auto attacker : friendlyTargets)
11684  {
11685  attacker->AttackStop(true);
11686  attacker->getThreatManager().modifyThreatPercent(m_unit, -101);
11687  }
11688  }
11689 }
11690 
11691 void CharmInfo::InitPossessCreateSpells()
11692 {
11693  InitEmptyActionBar(); // charm action bar
11694 
11695  if (m_unit->IsPlayer()) // possessed players don't have spells, keep the action bar empty
11696  return;
11697 
11698  std::vector<uint32> spells = m_unit->GetCharmSpells();
11699  for (uint32 x = 0; x < CREATURE_MAX_SPELLS; ++x)
11700  {
11701  if (spells[x] == 2 || (spells[x] == 0 && m_unit->hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_MELEE_ATTACKING)))
11702  SetActionBar(x, COMMAND_ATTACK, ACT_COMMAND);
11703  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spells[x]);
11704  if (spellInfo && spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NOT_AVAILABLE_WHILE_CHARMED))
11705  continue;
11706  if (spellInfo && IsPassiveSpell(spellInfo))
11707  m_unit->CastSpell(m_unit, spells[x], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
11708  else
11709  AddSpellToActionBar(spells[x], ACT_PASSIVE, x);
11710  }
11711 }
11712 
11713 void CharmInfo::InitCharmCreateSpells()
11714 {
11715  InitPetActionBar();
11716 
11717  SetActionBar(ACTION_BAR_INDEX_START, COMMAND_ATTACK, ACT_COMMAND);
11718 
11719  if (m_unit->IsPlayer()) // charmed players don't have spells
11720  return;
11721 
11722  std::vector<uint32> spells = m_unit->GetCharmSpells();
11723  for (uint32 x = 0; x < CREATURE_MAX_SPELLS; ++x)
11724  {
11725  uint32 spellId = spells[x];
11726  if (!spellId)
11727  {
11728  m_charmspells[x].SetActionAndType(spellId, ACT_DISABLED);
11729  continue;
11730  }
11731 
11732  if (spellId == 2) // hardcoded spell id 2 attack - only for possesss
11733  continue;
11734 
11735  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
11736  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NOT_AVAILABLE_WHILE_CHARMED))
11737  continue;
11738  if (IsPassiveSpell(spellInfo))
11739  {
11740  m_unit->CastSpell(m_unit, spellId, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
11741  m_charmspells[x].SetActionAndType(spellId, ACT_PASSIVE);
11742  }
11743  else
11744  {
11745  ActiveStates newstate;
11746  bool onlyselfcast = true;
11747 
11748  for (uint32 i = 0; i < 3 && onlyselfcast; ++i) // nonexistent spell will not make any problems as onlyselfcast would be false -> break right away
11749  {
11750  if (spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[i] != TARGET_UNIT_CASTER && spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[i] != 0)
11751  onlyselfcast = false;
11752  }
11753 
11754  if (IsAutocastable(spellInfo))
11755  newstate = ACT_ENABLED;
11756  else
11757  newstate = ACT_PASSIVE;
11758 
11759  m_charmspells[x].SetActionAndType(spellId, newstate);
11760  AddSpellToActionBar(spellId, newstate, x + 1);
11761  }
11762  }
11763 }
11764 
11765 bool CharmInfo::AddSpellToActionBar(uint32 spellId, ActiveStates newstate, uint8 forceSlot)
11766 {
11767  if (forceSlot != 255)
11768  {
11769  if (!PetActionBar[forceSlot].GetAction() && PetActionBar[forceSlot].IsActionBarForSpell())
11770  {
11771  SetActionBar(forceSlot, spellId, newstate == ACT_DECIDE ? IsAutocastable(spellId) ? ACT_DISABLED : ACT_PASSIVE : newstate);
11772  return true;
11773  }
11774  return false;
11775  }
11776 
11777  uint32 first_id = sSpellMgr.GetFirstSpellInChain(spellId);
11778 
11779  // new spell rank can be already listed
11780  for (auto& i : PetActionBar)
11781  {
11782  if (uint32 action = i.GetAction())
11783  {
11784  if (i.IsActionBarForSpell() && sSpellMgr.GetFirstSpellInChain(action) == first_id)
11785  {
11786  i.SetAction(spellId);
11787  return true;
11788  }
11789  }
11790  }
11791 
11792  // or use empty slot in other case
11793  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_UNIT_ACTION_BAR_INDEX; ++i)
11794  {
11795  if (!PetActionBar[i].GetAction() && PetActionBar[i].IsActionBarForSpell())
11796  {
11797  SetActionBar(i, spellId, newstate == ACT_DECIDE ? IsAutocastable(spellId) ? ACT_DISABLED : ACT_PASSIVE : newstate);
11798  return true;
11799  }
11800  }
11801  return false;
11802 }
11803 
11804 bool CharmInfo::RemoveSpellFromActionBar(uint32 spellId)
11805 {
11806  uint32 first_id = sSpellMgr.GetFirstSpellInChain(spellId);
11807 
11808  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_UNIT_ACTION_BAR_INDEX; ++i)
11809  {
11810  if (uint32 action = PetActionBar[i].GetAction())
11811  {
11812  if (PetActionBar[i].IsActionBarForSpell() && sSpellMgr.GetFirstSpellInChain(action) == first_id)
11813  {
11814  SetActionBar(i, 0, ACT_DISABLED);
11815  return true;
11816  }
11817  }
11818  }
11819 
11820  return false;
11821 }
11822 
11823 void CharmInfo::ToggleCreatureAutocast(uint32 spellid, bool apply)
11824 {
11825  if (IsPassiveSpell(spellid))
11826  return;
11827 
11828  for (auto& m_charmspell : m_charmspells)
11829  if (spellid == m_charmspell.GetAction())
11830  m_charmspell.SetType(apply ? ACT_ENABLED : ACT_DISABLED);
11831 }
11832 
11833 void CharmInfo::SetPetNumber(uint32 petnumber, bool statwindow)
11834 {
11835  m_petnumber = petnumber;
11836  if (statwindow)
11837  m_unit->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_PETNUMBER, m_petnumber);
11838  else
11839  m_unit->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_PETNUMBER, 0);
11840 }
11841 
11842 void CharmInfo::SetCommandState(CommandStates st)
11843 {
11844  m_CommandState = st;
11845 
11846  switch (st)
11847  {
11848  case COMMAND_STAY:
11849  SetIsRetreating();
11850  ResetStayPosition();
11851  SetSpellOpener();
11852  break;
11853 
11854  case COMMAND_FOLLOW:
11855  ResetStayPosition();
11856  SetSpellOpener();
11857  break;
11858 
11859  default:
11860  break;
11861  }
11862 }
11863 
11864 void CharmInfo::LoadPetActionBar(const std::string& data)
11865 {
11866  InitPetActionBar();
11867 
11868  Tokens tokens = StrSplit(data, " ");
11869 
11870  if (tokens.size() != (ACTION_BAR_INDEX_END - ACTION_BAR_INDEX_START) * 2)
11871  return; // non critical, will reset to default
11872 
11873  int index;
11874  Tokens::iterator iter;
11875  for (iter = tokens.begin(), index = ACTION_BAR_INDEX_START; index < ACTION_BAR_INDEX_END; ++iter, ++index)
11876  {
11877  // use unsigned cast to avoid sign negative format use at long-> ActiveStates (int) conversion
11878  uint8 type = (uint8)std::stoul(*iter);
11879  ++iter;
11880  uint32 action = std::stoul(*iter);
11881 
11882  PetActionBar[index].SetActionAndType(action, ActiveStates(type));
11883 
11884  // check correctness
11885  if (PetActionBar[index].IsActionBarForSpell())
11886  {
11887  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(PetActionBar[index].GetAction());
11888  if (!spellInfo)
11889  SetActionBar(index, 0, ACT_DISABLED);
11890  else if (!IsAutocastable(spellInfo))
11891  SetActionBar(index, PetActionBar[index].GetAction(), ACT_PASSIVE);
11892  }
11893  }
11894 }
11895 
11896 void CharmInfo::BuildActionBar(WorldPacket& data) const
11897 {
11898  for (auto i : PetActionBar)
11899  data << uint32(i.packedData);
11900 }
11901 
11902 void CharmInfo::SetSpellAutocast(uint32 spell_id, bool state)
11903 {
11904  for (auto& i : PetActionBar)
11905  {
11906  if (spell_id == i.GetAction() && i.IsActionBarForSpell())
11907  {
11908  i.SetType(state ? ACT_ENABLED : ACT_DISABLED);
11909  break;
11910  }
11911  }
11912 }
11913 
11914 void CharmInfo::ResetStayPosition()
11915 {
11916  m_stayPosX = 0;
11917  m_stayPosY = 0;
11918  m_stayPosZ = 0;
11919  m_stayPosO = 0;
11920  m_stayPosSet = false;
11921 }
11922 
11923 void CharmInfo::SetStayPosition()
11924 {
11925  if (!m_unit->movespline->Finalized())
11926  {
11927  Movement::Location loc = m_unit->movespline->ComputePosition();
11928  if (GenericTransport* transport = m_unit->GetTransport())
11929  transport->CalculatePassengerPosition(loc.x, loc.y, loc.z, &loc.orientation);
11930  m_stayPosX = loc.x;
11931  m_stayPosY = loc.y;
11932  m_stayPosZ = loc.z;
11933  m_stayPosO = loc.orientation;
11934  }
11935  else
11936  {
11937  m_stayPosX = m_unit->GetPositionX();
11938  m_stayPosY = m_unit->GetPositionY();
11939  m_stayPosZ = m_unit->GetPositionZ();
11940  m_stayPosO = m_unit->GetOrientation();
11941  }
11942  m_stayPosSet = true;
11943 }
11944 
11945 bool CharmInfo::UpdateStayPosition()
11946 {
11947  if (m_stayPosSet)
11948  return false;
11949 
11950  SetStayPosition();
11951  return true;
11952 }
11953 
11954 bool Unit::isFrozen() const
11955 {
11956  return HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_FROZEN);
11957 }
11958 
11960 void Unit::SendPetActionFeedback(uint8 msg) const
11961 {
11962  Unit* owner = GetOwner();
11963  if (!owner || owner->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
11964  return;
11965 
11966  WorldPacket data(SMSG_PET_ACTION_FEEDBACK, 1);
11967  data << uint8(msg);
11968  ((Player*)owner)->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
11969 }
11970 
11971 void Unit::SendPetTalk(uint32 pettalk) const
11972 {
11973  Unit* owner = GetOwner();
11974  if (!owner || owner->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
11975  return;
11976 
11977  WorldPacket data(SMSG_PET_ACTION_SOUND, 8 + 4);
11978  data << GetObjectGuid();
11979  data << uint32(pettalk);
11980  ((Player*)owner)->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
11981 }
11982 
11983 void Unit::SendPetAIReaction() const
11984 {
11985  Unit* owner = GetOwner();
11986  if (!owner || owner->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
11987  return;
11988 
11989  WorldPacket data(SMSG_AI_REACTION, 8 + 4);
11990  data << GetObjectGuid();
11991  data << uint32(AI_REACTION_HOSTILE);
11992  ((Player*)owner)->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
11993 }
11994 
11995 void Unit::SendPetDismiss(uint32 soundId) const
11996 {
11997  WorldPacket data(SMSG_PET_DISMISS_SOUND, 4 + 4 + 4 + 4);
11998  data << soundId;
11999  data << GetPositionX() << GetPositionY() << GetPositionZ();
12000  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
12001 }
12002 
12004 
12005 void Unit::StopMoving(bool forceSendStop /*=false*/)
12006 {
12007  if (IsStopped() && !forceSendStop)
12008  return;
12009 
12010  clearUnitState(UNIT_STAT_MOVING);
12011 
12012  // not need send any packets if not in world
12013  if (!IsInWorld())
12014  return;
12015 
12016  Movement::MoveSplineInit init(*this);
12017  init.Stop(forceSendStop);
12018 }
12019 
12020 void Unit::InterruptMoving(bool forceSendStop /*=false*/)
12021 {
12022  bool isMoving = false;
12023 
12024  if (!movespline->Finalized())
12025  {
12026  UpdateSplinePosition(true);
12027 
12028  movespline->_Interrupt();
12029  isMoving = true;
12030  }
12031 
12032  StopMoving(forceSendStop || isMoving);
12033 }
12034 
12035 bool Unit::SetConfused(bool apply, ObjectGuid casterGuid, uint32 spellID)
12036 {
12037  if (apply != HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_CONFUSED))
12038  {
12039  if (apply)
12040  CastStop(GetObjectGuid() == casterGuid ? spellID : 0);
12041  else
12042  RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_CONFUSED);
12043 
12044  // Update crowd controlled movement if required:
12045  // TODO: requires motionmster upgrade for proper handling past this line
12046  // We are effectively rebuilding motion master contents: confused > fleeing > panic
12047  {
12048  const bool panic = IsInPanic();
12049 
12050  GetMotionMaster()->MovementExpired();
12051 
12052  if (apply)
12053  GetMotionMaster()->MoveConfused();
12054  else if (IsFleeing() && !panic)
12055  {
12056  AuraList const& fears = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR);
12057  Unit* source = (fears.empty() ? nullptr : fears.back()->GetCaster());
12058  GetMotionMaster()->MoveFleeing(source ? source : this);
12059  }
12060  }
12061 
12062  if (apply)
12063  SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_CONFUSED);
12064 
12065  return true;
12066  }
12067  return false;
12068 }
12069 
12070 bool Unit::SetFleeing(bool apply, ObjectGuid casterGuid/* = ObjectGuid()*/, uint32 spellID/* = 0*/, uint32 duration/* = 0*/)
12071 {
12072  // Normal flee always takes prio over timed flee (panic)
12073  if (apply != HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING) || (apply && IsInPanic()))
12074  {
12075  if (apply)
12076  {
12077  // Fleeing prevention aura taken into account first
12078  if (HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_PREVENTS_FLEEING))
12079  return false;
12080 
12081  // Do not panic if already confused
12082  if (duration && IsConfused())
12083  return false;
12084 
12085  CastStop(GetObjectGuid() == casterGuid ? spellID : 0);
12086  }
12087  else
12088  RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING);
12089 
12090  // Update crowd controlled movement if required:
12091  // TODO: requires motionmster upgrade for proper handling past this line
12092  // We are effectively rebuilding motion master contents: confused > fleeing > panic
12093  {
12094  GetMotionMaster()->MovementExpired();
12095 
12096  if (IsConfused())
12097  GetMotionMaster()->MoveConfused();
12098  else if (apply)
12099  {
12100  Unit* source = (IsInWorld() ? GetMap()->GetUnit(casterGuid) : nullptr);
12101  GetMotionMaster()->MoveFleeing((source ? source : this), duration);
12102  }
12103  }
12104 
12105  if (apply)
12106  SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING);
12107 
12108  return true;
12109  }
12110  return false;
12111 }
12112 
12113 bool Unit::SetStunned(bool apply, ObjectGuid casterGuid, uint32 spellID, bool logout/* = false*/)
12114 {
12115  const bool initial = (apply && !IsStunned());
12116  const bool update = (apply != hasUnitState(logout ? UNIT_STAT_LOGOUT_TIMER : UNIT_STAT_STUNNED));
12117 
12118  if (initial || update || (logout && !apply))
12119  {
12120  if (initial)
12121  CastStop(GetObjectGuid() == casterGuid ? spellID : 0);
12122 
12123  if (initial)
12124  {
12125  // Non-client controlled unit with an AI should drop target
12126  if (const bool requireTargetChange = (!IsControlledByPlayer() && AI()))
12127  {
12128  if (!GetTargetGuid().IsEmpty())
12129  SetTargetGuid(ObjectGuid());
12130 
12131  // Broadcast orientation change on stun start for creatures
12132  // FIXME: TODO
12133  // SetFacingTo(GetOrientation());
12134  }
12135  }
12136 
12137  SetImmobilizedState(apply, true, logout);
12138 
12139  ApplyModFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED, hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_STUNNED | UNIT_STAT_LOGOUT_TIMER));
12140  return true;
12141  }
12142  return false;
12143 }
12144 
12145 bool Unit::SetStunnedByLogout(bool apply)
12146 {
12147  if (SetStunned(apply, ObjectGuid(), 0, true))
12148  {
12149  // Sit down when eligible:
12150  if (apply)
12151  {
12152  if (IsStandState())
12153  {
12154  if (!m_movementInfo.HasMovementFlag(MovementFlags(movementFlagsMask | MOVEFLAG_SWIMMING | MOVEFLAG_SPLINE_ENABLED)))
12155  SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT);
12156  }
12157  }
12158  // Stand up on cancel
12159  else if (getStandState() == UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT)
12160  SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
12161 
12162  return true;
12163  }
12164  return false;
12165 }
12166 
12167 void Unit::SetImmobilizedState(bool apply, bool stun, bool logout)
12168 {
12169  const uint32 state = (stun ? (logout ? UNIT_STAT_LOGOUT_TIMER : UNIT_STAT_STUNNED) : UNIT_STAT_ROOT);
12170 
12171  if (apply)
12172  {
12173  addUnitState(state);
12174 
12175  SendMoveRoot(true);
12176  }
12177  else
12178  {
12179  clearUnitState(state);
12180 
12181  // Prevent giving ability to move if more immobilizers are active
12182  if (!IsImmobilizedState())
12183  SendMoveRoot(false);
12184 
12185  SetIgnoreRangedTargets(false);
12186  }
12187 }
12188 
12189 void Unit::SetFeignDeath(bool apply, ObjectGuid casterGuid /*= ObjectGuid()*/, uint32 spellID /*= 0*/, bool dynamic /*= true*/, bool success /*= true*/)
12190 {
12191  if (apply)
12192  {
12193  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
12194  {
12195  if (success) // TODO: Determine if IsIgnoringFeignDeath needs to be implemented in threat system too
12196  {
12197  // Successful FD: set state, stop attack (+clear target for player-controlled npcs) and clear combat if applicable
12198  addUnitState(UNIT_STAT_FEIGN_DEATH);
12199 
12200  InstanceData* instance = GetInstanceData();
12201  if (instance && sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_BOOL_INSTANCE_STRICT_COMBAT_LOCKDOWN) && instance->IsEncounterInProgress())
12202  {
12203  // This rule was introduced in 2.3.0+: do not clear combat state if zone is in combat lockdown by encounter
12204  AttackStop(true, false, true);
12205  getHostileRefManager().addThreatPercent(-100);
12206  getHostileRefManager().updateOnlineOfflineState(false);
12207  }
12208  else
12209  CombatStop();
12210  }
12211  else
12212  {
12213  // Unsuccessful FD: do not set UNIT_STAT_FEIGN_DEATH, send resist message and stop attack (+clear target for player-controlled npcs)
12214  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
12215  static_cast<Player*>(this)->SendFeignDeathResisted();
12216  AttackStop(true, false, true);
12217  }
12218  }
12219  else
12220  {
12221  // NPC FD is always successful, but never observed to disengage from combat
12222  addUnitState(UNIT_STAT_FEIGN_DEATH);
12223  AttackStop(true, false, true);
12224  getHostileRefManager().addThreatPercent(-100);
12225  getHostileRefManager().updateOnlineOfflineState(false);
12226  }
12227 
12228  // blizz like 2.0.x
12229  SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH);
12230  // blizz like 2.0.x
12231  if (dynamic)
12232  SetFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_DEAD);
12233 
12234  // prevent interrupt message
12235  if (spellID && casterGuid == GetObjectGuid())
12236  {
12237  if (m_currentSpells[CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL] && m_currentSpells[CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL]->m_spellInfo->Id == spellID)
12238  FinishSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL, false);
12239  }
12240  InterruptNonMeleeSpells(true);
12241  }
12242  else if (IsFeigningDeath())
12243  {
12244  clearUnitState(UNIT_STAT_FEIGN_DEATH);
12245 
12246  // blizz like 2.0.x
12247  RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH);
12248  // blizz like 2.0.x
12249  RemoveFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_DEAD);
12250 
12251  getHostileRefManager().updateOnlineOfflineState(true);
12252  }
12253 }
12254 
12255 bool Unit::IsSitState() const
12256 {
12257  uint8 s = getStandState();
12258  return
12259  s == UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT_CHAIR || s == UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT_LOW_CHAIR ||
12260  s == UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT_MEDIUM_CHAIR || s == UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT_HIGH_CHAIR ||
12261  s == UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT;
12262 }
12263 
12264 bool Unit::IsStandState() const
12265 {
12266  uint8 s = getStandState();
12267  return !IsSitState() && s != UNIT_STAND_STATE_SLEEP && s != UNIT_STAND_STATE_KNEEL;
12268 }
12269 
12270 bool Unit::IsSeatedState() const
12271 {
12272  uint8 standState = getStandState();
12273  return standState != UNIT_STAND_STATE_SLEEP && standState != UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND;
12274 }
12275 
12276 bool Unit::IsStandUpOnMovementState() const
12277 {
12278  uint8 s = getStandState();
12279  return
12280  s == UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT_CHAIR || s == UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT_LOW_CHAIR ||
12281  s == UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT_MEDIUM_CHAIR || s == UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT_HIGH_CHAIR ||
12282  s == UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT || s == UNIT_STAND_STATE_SLEEP;
12283 }
12284 
12285 void Unit::SetStandState(uint8 state, bool acknowledge/* = false*/)
12286 {
12287  if (getStandState() == state)
12288  return;
12289 
12290  SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_STAND_STATE, state);
12291 
12292  if (IsStandState())
12293  RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_STANDING_CANCELS);
12294 
12295  if (!acknowledge && GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
12296  {
12297  WorldPacket data(SMSG_STANDSTATE_UPDATE, 1);
12298  data << uint8(state);
12299  static_cast<Player*>(this)->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
12300  }
12301 }
12302 
12303 bool Unit::IsPolymorphed() const
12304 {
12305  return HasAura(12939); // Polymorph heal effect common for all polys
12306 }
12307 
12308 void Unit::SetDisplayId(uint32 modelId)
12309 {
12310  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_DISPLAYID, modelId);
12311 
12312  UpdateModelData();
12313 
12314  if (HasCharmer())
12315  {
12316  Unit* charmer = GetCharmer();
12317  if (charmer && (charmer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) && ((Player*)charmer)->GetGroup())
12318  ((Player*)charmer)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_PET_MODEL_ID);
12319  }
12320 }
12321 
12322 void Unit::RestoreDisplayId()
12323 {
12324  Aura const* handledAura = nullptr;
12325  // try to receive model from transform auras
12326  AuraList const& transforms = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_TRANSFORM);
12327  if (!transforms.empty())
12328  {
12329  // iterate over already applied transform auras - from newest to oldest
12330  for (auto i = transforms.rbegin(); i != transforms.rend(); ++i)
12331  {
12332  if (!handledAura)
12333  handledAura = (*i);
12334  // prefer negative auras
12335  if (!(*i)->IsPositive())
12336  {
12337  handledAura = (*i);
12338  break;
12339  }
12340  }
12341  }
12342 
12343  // transform aura was found
12344  if (handledAura)
12345  {
12346  SetDisplayId(handledAura->GetModifier()->m_amount);
12347  return;
12348  }
12349 
12350  AuraList const& shapeshiftAura = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT);
12351  if (!shapeshiftAura.empty()) // we've found shapeshift
12352  {
12353  if (uint32 displayId = shapeshiftAura.front()->GetModifier()->m_amount) // can be zero
12354  {
12355  SetDisplayId(displayId);
12356  return;
12357  }
12358  }
12359 
12360  // no auras found - set modelid to default
12361  SetDisplayId(GetNativeDisplayId());
12362 }
12363 
12364 void Unit::UpdateModelData()
12365 {
12366  if (CreatureModelInfo const* modelInfo = sObjectMgr.GetCreatureModelInfo(GetDisplayId()))
12367  {
12368  // we expect values in database to be relative to scale = 1.0
12369  SetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_BOUNDINGRADIUS, GetObjectScale() * modelInfo->bounding_radius);
12370 
12371  SetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_COMBATREACH, GetObjectScale() * modelInfo->combat_reach);
12372 
12373  SetBaseWalkSpeed(modelInfo->SpeedWalk);
12374  SetBaseRunSpeed(modelInfo->SpeedRun, false);
12375  }
12376 }
12377 
12378 void Unit::ClearComboPointHolders()
12379 {
12380  while (!m_ComboPointHolders.empty())
12381  {
12382  uint32 lowguid = *m_ComboPointHolders.begin();
12383 
12384  Player* plr = sObjectMgr.GetPlayer(ObjectGuid(HIGHGUID_PLAYER, lowguid));
12385  if (plr && plr->GetComboTargetGuid() == GetObjectGuid())// recheck for safe
12386  plr->ClearComboPoints(); // remove also guid from m_ComboPointHolders;
12387  else
12388  m_ComboPointHolders.erase(lowguid); // or remove manually
12389  }
12390 }
12391 
12392 void Unit::ClearAllReactives()
12393 {
12394  for (unsigned int& i : m_reactiveTimer)
12395  i = 0;
12396 
12397  if (HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_DEFENSE))
12398  ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_DEFENSE, false);
12399  if (getClass() == CLASS_HUNTER && HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_HUNTER_PARRY))
12400  ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_HUNTER_PARRY, false);
12401  if (getClass() == CLASS_WARRIOR)
12402  ClearComboPoints();
12403 }
12404 
12405 void Unit::UpdateReactives(uint32 p_time)
12406 {
12407  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_REACTIVE; ++i)
12408  {
12409  ReactiveType reactive = ReactiveType(i);
12410 
12411  if (!m_reactiveTimer[reactive])
12412  continue;
12413 
12414  if (m_reactiveTimer[reactive] <= p_time)
12415  {
12416  m_reactiveTimer[reactive] = 0;
12417 
12418  switch (reactive)
12419  {
12420  case REACTIVE_DEFENSE:
12421  if (HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_DEFENSE))
12422  ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_DEFENSE, false);
12423  break;
12424  case REACTIVE_HUNTER_PARRY:
12425  if (getClass() == CLASS_HUNTER && HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_HUNTER_PARRY))
12426  ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_HUNTER_PARRY, false);
12427  break;
12428  case REACTIVE_OVERPOWER:
12429  if (getClass() == CLASS_WARRIOR)
12430  ClearComboPoints();
12431  break;
12432  default:
12433  break;
12434  }
12435  }
12436  else
12437  {
12438  m_reactiveTimer[reactive] -= p_time;
12439  }
12440  }
12441 }
12442 
12443 Unit* Unit::SelectRandomUnfriendlyTarget(Unit* except /*= nullptr*/, float radius /*= ATTACK_DISTANCE*/) const
12444 {
12445  UnitList targets;
12446 
12447  MaNGOS::AnyUnfriendlyUnitInObjectRangeCheck u_check(this, radius);
12448  MaNGOS::UnitListSearcher<MaNGOS::AnyUnfriendlyUnitInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(targets, u_check);
12449  Cell::VisitAllObjects(this, searcher, radius);
12450 
12451  // remove current target
12452  if (except)
12453  targets.remove(except);
12454 
12455  // remove not LoS targets
12456  for (UnitList::iterator tIter = targets.begin(); tIter != targets.end();)
12457  {
12458  bool remove = false;
12459  if (!IsWithinLOSInMap(*tIter, true))
12460  remove = true;
12461  else
12462  {
12463  // 2.4.2 - sweeping strikes no longer hits critters
12464  switch ((*tIter)->GetTypeId())
12465  {
12466  case TYPEID_UNIT:
12467  {
12468  Creature* target = static_cast<Creature*>(*tIter);
12469  if (target->IsCritter())
12470  remove = true;
12471  break;
12472  }
12473  default: break;
12474  }
12475  }
12476 
12477  if (remove)
12478  {
12479  UnitList::iterator tIter2 = tIter;
12480  ++tIter;
12481  targets.erase(tIter2);
12482  }
12483  else
12484  ++tIter;
12485  }
12486 
12487  // no appropriate targets
12488  if (targets.empty())
12489  return nullptr;
12490 
12491  // select random
12492  uint32 rIdx = urand(0, targets.size() - 1);
12493  UnitList::const_iterator tcIter = targets.begin();
12494  for (uint32 i = 0; i < rIdx; ++i)
12495  ++tcIter;
12496 
12497  return *tcIter;
12498 }
12499 
12500 Unit* Unit::SelectRandomFriendlyTarget(Unit* except /*= nullptr*/, float radius /*= ATTACK_DISTANCE*/) const
12501 {
12502  UnitList targets;
12503 
12504  MaNGOS::AnySpellAssistableUnitInObjectRangeCheck u_check(this, nullptr, radius);
12505  MaNGOS::UnitListSearcher<MaNGOS::AnySpellAssistableUnitInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(targets, u_check);
12506 
12507  Cell::VisitAllObjects(this, searcher, radius);
12508 
12509  // remove current target
12510  if (except)
12511  targets.remove(except);
12512 
12513  // remove not LoS targets
12514  for (UnitList::iterator tIter = targets.begin(); tIter != targets.end();)
12515  {
12516  if (!IsWithinLOSInMap(*tIter, true))
12517  {
12518  UnitList::iterator tIter2 = tIter;
12519  ++tIter;
12520  targets.erase(tIter2);
12521  }
12522  else
12523  ++tIter;
12524  }
12525 
12526  // no appropriate targets
12527  if (targets.empty())
12528  return nullptr;
12529 
12530  // select random
12531  uint32 rIdx = urand(0, targets.size() - 1);
12532  UnitList::const_iterator tcIter = targets.begin();
12533  for (uint32 i = 0; i < rIdx; ++i)
12534  ++tcIter;
12535 
12536  return *tcIter;
12537 }
12538 
12539 bool Unit::HasDamageInterruptibleStunAura() const
12540 {
12541  for (Aura* aura : GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN))
12542  if (aura->GetSpellProto()->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_DAMAGE)
12543  return true;
12544 
12545  return false;
12546 }
12547 
12548 bool Unit::HasAuraPetShouldAvoidBreaking(Unit* excludeCasterChannel, uint32 excludeAuraApplyMSTimeCutoff) const
12549 {
12550  return HasBreakableByDamageCrowdControlAura(excludeCasterChannel, excludeAuraApplyMSTimeCutoff);
12551 }
12552 
12553 bool Unit::HasBreakableByDamageAuraType(AuraType type, uint32 excludeAura, uint32 excludeAuraApplyMSTimeCutoff) const
12554 {
12555  AuraList const& auras = GetAurasByType(type);
12556  for (const auto& itr : auras)
12557  if (((!excludeAura || excludeAura != itr->GetSpellProto()->Id) && // Avoid self interrupt of channeled Crowd Control spells like Seduction
12558  (!excludeAuraApplyMSTimeCutoff || itr->GetHolder()->GetAuraApplyMSTime() >= excludeAuraApplyMSTimeCutoff)) && // Filter out CC effects which were applied before pet was last sent to attack
12559  (itr->GetSpellProto()->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_DAMAGE))
12560  return true;
12561  return false;
12562 }
12563 
12564 bool Unit::HasBreakableByDamageCrowdControlAura(Unit* excludeCasterChannel, uint32 excludeAuraApplyMSTimeCutoff) const
12565 {
12566  uint32 excludeAura = 0;
12567  if (Spell* currentChanneledSpell = excludeCasterChannel ? excludeCasterChannel->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL) : nullptr)
12568  excludeAura = currentChanneledSpell->m_spellInfo->Id; // Avoid self interrupt of channeled Crowd Control spells like Seduction
12569 
12570  return (HasBreakableByDamageAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE, excludeAura, excludeAuraApplyMSTimeCutoff)
12571  || HasBreakableByDamageAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN, excludeAura, excludeAuraApplyMSTimeCutoff)
12572  || HasBreakableByDamageAuraType(SPELL_AURA_TRANSFORM, excludeAura, excludeAuraApplyMSTimeCutoff));
12573 }
12574 
12575 void Unit::ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(WeaponAttackType att, float val, bool apply)
12576 {
12577  float oldVal = GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_BASEATTACKTIME + att);
12578  if (val > 0)
12579  {
12580  ApplyPercentModFloatVar(m_modAttackSpeedPct[att], val, !apply);
12581  ApplyPercentModFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_BASEATTACKTIME + att, val, !apply);
12582  }
12583  else
12584  {
12585  ApplyPercentModFloatVar(m_modAttackSpeedPct[att], -val, apply);
12586  ApplyPercentModFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_BASEATTACKTIME + att, -val, apply);
12587  }
12588  float newVal = GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_BASEATTACKTIME + att);
12589  uint32 attackTimer = getAttackTimer(att);
12590  int32 diff = newVal - oldVal;
12591  setAttackTimer(att, diff < -int32(attackTimer) ? 0 : attackTimer + diff);
12592 }
12593 
12594 void Unit::ApplyCastTimePercentMod(float val, bool apply)
12595 {
12596  if (val > 0)
12597  ApplyPercentModFloatValue(UNIT_MOD_CAST_SPEED, val, !apply);
12598  else
12599  ApplyPercentModFloatValue(UNIT_MOD_CAST_SPEED, -val, apply);
12600 }
12601 
12602 void Unit::UpdateAuraForGroup(uint8 slot)
12603 {
12604  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
12605  {
12606  Player* player = (Player*)this;
12607  if (player->GetGroup())
12608  {
12609  player->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_AURAS);
12610  player->SetAuraUpdateMask(slot);
12611  }
12612  }
12613  else if (HasCharmer())
12614  {
12615  Unit* charmer = GetCharmer();
12616  if (charmer && (charmer->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) && ((Player*)charmer)->GetGroup())
12617  {
12618  ((Player*)charmer)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_PET_AURAS);
12619  SetAuraUpdateMask(slot);
12620  }
12621  }
12622 }
12623 
12624 float Unit::GetAPMultiplier(WeaponAttackType attType, bool normalized)
12625 {
12626  if (!normalized || GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
12627  return float(GetAttackTime(attType)) / 1000.0f;
12628 
12629  Item* Weapon = ((Player*)this)->GetWeaponForAttack(attType, true, false);
12630  if (!Weapon)
12631  return 2.4f; // fist attack
12632 
12633  switch (Weapon->GetProto()->InventoryType)
12634  {
12635  case INVTYPE_2HWEAPON:
12636  return 3.3f;
12637  case INVTYPE_RANGED:
12638  case INVTYPE_RANGEDRIGHT:
12639  case INVTYPE_THROWN:
12640  return 2.8f;
12641  case INVTYPE_WEAPON:
12642  case INVTYPE_WEAPONMAINHAND:
12643  case INVTYPE_WEAPONOFFHAND:
12644  default:
12645  return Weapon->GetProto()->SubClass == ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_DAGGER ? 1.7f : 2.4f;
12646  }
12647 }
12648 
12649 Aura* Unit::GetDummyAura(uint32 spell_id) const
12650 {
12651  Unit::AuraList const& mDummy = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
12652  for (auto itr : mDummy)
12653  if (itr->GetId() == spell_id)
12654  return itr;
12655 
12656  return nullptr;
12657 }
12658 
12659 void Unit::AddPetAura(PetAura const* petSpell)
12660 {
12661  m_petAuras.insert(petSpell);
12662  if (Pet* pet = GetPet())
12663  pet->CastPetAura(petSpell);
12664 }
12665 
12666 void Unit::RemovePetAura(PetAura const* petSpell)
12667 {
12668  m_petAuras.erase(petSpell);
12669  if (Pet* pet = GetPet())
12670  pet->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(petSpell->GetAura(pet->GetEntry()));
12671 }
12672 
12673 void Unit::RemoveAurasAtMechanicImmunity(uint32 mechMask, uint32 exceptSpellId, bool non_positive /*= false*/)
12674 {
12675  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap& auras = GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
12676  for (Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = auras.begin(); iter != auras.end();)
12677  {
12678  SpellEntry const* spell = iter->second->GetSpellProto();
12679  if (spell->Id == exceptSpellId)
12680  ++iter;
12681  else if (non_positive && iter->second->IsPositive())
12682  ++iter;
12683  else if (spell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_NO_IMMUNITIES))
12684  ++iter;
12685  else if (iter->second->HasMechanicMask(mechMask))
12686  {
12687  RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spell->Id);
12688 
12689  if (auras.empty())
12690  break;
12691  iter = auras.begin();
12692  }
12693  else
12694  ++iter;
12695  }
12696 }
12697 
12698 struct SetPhaseMaskHelper
12699 {
12700  explicit SetPhaseMaskHelper(uint32 _phaseMask) : phaseMask(_phaseMask) {}
12701  void operator()(Unit* unit) const { unit->SetPhaseMask(phaseMask, true); }
12702  uint32 phaseMask;
12703 };
12704 
12705 void Unit::SetPhaseMask(uint32 newPhaseMask, bool update)
12706 {
12707  if (newPhaseMask == GetPhaseMask())
12708  return;
12709 
12710  // first move to both phase for proper update controlled units
12711  WorldObject::SetPhaseMask(GetPhaseMask() | newPhaseMask, false);
12712 
12713  if (IsInWorld())
12714  {
12715  RemoveNotOwnTrackedTargetAuras(newPhaseMask); // we can lost access to caster or target
12716 
12717  // all controlled except not owned charmed units
12718  CallForAllControlledUnits(SetPhaseMaskHelper(newPhaseMask), CONTROLLED_PET | CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS | CONTROLLED_MINIPET | CONTROLLED_TOTEMS);
12719  }
12720 
12721  WorldObject::SetPhaseMask(newPhaseMask, update);
12722 }
12723 
12724 bool Unit::IsUnitConditionSatisfied(int32 unitConditionId, Unit const* otherUnit) const
12725 {
12726  return sObjectMgr.IsUnitConditionSatisfied(unitConditionId, this, otherUnit);
12727 }
12728 
12729 void Unit::NearTeleportTo(float x, float y, float z, float orientation, bool casting /*= false*/, bool transportLeave /*= false*/)
12730 {
12731  if (IsPlayer())
12732  {
12733  uint32 options = (transportLeave ? 0 : TELE_TO_NOT_LEAVE_TRANSPORT) | (casting ? TELE_TO_SPELL : 0);
12734  if (GetDistance(x, y, z, DIST_CALC_NONE) < 100.f * 100.f)
12735  options |= TELE_TO_NOT_LEAVE_COMBAT;
12736  static_cast<Player*>(this)->TeleportTo(GetMapId(), x, y, z, orientation, options);
12737  }
12738  else
12739  {
12740  DisableSpline();
12741 
12742  Creature* c = static_cast<Creature*>(this);
12743  // Creature relocation acts like instant movement generator, so current generator expects interrupt/reset calls to react properly
12744  if (!c->GetMotionMaster()->empty())
12745  if (MovementGenerator* movgen = c->GetMotionMaster()->top())
12746  movgen->Interrupt(*c);
12747 
12748  SendTeleportPacket(x, y, z, orientation, GetTransport());
12749 
12750  GetMap()->CreatureRelocation(c, x, y, z, orientation);
12751 
12752  // finished relocation, movegen can different from top before creature relocation,
12753  // but apply Reset expected to be safe in any case
12754  if (!c->GetMotionMaster()->empty())
12755  if (MovementGenerator* movgen = c->GetMotionMaster()->top())
12756  movgen->Reset(*c);
12757  }
12758 }
12759 
12760 void Unit::SendTeleportPacket(float x, float y, float z, float ori, GenericTransport* transport)
12761 {
12762  MovementInfo teleportMovementInfo = m_movementInfo;
12763  if (transport)
12764  {
12765  teleportMovementInfo.SetTransportData(transport->GetObjectGuid(), x, y, z, ori, transport->GetPathProgress(), -1);
12766  transport->CalculatePassengerPosition(x, y, z, &ori); // recalculate to real coords
12767  }
12768  teleportMovementInfo.ChangePosition(x, y, z, ori);
12769 
12770  Player* player = nullptr;
12771 
12772  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
12773  {
12774  player = static_cast<Player*>(this);
12775  auto const counter = player->GetSession()->GetOrderCounter();
12776  WorldPacket data;
12777  data.Initialize(MSG_MOVE_TELEPORT_ACK, 41);
12778  data << GetPackGUID();
12779  data << uint32(counter); // this value increments every time
12780  data << teleportMovementInfo;
12781  player->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
12782  player->GetSession()->GetAnticheat()->OrderSent(data.GetOpcode(), counter);
12783  player->GetSession()->IncrementOrderCounter();
12784  }
12785 
12786  WorldPacket moveUpdateTeleport(MSG_MOVE_TELEPORT, 38);
12787  moveUpdateTeleport << GetPackGUID();
12788  teleportMovementInfo.Write(moveUpdateTeleport);
12789  SendMessageToSetExcept(moveUpdateTeleport, player);
12790 }
12791 
12792 void Unit::MonsterMoveWithSpeed(float x, float y, float z, float speed, bool generatePath, bool forceDestination)
12793 {
12794  Movement::MoveSplineInit init(*this);
12795  init.MoveTo(x, y, z, generatePath, forceDestination);
12796  init.SetVelocity(speed);
12797  init.Launch();
12798 }
12799 
12800 struct SetImmuneToNPCHelper
12801 {
12802  explicit SetImmuneToNPCHelper(bool _state) : state(_state) {}
12803  void operator()(Unit* unit) const { unit->SetImmuneToNPC(state); }
12804  bool state;
12805 };
12806 
12807 void Unit::SetImmuneToNPC(bool state)
12808 {
12809  if (state)
12810  SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC);
12811  else
12812  RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC);
12813 
12814  // Do not propagate during charm
12815  if (!HasCharmer())
12816  CallForAllControlledUnits(SetImmuneToNPCHelper(state), CONTROLLED_PET | CONTROLLED_TOTEMS | CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS | CONTROLLED_CHARM);
12817 }
12818 
12819 struct SetImmuneToPlayerHelper
12820 {
12821  explicit SetImmuneToPlayerHelper(bool _state) : state(_state) {}
12822  void operator()(Unit* unit) const { unit->SetImmuneToPlayer(state); }
12823  bool state;
12824 };
12825 
12826 void Unit::SetImmuneToPlayer(bool state)
12827 {
12828  if (state)
12829  SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PLAYER);
12830  else
12831  RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PLAYER);
12832 
12833  // Do not propagate during charm
12834  if (!HasCharmer())
12835  CallForAllControlledUnits(SetImmuneToPlayerHelper(state), CONTROLLED_PET | CONTROLLED_TOTEMS | CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS | CONTROLLED_CHARM);
12836 }
12837 
12838 struct SetPvPHelper
12839 {
12840  explicit SetPvPHelper(bool _state) : state(_state) {}
12841  void operator()(Unit* unit) const { unit->SetPvP(state); }
12842  bool state;
12843 };
12844 
12845 void Unit::SetPvP(bool state)
12846 {
12847  if (state)
12848  SetByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 1, UNIT_BYTE2_FLAG_PVP);
12849  else
12850  RemoveByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 1, UNIT_BYTE2_FLAG_PVP);
12851 
12852  // Do not propagate during charm
12853  if (!HasCharmer())
12854  {
12855  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && static_cast<Player*>(this)->GetGroup())
12856  static_cast<Player*>(this)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_STATUS);
12857 
12858  CallForAllControlledUnits(SetPvPHelper(state), CONTROLLED_PET | CONTROLLED_TOTEMS | CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS | CONTROLLED_CHARM);
12859  }
12860 }
12861 
12862 struct SetPvPFreeForAllHelper
12863 {
12864  explicit SetPvPFreeForAllHelper(bool _state) : state(_state) {}
12865  void operator()(Unit* unit) const { unit->SetPvPFreeForAll(state); }
12866  bool state;
12867 };
12868 
12869 void Unit::SetPvPFreeForAll(bool state)
12870 {
12871  if (state)
12872  SetByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 1, UNIT_BYTE2_FLAG_FFA_PVP);
12873  else
12874  RemoveByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 1, UNIT_BYTE2_FLAG_FFA_PVP);
12875 
12876  // Do not propagate during charm
12877  if (!HasCharmer())
12878  {
12879  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && static_cast<Player*>(this)->GetGroup())
12880  static_cast<Player*>(this)->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_STATUS);
12881 
12882  CallForAllControlledUnits(SetPvPFreeForAllHelper(state), CONTROLLED_PET | CONTROLLED_TOTEMS | CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS | CONTROLLED_CHARM);
12883  }
12884 }
12885 
12886 bool Unit::IsPvPContested() const
12887 {
12888  if (const Player* thisPlayer = GetControllingPlayer())
12889  return thisPlayer->HasFlag(PLAYER_FLAGS, PLAYER_FLAGS_CONTESTED_PVP);
12890  return false;
12891 }
12892 
12893 void Unit::SetPvPContested(bool state)
12894 {
12895  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
12896  {
12897  if (state)
12898  SetFlag(PLAYER_FLAGS, PLAYER_FLAGS_CONTESTED_PVP);
12899  else
12900  RemoveFlag(PLAYER_FLAGS, PLAYER_FLAGS_CONTESTED_PVP);
12901  }
12902 }
12903 
12904 struct SetPvPSanctuaryHelper
12905 {
12906  explicit SetPvPSanctuaryHelper(bool _state) : state(_state) {}
12907  void operator()(Unit* unit) const { unit->SetPvPSanctuary(state); }
12908  bool state;
12909 };
12910 
12911 void Unit::SetPvPSanctuary(bool state)
12912 {
12913  if (state)
12914  SetByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 1, UNIT_BYTE2_FLAG_SANCTUARY);
12915  else
12916  RemoveByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 1, UNIT_BYTE2_FLAG_SANCTUARY);
12917 
12918  // Do not propagate during charm
12919  if (!HasCharmer())
12920  CallForAllControlledUnits(SetPvPSanctuaryHelper(state), CONTROLLED_PET | CONTROLLED_TOTEMS | CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS | CONTROLLED_CHARM);
12921 }
12922 
12923 void Unit::RestoreOriginalFaction()
12924 {
12925  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
12926  ((Player*)this)->setFactionForRace(getRace());
12927  else
12928  {
12929  Creature* creature = (Creature*)this;
12930 
12931  if (creature->IsPet() || creature->IsTotem())
12932  {
12933  if (Unit* owner = GetOwner())
12934  setFaction(owner->GetFaction());
12935  }
12936  else
12937  setFaction(creature->GetCreatureInfo()->Faction);
12938  }
12939 }
12940 
12941 void Unit::KnockBackFrom(Unit* target, float horizontalSpeed, float verticalSpeed)
12942 {
12943  float angle = this == target ? GetOrientation() + M_PI_F : target->GetAngle(this);
12944  KnockBackWithAngle(angle, horizontalSpeed, verticalSpeed);
12945 }
12946 
12947 void Unit::KnockBackWithAngle(float angle, float horizontalSpeed, float verticalSpeed)
12948 {
12949  if (IsClientControlled())
12950  {
12951  if (Player const* player = GetControllingPlayer())
12952  {
12953  player->GetSession()->SendKnockBack(this, angle, horizontalSpeed, verticalSpeed);
12954  return;
12955  }
12956  }
12957 
12958  float vsin = sin(angle);
12959  float vcos = cos(angle);
12960  float moveTimeHalf = verticalSpeed / Movement::gravity;
12961  float max_height = -Movement::computeFallElevation(moveTimeHalf, false, -verticalSpeed);
12962 
12963  float dis = 2 * moveTimeHalf * horizontalSpeed;
12964  float ox, oy, oz;
12965  GetPosition(ox, oy, oz);
12966  float fx = ox + dis * vcos;
12967  float fy = oy + dis * vsin;
12968  float fz = oz + 0.5f;
12969  GetMap()->GetHitPosition(ox, oy, oz + 0.5f, fx, fy, fz, GetPhaseMask(), -0.5f);
12970  UpdateAllowedPositionZ(fx, fy, fz);
12971  GetMotionMaster()->MoveKnockback(fx, fy, fz, horizontalSpeed, max_height);
12972 }
12973 
12974 float Unit::GetCombatRatingReduction(CombatRating cr) const
12975 {
12976  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
12977  return ((Player const*)this)->GetRatingBonusValue(cr);
12978  if (((Creature const*)this)->IsPet())
12979  {
12980  // Player's pet get 100% resilience from owner
12981  if (Unit* owner = GetOwner())
12982  if (owner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
12983  return ((Player*)owner)->GetRatingBonusValue(cr);
12984  }
12985 
12986  return 0.0f;
12987 }
12988 
12989 uint32 Unit::GetCombatRatingDamageReduction(CombatRating cr, float rate, float cap, uint32 damage) const
12990 {
12991  float percent = GetCombatRatingReduction(cr) * rate;
12992  if (percent > cap)
12993  percent = cap;
12994  return uint32(percent * damage / 100.0f);
12995 }
12996 
12997 void Unit::SendThreatUpdate()
12998 {
12999  ThreatList const& tlist = getThreatManager().getThreatList();
13000  if (uint32 count = tlist.size())
13001  {
13002  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "WORLD: Send SMSG_THREAT_UPDATE Message");
13003  WorldPacket data(SMSG_THREAT_UPDATE, 8 + count * 8);
13004  data << GetPackGUID();
13005  data << uint32(count);
13006  for (auto itr : tlist)
13007  {
13008  data << itr->getUnitGuid().WriteAsPacked();
13009  data << uint32(itr->getThreat());
13010  }
13011  SendMessageToSet(data, false);
13012  }
13013 }
13014 
13015 void Unit::SendHighestThreatUpdate(HostileReference* pHostilReference)
13016 {
13017  ThreatList const& tlist = getThreatManager().getThreatList();
13018  if (uint32 count = tlist.size())
13019  {
13020  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "WORLD: Send SMSG_HIGHEST_THREAT_UPDATE Message");
13021  WorldPacket data(SMSG_HIGHEST_THREAT_UPDATE, 8 + 8 + count * 8);
13022  data << GetPackGUID();
13023  data << pHostilReference->getUnitGuid().WriteAsPacked();
13024  data << uint32(count);
13025  for (auto itr : tlist)
13026  {
13027  data << itr->getUnitGuid().WriteAsPacked();
13028  data << uint32(itr->getThreat());
13029  }
13030  SendMessageToSet(data, false);
13031  }
13032 }
13033 
13034 void Unit::SendThreatClear() const
13035 {
13036  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "WORLD: Send SMSG_THREAT_CLEAR Message");
13037  WorldPacket data(SMSG_THREAT_CLEAR, 8);
13038  data << GetPackGUID();
13039  SendMessageToSet(data, false);
13040 }
13041 
13042 void Unit::SendThreatRemove(HostileReference* pHostileReference) const
13043 {
13044  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "WORLD: Send SMSG_THREAT_REMOVE Message");
13045  WorldPacket data(SMSG_THREAT_REMOVE, 8 + 8);
13046  data << GetPackGUID();
13047  data << pHostileReference->getUnitGuid().WriteAsPacked();
13048  SendMessageToSet(data, false);
13049 }
13050 
13051 struct StopAttackFactionHelper
13052 {
13053  explicit StopAttackFactionHelper(uint32 _faction_id) : faction_id(_faction_id) {}
13054  void operator()(Unit* unit) const { unit->StopAttackFaction(faction_id); }
13055  uint32 faction_id;
13056 };
13057 
13058 void Unit::StopAttackFaction(uint32 faction_id)
13059 {
13060  if (Unit* victim = GetVictim())
13061  {
13062  if (victim->GetFactionTemplateEntry()->faction == faction_id)
13063  {
13064  AttackStop();
13065  if (IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false))
13066  InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
13067  }
13068  }
13069 
13070  AttackerSet const& attackers = getAttackers();
13071  for (AttackerSet::const_iterator itr = attackers.begin(); itr != attackers.end();)
13072  {
13073  if ((*itr)->GetFactionTemplateEntry()->faction == faction_id)
13074  {
13075  (*itr)->AttackStop();
13076  itr = attackers.begin();
13077  }
13078  else
13079  ++itr;
13080  }
13081 
13082  getHostileRefManager().deleteReferencesForFaction(faction_id);
13083 
13084  CallForAllControlledUnits(StopAttackFactionHelper(faction_id), CONTROLLED_PET | CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS | CONTROLLED_CHARM);
13085 }
13086 
13087 bool Unit::IsIgnoreUnitState(SpellEntry const* spell, IgnoreUnitState ignoreState) const
13088 {
13089  Unit::AuraList const& stateAuras = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_IGNORE_UNIT_STATE);
13090  for (auto stateAura : stateAuras)
13091  {
13092  if (stateAura->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue == ignoreState)
13093  {
13094  // frozen state absent ignored for all spells
13095  if (ignoreState == IGNORE_UNIT_TARGET_NON_FROZEN)
13096  return true;
13097 
13098  if (stateAura->isAffectedOnSpell(spell))
13099  return true;
13100  }
13101  }
13102 
13103  return false;
13104 }
13105 
13106 void Unit::CleanupDeletedAuras()
13107 {
13108  for (SpellAuraHolderList::const_iterator iter = m_deletedHolders.begin(); iter != m_deletedHolders.end(); ++iter)
13109  delete *iter;
13110  m_deletedHolders.clear();
13111 
13112  // really delete auras "deleted" while processing its ApplyModify code
13113  for (AuraList::const_iterator itr = m_deletedAuras.begin(); itr != m_deletedAuras.end(); ++itr)
13114  delete *itr;
13115  m_deletedAuras.clear();
13116 }
13117 
13118 bool Unit::IsShapeShifted() const
13119 {
13120  // Mirroring clientside gameplay logic
13121  if (ShapeshiftForm form = GetShapeshiftForm())
13122  {
13123  if (SpellShapeshiftFormEntry const* entry = sSpellShapeshiftFormStore.LookupEntry(form))
13124  return !(entry->flags1 & SHAPESHIFT_FLAG_STANCE);
13125  }
13126  return false;
13127 }
13128 
13129 bool Unit::IsNoWeaponShapeShift() const
13130 {
13131  // Mirroring clientside gameplay logic
13132  if (ShapeshiftForm form = GetShapeshiftForm())
13133  if (SpellShapeshiftFormEntry const* entry = sSpellShapeshiftFormStore.LookupEntry(form))
13134  return entry->flags1 & SHAPESHIFT_FLAG_DONT_USE_WEAPON;
13135 
13136  return false;
13137 }
13138 
13139 SpellAuraHolder* Unit::GetSpellAuraHolder(uint32 spellid) const
13140 {
13141  SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator itr = m_spellAuraHolders.find(spellid);
13142  return itr != m_spellAuraHolders.end() ? itr->second : nullptr;
13143 }
13144 
13145 SpellAuraHolder* Unit::GetSpellAuraHolder(uint32 spellid, ObjectGuid casterGuid) const
13146 {
13147  SpellAuraHolderConstBounds bounds = GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(spellid);
13148  for (SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator iter = bounds.first; iter != bounds.second; ++iter)
13149  if (iter->second->GetCasterGuid() == casterGuid)
13150  return iter->second;
13151 
13152  return nullptr;
13153 }
13154 
13155 bool Unit::IsAllowedDamageInArea(Unit* attacker, Unit* pVictim)
13156 {
13157  if (!attacker) // GOs can damage anywhere
13158  return true;
13159 
13160  // can damage self anywhere
13161  if (pVictim == attacker)
13162  return true;
13163 
13164  // can damage own pet anywhere
13165  if (pVictim->GetOwnerGuid() == attacker->GetObjectGuid())
13166  return true;
13167 
13168  // non player controlled unit can damage anywhere
13169  Player const* pOwner = attacker->GetBeneficiaryPlayer();
13170  if (!pOwner)
13171  return true;
13172 
13173  // can damage non player controlled victim anywhere
13174  Player const* vOwner = pVictim->GetBeneficiaryPlayer();
13175  if (!vOwner)
13176  return true;
13177 
13178  // can damage opponent in duel
13179  if (pOwner->IsInDuelWith(vOwner))
13180  return true;
13181 
13182  // can't damage player controlled unit by player controlled unit in sanctuary
13183  AreaTableEntry const* area = GetAreaEntryByAreaID(pVictim->GetAreaId());
13184  return !(area && area->flags & AREA_FLAG_SANCTUARY);
13185 }
13186 
13187 class UnitVisitObjectsInRangeNotifyEvent : public BasicEvent
13188 {
13189  public:
13190  UnitVisitObjectsInRangeNotifyEvent(Unit& owner) : BasicEvent(), m_owner(owner) {}
13191 
13192  bool Execute(uint64 /*e_time*/, uint32 /*p_time*/) override
13193  {
13194  float radius = std::max(m_owner.GetDetectionRange(), uint32(MAX_CREATURE_ATTACK_RADIUS)) * sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_FLOAT_RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
13195  if (m_owner.IsPlayer())
13196  {
13197  MaNGOS::PlayerVisitObjectsNotifier notify(static_cast<Player&>(m_owner));
13198  Cell::VisitAllObjects(&m_owner, notify, radius);
13199  }
13200  else // if(m_owner.GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
13201  {
13202  Creature& creature = static_cast<Creature&>(m_owner);
13203  //since visitor was called we override can aggro with true if creature is alive
13204  creature.SetCanAggro(creature.IsAlive());
13205  MaNGOS::CreatureVisitObjectsNotifier notify(creature);
13206  Cell::VisitAllObjects(&m_owner, notify, radius);
13207  }
13208  m_owner.FinalizeAINotifyEvent();
13209  return true;
13210  }
13211 
13212  void Abort(uint64) override
13213  {
13214  m_owner.FinalizeAINotifyEvent();
13215  }
13216 
13217  private:
13218  Unit & m_owner;
13219 };
13220 
13221 void Unit::ScheduleAINotify(uint32 delay, bool forced)
13222 {
13223  if (!IsAINotifyScheduled())
13224  {
13225  m_AINotifyEvent = new UnitVisitObjectsInRangeNotifyEvent(*this);
