13226  m_events.AddEvent(m_AINotifyEvent, m_events.CalculateTime(delay));
13227  }
13228  else if (forced)
13229  {
13230  m_events.KillEvent(m_AINotifyEvent);
13231  m_AINotifyEvent = new UnitVisitObjectsInRangeNotifyEvent(*this);
13232  m_events.AddEvent(m_AINotifyEvent, m_events.CalculateTime(delay));
13233  }
13234 }
13235 
13236 void Unit::AbortAINotifyEvent()
13237 {
13238  if (m_AINotifyEvent)
13239  {
13240  m_events.KillEvent(m_AINotifyEvent);
13241  m_AINotifyEvent = nullptr;
13242  }
13243 }
13244 
13245 void Unit::OnRelocated()
13246 {
13247  // switch to use G3D::Vector3 is good idea, maybe
13248  float dx = m_last_notified_position.x - GetPositionX();
13249  float dy = m_last_notified_position.y - GetPositionY();
13250  float dz = m_last_notified_position.z - GetPositionZ();
13251  float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz;
13252  if (distsq > World::GetRelocationLowerLimitSq())
13253  {
13254  m_last_notified_position.x = GetPositionX();
13255  m_last_notified_position.y = GetPositionY();
13256  m_last_notified_position.z = GetPositionZ();
13257  if (!IsBoarded() && IsVehicle()) // must update passengers for visibility reasons
13258  m_vehicleInfo->UpdateGlobalPositions();
13259  GetViewPoint().Call_UpdateVisibilityForOwner();
13260  UpdateObjectVisibility();
13261  }
13262  ScheduleAINotify(World::GetRelocationAINotifyDelay());
13263 }
13264 
13269 void Unit::SetVehicleId(uint32 entry, uint32 overwriteNpcEntry)
13270 {
13271  delete m_vehicleInfo;
13272 
13273  if (entry)
13274  {
13275  VehicleEntry const* ventry = sVehicleStore.LookupEntry(entry);
13276  MANGOS_ASSERT(ventry != nullptr);
13277 
13278  m_vehicleInfo = new VehicleInfo(this, ventry, overwriteNpcEntry);
13279  m_updateFlag |= UPDATEFLAG_VEHICLE;
13280  }
13281  else
13282  {
13283  m_vehicleInfo = nullptr;
13284  m_updateFlag &= ~UPDATEFLAG_VEHICLE;
13285  }
13286 
13287  if (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
13288  {
13289  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SET_VEHICLE_REC_ID, 16);
13290  data << GetPackGUID();
13291  data << uint32(entry);
13292  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
13293  }
13294 }
13295 
13296 Unit const* Unit::FindRootVehicle(const Unit* whichVehicle /*= nullptr*/) const
13297 {
13298  // A server counterpart to client's API:
13299  // Searches for a specific vehicle pointer through chain of transports and returns it, if not found or nullptr - returns root vehicle in chain of transports
13300  const ObjectGuid& thisTransportGuid = m_movementInfo.GetTransportGuid();
13301  if (this == whichVehicle || (thisTransportGuid.IsEmpty() || !thisTransportGuid.IsVehicle()))
13302  {
13303  if (const VehicleInfo* thisVehicleInfo = this->GetVehicleInfo())
13304  {
13305  if (thisVehicleInfo->GetVehicleEntry())
13306  return this;
13307  }
13308  }
13309  else
13310  {
13311  if (Unit const* vehicle = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*this, thisTransportGuid))
13312  {
13313  while (vehicle != whichVehicle)
13314  {
13315  const ObjectGuid& guid = vehicle->m_movementInfo.GetTransportGuid();
13316  if (guid.IsEmpty() || !guid.IsVehicle())
13317  break;
13318  vehicle = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*vehicle, guid);
13319  if (!vehicle)
13320  return nullptr;
13321  }
13322  return vehicle;
13323  }
13324  }
13325  return nullptr;
13326 }
13327 
13328 void Unit::UpdateSplineMovement(uint32 t_diff)
13329 {
13330  enum
13331  {
13332  POSITION_UPDATE_DELAY = 400,
13333  };
13334 
13335  if (movespline->Finalized())
13336  return;
13337 #ifdef BUILD_METRICS
13338  metric::duration<std::chrono::microseconds> meas("unit.updatesplinemovement", {
13339  { "entry", std::to_string(GetEntry()) },
13340  { "guid", std::to_string(GetGUIDLow()) },
13341  { "unit_type", std::to_string(GetGUIDHigh()) },
13342  { "map_id", std::to_string(GetMapId()) },
13343  { "instance_id", std::to_string(GetInstanceId()) }
13344  }, 1000);
13345 #endif
13346  movespline->updateState(t_diff);
13347  bool arrived = movespline->Finalized();
13348 
13349  if (arrived)
13350  DisableSpline();
13351 
13352  m_movesplineTimer.Update(t_diff);
13353  if (m_movesplineTimer.Passed() || arrived)
13354  {
13355  m_movesplineTimer.Reset(POSITION_UPDATE_DELAY);
13356  UpdateSplinePosition();
13357  }
13358 }
13359 
13360 void Unit::UpdateSplinePosition(bool relocateOnly)
13361 {
13362  Movement::Location computedLoc = movespline->ComputePosition();
13363  Position pos(computedLoc.x, computedLoc.y, computedLoc.z, computedLoc.orientation);
13364  if (GenericTransport* transport = GetTransport())
13365  {
13366  m_movementInfo.UpdateTransportData(pos);
13367  transport->CalculatePassengerPosition(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z, &pos.o);
13368  }
13369  if (TransportInfo* transportInfo = GetTransportInfo())
13370  {
13371  m_movementInfo.UpdateTransportData(pos);
13372  transportInfo->CalculatePassengerPosition(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z, &pos.o);
13373  }
13374 
13375  bool faced = false;
13376  if (movespline->isFacing())
13377  {
13378  if (movespline->isFacingTarget())
13379  {
13380  if (WorldObject const* target = GetMap()->GetWorldObject(ObjectGuid(movespline->GetFacing().target)))
13381  {
13382  pos.o = GetAngle(target);
13383  faced = true;
13384  }
13385  }
13386  else if (movespline->isFacingPoint())
13387  {
13388  auto& facing = movespline->GetFacing();
13389  pos.o = GetAngle(facing.f.x, facing.f.y);
13390  faced = true;
13391  }
13392  else if (movespline->isFacingAngle())
13393  {
13394  pos.o = movespline->GetFacing().angle;
13395  faced = true;
13396  }
13397  }
13398 
13399  if (!faced)
13400  {
13401  if (pos.y == GetPositionY() && pos.x == GetPositionX())
13402  pos.o = GetOrientation();
13403  else
13404  {
13405  float angle = atan2((pos.y - GetPositionY()), (pos.x - GetPositionX()));
13406  pos.o = (angle >= 0 ? angle : ((2 * M_PI_F) + angle));
13407  }
13408  }
13409 
13410  if (relocateOnly)
13411  {
13412  Relocate(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z, pos.o);
13413  return;
13414  }
13415 
13416  if (IsPlayer())
13417  static_cast<Player*>(this)->SetPosition(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z, pos.o);
13418  else
13419  GetMap()->CreatureRelocation((Creature*)this, pos.x, pos.y, pos.z, pos.o);
13420 }
13421 
13422 void Unit::SendFlightSplineSyncIfNeeded()
13423 {
13424  if (movespline->Finalized() || !movespline->isCyclic())
13425  return;
13426 
13427  WorldPacket packet(SMSG_FLIGHT_SPLINE_SYNC, 4 + 8);
13428  packet << movespline->GetElapsedValue();
13429  packet << GetObjectGuid();
13430  SendMessageToSet(packet, true);
13431 }
13432 
13433 void Unit::DisableSpline()
13434 {
13435  m_movementInfo.RemoveMovementFlag(MovementFlags(MOVEFLAG_SPLINE_ENABLED | MOVEFLAG_FORWARD));
13436  movespline->_Interrupt();
13437 }
13438 
13439 void Unit::SendCollisionHeightUpdate(float height)
13440 {
13441  if (IsClientControlled())
13442  {
13443  if (Player const* player = GetControllingPlayer())
13444  {
13445  WorldPacket data(SMSG_MOVE_SET_COLLISION_HGT, GetPackGUID().size() + 4 + 4);
13446  data << GetPackGUID();
13447  data << uint32(sWorld.GetGameTime());
13448  data << height;
13449  player->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
13450  }
13451  }
13452 }
13453 
13454 // This will create a new creature and set the current unit as the controller of that new creature
13455 Unit* Unit::TakePossessOf(SpellEntry const* spellEntry, SummonPropertiesEntry const* /*summonProp*/, uint32 effIdx, float x, float y, float z, float ang)
13456 {
13457  // Possess is a unique advertised charm, another advertised charm already exists: we should get rid of it first
13458  if (HasCharm())
13459  return nullptr;
13460 
13461  int32 const& creatureEntry = spellEntry->EffectMiscValue[effIdx];
13462  CreatureInfo const* cinfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(creatureEntry);
13463  if (!cinfo)
13464  {
13465  sLog.outErrorDb("WorldObject::SummonCreature: Creature (Entry: %u) not existed for summoner: %s. ", creatureEntry, GetGuidStr().c_str());
13466  return nullptr;
13467  }
13468 
13469  if (GetCharm())
13470  {
13471  sLog.outError("Unit::TakePossessOf> There is already a charmed creature for %s its : %s. ", GetGuidStr().c_str(), GetCharm()->GetGuidStr().c_str());
13472  return nullptr;
13473  }
13474 
13475  TemporarySpawn* possessed = new TemporarySpawn(GetObjectGuid());
13476 
13477  CreatureCreatePos pos(GetMap(), x, y, z, ang, GetPhaseMask());
13478 
13479  if (x == 0.0f && y == 0.0f && z == 0.0f)
13480  pos = CreatureCreatePos(this, GetOrientation(), CONTACT_DISTANCE, ang);
13481 
13482  uint32 lowGuid = GetMap()->GenerateLocalLowGuid(cinfo->GetHighGuid());
13483  if (!possessed->Create(lowGuid, lowGuid, pos, cinfo))
13484  {
13485  delete possessed;
13486  return nullptr;
13487  }
13488 
13489  Player* player = GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? static_cast<Player*>(this) : nullptr;
13490 
13491  possessed->SetFactionTemporary(GetFaction(), TEMPFACTION_NONE); // set same faction than player
13492  possessed->SetRespawnCoord(pos); // set spawn coord
13493  possessed->SetCharmerGuid(GetObjectGuid()); // save guid of the charmer
13494  possessed->SetCreatorGuid(GetObjectGuid()); // save guid of the creator
13495  possessed->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_CREATED_BY_SPELL, spellEntry->Id); // set the spell id used to create this (may be used for removing corresponding aura
13496  possessed->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_POSSESSED); // set flag for client that mean this unit is controlled by a player
13497  possessed->addUnitState(UNIT_STAT_POSSESSED); // also set internal unit state flag
13498  possessed->SelectLevel(GetLevel()); // set level to same level than summoner TODO:: not sure its always the case...
13499  possessed->SetLinkedToOwnerAura(TEMPSPAWN_LINKED_AURA_OWNER_CHECK | TEMPSPAWN_LINKED_AURA_REMOVE_OWNER); // set what to do if linked aura is removed or the creature is dead.
13500 
13501  // important before adding to the map!
13502  SetCharmGuid(possessed->GetObjectGuid()); // save guid of charmed creature
13503 
13504  possessed->SetSummonProperties(TEMPSPAWN_CORPSE_TIMED_DESPAWN, 5000); // set 5s corpse decay
13505  GetMap()->Add(static_cast<Creature*>(possessed)); // create the creature in the client
13506  possessed->AIM_Initialize(); // even if this will be replaced it need to be initialized to take care of spawn spells
13507 
13508  // Give the control to the player
13509  if (player)
13510  {
13511  player->UnsummonPetTemporaryIfAny();
13512 
13513  player->GetCamera().SetView(possessed); // modify camera view to the creature view
13514  // Force granting client control (required for action bars to function propely, will be taken away on demand after action bars update below)
13515  player->UpdateClientControl(possessed, true, true); // transfer client control to the creature after altering flags
13516  player->SetMover(possessed); // set mover so now we know that creature is "moved" by this unit
13517  player->SendForcedObjectUpdate(); // we have to update client data here to avoid problem with the "release spirit" windows reappear.
13518  }
13519 
13520  // init CharmInfo class that will hold charm data
13521  CharmInfo* charmInfo = possessed->InitCharmInfo(possessed);
13522 
13523  // set temp possess ai (creature will not be able to react by itself)
13524  charmInfo->SetCharmState("PossessedAI");
13525  possessed->SetWalk(IsWalking(), true); // sync the walking state with the summoner - after SetCharmState
13526 
13527  // New flags for the duration of charm need to be set after SetCharmState, gets reset in ResetCharmState
13528  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
13529  possessed->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
13530 
13531  const bool immunePC = IsImmuneToPlayer();
13532  if (possessed->IsImmuneToPlayer() != immunePC)
13533  possessed->SetImmuneToPlayer(immunePC);
13534 
13535  const bool immuneNPC = IsImmuneToNPC();
13536  if (possessed->IsImmuneToNPC() != immuneNPC)
13537  possessed->SetImmuneToNPC(immuneNPC);
13538 
13539  charmInfo->ProcessUnattackableTargets(possessed->m_combatData);
13540 
13541  if (player)
13542  {
13543  // Initialize pet bar
13544  charmInfo->InitPossessCreateSpells();
13545  player->PossessSpellInitialize();
13546 
13547  // Take away client control immediately if we are not supposed to have control at the moment
13548  if (!possessed->IsClientControlled(player))
13549  player->UpdateClientControl(possessed, false);
13550  }
13551 
13552  // Creature Linking, Initial load is handled like respawn
13553  if (possessed->IsLinkingEventTrigger())
13554  GetMap()->GetCreatureLinkingHolder()->DoCreatureLinkingEvent(LINKING_EVENT_RESPAWN, possessed);
13555 
13556  // return the creature therewith the summoner has access to it
13557  return possessed;
13558 }
13559 
13560 bool Unit::TakePossessOf(Unit* possessed)
13561 {
13562  // Possess is a unique advertised charm, another advertised charm already exists: we should get rid of it first
13563  if (HasCharm())
13564  return false;
13565 
13566  Player* player = (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? static_cast<Player*>(this) : nullptr);
13567 
13568  if (player && possessed->GetObjectGuid() != GetPetGuid())
13569  player->UnsummonPetTemporaryIfAny();
13570 
13571  // Update possessed's client control status before altering flags
13572  if (const Player* controllingClientPlayer = possessed->GetClientControlling())
13573  controllingClientPlayer->UpdateClientControl(possessed, false);
13574 
13575  // stop attacking
13576  possessed->AttackStop(true, true);
13577 
13578  Creature* possessedCreature = nullptr;
13579  Player* possessedPlayer = nullptr;
13580  CharmInfo* charmInfo = possessed->InitCharmInfo(possessed);
13581  possessed->SetCharmerGuid(GetObjectGuid());
13582  SetCharm(possessed);
13583 
13584  const bool panic = possessed->IsInPanic(), fleeing = possessed->IsFleeing(), confused = possessed->IsConfused();
13585 
13586  // stop any generated movement: current solution
13587  possessed->StopMoving(true);
13588  possessed->GetMotionMaster()->Clear(false, true);
13589  possessed->GetMotionMaster()->MoveIdle();
13590 
13591  if (confused)
13592  possessed->GetMotionMaster()->MoveConfused();
13593  else if (fleeing && !panic)
13594  {
13595  AuraList const& fears = possessed->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR);
13596  Unit* source = (fears.empty() ? nullptr : fears.back()->GetCaster());
13597  possessed->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFleeing(source ? source : this);
13598  }
13599 
13600  Position combatStartPosition;
13601 
13602  if (possessed->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
13603  {
13604  possessedCreature = static_cast<Creature*>(possessed);
13605  possessedCreature->GetCombatStartPosition(combatStartPosition);
13606  possessedCreature->SetFactionTemporary(GetFaction(), TEMPFACTION_NONE);
13607 
13608  charmInfo->SetCharmState("PossessedAI");
13609  possessedCreature->SetWalk(IsWalking(), true);
13610  getHostileRefManager().deleteReference(possessedCreature);
13611  }
13612  else if (possessed->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
13613  {
13614  possessedPlayer = static_cast<Player*>(possessed);
13615  if (player && player->IsInDuelWith(possessedPlayer))
13616  possessedPlayer->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_DUEL_TEAM, player->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_DUEL_TEAM));
13617  else
13618  possessedPlayer->setFaction(GetFaction());
13619 
13620  charmInfo->SetCharmState("PossessedAI");
13621  }
13622 
13623  // Manipulate unit flags after SetCharmState
13624  possessed->addUnitState(UNIT_STAT_POSSESSED);
13625  possessed->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_POSSESSED);
13626 
13627  // New flags for the duration of charm need to be set after SetCharmState, gets reset in ResetCharmState
13628  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
13629  possessed->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
13630  else
13631  possessed->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
13632 
13633  const bool immunePC = IsImmuneToPlayer();
13634  if (possessed->IsImmuneToPlayer() != immunePC) // Do not propagate immunity flag to pets
13635  possessed->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PLAYER);
13636 
13637  const bool immuneNPC = IsImmuneToNPC();
13638  if (possessed->IsImmuneToNPC() != immuneNPC)
13639  possessed->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC);
13640 
13641  charmInfo->SetCharmStartPosition(combatStartPosition.IsEmpty() ? possessed->GetPosition(possessed->GetTransport()) : combatStartPosition);
13642 
13643  charmInfo->ProcessUnattackableTargets(possessed->m_combatData);
13644 
13645  if (!IsInCombat())
13646  {
13647  possessed->GetCombatManager().StopCombatTimer();
13648  possessed->ClearInCombat();
13649  }
13650 
13651  if (player)
13652  {
13653  player->GetCamera().SetView(possessed);
13654  // Force granting client control (required for action bars to function propely, will be taken away on demand after action bars update below)
13655  player->UpdateClientControl(possessed, true, true);
13656  player->SetMover(possessed);
13657  player->SendForcedObjectUpdate();
13658 
13659  // Unsummon existing pet and initialize pet bar only when not possessing own pet
13660  if (possessedCreature && !(possessedCreature->IsPet() && possessedCreature->GetObjectGuid() == GetPetGuid()))
13661  {
13662  // player pet is unsmumoned while possessing
13663  player->UnsummonPetTemporaryIfAny();
13664 
13665  charmInfo->InitPossessCreateSpells();
13666  // may not always have AI, when posessing a player for example
13667  if (possessed->AI())
13668  possessed->AI()->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
13669  charmInfo->SetCommandState(COMMAND_STAY);
13670  player->PossessSpellInitialize(); // but still initialize pet bar for even own pet
13671  }
13672  else
13673  {
13674  charmInfo->InitPossessCreateSpells();
13675  player->PossessSpellInitialize();
13676  }
13677 
13678  // Take away client control immediately if we are not supposed to have control at the moment
13679  if (!possessed->IsClientControlled(player))
13680  player->UpdateClientControl(possessed, false);
13681 
13682  if (player->GetGroup())
13683  player->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_PET);
13684  }
13685 
13686  return true;
13687 }
13688 
13689 bool Unit::TakeCharmOf(Unit* charmed, uint32 spellId, bool advertised /*= true*/)
13690 {
13691  Player* charmerPlayer = (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? static_cast<Player*>(this) : nullptr);
13692 
13693  if (charmerPlayer && advertised)
13694  charmerPlayer->UnsummonPetTemporaryIfAny();
13695 
13696  // Update charmed's client control status before altering flags
13697  if (const Player* controllingClientPlayer = charmed->GetClientControlling())
13698  controllingClientPlayer->UpdateClientControl(charmed, false);
13699 
13700  // stop attacking
13701  charmed->AttackStop(true, true);
13702 
13703  charmed->SetCharmerGuid(GetObjectGuid());
13704  if (advertised)
13705  {
13706  // If an advertised charm already exists: offload and overwrite
13707  if (const ObjectGuid &charmGuid = GetCharmGuid())
13708  m_charmedUnitsPrivate.insert(charmGuid);
13709  SetCharmGuid(charmed->GetObjectGuid());
13710  }
13711  else
13712  m_charmedUnitsPrivate.insert(charmed->GetObjectGuid());
13713 
13714  CharmInfo* charmInfo = charmed->InitCharmInfo(charmed);
13715 
13716  bool isPossessCharm = IsPossessCharmType(spellId);
13717 
13718  Position combatStartPosition;
13719 
13720  if (charmed->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
13721  {
13722  Player* charmedPlayer = static_cast<Player*>(charmed);
13723  if (charmerPlayer && charmerPlayer->IsInDuelWith(charmedPlayer))
13724  charmedPlayer->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_DUEL_TEAM, charmerPlayer->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_DUEL_TEAM));
13725  else
13726  charmedPlayer->setFaction(GetFaction());
13727 
13728  charmInfo->SetCharmState("PetAI");
13729  charmed->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 1, UNIT_BYTE2_FLAG_AURAS); // important have to be after charminfo initialization
13730 
13731  if (isPossessCharm)
13732  charmInfo->InitPossessCreateSpells();
13733  else
13734  {
13735  charmInfo->InitCharmCreateSpells();
13736  charmed->AI()->SetReactState(REACT_DEFENSIVE);
13737  charmInfo->SetCommandState(COMMAND_FOLLOW);
13738  charmInfo->SetIsRetreating(true);
13739  }
13740 
13741  charmedPlayer->ClearSelectionGuid();
13742 
13743  charmedPlayer->SendForcedObjectUpdate();
13744  }
13745  else if (charmed->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
13746  {
13747  Creature* charmedCreature = static_cast<Creature*>(charmed);
13748 
13749  charmedCreature->GetCombatStartPosition(combatStartPosition);
13750 
13751  if (charmed->AI() && charmed->AI()->CanHandleCharm())
13752  charmInfo->SetCharmState("", false);
13753  else
13754  charmInfo->SetCharmState("PetAI");
13755 
13756  charmedCreature->SetWalk(IsWalking(), true);
13757 
13758  getHostileRefManager().deleteReference(charmedCreature);
13759 
13760  charmedCreature->SetFactionTemporary(GetFaction(), TEMPFACTION_NONE);
13761 
13762  if (isPossessCharm)
13763  charmInfo->InitPossessCreateSpells();
13764  else
13765  {
13766  charmInfo->InitCharmCreateSpells();
13767  charmed->AI()->SetReactState(REACT_DEFENSIVE);
13768  charmInfo->SetCommandState(COMMAND_FOLLOW);
13769  charmInfo->SetIsRetreating(true);
13770  }
13771  }
13772 
13773  if (charmInfo->GetUnit() != charmed)
13774  sLog.outCustomLog("Unit didnt equal in Unit::TakeCharmOf after base changes.");
13775 
13776  // New flags for the duration of charm need to be set after SetCharmState, gets reset in ResetCharmState
13777  if (HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
13778  charmed->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
13779  else
13780  charmed->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
13781 
13782  const bool immunePC = IsImmuneToPlayer();
13783  if (charmed->IsImmuneToPlayer() != immunePC) // Do not propagate immunity flag to pets
13784  charmed->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PLAYER);
13785 
13786  const bool immuneNPC = IsImmuneToNPC();
13787  if (charmed->IsImmuneToNPC() != immuneNPC)
13788  charmed->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC);
13789 
13790  charmInfo->SetCharmStartPosition(combatStartPosition.IsEmpty() ? charmed->GetPosition(charmed->GetTransport()) : combatStartPosition);
13791 
13792  if (charmerPlayer && advertised)
13793  {
13794  charmerPlayer->CharmSpellInitialize();
13795  if (charmerPlayer->GetGroup())
13796  charmerPlayer->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_PET);
13797  }
13798 
13799  if (charmInfo->GetUnit() != charmed)
13800  sLog.outCustomLog("Unit didnt equal in Unit::TakeCharmOf after flag changes.");
13801 
13802  if (spellId != 24178) // Will of Hakkar - Preserves threat
13803  charmInfo->ProcessUnattackableTargets(charmed->m_combatData);
13804 
13805  if (charmInfo->GetUnit() != charmed)
13806  sLog.outCustomLog("Unit didnt equal in Unit::TakeCharmOf after attackability changes.");
13807 
13808  // put charmed in combat with all charmers enemies - must be done after flags
13809  ThreatList const& list = getThreatManager().getThreatList();
13810  for (auto& data : list)
13811  {
13812  Unit* enemy = data->getTarget();
13813  if (charmed->CanAttack(enemy))
13814  charmed->AddThreat(enemy, 0.f);
13815  }
13816 
13817  if (!IsInCombat())
13818  {
13819  charmed->GetCombatManager().StopCombatTimer();
13820  charmed->ClearInCombat();
13821  }
13822 
13823  if (UnitAI* ai = charmed->AI())
13824  ai->JustGotCharmed(this);
13825 
13826  return true;
13827 }
13828 
13829 void Unit::BreakCharmOutgoing(Unit* charmed)
13830 {
13831  // Cache our own guid
13832  const ObjectGuid &guid = GetObjectGuid();
13833 
13834  // Verify charmed with self as a charmer
13835  if (charmed && charmed->HasCharmer(guid))
13836  {
13837  // Break any aura-based charm spells on the charmed unit placed by self
13838  charmed->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS, guid);
13839  charmed->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CHARM, guid);
13840  charmed->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS_PET, guid);
13841  charmed->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_AOE_CHARM, guid);
13842 
13843  // Re-check: if still charmed after aura removal attempt - likely non-aura charm (summon charmed for example)
13844  if (charmed->HasCharmer(guid))
13845  Uncharm(charmed);
13846 
13847  if (charmed->GetSpawnerGuid() == guid)
13848  {
13849  // Looks like a charmed temporary summon, possibly summoned by a linked specific aura, try removing
13850  if (uint32 spellid = charmed->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_CREATED_BY_SPELL))
13851  RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spellid);
13852  }
13853  }
13854 }
13855 
13856 void Unit::BreakCharmOutgoing(bool advertisedOnly /*= false*/)
13857 {
13858  // Always break charm on the unit advertised in own charm field
13859  BreakCharmOutgoing(GetCharm());
13860 
13861  // If set, do not break non-advertised charms (such as aoe charms)
13862  if (advertisedOnly)
13863  return;
13864 
13865  // Proceed breaking the rest of charms
13866  if (Map* map = GetMap())
13867  {
13868  while (!m_charmedUnitsPrivate.empty())
13869  {
13870  const ObjectGuid &guid = (*m_charmedUnitsPrivate.begin());
13871 
13872  if (Unit* unit = map->GetUnit(guid))
13873  // Erase is performed further down the line
13874  BreakCharmOutgoing(unit);
13875  else
13876  // Erase it from the container if somehow does not exist / is inaccesible anymore
13877  m_charmedUnitsPrivate.erase(guid);
13878  }
13879  }
13880 }
13881 
13882 void Unit::BreakCharmIncoming()
13883 {
13884  if (Unit* charmer = GetCharmer())
13885  charmer->BreakCharmOutgoing(this);
13886 }
13887 
13888 void Unit::Uncharm(Unit* charmed, uint32 spellId)
13889 {
13890  Player* player = (GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? static_cast<Player*>(this) : nullptr);
13891 
13892  // Charmed unit should exist and be charmed by us
13893  if (!charmed || !charmed->HasCharmer(GetObjectGuid()))
13894  return;
13895 
13896  // Cache the guid of the charmed unit
13897  const ObjectGuid charmedGuid = charmed->GetObjectGuid();
13898 
13899  // Detect if the charm is the possessing charm
13900  const bool possess = charmed->hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_POSSESSED);
13901 
13902  // Detect if this charm is advertised in own charm field (public) or a private one
13903  const bool advertised = HasCharm(charmedGuid);
13904 
13905  if (possess)
13906  {
13907  charmed->clearUnitState(UNIT_STAT_POSSESSED);
13908  charmed->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_POSSESSED);
13909  }
13910  charmed->SetCharmerGuid(ObjectGuid());
13911  if (advertised)
13912  SetCharmGuid(ObjectGuid());
13913  else
13914  m_charmedUnitsPrivate.erase(charmedGuid);
13915 
13916  // Update movement of the victim
13917  // Update crowd controlled movement if required:
13918  // TODO: requires motionmster upgrade for proper handling past this line
13919  // We are effectively rebuilding motion master contents: confused > fleeing > panic
13920  if (!IsPossessCharmType(spellId))
13921  {
13922  const bool panic = charmed->IsInPanic(), fleeing = charmed->IsFleeing(), confused = charmed->IsConfused();
13923 
13924  // stop any generated movement: current solution
13925  charmed->StopMoving(true);
13926  charmed->GetMotionMaster()->Initialize();
13927 
13928  if (confused)
13929  charmed->GetMotionMaster()->MoveConfused();
13930  else if (fleeing && !panic)
13931  {
13932  AuraList const& fears = charmed->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR);
13933  Unit* source = (fears.empty() ? nullptr : fears.back()->GetCaster());
13934  charmed->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFleeing(source ? source : this);
13935  }
13936  }
13937 
13938  const Position charmStartPosition = charmed->GetCharmInfo()->GetCharmStartPosition();
13939 
13940  // if charm expires mid evade clear evade since movement is also cleared
13941  // TODO: maybe should be done on HomeMovementGenerator::MovementExpires
13942  charmed->GetCombatManager().SetEvadeState(EVADE_NONE);
13943 
13944  if (charmed->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
13945  {
13946  // now we have to clean threat list to be able to restore normal creature behavior
13947  Creature* charmedCreature = static_cast<Creature*>(charmed);
13948  if (!charmedCreature->IsPet())
13949  {
13950  charmedCreature->ClearTemporaryFaction();
13951 
13952  charmed->AttackStop(true, true);
13953  charmed->InterruptSpell(CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL);
13954  charmed->InterruptSpell(CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL);
13955 
13956  charmed->GetCharmInfo()->ResetCharmState();
13957  charmed->DeleteCharmInfo();
13958 
13959  charmed->RemoveUnattackableTargets();
13960 
13961  // we have to restore initial MotionMaster
13962  charmed->GetMotionMaster()->UnMarkFollowMovegens();
13963  }
13964  else
13965  {
13966  // safeguard against nullptr on totem elemental despawn
13967  if (Unit* owner = charmedCreature->GetOwner())
13968  charmed->setFaction(owner->GetFaction());
13969 
13970  charmed->GetCharmInfo()->ResetCharmState();
13971 
13972  // as possessed is a pet we have to restore original charminfo so Pet::DeleteCharmInfo will take care of that
13973  charmed->DeleteCharmInfo();
13974  }
13975 
13976  charmed->SetTarget(charmed->GetVictim());
13977  }
13978  else if (charmed->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
13979  {
13980  charmed->AttackStop(true, true);
13981 
13982  Player* charmedPlayer = static_cast<Player*>(charmed);
13983 
13984  if (player && player->IsInDuelWith(charmedPlayer))
13985  charmedPlayer->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_DUEL_TEAM, player->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_DUEL_TEAM) == 1 ? 2 : 1);
13986  else
13987  charmedPlayer->setFactionForRace(charmedPlayer->getRace());
13988 
13989  charmed->GetCharmInfo()->ResetCharmState();
13990  charmedPlayer->DeleteCharmInfo();
13991 
13992  charmed->GetMotionMaster()->Clear(false, true);
13993  charmed->GetMotionMaster()->MoveIdle();
13994 
13995  charmed->DeleteThreatList();
13996 
13997  charmed->SetTarget(nullptr);
13998 
13999  charmed->GetMotionMaster()->UnMarkFollowMovegens();
14000  }
14001 
14002  if (GetFormationSlot())
14003  {
14004  GetFormationSlot()->GetFormationData()->Remove(charmed);
14005  }
14006 
14007  // Update possessed's client control status after altering flags
14008  if (const Player* controllingClientPlayer = charmed->GetClientControlling())
14009  controllingClientPlayer->UpdateClientControl(charmed, true);
14010 
14011  if (charmed->IsAlive()) // must be done after flag update
14012  {
14013  if (charmed->CanAttack(this))
14014  {
14015  if (!charmed->IsInCombat())
14016  EngageInCombatWithAggressor(charmed);
14017 
14018  if (charmed->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
14019  charmed->AddThreat(this, charmed->GetMaxHealth()); // Simulates being charmed
14020  this->AddThreat(charmed);
14021 
14022  if (charmed->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
14023  {
14024  if (!charmStartPosition.IsEmpty())
14025  static_cast<Creature*>(charmed)->SetCombatStartPosition(charmStartPosition);
14026  }
14027  }
14028  }
14029  else
14030  charmed->GetCombatData()->threatManager.clearReferences();
14031 
14032  if (player)
14033  {
14034  if (possess)
14035  {
14036  player->GetCamera().ResetView();
14037  player->UpdateClientControl(charmed, false);
14038  player->SetMover(player);
14039  }
14040  }
14041 
14042  // be sure all those change will be made for clients
14043  SendForcedObjectUpdate();
14044 
14045  if (player)
14046  {
14047  // Player pet can be re-summoned here
14048  if (advertised)
14049  {
14050  player->ResummonPetTemporaryUnSummonedIfAny();
14051 
14052  // remove pet bar only if no pet
14053  if (!player->GetPet())
14054  player->RemovePetActionBar();
14055  else
14056  player->PetSpellInitialize(); // reset spell on pet bar
14057 
14058  if (player->GetGroup())
14059  player->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_PET);
14060  }
14061  }
14062 }
14063 
14064 void Unit::RemoveUnattackableTargets(Unit* charmer)
14065 {
14066  // first find friendly target (stopping combat here is not recommended because m_attackers will be modified)
14067  AttackerSet friendlyTargets;
14068  for (auto itr = getAttackers().begin(); itr != getAttackers().end(); ++itr)
14069  {
14070  Unit* attacker = (*itr);
14071  if (attacker->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
14072  continue;
14073 
14074  if (CanAttack(attacker))
14075  friendlyTargets.insert(attacker);
14076  }
14077 
14078  for (auto itr = getThreatManager().getThreatList().begin(); itr != getThreatManager().getThreatList().end(); ++itr)
14079  {
14080  Unit* attacker = (*itr)->getTarget();
14081  if (attacker->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
14082  continue;
14083 
14084  if (!CanAttack(attacker))
14085  friendlyTargets.insert(attacker);
14086  }
14087 
14088  // now stop attackers combat and transfer threat generated from this to owner, also get the total generated threat
14089  for (auto attacker : friendlyTargets)
14090  {
14091  attacker->AttackStop(true, true);
14092  attacker->getThreatManager().modifyThreatPercent(this, -101); // only remove the possessed creature from threat list because it can be filled by other players
14093  if (charmer && IsPropagatingThreatToOwner())
14094  attacker->AddThreat(charmer);
14095  }
14096 }
14097 
14098 float Unit::GetAttackDistance(Unit const* target) const
14099 {
14100  float aggroRate = sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_FLOAT_RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO);
14101  if (aggroRate == 0)
14102  return 0.0f;
14103 
14104  uint32 playerlevel = target->GetLevelForTarget(this);
14105  uint32 creaturelevel = GetLevelForTarget(target);
14106 
14107  int32 leveldif = int32(playerlevel) - int32(creaturelevel);
14108 
14109  // "The maximum Aggro Radius has a cap of 25 levels under. Example: A level 30 char has the same Aggro Radius of a level 5 char on a level 60 mob."
14110  if (leveldif < -25)
14111  leveldif = -25;
14112 
14113  // "The aggro radius of a mob having the same level as the player is roughly 18 yards"
14114  float attackDistance = GetDetectionRange();
14115  if (attackDistance == 0.f)
14116  return 0.0f;
14117 
14118  // "Aggro Radius varies with level difference at a rate of roughly 1 yard/level"
14119  // radius grow if playlevel < creaturelevel
14120  attackDistance -= (float)leveldif;
14121 
14122  // detect range auras
14123  attackDistance += GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECT_RANGE);
14124 
14125  // detected range auras
14126  attackDistance += target->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECTED_RANGE);
14127 
14128  // "Minimum Aggro Radius for a mob seems to be combat range (5 yards)"
14129  if (attackDistance < 5)
14130  attackDistance = 5;
14131 
14132  if (target->IsPlayerControlled() && target->IsCreature() && !target->IsClientControlled()) // player pets do not aggro from so afar
14133  attackDistance = attackDistance * 0.65f;
14134 
14135  return (attackDistance * aggroRate);
14136 }
14137 
14138 void Unit::InterruptSpellsCastedOnMe(bool killDelayed)
14139 {
14140  UnitList targets;
14141  // Maximum spell range=100m ?
14142  MaNGOS::AnyUnitInObjectRangeCheck u_check(this, 100.0f);
14143  MaNGOS::UnitListSearcher<MaNGOS::AnyUnitInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(targets, u_check);
14144  Cell::VisitAllObjects(this, searcher, GetMap()->GetVisibilityDistance());
14145  for (auto& target : targets)
14146  {
14147  if (!CanAttack(target))
14148  continue;
14149  for (uint32 i = CURRENT_FIRST_NON_MELEE_SPELL; i < CURRENT_MAX_SPELL; i++)
14150  if (Spell *spell = target->GetCurrentSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i)))
14151  if (spell->m_targets.getUnitTargetGuid() == GetObjectGuid())
14152  if (killDelayed || (spell->getState() == SPELL_STATE_CASTING && spell->GetCastedTime()) || i == CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL)
14153  target->InterruptSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i), true);
14154  if (!killDelayed)
14155  continue;
14156  // 2/ Interrupt spells that are not referenced but that still have an event (like delayed spell)
14157  for (auto i_events = target->m_events.GetEvents().begin(); i_events != target->m_events.GetEvents().end(); ++i_events)
14158  if (SpellEvent* event = dynamic_cast<SpellEvent*>(i_events->second))
14159  if (event && event->GetSpell()->m_targets.getUnitTargetGuid() == GetObjectGuid())
14160  if (event->GetSpell()->getState() != SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
14161  event->GetSpell()->cancel();
14162  }
14163 }
14164 
14165 void Unit::UpdateAllowedPositionZ(float x, float y, float& z, Map* atMap /*=nullptr*/) const
14166 {
14167  if (!atMap)
14168  atMap = GetMap();
14169 
14170  // non fly unit don't must be in air
14171  // non swim unit must be at ground (mostly speedup, because it don't must be in water and water level check less fast
14172  if (!CanFly())
14173  {
14174  bool canSwim = CanSwim();
14175  float groundZ = GetMap()->GetHeight(GetPhaseMask(), x, y, z, canSwim), maxZ;
14176  if (canSwim)
14177  maxZ = atMap->GetTerrain()->GetWaterOrGroundLevel(x, y, z, groundZ, !HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_WATER_WALK), GetCollisionHeight());
14178  else
14179  maxZ = groundZ;
14180  if (maxZ > INVALID_HEIGHT)
14181  {
14182  if (z > maxZ)
14183  z = maxZ;
14184  else if (z < groundZ)
14185  z = groundZ;
14186  }
14187  }
14188  else
14189  {
14190  float groundZ = atMap->GetHeight(GetPhaseMask(), x, y, z);
14191  if (z < groundZ)
14192  z = groundZ;
14193  }
14194 }
14195 
14196 void Unit::AdjustZForCollision(float x, float y, float& z, float halfHeight) const
14197 {
14198  if (CanFly())
14199  {
14200  float groundZ = GetMap()->GetHeight(GetPhaseMask(), x, y, z);
14201  if (z - halfHeight < groundZ)
14202  z = groundZ;
14203  }
14204 }
14205 
14206 uint32 Unit::GetSpellRank(SpellEntry const* spellInfo)
14207 {
14208  uint32 spellRank = GetLevel();
14209  if (spellInfo->maxLevel > 0 && spellRank >= spellInfo->maxLevel * 5)
14210  spellRank = spellInfo->maxLevel * 5;
14211  return spellRank;
14212 }
14213 
14214 float Unit::OCTRegenHPPerSpirit() const
14215 {
14216  uint32 level = GetLevel();
14217  uint32 pclass = getClass();
14218 
14219  if (level > GT_MAX_LEVEL) level = GT_MAX_LEVEL;
14220 
14221  GtOCTRegenHPEntry const* baseRatio = sGtOCTRegenHPStore.LookupEntry((pclass - 1) * GT_MAX_LEVEL + level - 1);
14222  GtRegenHPPerSptEntry const* moreRatio = sGtRegenHPPerSptStore.LookupEntry((pclass - 1) * GT_MAX_LEVEL + level - 1);
14223  if (baseRatio == nullptr || moreRatio == nullptr)
14224  return 0.0f;
14225 
14226  // Formula from PaperDollFrame script
14227  float spirit = GetStat(STAT_SPIRIT);
14228  float baseSpirit = spirit;
14229  if (baseSpirit > 50) baseSpirit = 50;
14230  float moreSpirit = spirit - baseSpirit;
14231  float regen = baseSpirit * baseRatio->ratio + moreSpirit * moreRatio->ratio;
14232  return regen;
14233 }
14234 
14235 float Unit::OCTRegenMPPerSpirit() const
14236 {
14237  uint32 level = GetLevel();
14238  uint32 pclass = getClass();
14239 
14240  if (level > GT_MAX_LEVEL) level = GT_MAX_LEVEL;
14241 
14242  // GtOCTRegenMPEntry const *baseRatio = sGtOCTRegenMPStore.LookupEntry((pclass-1)*GT_MAX_LEVEL + level-1);
14243  GtRegenMPPerSptEntry const* moreRatio = sGtRegenMPPerSptStore.LookupEntry((pclass - 1) * GT_MAX_LEVEL + level - 1);
14244  if (moreRatio == nullptr)
14245  return 0.0f;
14246 
14247  // Formula get from PaperDollFrame script
14248  float spirit = GetStat(STAT_SPIRIT);
14249  float regen = spirit * moreRatio->ratio;
14250  return regen;
14251 }
14252 
14253 float Unit::GetCollisionHeight() const
14254 {
14255  float scaleMod = GetObjectScale(); // 99% sure about this
14256 
14257  if (GetMountID())
14258  {
14259  if (CreatureDisplayInfoEntry const* mountDisplayInfo = sCreatureDisplayInfoStore.LookupEntry(GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MOUNTDISPLAYID)))
14260  {
14261  if (CreatureModelDataEntry const* mountModelData = sCreatureModelDataStore.LookupEntry(mountDisplayInfo->ModelId))
14262  {
14263  CreatureDisplayInfoEntry const* displayInfo = sCreatureDisplayInfoStore.LookupEntry(GetNativeDisplayId());
14264  MANGOS_ASSERT(displayInfo);
14265  CreatureModelDataEntry const* modelData = sCreatureModelDataStore.LookupEntry(displayInfo->ModelId);
14266  MANGOS_ASSERT(modelData);
14267  float const collisionHeight = scaleMod * (mountModelData->MountHeight + modelData->CollisionHeight * modelData->Scale * displayInfo->scale * 0.5f);
14268  return collisionHeight == 0.0f ? DEFAULT_COLLISION_HEIGHT : collisionHeight;
14269  }
14270  }
14271  }
14272 
14274  CreatureDisplayInfoEntry const* displayInfo = sCreatureDisplayInfoStore.LookupEntry(GetNativeDisplayId());
14275  MANGOS_ASSERT(displayInfo);
14276  CreatureModelDataEntry const* modelData = sCreatureModelDataStore.LookupEntry(displayInfo->ModelId);
14277  MANGOS_ASSERT(modelData);
14278 
14279  float const collisionHeight = scaleMod * modelData->CollisionHeight * modelData->Scale * displayInfo->scale;
14280  return collisionHeight == 0.0f ? DEFAULT_COLLISION_HEIGHT : collisionHeight;
14281 }
14282 
14283 float Unit::GetCollisionWidth() const
14284 {
14285  float scaleMod = GetObjectScale(); // 99% sure about this
14286 
14287  if (GetMountID())
14288  {
14289  if (CreatureDisplayInfoEntry const* mountDisplayInfo = sCreatureDisplayInfoStore.LookupEntry(GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MOUNTDISPLAYID)))
14290  {
14291  if (CreatureModelDataEntry const* mountModelData = sCreatureModelDataStore.LookupEntry(mountDisplayInfo->ModelId))
14292  {
14293  CreatureDisplayInfoEntry const* displayInfo = sCreatureDisplayInfoStore.LookupEntry(GetNativeDisplayId());
14294  MANGOS_ASSERT(displayInfo);
14295  CreatureModelDataEntry const* modelData = sCreatureModelDataStore.LookupEntry(displayInfo->ModelId);
14296  MANGOS_ASSERT(modelData);
14297  float const collisionWidth = scaleMod * (mountModelData->MountHeight + modelData->CollisionWidth * modelData->Scale * displayInfo->scale * 0.5f);
14298  return collisionWidth == 0.0f ? DEFAULT_COLLISION_WIDTH : collisionWidth;
14299  }
14300  }
14301  }
14302 
14304  CreatureDisplayInfoEntry const* displayInfo = sCreatureDisplayInfoStore.LookupEntry(GetNativeDisplayId());
14305  MANGOS_ASSERT(displayInfo);
14306  CreatureModelDataEntry const* modelData = sCreatureModelDataStore.LookupEntry(displayInfo->ModelId);
14307  MANGOS_ASSERT(modelData);
14308 
14309  float const collisionWidth = scaleMod * modelData->CollisionWidth * modelData->Scale * displayInfo->scale;
14310  return collisionWidth == 0.0f ? DEFAULT_COLLISION_WIDTH : collisionWidth;
14311 }
14312 
14313 Player* Unit::GetNextRandomRaidMember(float radius, AuraType noAuraType)
14314 {
14315  if (GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
14316  return nullptr;
14317 
14318  Player* player = static_cast<Player*>(this);
14319  Group* group = player->GetGroup();
14320  if (!group)
14321  return nullptr;
14322 
14323  std::vector<Player*> nearMembers;
14324  // reserve place for players because resizing vector every unit push is unefficient (vector is reallocated then)
14325  nearMembers.reserve(group->GetMembersCount());
14326 
14327  for (GroupReference* itr = group->GetFirstMember(); itr != nullptr; itr = itr->next())
14328  if (Player* target = itr->getSource())
14329  {
14330  // IsHostileTo check duel and controlled by enemy
14331  if (target != this && IsWithinDistInMap(target, radius) && target->IsAlive() && CanAssist(target))
14332  nearMembers.push_back(target);
14333  }
14334 
14335  if (nearMembers.empty())
14336  return nullptr;
14337 
14338  uint32 randTarget = urand(0, nearMembers.size()-1);
14339  return nearMembers[randTarget];
14340 }
14341 
14342 bool Unit::HasOverrideScript(uint32 id) const
14343 {
14344  return m_classScripts.find(id) != m_classScripts.end();
14345 }
14346 
14347 Aura* Unit::GetOverrideScript(uint32 id) const
14348 {
14349  auto itr = m_classScripts.find(id);
14350  return itr == m_classScripts.end() ? nullptr : (*itr).second;
14351 }
14352 
14353 void Unit::RegisterOverrideScriptAura(Aura* aura, uint32 id, bool apply)
14354 {
14355  if (apply)
14356  m_classScripts.insert({ id, aura });
14357  else
14358  m_classScripts.erase(id);
14359 }
14360 
14361 void Unit::RegisterScriptedLocationAura(Aura* aura, AuraScriptLocation location, bool apply)
14362 {
14363  if (apply)
14364  m_scriptedLocations[location].push_back(aura);
14365  else
14366  m_scriptedLocations[location].erase(std::remove(m_scriptedLocations[location].begin(), m_scriptedLocations[location].end(), aura), m_scriptedLocations[location].end());
14367 }
14368 
14369 void Unit::AddComboPoints(Unit* target, int8 count)
14370 {
14371  if (!count)
14372  return;
14373 
14374  // without combo points lost (duration checked in aura)
14375  RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_RETAIN_COMBO_POINTS);
14376 
14377  if (target->GetObjectGuid() == m_comboTargetGuid)
14378  {
14379  m_comboPoints += count;
14380  }
14381  else
14382  {
14383  if (m_comboTargetGuid)
14384  if (Unit* target2 = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*this, m_comboTargetGuid))
14385  target2->RemoveComboPointHolder(GetGUIDLow());
14386 
14387  m_comboTargetGuid = target->GetObjectGuid();
14388  m_comboPoints = count;
14389 
14390  target->AddComboPointHolder(GetGUIDLow());
14391  }
14392 
14393  if (m_comboPoints > 5) m_comboPoints = 5;
14394  if (m_comboPoints < 0) m_comboPoints = 0;
14395 
14396  if (IsPlayer())
14397  static_cast<Player*>(this)->SendComboPoints();
14398  if (Player const* player = GetControllingPlayer())
14399  {
14400  if (player != this)
14401  {
14402  auto packedComboTarget = GetComboTargetGuid().WriteAsPacked();
14403  WorldPacket data;
14404  data.Initialize(SMSG_PET_UPDATE_COMBO_POINTS, GetPackGUID().size() + packedComboTarget.size() + 1);
14405  data << GetPackGUID();
14406  data << packedComboTarget;
14407  data << uint8(m_comboPoints);
14408  player->SendDirectMessage(data);
14409  }
14410  }
14411 }
14412 
14413 void Unit::ClearComboPoints()
14414 {
14415  if (!m_comboTargetGuid)
14416  return;
14417 
14418  // without combopoints lost (duration checked in aura)
14419  RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_RETAIN_COMBO_POINTS);
14420 
14421  m_comboPoints = 0;
14422 
14423  if (Unit* target = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*this, m_comboTargetGuid))
14424  target->RemoveComboPointHolder(GetGUIDLow());
14425 
14426  if (IsPlayer())
14427  static_cast<Player*>(this)->SendComboPoints();
14428 
14429  m_comboTargetGuid.Clear();
14430 }
14431 
14432 void Unit::RegisterScalingAura(Aura* aura, bool apply)
14433 {
14434  if (apply)
14435  m_scalingAuras.push_back(aura);
14436  else
14437  m_scalingAuras.erase(std::remove(m_scalingAuras.begin(), m_scalingAuras.end(), aura), m_scalingAuras.end());
14438 }
14439 
14440 void Unit::UpdateScalingAuras()
14441 {
14442  for (Aura* aura : m_scalingAuras)
14443  aura->UpdateAuraScaling();
14444 }
14445 
14446 uint32 Unit::GetModifierXpBasedOnDamageReceived(uint32 xp)
14447 {
14448  if (xp && IsCreature() && GetDamageDoneByOthers())
14449  {
14450  uint32 health = GetMaxHealth();
14451  float percentageHp = float(GetDamageDoneByOthers()) / health;
14452  if (percentageHp >= 1.f)
14453  xp = 0;
14454  else if (percentageHp > 0.f)
14455  xp *= (1.f - percentageHp);
14456  }
14457  return xp;
14458 }
14459 
14460 void Unit::OverrideMountDisplayId(uint32 newDisplayId)
14461 {
14462  if (newDisplayId)
14463  {
14464  m_overridenMountId = newDisplayId;
14465  if (GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED).size())
14466  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MOUNTDISPLAYID, newDisplayId);
14467  m_isMountOverriden = true;
14468  }
14469  else
14470  {
14471  m_isMountOverriden = false;
14472  auto& mountedAuras = GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED);
14473  if (mountedAuras.size())
14474  SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MOUNTDISPLAYID, mountedAuras.back()->GetAmount());
14475  m_overridenMountId = 0;
14476  }
14477 }
14478 
14479 void Unit::AddSummonForOnDeathDespawn(ObjectGuid guid)
14480 {
14481  m_summonsForOnDeathDespawn.insert(guid);
14482 }
14483 
14484 void Unit::DespawnSummonsOnDeath()
14485 {
14486  for (ObjectGuid guid : m_summonsForOnDeathDespawn)
14487  if (Creature* summon = GetMap()->GetAnyTypeCreature(guid))
14488  summon->ForcedDespawn();
14489 
14490  m_summonsForOnDeathDespawn.clear();
14491 }
14492 
14493 bool Unit::MeetsSelectAttackingRequirement(Unit* target, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, uint32 selectFlags, SelectAttackingTargetParams params, int32 unitConditionId) const
14494 {
14495  if (selectFlags)
14496  {
14497  if ((selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_PLAYER) && (!target->IsPlayer() || !target->IsPlayerControlled()))
14498  return false;
14499 
14500  if ((selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_POWER_MANA) && target->GetPowerType() != POWER_MANA)
14501  return false;
14502 
14503  if ((selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_POWER_RAGE) && target->GetPowerType() != POWER_RAGE)
14504  return false;
14505 
14506  if ((selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_POWER_ENERGY) && target->GetPowerType() != POWER_ENERGY)
14507  return false;
14508 
14509  if ((selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_IN_MELEE_RANGE) && !CanReachWithMeleeAttack(target))
14510  return false;
14511 
14512  if ((selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_NOT_IN_MELEE_RANGE) && CanReachWithMeleeAttack(target))
14513  return false;
14514 
14515  if ((selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_IN_LOS) && !IsWithinLOSInMap(target, true))
14516  return false;
14517 
14518  if (!target->IsAlive())
14519  return false;
14520 
14521  if ((selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_RANGE_RANGE))
14522  {
14523  float dist = GetDistance(target, true, DIST_CALC_COMBAT_REACH);
14524  if (dist > params.range.maxRange || dist < params.range.minRange)
14525  return false;
14526  }
14527 
14528  if ((selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_RANGE_AOE_RANGE))
14529  {
14530  float dist = target->GetDistance(GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ(), DIST_CALC_COMBAT_REACH);
14531  if (dist > params.range.maxRange || dist < params.range.minRange)
14532  return false;
14533  }
14534 
14535  if ((selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_POWER_NOT_MANA) && target->GetPowerType() == POWER_MANA)
14536  return false;
14537 
14538  if ((selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_SKIP_TANK) && target == GetVictim())
14539  return false;
14540 
14541  if ((selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_SKIP_CUSTOM) && target->GetObjectGuid() == params.skip.guid)
14542  return false;
14543 
14544  if ((selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_CASTING) && !target->IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false))
14545  return false;
14546  }
14547 
14548  if (spellInfo)
14549  {
14550  if (!spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_CAN_TARGET_UNTARGETABLE) && target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_UNTARGETABLE))
14551  return false;
14552 
14553  if (selectFlags & (SELECT_FLAG_HAS_AURA | SELECT_FLAG_NOT_AURA))
14554  {
14555  if (selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_HAS_AURA)
14556  {
14557  if (!target->HasAura(spellInfo->Id))
14558  return false;
14559  }
14560 
14561  if (selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_NOT_AURA)
14562  {
14563  if (target->HasAura(spellInfo->Id))
14564  return false;
14565  }
14566  }
14567 
14568  if (selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_NOT_IMMUNE)
14569  if (target->IsImmuneToSpell(spellInfo, false, GetCheckCastEffectMask(spellInfo), this))
14570  return false;
14571 
14572  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_ONLY_ON_PLAYER) && target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
14573  return false;
14574 
14575  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NOT_ON_PLAYER) && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
14576  return false;
14577 
14578  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NOT_ON_PLAYER_CONTROLLED_NPC) && target->IsPlayerControlled() && target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
14579  return false;
14580 
14581  switch (spellInfo->rangeIndex)
14582  {
14583  case SPELL_RANGE_IDX_ANYWHERE: return true;
14584  case SPELL_RANGE_IDX_COMBAT: return CanReachWithMeleeAttack(target);
14585  }
14586 
14587  if (selectFlags & (SELECT_FLAG_USE_EFFECT_RADIUS | SELECT_FLAG_USE_EFFECT_RADIUS_OF_TRIGGERED_SPELL))
14588  {
14589  SpellEntry const* resultingEntry = spellInfo;
14590  if (selectFlags & SELECT_FLAG_USE_EFFECT_RADIUS_OF_TRIGGERED_SPELL)
14591  resultingEntry = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellInfo->EffectTriggerSpell[0]);
14592  SpellRadiusEntry const* srange = sSpellRadiusStore.LookupEntry(resultingEntry->EffectRadiusIndex[0]);
14593  float max_range = GetSpellRadius(srange);
14594  float dist = target->GetDistance(GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ(), DIST_CALC_COMBAT_REACH);
14595  return dist < max_range;
14596  }
14597  else
14598  {
14599  SpellRangeEntry const* srange = sSpellRangeStore.LookupEntry(spellInfo->rangeIndex);
14600  float max_range = GetSpellMaxRange(srange);
14601  float min_range = GetSpellMinRange(srange);
14602  float dist = GetDistance(target, true, DIST_CALC_COMBAT_REACH);
14603  return dist < max_range&& dist >= min_range;
14604  }
14605  }
14606 
14607  if (unitConditionId && !sObjectMgr.IsUnitConditionSatisfied(unitConditionId, target, this))
14608  return false;
14609 
14610  return true;
14611 }
14612 
14613 Unit* Unit::SelectAttackingTarget(AttackingTarget target, uint32 position, uint32 spellId, uint32 selectFlags, SelectAttackingTargetParams params /*= SelectAttackingTargetParams()*/, int32 unitConditionId/* = 0*/) const
14614 {
14615  return SelectAttackingTarget(target, position, sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId), selectFlags, params, unitConditionId);
14616 }
14617 
14618 Unit* Unit::SelectAttackingTarget(AttackingTarget target, uint32 position, SpellEntry const* spellInfo /*= nullptr*/, uint32 selectFlags/*= 0*/, SelectAttackingTargetParams params /*= SelectAttackingTargetParams()*/, int32 unitConditionId/* = 0*/) const
14619 {
14620  if (!CanHaveThreatList())
14621  return nullptr;
14622 
14623  ThreatList const& threatlist = getThreatManager().getThreatList();
14624  if (threatlist.empty() || position >= threatlist.size())
14625  return nullptr;
14626 
14627  ThreatList::const_iterator itr = threatlist.begin();
14628 
14629  switch (target)
14630  {
14631  case ATTACKING_TARGET_RANDOM:
14632  {
14633  std::vector<Unit*> suitableUnits;
14634  suitableUnits.reserve(threatlist.size() - position);
14635 
14636  if (position)
14637  advance(itr, position);
14638 
14639  for (; itr != threatlist.end(); ++itr)
14640  {
14641  if (Unit* pTarget = GetMap()->GetUnit((*itr)->getUnitGuid()))
14642  {
14643  if ((!selectFlags && !spellInfo) || MeetsSelectAttackingRequirement(pTarget, spellInfo, selectFlags, params, unitConditionId))
14644  suitableUnits.push_back(pTarget);
14645  }
14646  }
14647 
14648  if (!suitableUnits.empty())
14649  return suitableUnits[urand(0, suitableUnits.size() - 1)];
14650 
14651  break;
14652  }
14653  case ATTACKING_TARGET_TOPAGGRO:
14654  {
14655  if (position)
14656  advance(itr, position);
14657 
14658  for (; itr != threatlist.end(); ++itr)
14659  {
14660  if (Unit* pTarget = GetMap()->GetUnit((*itr)->getUnitGuid()))
14661  {
14662  if ((!selectFlags && !spellInfo) || MeetsSelectAttackingRequirement(pTarget, spellInfo, selectFlags, params, unitConditionId))
14663  return pTarget;
14664  }
14665  }
14666 
14667  break;
14668  }
14669  case ATTACKING_TARGET_BOTTOMAGGRO:
14670  {
14671  ThreatList::const_reverse_iterator ritr = threatlist.rbegin();
14672 
14673  if (position)
14674  advance(ritr, position);
14675 
14676  for (; ritr != threatlist.rend(); ++ritr)
14677  {
14678  if (Unit* pTarget = GetMap()->GetUnit((*itr)->getUnitGuid()))
14679  {
14680  if ((!selectFlags && !spellInfo) || MeetsSelectAttackingRequirement(pTarget, spellInfo, selectFlags, params, unitConditionId))
14681  return pTarget;
14682  }
14683  }
14684 
14685  break;
14686  }
14687  case ATTACKING_TARGET_NEAREST_BY:
14688  case ATTACKING_TARGET_FARTHEST_AWAY:
14689  {
14690  UnitList suitableUnits;
14691 
14692  for (; itr != threatlist.end(); ++itr)
14693  {
14694  if (Unit* pTarget = GetMap()->GetUnit((*itr)->getUnitGuid()))
14695  {
14696  if ((!selectFlags && !spellInfo) || MeetsSelectAttackingRequirement(pTarget, spellInfo, selectFlags, params, unitConditionId))
14697  suitableUnits.push_back(pTarget);
14698  }
14699  }
14700 
14701  if (suitableUnits.empty() || position >= suitableUnits.size())
14702  return nullptr;
14703 
14704  if (suitableUnits.size() > 1)
14705  {
14706  if (target == ATTACKING_TARGET_NEAREST_BY)
14707  suitableUnits.sort(TargetDistanceOrderNear(this));
14708  else
14709  suitableUnits.sort(TargetDistanceOrderFarAway(this));
14710  }
14711 
14712  UnitList::iterator itr2 = suitableUnits.begin();
14713  if (position)
14714  std::advance(itr2, position);
14715  return *itr2;
14716  }
14717  case ATTACKING_TARGET_ALL_SUITABLE:
14718  //TODO:: This should not happen
14719  sLog.outError("Creature::SelectAttackingTarget> Target have unimplemented value 'ATTACKING_TARGET_ALL_SUITABLE'!");
14720  break;
14721  default:
14722  break;
14723  }
14724 
14725  return nullptr;
14726 }
14727 
14728 void Unit::SelectAttackingTargets(std::vector<Unit*>& selectedTargets, AttackingTarget target, uint32 position, uint32 spellId, uint32 selectFlags/*= 0*/, SelectAttackingTargetParams params /*= SelectAttackingTargetParams()*/, int32 unitConditionId/* = 0*/) const
14729 {
14730  SelectAttackingTargets(selectedTargets, target, position, sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId), selectFlags, params, unitConditionId);
14731 }
14732 
14733 void Unit::SelectAttackingTargets(std::vector<Unit*>& selectedTargets, AttackingTarget target, uint32 position, SpellEntry const* spellInfo /*= nullptr*/, uint32 selectFlags/*= 0*/, SelectAttackingTargetParams params /*= SelectAttackingTargetParams()*/, int32 unitConditionId/* = 0*/) const
14734 {
14735  if (!CanHaveThreatList())
14736  return;
14737 
14738  ThreatList const& threatlist = getThreatManager().getThreatList();
14739  if (threatlist.empty() || position >= threatlist.size())
14740  return;
14741 
14742  ThreatList::const_iterator itr = threatlist.begin();
14743 
14744  switch (target)
14745  {
14746  case ATTACKING_TARGET_ALL_SUITABLE:
14747  {
14748  if (position)
14749  advance(itr, position);
14750 
14751  for (; itr != threatlist.end(); ++itr)
14752  {
14753  if (Unit* pTarget = GetMap()->GetUnit((*itr)->getUnitGuid()))
14754  {
14755  if ((!selectFlags && !spellInfo) || MeetsSelectAttackingRequirement(pTarget, spellInfo, selectFlags, params, unitConditionId))
14756  selectedTargets.push_back(pTarget);
14757  }
14758  }
14759  break;
14760  }
14761  case ATTACKING_TARGET_RANDOM:
14762  case ATTACKING_TARGET_TOPAGGRO:
14763  case ATTACKING_TARGET_BOTTOMAGGRO:
14764  case ATTACKING_TARGET_NEAREST_BY:
14765  case ATTACKING_TARGET_FARTHEST_AWAY:
14766  default:
14767  //TODO:: This should not happen
14768  sLog.outError("Creature::SelectAttackingTarget> Target have unimplemented value!");
14769  break;
14770  }
14771 }
14772 
14773 void Unit::SetLevitate(bool enable)
14774 {
14775  bool isClientControlled = IsClientControlled();
14776 
14777  if (!isClientControlled)
14778  {
14779  if (enable)
14780  m_movementInfo.AddMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_LEVITATING);
14781  else
14782  m_movementInfo.RemoveMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_LEVITATING);
14783  }
14784 
14785  if (!IsInWorld()) // is sent on add to map
14786  return;
14787 
14788  if (isClientControlled)
14789  {
14790  if (Player const* player = GetControllingPlayer())
14791  {
14792  auto const counter = player->GetSession()->GetOrderCounter();
14793 
14794  WorldPacket data(enable ? SMSG_MOVE_GRAVITY_DISABLE : SMSG_MOVE_GRAVITY_ENABLE, GetPackGUID().size() + 4);
14795  data << GetPackGUID();
14796  data << counter;
14797  player->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
14798  player->GetSession()->IncrementOrderCounter();
14799  return;
14800  }
14801  }
14802 
14803  WorldPacket data(enable ? SMSG_SPLINE_MOVE_GRAVITY_DISABLE : SMSG_SPLINE_MOVE_GRAVITY_ENABLE, 9);
14804  data << GetPackGUID();
14805  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
14806 }
14807 
14808 void Unit::SetSwim(bool enable)
14809 {
14810  if (IsClientControlled())
14811  return;
14812 
14813  if (enable)
14814  m_movementInfo.AddMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_SWIMMING);
14815  else
14816  m_movementInfo.RemoveMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_SWIMMING);
14817 
14818  if (!IsInWorld()) // is sent on add to map
14819  return;
14820 
14821  WorldPacket data(enable ? SMSG_SPLINE_MOVE_START_SWIM : SMSG_SPLINE_MOVE_STOP_SWIM);
14822  data << GetPackGUID();
14823  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
14824 }
14825 
14826 void Unit::SetCanFly(bool enable)
14827 {
14828  bool isClientControlled = IsClientControlled();
14829 
14830  if (!isClientControlled)
14831  {
14832  if (enable)
14833  m_movementInfo.AddMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_CAN_FLY);
14834  else
14835  m_movementInfo.RemoveMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_CAN_FLY);
14836  }
14837 
14838  if (!IsInWorld()) // is sent on add to map
14839  return;
14840 
14841  if (isClientControlled)
14842  {
14843  if (Player const* player = GetControllingPlayer())
14844  {
14845  auto const counter = player->GetSession()->GetOrderCounter();
14846 
14847  WorldPacket data(enable ? SMSG_MOVE_SET_CAN_FLY : SMSG_MOVE_UNSET_CAN_FLY, GetPackGUID().size() + 4);
14848  data << GetPackGUID();
14849  data << counter;
14850  player->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
14851  player->GetSession()->GetAnticheat()->OrderSent(data.GetOpcode(), counter);
14852  player->GetSession()->IncrementOrderCounter();
14853  return;
14854  }
14855  }
14856 
14857  WorldPacket data(enable ? SMSG_SPLINE_MOVE_SET_FLYING : SMSG_SPLINE_MOVE_UNSET_FLYING, 9);
14858  data << GetPackGUID();
14859  SendMessageToSet(data, true);

14862 void Unit::SetFeatherFall(bool enable)
14863 {
14864  bool isClientControlled = IsClientControlled();
14865 
14866  if (!isClientControlled)
14867  {
14868  if (enable)
14869  m_movementInfo.AddMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_SAFE_FALL);
14870  else
14871  m_movementInfo.RemoveMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_SAFE_FALL);
14872  }
14873 
14874  if (!IsInWorld()) // is sent on add to map
14875  return;
14876 
14877  if (isClientControlled)
14878  {
14879  if (Player const* player = GetControllingPlayer())
14880  {
14881  auto const counter = player->GetSession()->GetOrderCounter();
14882 
14883  WorldPacket data(enable ? SMSG_MOVE_FEATHER_FALL : SMSG_MOVE_NORMAL_FALL, GetPackGUID().size() + 4);
14884 
14885  data << GetPackGUID();
14886  data << counter;
14887  player->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
14888  player->GetSession()->GetAnticheat()->OrderSent(data.GetOpcode(), counter);
14889  player->GetSession()->IncrementOrderCounter();
14890 
14891  // start fall from current height
14892  if (!enable)
14893  const_cast<Player*>(player)->SetFallInformation(0, GetPositionZ());
14894 
14895  return;
14896  }
14897  }
14898 
14899  WorldPacket data(enable ? SMSG_SPLINE_MOVE_FEATHER_FALL : SMSG_SPLINE_MOVE_NORMAL_FALL);
14900  data << GetPackGUID();
14901  SendMessageToSet(data, true);
14902 }

14976 
14977 void Unit::CharmCooldownInitialize(WorldPacket& data) const
14978 {
14979  // write cooldown data
14980  uint32 cdCount = 0;
14981  const size_t cdCountPos = data.wpos();
14982  data << uint8(0);
14983  auto currTime = GetMap()->GetCurrentClockTime();
14984 
14985  for (auto& cdItr : m_cooldownMap)
14986  {
14987  auto& cdData = cdItr.second;
14988  TimePoint spellRecTime = currTime;
14989  TimePoint catRecTime = currTime;
14990  cdData->GetSpellCDExpireTime(spellRecTime);
14991  cdData->GetCatCDExpireTime(catRecTime);
14992  uint32 spellCDDuration = 0;
14993  uint32 catCDDuration = 0;
14994  if (spellRecTime > currTime)
14995  spellCDDuration = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(spellRecTime - currTime).count();
14996  if (catRecTime > currTime)
14997  catCDDuration = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(catRecTime - currTime).count();
14998 
14999  if (!spellCDDuration && !catCDDuration && !cdData->IsPermanent())
15000  continue;
15001 
15002  if (cdData->IsPermanent())
15003  catCDDuration |= 0x80000000;
15004 
15005  data << uint32(cdData->GetSpellId());
15006  data << uint16(cdData->GetCategory()); // spell category
15007  data << uint32(spellCDDuration); // cooldown
15008  data << uint32(catCDDuration); // category cooldown
15009  ++cdCount;
15010  }
15011  data.put<uint8>(cdCountPos, cdCount);
15012 }
